name: 2008 Catana Catana 652008 Catana Catana 65
description:
TRAMONTANE is hull n° 2 of the Catana 65 Series. It was initially sold EUR 3.5 M to her first owner who sailed her in the Mediterranean Sea then in the Caribbean for a little more than a year. She was then bought back and refitted by the shipyard following the initial owner’s order of a new Catana 65. Catana exhibited her in 2009 at the Barcelona Yacht Show. She then was stored on the hard until 2014 when her current owner bought her.
In 2014 she underwent an extensive refit where engines, generator, running & standing rigging, sails, tender, seacocks, etc. have been renewed or serviced. TRAMONTANE is extremely well built (bottom of the hulls in Twaron, topsides built out of composite, all carbon roof, bulkheads & beams, interior built out of sandwich panels with wood veneers. She only weight 30.2 t fully loaded. Carbon mast and bowsprit, sails in Twaron Dyneema, fine hull, nacelle well above the water. Extensive comfort equipment: heater, air conditioning, water maker, generator, 4 cabins with unsuited bathroom. She can easily be handled by one person with 2 engines, electric winches, etc.
Please note that a major refit has been done in 2021 - Details of the work carried out are available on request.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2008 Custom ZEYDON Z602008 Custom ZEYDON Z60
description:
ENGLISH - This Zeydon Z60 REGULUS, designed by Bosgraaf Yacht Design in close cooperation with BMW Designworks USA, has been totally refitted in 2020/2021. Her design is fascinating, her performance is outstanding and her interior sleek yet comfortable. The current owners not only have invested quite some money in the refit, but also their heart and soul. The hull has been re-painted, the teak decks have been renovated, hydraulics and electronics have been overhauled, windows have been replaced, and sails have been renewed. And, to optimize the center of gravity, they have made changes to the bulb keel. She is very well equipped with carbon mast and carbon furling boom, hydraulic opening garage, an 110hp Yanmar diesel engine, folding prop, bow thruster, generator, new bimini and spray hood, dinghy with outboard, life raft, numerous covers, etc. The interior of this Zeydon Z60 is bright and there is no shortage of space. The upholstery has recently been renewed and she is furthermore comfortably fitted out with air conditioning and heating. The L-shaped galley is located to starboard, the generous navigation corner is located to port, and the dining area can easily seat up to 6 guests. The big master cabin with ensuite is located forward. The two ample guest cabins are located aft and share the second bathroom.  REGULUS will surely turn heads wherever you go.
DEUTSCH - Diese Zeydon Z60 REGULUS, entworfen von Bosgraaf Yacht Design in enger Zusammenarbeit mit BMW Designworks USA, unterzog im Jahr 2020/2021 einen kompletten Refit. Ihr Design ist faszinierend, ihre Leistung herausragend, und ihr Interieur ist modern doch komfortabel. Die heutigen Besitzer haben nicht nur viel Geld investiert während der Refit, sondern auch ihr Herzblut. Der Rumpf wurde neu lackiert, die Teakdecks wurden renoviert, die Segel wurden erneuert, Hydraulik und Elektronik wurden überholt und Fenster wurden ersetzt. Um den Scherpunkt zu optimieren und so noch bessere Segelleistungen zu erreichen, wurden Änderungen am Kiel vorgenommen. REGULUS ist gut ausgestattet mit Karbon Mast und Rollbaum, hydraulisch betriebene Garage, einem 110PS Yanmar Dieselmotor, Faltpropeller, Bugstrahlruder, Generator, neues Bimini und Spritzverdeck, Beiboot mit Außenborder, Rettungsinsel, zahlreiche Persenninge, usw. Das Interieur dieser Zeydon Z60 ist hell und es mangelt nicht an Platz. Die Polsterung wurde kürzlich erneuert und sie ist außerdem komfortabel versehen mit Klimaanlage und Heizung. Die L-förmige Kombüse befindet sich am Steuerbord, die großzügige Navigationsecke ist am Backbord, und  der bequeme Essbereich bietet Platz bis zu 6 Personen. Die große Eignerkabine vorne hat ein eigenes Ensuite-Badezimmer, und die zwei Gästekabinen achter teilen sich die getrennte Toilette und Dusche. Ein echter Hingucker!
ESPAÑOL - Este Zeydon Z60 REGULUS, diseñado por Bosgraaf Yacht Design en estrecha colaboración con BMW Designworks UUAA, se sometió un gran refit en 2020/2021. Su diseño es fascinante, su rendimiento excelente, y su interior moderno y cómodo. Los propietarios actuales no solo han invertido bastante dinero en el refit, sino también su corazón y su alma. El casco ha sido repintado, las cubiertas de teca han sido restauradas, la hidráulica y la electrónica han sido revisadas, las ventanas han sido reemplazadas y las velas han sido renovadas. Para obtener un rendimiento aún más mejor, se han optimizado el centro de gravedad en la quilla. REGULUS está muy bien equipado con mástil de carbono, botavara enrollable de carbón, garaje de apertura hidráulica, motor diésel de 110 CV, hélice plegable, propulsor de proa, generador, nuevo bimini y capote, bote auxiliar con fueraborda, balsa salvavidas, etc. El interior de este Zeydon Z60 es luminoso y hay más que suficiente espacio. Está cómodamente equipada con aire acondicionado y calefacción, y recientemente, la tapicería ha sido renovada. El camarote principal con baño privado está en proa, y los camarotes de invitados y el segundo baño están localizados en popa. No importe donde vayas, este Zeydon llamará la atención.
NEDERLANDS - Deze Zeydon Z60 REGULUS, ontworpen door Bosgraaf Yacht Design in nauwe samenwerking met BMW Designworks USA, onderging een complete refit in 2020/2021. Haar ontwerp is fascinerend, haar prestaties zijn uitstekend, en haar interieur is modern en comfortabel. De huidige eigenaren hebben niet alleen flink wat geld geïnvesteerd in de refit, maar ook hun hart en ziel. De romp is opnieuw geschilderd, de teakdekken zijn gerenoveerd, hydrauliek en elektronica zijn gereviseerd, ramen zijn vervangen, en zeilen zijn vernieuwd. En, om nog betere zeilprestaties te verkrijgen, is het zwaartepunt in de kiel geoptimaliseerd. Ze is zeer goed uitgerust met een carbon mast, carbon rolgiek, hydraulische garage, 110PK dieselmotor, klapschroef, boegschroef, generator, nieuwe bimini en buiskap, bijboot met buitenboordmotor, reddingsvlot, etc. Het interieur van deze Zeydon Z60 baadt in licht en aan ruimte is geen gebrek. De bekleding is onlangs vernieuwd en ze is verder comfortabel voorzien van airconditioning en verwarming. De eigenaarshut met ensuite bevindt zich in het voorschip, en de twee ruime gastenhutten en de tweede natte cel bevinden zich in het achterschip. Waar je ook naar toe gaat, REGULUS zal menig hoofd doen draaien.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1966 Sangermani YAWL MARCONI1966 Sangermani YAWL MARCONI
description: GIANNELLA II is a wonderful classic sailing yacht ideal for family cruising in absolute comfort. She has won many regattas including The Voiles de St Tropez and Conde de Barcelona. She features lovely warm interiors and is easy to sail!The first owner, an Italian, commissioned the construction of GIANNELLA II under a double signature. First the plans were designed by Eugene Cornu, a famous French Naval Architect, known for his extreme severity about quality of construction. Second, she was built by Cantieri Sangermani, considered as one of the best wooden sailing yacht shipyards in Europe thanks to the large number of regattas wins for their yachts. The result is a perfect classic sailing yacht, easy to sail and comfortable for long sea passages.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1990 Baltic 64 centerboard1990 Baltic 64 centerboard
description:
The Baltic 64 TANASSA with centerboard from 1990 is for sale
The Baltic 64 TANASSA is the ultimate blue water cruiser. Classic lines from Sparkman&Stephens make this yacht a timeless classic that can be moved even with a small crew. The mainsail is stowed hydraulically in the RECKMANN furling mast, as are the genoa and the staysail, which are driven on hydraulic furling systems. The highlight of the yacht is the centreboard, which makes it possible to reduce the draft from 4.20 m to just 1.80 m. Below deck, TANASSA offers all the amenities that characterize a yacht of this class.
Highlights:

Main and Genoa Triradial new 2018
Epoxy primer and antifouling sandblasted and rebuilt in 2018
Center board (1.80m - 4.20m)
RECKMANN furling mast with hydraulic genoa furler
5x Lewmar electric main sheet winches
Engine Perkins M135, 125 hp, 2015 completely overhauled (approx. 200 hrs.)
New teak deck 2009
Mast service 2008/9, new standing rigging (rod), Reckmann
New air conditioning CONDARIA in 2010
Hull painted AWL-Grip white 2009
110V & 220V system
New SIMRAD/ B&G navigation electronics in 2015
German flag / German owner
EU VAT paid

For sale is the Baltic 64 TANASSA Centerboard Cruiser from 1990
The Baltic 64 TANASSA is a blue water cruiser designed throughout by Sparkman&Stephens with eye-catching, classic lines, fully equipped to go anywhere even with a small crew. TANASSA was built in 1990 and since 1996 owned by her present demanding owner. The yacht offers two cockpits with two companionways, all lines and sheets lead to the aft cockpit. The rig is a RECKMANN furling mast with hydraulic RECKMANN genoa and staysail furlers. She is a equipped with the very rare bronze centerboard keel which allows to reduce the draft hydraulically from 4.20 m to 1.80 m. Below deck TANASSA offers a spacious owners cabin aft with separate companionway, a skipper/navigation room, huge salon with dining area and coffee table. In the bow section are two guest cabins with ensuite heads and a sail locker. TANASSA is fully equipped and well maintained, new teak deck 2009, engine overhauled 2015, new rigging 2009, new navigation electronics 2015. German owner/flag, EU-VAT paid.

Port forward galley (3 cabins / 3 heads + forward Pullman), Boston ambiance, Teak on the bottom of the cockpit, the gangways and on the aft door (black seals), Long cast iron ballast (draught = 2, 85 m), Carbon arch on coachroof for mainsheet, Volvo D4-180cv engine, 4-blade folding propeller, Mainsail Full Batten Dacron + lazy bag, Dacron self-tacking jib on electric furler, Electric windlass 2000W, Table of cockpit, Cockpit shower (hot/cold water), Section doors, Leather-covered steering wheels, 230V/110V cockpit portholes, 24v/220v 2300w converter (included in the generator), 4 AGM 140 Ah service batteries, Battery charger, LED lighting (interior fittings), Holding tanks, Radio CD Exterior speakers, Lighting in the bulwark, Electric opening of the rear door Blinds and curtains in the saloon and the cabins Fixed saloon table 2 Winches of electric halyards size 65 2 size 65 manual winches at helm station P retractable bow thruster Instrument support pods starboard and port helm console, Outdoor galley: gas griddle + sink, electric toilet in the Forward Owner cabin.
SAILING ELECTRONIC PACK
Central log speedo wind vane anemometer + 1 I70 display to port, Raymarine Evolution autopilot - hydraulic cylinder - P70 display, VHF Ray63GPS AXIOM 7 to starboard.
CRUISING ELECTRONIC PACK
Large Pods, Upgrade Autopilot: Lewmar rotary engine, Second Ray Mic handset at starboard helm station, AXIOM 12 PRO GPS instead of AXIOM 7 on starboard, AXIOM 12 PRO GPS on port, AIS 700 HP VHF cockpit transceiver
TRANSAT ELECTRONIC PACK
18" Digital Radar - QUANTUM, Smart Controller Wireless Remote Control
OPTIONS
Electric winches at the helm station, Releasable forestay + 1 staysail halyard, Asymmetrical spinnaker fittings, Stainless steel bow protection, Wheel helm covers + cockpit table cover, POD covers, Companionship sprayhood with handrail: Dark smoke, Bimini Dark smoke, Winch + Inflator / Deflator + guide rollers, Cockpit bench cushions with backrests + rear seats + helmsman backrest: Dark smoke, Refrigerator integrated into the cockpit table, Chain locker flushing, Shorepower connector fresh water, Preparation of the boat in La Rochelle and handover/training with skipper.
Constantly looking to the future, Dufour designs each new model to give you pleasure and sensations in complete serenity, whatever your cruising plans and the use of your sailboat. For over 60 years, we have been designing and building innovative, high-performance sailboats.

name: 1998 Hallberg-Rassy 621998 Hallberg-Rassy 62
description:
ENGLISH - This Hallberg Rassy 62 with new teak decks is a high quality offshore cruising yacht designed by Germán Frers. She is well balanced, has a strong hull and has an efficient and easy to handle sail plan. And she has a well-protected center cockpit with good shelter from the hard top.  Very well equipped with; an in-mast main sail, jib, genoa, as new gennaker and spinnaker, hydraulic boom vang, reefing system, hydraulic back stay adjuster and furler, hydraulic winches, winches at the mast, etc. And all this can be handled by the push buttons at the steering pedestal. Furthermore, fitted out with; a 235 hp diesel engine, bow thruster, folding prop, generator, inverter, battery chargers, and a complete B&G navigation equipment in the cockpit and at the chart table. Further to that, a water maker, life raft, Epirb, hydraulic gangway, and a dinghy with outboard. The lay out under deck of this Hallberg Rassy 62 is well-arranged and offers plenty of space and stowage room which indispensable for longer periods on board. Furthermore, fitted out with; a reverse cycle air conditioning system, electric toilets, and a washer/dryer. She has a huge owner’s cabin located aft with ensuite. Located fore are a guest cabin to port with semi-double bed, a guest cabin to starboard with bunk beds, a guest cabin with v-berth, and two head compartments.  A long distance cruiser offering great comfort either at sea or in the harbour.
DEUTSCH - Diese Hallberg Rassy 62 mit neuen Teakdecks ist eine hochwertige, von Germán Frers entworfene, Offshore-Kreuzfahrtenyacht. Sie ist gut ausbalanciert, hat einen starken Rumpf, und verfügt über einen effizienten und einfach zu handhaben Segelplan. Weiter, hat sie ein gut geschütztes Mittelplicht mit gutem Schutz durch das Hardtop. Sehr gut ausgestattet mit einem Inmast-Großsegel, Fock, Genua, einem neuwertigen Gennaker und Spinnaker, hydraulischen Baumniederholer, Reff System,  hydraulisches verstellbares Achterstag und Rollreffanlage, hydraulischen Winden, Winden am Mast, usw. All dies kann über die Drucktasten am Lenksäule bedient werden. Weiter, ausgestattet mit einem 235 PS starken Dieselmotor, Bugstrahlruder, Faltpropeller, Generator, Wechselrichter, Batterieladegeräte, und eine komplette B&G Navigationsausrüstung im Plicht und am Kartentisch. Darüber hinaus, ausgestattet mit einem Wassermacher, eine Rettungsinsel, Epirb, eine hydraulische Gangway und ein Beiboot mit Außenborder. Das Layout unter Deck dieser Hallberg Rassy 62 ist übersichtlich und geräumig und bietet viel Stauraum, etwas was für längere Aufenthalte an Bord unerlässlich ist. Außerdem, ist sie mit einer Reverse-Zyklus Klimaanlage, elektrische Toiletten und einer Waschmaschine/Trockner ausgestattet. Sie hat eine großzügige Eignerkabine achtern mit eigenem Bad. Im Vorschiff befinden sich eine Gästekabine an Backbord mit einem kleinen Doppelbett, eine Gästekabine an Steuerbord mit Etagenbetten, eine Gästekabine mit V-Koje und zwei Nasszellen. Ein Langstreckenkreuzer, der sowohl auf See als auch im Hafen großen Komfort bietet.
ESPAÑOL - Este Hallberg Rassy 62 con cubiertas de teca nuevas es un velero de alta calidad dise;ado por Germán Frers. Es un yate bien equilibrado, tiene un casco fuerte, y tiene un plano vélico eficiente y fácil de manejar. Además, la bañera central con techo rígido ofrece bien protección. Está bien equipado con: vela mayor enrollable en el mástil, foque, génova, gennaker y spinnaker como nuevos, contra de botavara hidráulico, estay de popa y enrollador hidráulico, cabrestantes hidráulicos, cabrestantes en el mástil, etc. Y todo esto puede ser manejado por los botones en el pedestal de dirección. Además, está equipado con un motor diésel de 235 CV, hélice de proa, hélice plegable, generador, inversor, cargadores de baterías y un completo equipo de navegación B&G en la bañera y en la mesa de cartas. Más aún, una desalinizadora, balsa salvavidas, Epirb, pasarela hidráulica, y un bote auxiliar con fueraborda. Además, equipado con aire acondicionado, inodoros eléctricos, y una lavadora/secadora. 
NEDERLANDS - Deze Hallberg Rassy 62 met nieuwe teakdekken is een offshore cruising-jacht van hoge kwaliteit, ontworpen door Germán Frers. Ze is goed gebalanceerd, heeft een sterke romp, een goed beschermde middenkuip met hardtop, en een efficiënt zeilplan. Zeer goed uitgerust met; een in-mast grootzeil, fok, genua, gennaker en spinnaker die als nieuw zijn, hydraulische neerhouder, hydraulische achterstag en rolsysteem, hydraulische lieren, lieren bij de mast, etc. Dit alles kan bediend worden met de drukknoppen aan de stuurstand. Verder, uitgerust met een 235 pk dieselmotor, boegschroef, klapschroef, generator, omvormer, acculaders, en een complete B&G navigatie-uitrusting in de kuip en aan de kaartentafel. Verder, een watermaker, reddingsvlot, Epirb, hydraulische gangway, en een bijboot met buitenboordmotor. De lay-out onderdek van deze Hallberg Rassy 62 is ruim. Verder beschikt ze over veel opbergruimte, airconditioning, elektrische toiletten en een wasmachine/droger. De grote eigenaarshut met badkamer ensuite bevindt zich in het achterschip. In het voorste gedeelte bevinden zich een gastenhut met semi-dubbel bed, een gastenhut met stapelbed, een gastenhut met V-bed, en twee natte cellen. Mehr anzeigen

name: 2002 Azzura 60' CANTING KEEL MINI MAXI2002 Azzura 60' CANTING KEEL MINI MAXI
description:
The Reichel-Pugh designed WILD JOE is one of the world’s fastest 60 foot sailboat, built by the Australian Azzura Marine boat factory in 2002. Wild Oats IX (her original name) is part of a 'legendary' line of Australian racing boats crewed by the Oatley family. The name and ownership change did not interrupt the boat’s success series, and up to now, it holds the record at the Pittwater Coffs Harbour Race, a regatta at which it captured four IRC victories. She has been transformed from her original Admiral’s Cup winning design to a DSS foiling boat using the latest foil and sail technology to take her performance to new levels.
In 2018 WILD JOE underwent a complete refit, including the installation of a DSS foil. The DSS foil, coupled with a completely new sail inventory from Doyle Sails, supervised and developed by Stu Bannatyne, has meant that the performance of the yacht has been increased as much as 40%. Speed increases of 6 knots in moderate wind strengths are not uncommon and the thrill factor for the owner and crew is at a completely different level.
Perfect for the offshore Mediterranean circuit, the West Coast of the USA and the Caribbean, still a potential Sydney-Hobart Winner, WILD JOE is a head turning game changer. WILD JOE is an iconic racing yacht. This is a rare opportunity to acquire such a legendary and perfectly refitted racer at such reasonable price.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1996 X-Yachts X-6121996 X-Yachts X-612
description:
Well maintained X-Yachts X-612 (1996) located in Valencia, Spain


This well maintained X-Yachts X-612 Mk1 Diva (1996) located in Valencia, Spain, is still a high-performance luxury yacht which offers impressive speed and ease of handling. The waterline length of this model allows additional cruising features. The design incorporates honey-comb-cored sandwich bulkheads and floorboards and a stern garage for a 2.8M dinghy. Current owner already updated electronic equipment and extensive sail wardrobe and the hull was refurbished in 2019. Diva is ready to sail. Yanmar 110 Hp engine with new turbo in 2018 and only 3.000 engine hours. Interested or want to make an appointment for a visit? Contact Frans Bennekers from White Whale Spain Yacht Brokers on spain@wwy.nl or call +34 629979667.
(ES) Bien mantenido XYachts X-612 Mk1 Diva (1996) en Valencia, en buena forma, un velero de prestigio con altas prestaciones, veloz, regatero y de fácil manejo. Barco de excelente calidad de construcción y también diseñado para crucero de altura. El diseño incorpora las cuadernas reforzadas de fibra tipo sandwich y almacenamiento empotrado en la popa donde cabe un dinghy 2.8M. El propietario actual ya puso al día el equipamiento electronico y la extensa colección de velas y el casco se pintó nuevo en 2019. Diva está listo para navegar y tiene todos los impuestos en España pagados. Motor Yanmar 110Hp con turbo Nuevo 2018 y solamente 3.000 horas de motor. Interesado en una visita? Contacta Frans Bennekers de White Whale Spain Yacht Brokers por email spain@wwy.nl o llama al +34 629979667.

Navtec hydraulic control for boom strap, backstay en inner forestay. Hydraulic piston fittings all sealed new. 2 Oversized electric Lewmar 77 winches for genua, also useable for halyards.

Uitrusting

name: 2020 Sunreef 602020 Sunreef 60
description:
**Offers in Excess of €3,500,000 (Ex TAX)**
The Sunreef 60 is an all-round sailing leisure yacht, built for transoceanic performance in comfort and luxury. Characterised by her sleek grey hulls, Calma is a stylish yacht that offers guests 225m2 of luxurious living space and plenty of room for entertaining and socialising. Thanks to the sliding door, the saloon blends seamlessly with the outside, opening onto the large aft deck, as well as the bow terrace.
Heading upstairs to the flybridge, guests will find the BBQ, wet bar and plenty of seating as they unwind and admire panoramic views over the water.
Calma’s interior is designed to create a calming, yet chic and glamorous feeling on board, with a modern grey, black and white palette, combined with warm wooden features, dark paneling and grey soft furnishings across the yacht. The cosy saloon is the ultimate space for lounging and also features a dining area and fully functional galley for a professional chef. The huge panoramic windows surrounding the saloon means natural light is a welcomed and permanent fixture during the day.
The hulls provide impressive volumes housing five guest suites for up to ten guests overnight. Of the five cabins, one is the master stateroom and four are double guest suites, all with their own en-suite facilities, air conditioning and plenty of storage space. Calma also provides accommodation for three professional crew members. 
S6 Marine are the Central Agent for this yacht. 
The text and images used in this listing are not to be reproduced or shared without direct consent from S6 Marine ©Mehr anzeigen

name: 1995 X-Yachts X-6121995 X-Yachts X-612
description:
X-612 with new spray-painted blue hull with full teak decks. This high performance cruiser with racing capabilities is really stunning and is powered by two Volvo Penta diesel engines 60hp each. Very well equipped with: bow thruster, radar, autopilot, chart plotter, complete safety equipment with life raft and Epirb, etc.  Her third owner invested more than 220.000 Euros the past years, which includes; new reversible air-conditioning, mast, standing and running rigging, North Sail mainsail, furling genoa, generator and batteries all fitted in 2014. All interior woodwork has been sanded and varnished as well.  Under deck three double bed cabins, three heads and a separate crew cabin in the bow. Well maintained and Spanish matriculated. 
X-612 mit neu gestrichen blauem Rumpf und Teak Decks. Dieser Hochleistungs-Kreuzer mit Regatta Kapazitäten ist wirklich atemberaubend und wird angetrieben von zwei Volvo Penta Dieselmotoren je 60 PS. Sehr gut ausgestattet mit Bugstrahlruder, Radar, Autopilot, Kartenplotter, komplette Sicherheitsausstattung mit Rettungsinsel und Epirb, usw. Der dritte und aktuelle Besitzer hat in den letzten Jahren mehr als  220.000 Euro investiert  in dieser Yacht. Die folgende Sachen sind erneuert worden: umschaltbare Klimaanlage, Mast, stehendes und laufendes Takelwerk, North Sails Großsegel, Rollreff Genua, Generator und Batterien etc. Der ganze Innenausbau wurde geschliffen und neu lackiert. Unter Deck drei Doppelbettkabinen, drei Nasszellen und einen separaten Marinero-Kabine im Bug. Gut gepflegt und Spanisch registriert.
X-612 con casco azul nuevo pintado y cubiertas de teca. Este yate de crucero de alto rendimiento con  capacidades de regata es realmente impresionante y es propulsado por dos Volvo Penta motores diesel de 60 CV. Muy bien equipado con hélice de proa, radar, piloto automatico, trazador de cartas, equipo de seguridad completo con balsa salvavidas y radiobaliza, etc. Su tercero y actual propietario ha invertido más de 220.000 Euros en este yate. Las siguentes cosas han sido realizado: nuevo aire acondicionado reversible, nuevo mástil, nueva jarcia fija, nueva jarcia de labor, nueva vela mayor de North Sails, nueva genova enrollable, generador, baterías. La carpintería interior ha sido lijada y barnizada. Bajo cubierta tres camarotes dobles, tres baños y un camarote de marinería en proa. Bien mantenido. Lista 7ª registrado.
X-612 met opnieuw gespoten donkerblauwe romp en met teakdekken. Deze high performance cruiser met wedstrijd kwaliteiten is werkelijk indrukwekkend en wordt aangedreven door twee 60pk Volvo Penta dieselmotoren. Zeer goed uitgerust met boegschroef, radar, automatische piloot, kaartplotter, complete veiligheidsuitrusting met reddingsvlot en Epirb, etc. Haar derde en huidige eigenaar heeft de laatste jaren ruim 220.000 euro geïnvesteerd in dit jacht en de volgende zaken zijn aangepakt: nieuwe dubbelwerkende airconditioning, nieuwe mast, nieuw staand en lopen want, nieuw North Sails grootzeil, nieuwe rolgenua, generator en accu’s. Tevens is al het interieurhoutwerk geschuurd en opnieuw gelakt. Onder dek drie tweepersoonshutten, drie natte cellen en een gescheiden hut voor de bemanning in de boeg. Goed onderhouden en Spaans geregistreerd.
X-612 avec coque bleue repeinte et ponts en teck. Ce croiseur de haute performance est vraiment impressionnant et est propulsé par deux Volvo Penta moteurs diesel de chaque 60 cv.  Très bien équipé avec hélice d´étrave, radar, pilote automatique, traceur de cartes, équipement de sécurité complet avec canot de sauvetage y RLS, etc. Sa troisième et actuel propriétaire a investi plus de 220,000 Euros les dernières années en ce voilier. Entre autres les choses suivantes sont réalisées : nouvelle climatisation réversible, nouveau mât, nouveau gréement dormant et courant, nouvelle grand-voile de North Sails, nouveau génois sur enrouleur, groupe électrogène et les batteries  et toute la menuiserie intérieure a été poncé et verni.  Sous le pont trois cabines avec lits double, trois salles d´eau et une cabine de skipper à la proue. Bien entretenu et prêt à partir. Pavillon espagnol, lista 7aMehr anzeigen

New to be built Colin Archer that will be built and delivered completely semi custom built by a shipyard that has more than earned its spurs in the yacht and shipbuilding industry. This together with an excellent yacht architect Olivier van der Meer (known for the Puffin and Zacca designs, among others) stands for a high-quality and solid ship for which no sea is too high. This Spitzgatter is delivered fully ready to sail. As standard she is equipped with a self-draining cockpit, very good insulation, double glazing, central heating and a 125 HP diesel engine. Kotter rigged but also a kit rig is possible. If you want other dimensions, that is certainly possible. For example, if you prefer a keel center sword, that can also be realized. name: 1986 Custom Sciarrelli Bugeye Schooner1986 Custom Sciarrelli Bugeye Schooner
description:
Schooner built in cedar from Lebanon in 1986 by shipwright Piero Crosato based on designs by Carlo Sciarrelli (no. 106 *). The project derives from the Schooner St. Ann of 1736, and is the definitive version of the prototype n. 90 San Nicolò. The rig is a bug-eye schooner, typical of American work schooners. The boat was acquired in 2015 by a new owner specializing in the restoration of vintage hulls, who completely restored it while maintaining its originality. Boat ready to buoy always well maintained by the owner.
English Schooner built of Lebanon cedar in 1986 by the ax master Piero Crosato to designs by Carlo Sciarrelli (b. 106 *). The project is derived from the Schooner St. Ann of 1736, and is the final version of prototype No. 90 San Nicolò. The arm is a bug-eye schooner, typical of American work schooners. The boat was acquired in 2015 by a new owner specialized in the restoration of vintage hulls, which has totally restored it while maintaining its originality of lei. Boat ready for the buoy always well maintained by the owner.

Le bateau a été acquis en 2015 for a nouveau propriétaire special in the restauration de coques vintage, here a total restoration tout en conservant son originality of her. Deutsch Schooner wurde 1986 von dem Axtmeister Piero Crosato nach Entwürfen von Carlo Sciarrelli (geb. 106 *) gebaut. Das Projekt stammt von der Schooner St. Ann von 1736 and is the endgültige Version des Prototyps Nr. 90 San Nicolé. Der Arm ist ein Bug-Eye-Schoner, typisch für amerikanische Arbeitsschoner. Das Boot wurde im Jahr 2015 von einem neuen Besitzer erworben, der auf die Restaurierung von Vintage-Rümpfen spezialisiert ist, die es vollständig restauriert hat, während seine Originalität erhalten bleibt. Boot bereit für die Boje immer gut gepflegt durch den Besitzer.
Español Schooner built of cedar of Lebanon in 1986 by the master of hachas Piero Crosato to the designs of Carlo Sciarrelli (n. 106 *). El proyecto se derives from the Schooner St. Ann de 1736, y es the final versión of the prototype No. 90 San Nicolá. El brazo is a goleta de ojo de bicho, typical of the escuelas de trabajo estadounidenses. The boat was purchased in 2015 by a new owner especially in the restoration of vintage cascos, who fully restored it while maintaining its originality. Проект основан на Шхунер Сент-Энн 1736 года и является окончательной версией прототипа No 90 Сан-Николо. Рука - шхуна с клопами для глаз, типичная для американских рабочих шхун. Лодка была приобретена в 2015 году новым владельцем, специализирующимся на реставрации винтажных корпусов, что полностью восстановило ее, сохранив при этом ее оригинальность. name: 2019 Ice Yachts ICE 602019 Ice Yachts ICE 60
description:
"La linea degli ICE60 per loro natura semi custom, ha consentito una personalizzazione degli interni tale da stravolgere in parte il lay out del primo esemplare. Lo scafo interamente in carbonio accoglie al suo interno un ambiente molto aperto, lo sguardo appena scese le scalette corre libero dal salone centrale alla cabina armatoriale. Lo studio dell’ambiente rispetta delle precise simmetrie, infatti la disposizione dei divani è frontale e ogni divano ha un tavolino dedicato, trasformabile in tavolo da pranzo. Simmetrici anche i due mobili attrezzati della zona cucina e al centro un banco di lavoro ad isola che lascia un ottimo spazio di movimento per il passaggio dalla zona giorno alla zona notte armatoriale. Contribuisce all’idea di grande spazio aperto, la linea pulita degli elementi di arredo, che mantengono in ogni dettaglio un rigoroso ordine. L’arredo infatti minimalista esalta l’importanza degli elementi modellati in armonia ed integrazione con lo scafo, senza distrazioni da altri oggetti superflui. Ogni elemento di arredo è realizzato da stampi ed è caratterizzato da bordi tondeggianti che ammorbidiscono la loro linea decisa. Carbonio lasciato a vista sulle ante degli sportelli alti laterali, che corrono quasi senza interruzioni per tutto il fianco, a cui si unisce un’essenza chiara del legno per i mobili bassi e per i tavolini e un grigio antracite per i divani. Colori quindi neutri pronti a supportare il verde acido, un colore forte e di contrasto utilizzato in alcuni piani orizzontali in Corian e in alcuni fianchi scafo, verticali. Sullo sfondo a delimitare la zona armatoriale vi è una grande paratia in carbonio con un taglio futuristico esagonale ad evidenziare l’andamento dei rinforzi in fibra unidirezionale di carbonio che corrono lungo i bordi. La porta a filo, conduce alla spaziosa cabina con armadiature particolarmente capienti. I bagni sono tutti realizzati con piani e dettagli in carbonio a vista. Per oscurare le cabine che hanno tutte oblò con luce diretta, sono stati progettati dei pannelli scorrevoli rigidi. Il lay out della coperta, realizzata in carbonio, rispetta il rigore progettuale dell’intera imbarcazione. Tutta ricoperta di teak, albero e boma in carbonio e tuga con ampie vetrate a garantire una piacevole luminosità all’interno. Lo scafo è verde acido, una scelta grintosa, ripresa all’interno, che risulta perfettamente armonica con gli altri pochi colori neutri che si trovano anche in coperta." " ECCELLENTI CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA. PER INFORMAZIONI : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069  INTERNI 3 Cabine, 3 Bagni Lo scafo interamente in carbonio accoglie al suo interno un ambiente molto aperto, lo sguardo appena scese le scalette corre libero dal salone centrale alla cabina armatoriale. Lo studio dell’ambiente rispetta delle precise simmetrie, infatti la disposizione dei divani è frontale e ogni divano ha un tavolino dedicato, trasformabile in tavolo da pranzo. Simmetrici anche i due mobili attrezzati della zona cucina e al centro un banco di lavoro ad isola che lascia un ottimo spazio di movimento per il passaggio dalla zona giorno alla zona notte armatoriale. Contribuisce all’idea di grande spazio aperto, la linea pulita degli elementi di arredo, che mantengono in ogni dettaglio un rigoroso ordine. L’arredo infatti minimalista esalta l’importanza degli elementi modellati in armonia ed integrazione con lo scafo, senza distrazioni da altri oggetti superflui. Ogni elemento di arredo è realizzato da stampi ed è caratterizzato da bordi tondeggianti che ammorbidiscono la loro linea decisa. Carbonio lasciato a vista sulle ante degli sportelli alti laterali, che corrono quasi senza interruzioni per tutto il fianco, a cui si unisce un’essenza chiara del legno per i mobili bassi e per i tavolini e un grigio antracite per i divani. Colori quindi neutri pronti a supportare il verde acido, un colore forte e di contrasto utilizzato in alcuni piani orizzontali in Corian e in alcuni fianchi scafo, verticali. Sullo sfondo a delimitare la zona armatoriale vi è una grande paratia in carbonio con un taglio futuristico esagonale ad evidenziare l’andamento dei rinforzi in fibra unidirezionale di carbonio che corrono lungo i bordi. La porta a filo, conduce alla spaziosa cabina con armadiature particolarmente capienti. I bagni sono tutti realizzati con piani e dettagli in carbonio a vista. Per oscurare le cabine che hanno tutte oblò con luce diretta, sono stati progettati dei pannelli scorrevoli rigidi. Note sul prezzo: IVA Escl. sul res. leasing - ECCELLENTI CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA. PER INFORMAZIONI : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069
English "The line of ice60 by their nature semi-custom, has allowed a customization of the interior such as to partially distort the layout of the first specimen. The all-carbon hull accommodates a very open environment inside, the gaze as soon as the stairs descended runs free from the central saloon to the master cabin. The study of the environment respects precise symmetries, in fact the arrangement of the sofas is frontal and each sofa has a dedicated coffee table, which can be transformed into a dining table. Symmetrical also the two equipped furniture of the kitchen area and in the center an island workbench that leaves an excellent space for movement for the transition from the living area to the owner's sleeping area. It contributes to the idea of a large open space, the clean line of the furnishing elements, which maintain a rigorous order in every detail. In fact, the minimalist furniture enhances the importance of the elements modeled in harmony and integration with the hull, without distractions from other superfluous objects. Each piece of furniture is made from molds and is characterized by rounded edges that soften their decisive line. Carbon left exposed on the doors of the high side doors, which run almost without interruption throughout the side, which is joined by a light essence of wood for the low furniture and for the tables and an anthracite gray for the sofas. Neutral colors ready to support acid green, a strong and contrasting color used in some horizontal planes in Corian and in some hull sides, vertical. In the background to delimit the owner's area there is a large carbon bulkhead with a futuristic hexagonal cut to highlight the trend of the unidirectional carbon fiber reinforcements that run along the edges. The flush door leads to the spacious cabin with particularly large wardrobes. The bathrooms are all made with exposed carbon tops and details. To obscure the cabins that all have portholes with direct light, rigid sliding panels have been designed. The layout of the deck, made of carbon, respects the design rigor of the entire boat. All covered with teak, tree and carbon boom and deckhouse with large windows to ensure a pleasant brightness inside. The hull is acid green, a gritty choice, taken up inside, which is perfectly harmonious with the other few neutral colors that are also found on deck." " EXCELLENT GENERAL CONDITION, + AGENCY FEES. FOR INFORMATION : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069  INTERIORS 3 Cabins, 3 Bathrooms The all-carbon hull accommodates a very open environment inside, the gaze as soon as the stairs descended runs free from the central saloon to the master cabin. The study of the environment respects precise symmetries, in fact the arrangement of the sofas is frontal and each sofa has a dedicated coffee table, which can be transformed into a dining table. Symmetrical also the two equipped furniture of the kitchen area and in the center an island workbench that leaves an excellent space for movement for the transition from the living area to the owner's sleeping area. It contributes to the idea of a large open space, the clean line of the furnishing elements, which maintain a rigorous order in every detail. In fact, the minimalist furniture enhances the importance of the elements modeled in harmony and integration with the hull, without distractions from other superfluous objects. Each piece of furniture is made from molds and is characterized by rounded edges that soften their decisive line. Carbon left exposed on the doors of the high side doors, which run almost without interruption throughout the side, which is joined by a light essence of wood for the low furniture and for the tables and an anthracite gray for the sofas. Neutral colors ready to support acid green, a strong and contrasting color used in some horizontal planes in Corian and in some hull sides, vertical. In the background to delimit the owner's area there is a large carbon bulkhead with a futuristic hexagonal cut to highlight the trend of the unidirectional carbon fiber reinforcements that run along the edges. The flush door leads to the spacious cabin with particularly large wardrobes. The bathrooms are all made with exposed carbon tops and details. To obscure the cabins that all have portholes with direct light, rigid sliding panels have been designed. Française « La ligne de ice60 par leur nature semi-personnalisée, a permis une personnalisation de l’intérieur telle qu’elle déforme partiellement la disposition du premier spécimen. La coque tout en carbone s’adapte à un environnement très ouvert à l’intérieur, le regard dès la descente des escaliers se libère du salon central à la cabine principale. L’étude de l’environnement respecte des symétries précises, en effet la disposition des canapés est frontale et chaque canapé dispose d’une table basse dédiée, qui peut être transformée en table à manger. Symétrique aussi les deux meubles équipés de la cuisine et au centre un établi îlot qui laisse un excellent espace de mouvement pour la transition du salon à la zone de couchage du propriétaire. Il contribue à l’idée d’un grand espace ouvert, la ligne épurée des éléments d’ameublement, qui maintiennent un ordre rigoureux dans les moindres détails. En effet, le mobilier minimaliste renforce l’importance des éléments modélisés en harmonie et en intégration avec la coque, sans distractions d’autres objets superflus. Chaque meuble est fabriqué à partir de moules et se caractérise par des bords arrondis qui adoucissent leur ligne décisive. Carbone laissé exposé sur les portes des portes latérales hautes, qui courent presque sans interruption sur tout le côté, qui est rejoint par une essence légère de bois pour les meubles bas et pour les tables et un gris anthracite pour les canapés. Couleurs neutres prêtes à supporter le vert acide, une couleur forte et contrastée utilisée dans certains plans horizontaux en Corian et dans certains côtés de coque, verticaux. En arrière-plan pour délimiter la zone du propriétaire, il y a une grande cloison en carbone avec une coupe hexagonale futuriste pour mettre en évidence la tendance des renforts unidirectionnels en fibre de carbone qui longent les bords. La porte affleurante mène à la cabine spacieuse avec des armoires particulièrement grandes. Les salles de bains sont toutes faites avec des plateaux et des détails en carbone exposés. Pour masquer les cabines qui ont toutes des hublots à lumière directe, des panneaux coulissants rigides ont été conçus. La disposition du pont, en carbone, respecte la rigueur de conception de l’ensemble du bateau. Le tout recouvert de teck, d’arbre et de carbone boom et rouf avec de grandes fenêtres pour assurer une luminosité agréable à l’intérieur. La coque est vert acide, un choix graveleux, repris à l’intérieur, ce qui est parfaitement harmonieux avec les quelques autres couleurs neutres que l’on trouve également sur le pont. " EXCELLENT ÉTAT GÉNÉRAL, + FRAIS D’AGENCE. Deutsch "Die Linie von ice60 von Natur aus semi-custom, hat eine Anpassung des Innenraums ermöglicht, so dass das Layout des ersten Exemplars teilweise verzerrt wird. Der Vollcarbon-Rumpf bietet Platz für eine sehr offene Umgebung im Inneren, der Blick, sobald die Treppe absteigt, läuft vom zentralen Salon zur Masterkabine frei. Das Studium der Umgebung respektiert präzise Symmetrien, in der Tat ist die Anordnung der Sofas frontal und jedes Sofa hat einen speziellen Couchtisch, der in einen Esstisch umgewandelt werden kann. Symmetrisch auch die beiden ausgestatteten Möbel des Küchenbereichs und in der Mitte eine Inselwerkbank, die einen hervorragenden Bewegungsraum für den Übergang vom Wohnbereich zum Schlafbereich des Eigentümers lässt. Es trägt zur Idee eines großen offenen Raumes bei, der klaren Linie der Einrichtungselemente, die in jedem Detail eine strenge Ordnung aufrechterhalten. In der Tat erhöhen die minimalistischen Möbel die Bedeutung der Elemente, die in Harmonie und Integration mit dem Rumpf modelliert sind, ohne Ablenkungen von anderen überflüssigen Objekten. Jedes Möbelstück besteht aus Formen und zeichnet sich durch abgerundete Kanten aus, die ihre entscheidende Linie weicher machen. Carbon an den Türen der hohen Seitentüren, die fast unterbrechungsfrei durch die Seite verlaufen, zu denen sich eine leichte Essenz aus Holz für die niedrigen Möbel und für die Tische und ein anthrazitfarbenes Grau für die Sofas gesellt. Neutrale Farben, die bereit sind, saures Grün zu unterstützen, eine starke und kontrastierende Farbe, die in einigen horizontalen Ebenen in Corian und in einigen Rumpfseiten vertikal verwendet wird. Im Hintergrund, um den Bereich des Eigentümers abzugrenzen, befindet sich ein großes Carbon-Schott mit einem futuristischen sechseckigen Schnitt, um den Trend der unidirektionalen Kohlefaserverstärkungen hervorzuheben, die entlang der Kanten verlaufen. Die bündige Tür führt in die geräumige Kabine mit besonders großen Kleiderschränken. Die Badezimmer sind alle mit freiliegenden Carbonplatten und Details ausgestattet. Um die Kabinen zu verdecken, die alle Bullaugen mit direktem Licht haben, wurden starre Schiebepaneele entworfen. Das Layout des Decks aus Carbon respektiert die Designgenauigkeit des gesamten Bootes. Alle mit Teakholz, Baum und Carbon-Boom und Deckshaus mit großen Fenstern bedeckt, um eine angenehme Helligkeit im Inneren zu gewährleisten. Der Rumpf ist säuregrün, eine düstere Wahl, die innen aufgenommen wird und perfekt mit den anderen wenigen neutralen Farben harmoniert, die auch an Deck zu finden sind." " AUSGEZEICHNETER ALLGEMEINZUSTAND, + AGENTURGEBÜHREN. FÜR INFORMATIONEN : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069  INNENRÄUME 3 Kabinen, 3 Badezimmer Der Vollcarbon-Rumpf bietet Platz für eine sehr offene Umgebung im Inneren, der Blick, sobald die Treppe absteigt, läuft vom zentralen Salon zur Masterkabine frei. Español "La línea de ice60 por su naturaleza semi-personalizada, ha permitido una personalización del interior tal que distorsiona parcialmente el diseño del primer espécimen. El casco de carbono acomoda un ambiente muy abierto en el interior, la mirada tan pronto como las escaleras descienden corre libre desde el salón central hasta la cabina principal. El estudio del entorno respeta simetrías precisas, de hecho la disposición de los sofás es frontal y cada sofá tiene una mesa de centro dedicada, que se puede transformar en una mesa de comedor. Simétricos también los dos muebles equipados de la zona de cocina y en el centro un banco de trabajo de isla que deja un excelente espacio para el movimiento para la transición de la sala de estar a la zona de dormitorio del propietario. Contribuye a la idea de un gran espacio abierto, la línea limpia de los elementos de decoración, que mantienen un orden riguroso en cada detalle. De hecho, el mobiliario minimalista realza la importancia de los elementos modelados en armonía e integración con el casco, sin distracciones de otros objetos superfluos. Cada mueble está hecho de moldes y se caracteriza por bordes redondeados que suavizan su línea decisiva. Carbono dejado expuesto en las puertas de las puertas laterales altas, que recorren casi sin interrupción por todo el lateral, al que se une una ligera esencia de madera para los muebles bajos y para las mesas y un gris antracita para los sofás. Colores neutros listos para soportar el verde ácido, un color fuerte y contrastante utilizado en algunos planos horizontales en Corian y en algunos lados del casco, vertical. Al fondo para delimitar la zona del propietario hay un gran mamparo de carbono con un corte hexagonal futurista para resaltar la tendencia de los refuerzos unidireccionales de fibra de carbono que recorren los bordes. La puerta enrasada conduce a la espaciosa cabina con armarios particularmente grandes. Todos los baños están hechos con tapas y detalles de carbono expuesto. Para oscurecer las cabinas que tienen ojos de buey con luz directa, se han diseñado paneles deslizantes rígidos. El diseño de la cubierta, hecho de carbono, respeta el rigor de diseño de todo el barco. Todo cubierto con teca, árbol y pluma de carbono y deckhouse con grandes ventanales para garantizar una agradable luminosidad en el interior. El casco es de color verde ácido, una opción arenosa, tomada en el interior, que es perfectamente armoniosa con los otros pocos colores neutros que también se encuentran en la cubierta". " EXCELENTE ESTADO GENERAL, + HONORARIOS DE AGENCIA. PARA MÁS INFORMACIÓN : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069  INTERIORES 3 Cabañas, 3 Baños El casco de carbono acomoda un ambiente muy abierto en el interior, la mirada tan pronto como las escaleras descienden corre libre desde el salón central hasta la cabina principal. El estudio del entorno respeta simetrías precisas, de hecho la disposición de los sofás es frontal y cada sofá tiene una mesa de centro dedicada, que se puede transformar en una mesa de comedor. Simétricos también los dos muebles equipados de la zona de cocina y en el centro un banco de trabajo de isla que deja un excelente espacio para el movimiento para la transición de la sala de estar a la zona de dormitorio del propietario. Contribuye a la idea de un gran espacio abierto, la línea limpia de los elementos de decoración, que mantienen un orden riguroso en cada detalle. De hecho, el mobiliario minimalista realza la importancia de los elementos modelados en armonía e integración con el casco, sin distracciones de otros objetos superfluos. Cada mueble está hecho de moldes y se caracteriza por bordes redondeados que suavizan su línea decisiva. Carbono dejado expuesto en las puertas de las puertas laterales altas, que recorren casi sin interrupción por todo el lateral, al que se une una ligera esencia de madera para los muebles bajos y para las mesas y un gris antracita para los sofás. Colores neutros listos para soportar el verde ácido, un color fuerte y contrastante utilizado en algunos planos horizontales en Corian y en algunos lados del casco, vertical. Al fondo para delimitar la zona del propietario hay un gran mamparo de carbono con un corte hexagonal futurista para resaltar la tendencia de los refuerzos unidireccionales de fibra de carbono que recorren los bordes. La puerta enrasada conduce a la espaciosa cabina con armarios particularmente grandes. Todos los baños están hechos con tapas y detalles de carbono expuesto. Para oscurecer las cabinas que tienen ojos de buey con luz directa, se han diseñado paneles deslizantes rígidos. name: 1979 Herreshoff Bounty1979 Herreshoff Bounty
description:
Tamasha is one of 8 or 9 Herreshoff Bounty’s that were built by Alan Orams Sea Glass Marine in New Zealand. This classic design represents the brilliance and superior skill of Francis Herreshoff – a name synonymous with classic yacht design, building, and innovation. What makes her different from other Bounty’s is her interior and the fact that she has a centre cockpit and a hard dodger. This vessel requires significant updating to bring her back to her former glory including new rigging, stantions, teak deck replacement, exterior painting, anti-fouling and mechanical overhauls. The price has been significantly reduced to US$45,000 and is sold on an "as is, where is" basis. A rare opportunity to purchase a classic pedigree at a very attractive price.
Viewing by appointment at our Grenada Office 473 422 6418 info(at)clarkeandcartercaribbean.comMehr anzeigen

name: 2008 Fairline Squadron 582008 Fairline Squadron 58
description: The NU is an absolute unique 2008 Fairline Squadron 58. She has been pure luxury since her redesign and refit worth around €200,000*. Since this comprehensive refit in 2020 under the aegis of the Icelandic interior designer Magnea Haralds, she has distinguished herself from all others on the market: The interior design thrives on a professional color concept and is more reminiscent of the interior of ultra-modern superyachts than of classic motor yachts. Those who love traditional, highly polished mahogany surfaces are in the wrong place here, but if your heart beats for lavish modern extravagance, then you are spot on with the NU. Not only design freaks get their money's worth with this super yacht in miniature, but also music lovers who like to let it rip on the high seas. The previous owner of the yacht J. Lanz, ex-band member of ABBA, has turned the yacht into half a concert hall in terms of sound technology, mind you not only the saloon, but also the owner's cabin, aft deck and above all the flybridge. The surfaces in the dinette, saloon, galley, cabins including toilets and washrooms shine in an extremely high-quality bronze/gold tone in combination with matt anthracite. This look is paired with the Black and White theme: The seats were all covered with white artificial leather (easy-care); This white contrasts with the matt anthracite of the dining table and living room table as well as the floors, which are also anthracite. In keeping with this, the vertical blinds of all portholes were replaced by anthracite-colored ones. The double deck layout offers full standing headroom throughout. The lower helm, has instrument panel veneered in anthracite. The electrically adjustable pilot & co-pilot seats are located starboard forward of the fully equipped galley. Just to starboard of the helm is an aircraft style side exit door. This ample sized vessel boasts three staterooms, two with twins and one double. The Master occupies the entire forward section of the boat and features a queen size bed and head and shower facilities en-suite.  The Aft cockpit has a large alfresco seating group that is shaded by the flybridge overhang. The transom leads to the vast bathing platform via the port or starboard side gates. The Black & White theme is also continued on the Fly Bridge in the sense of a consistently implemented color concept: the upholstery of the 3 front seats at the helm station and the upholstery of the bench seat around the large table have been reupholstered in white, with both biminis the blue one cloth replaced with a black one. And outside, the topic does not end with the now black fenders with white NU lettering on them. The large oval flybridge with asymmetrical design makes it a wonderful surrounding for socializing. As you curve around the front of the helm, positioned in the center, you will notice the large, upholstered semicircular sunbed. Behind the helm is a large settee with seats upholstered in white. There is a bar, with sink, ice maker, refrigerator and electric griddle and twin bimini tops refitted in black which contrasts perfectly with the white of the seats. This Fairline Squadron 58 is fully equipped for cruising, comfort and relaxation in an atmosphere of the most modern exclusivity As with all Fairline models, hand-laid GRP hull is a modified deep-V designed by Bernard Olesinski with a sharp entry that moderates to 18 degrees of deadrise and continues past the transom to 'build in' the swim platform. Combined with multiple full-length lift straps, this shape can cut through the water high and dry and with minimal jerking at speeds in excess of 30 mph. With the Teleflex power steering and the electronic single lever control from Mathers, the handling of the boat is sporty and safe. Example: During a 180-degree turn into the weather at a speed of 40 km / h, she was hardly disturbed by quarter and lateral seas. 2015 ROBERTSON AND CAINE LEOPARD 58 – Ocean Suite
BUILDERS REMARKS: Nothing compares to cruising the sea aboard the Leopard 58, exclusively designed and built for The Moorings by Robertson and Caine. With a spacious, split-level floor plan featuring two cabins opening to a forward cockpit and four cabins below (all with private en-suite baths), the 5800 provides unforgettable sailing getaways for large groups. Venture up to the enormous fly bridge and captain from the helm station with a 360-degree vantage point, all sail control lines within arm's reach, electric winches and a fully equipped Raymarine Navigation System. Performance under sail is nothing short of impeccable and made all the more pleasurable by fly bridge amenities including stylish lounge seating with an additional propane grill and wet bar/refrigerator. Down below, you'll find spacious, teak-style decking, state-of-the-art equipment and air-conditioning, making this yacht an unrivaled leader in cruising comfort. Inside the 5800, you'll discover a well-appointed galley with a large refrigerator, 2-drawer freezer, 4-burner gas cooker with oven and broiler, and microwave, offering the tools necessary for dining afloat. Meals can be enjoyed in the saloon, which includes plush wrap-around seating and a wet bar. The yacht also comes complete with 46” flat screen TV/DVD player, onboard WiFi, Apple TV, CD stereo with MP3 connection, as well as cockpit and fly bridge speakers.
BROKERS REMARKS: OCEAN SUITE is a young model 6 cabin version with the lighter Ash interior Leopard 58. Total comfort for 10 guests and crew. The flybridge is a standout feature for hanging out and entertaining with wet bar and grill.
 AVAILABILITY: Due to be released from the fleet on 31st July 2020. Please inquire for details.
NOTE: This vessel sustained some damage from Hurricane IRMA, and has been repaired following the builders guidelines. The pictures of the vessel were taken after the repairs were completed. Please contact your broker for more detailed information on the repairs.

name: 2019 Black Pepper Code 2.12019 Black Pepper Code 2.1
description: Awesome Marc Lombard IMOCA 60-inspired offshore speed machine in full carbon with centreboard, water ballast, easily managed rig-plan.The flagship of the Black Pepper fleet, the Code 2 is the result of a design collaboration between Marc Lombard and Armel Tripon (winner of Route de Rhum 2018, and IMOCA 60 racer) to design an IMOCA 60 inspired offshore speed machine equally at home racing as she is to very fast cruising. Constructedin full carbon fibre with Axxon carbon rig, twin rudders, centreboard and water ballast, she is perfectly configured for racing and cruising duties on both sides of the Atlantic.Recently built by the Shipyard, she will be going into the water early September 2019, and from then visible in Mediterranean.She represents a very rare opportunity to acquire what would almost certainly be an ultimate line of honors boat, as well as fitting very neatly in the middle of the Mini Maxi class. With measurements for ORC, IRC, PHRF and CSA racing, as well as custom polar from Sailing Performance she is also race-ready for most of races including Offshores and Inshore.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2013 psi reunion aventurin 542013 psi reunion aventurin 54
description:
2013 PSI REUNION AVENTURINE 54,
XBOAT ref 5242.AVENTURIN 54 The bi-rudder centerboarder with the weight and performance of a keelboat.Composite construction, strip planking (weight saving and stiffness for the bottom, heavy centerboard, bustle and freshwater ballast (stiffness at the canvas).The words of the owner / builder: "Aventurin is an integral dinghy 16.40 m long (17.30 ht) and 4.73 wide built in epoxy glass kevlar carbon composite. Its draft high daggerboard is 3.20 m and 1.20 m low centreboard.The carbon mast (Formula mast), placed on the bottom is 22.2 m above the deck. The boom is also made of carbon. We have three cabins on board, a very large one forward (berth of 2.35x2.85 mx 2.0 m) and two large aft cabins (sleeping 1.65 x 1.25 m x2.0 m) and a front hold that can be used as a cabin for a sailor. Saloon and saloon are covered in burgundy leather and solid wood veneer (3 mm) is glued on facades, composite floors or directly on the hull and ncompositeThe kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, a freezer, a gas oven, an extractor hood, a microwave oven and a large stainless steel sink. A washing machine (3kg) is installed under the kitchen sink. An automatic dust extraction system under the floors facilitates cleaning. A 200 l/h dessalator supplies two 850 liter tanks which can be ballasted. The main engine is 83 hp, the fuel reserve is 600 l which can be increased to 900 l. in 2014 900,000 euro Possibility of delivery to your navigation basin More information and photos on the site xboat.frMehr anzeigen

name: 2006 Beneteau 572006 Beneteau 57
description:
Beneteau 57 in perfect condition, located in Almería, Spain


Perfectly maintained Beneteau 57 of 2006, located in Almería, Spain. One careful owner. This outstanding cruiser still looks new in- and outside. Never chartered or used for long-distance ocean cruising. Yanmar engine in perfect condition with less then 2.000 engine hours. Hull was painted new with certified DuPont system in 2021, preventive anti-osmosis treatment was done in 2022. Teak deck and standing rigging in good condition. The Beneteau 57 was designed by Bruce Farr and built by Beneteau France according highest quality standards, not to be compared with the common Beneteau range. Lots of extras: powerful watermaker, generator, airco hot/cold (5 units), freezer, etc etc. All taxes paid in Spain. Interested or want to make an appointment for a visit? Contact Frans Bennekers from White Whale Spain Yacht Brokers on spain@wwy.nl or call +34 629979667.

El casco se pintó nuevo en 2021 con el sistema certificado de DuPont, y se aplicó tratamiento preventivo anti-osmosis en el 2022. Cubierta de teca y jarcia en buen estado. name: 2004 Beneteau 572004 Beneteau 57
description:
ENGLISH   This Beneteau 57 designed by Bruce Farr is in great condition throughout and is undoubtedly one of the nicest on the market right now. This year, her decks have been laid with new 12mm Burma teak. And this year as well, her hull has been re-spray-painted in Awlgrip in a distinguished colour blue. On top of that, the standing and the running rigging has been replaced in the year 2019.  She is cutter rigged with an in-mast furling main sail, furling genoa, furling stay sail, furling Code 0, a storm jib, and a spinnaker. Furthermore, equipped with; a 160hp diesel engine, bow thruster, generator, inverter, battery chargers, and a complete and partly renewed Raymarine navigation package including radar, AIS and Sat phone. Further to that, a water maker, a new life raft, electric stainless steel davits, a deluxe cockpit table with inbuilt fridge, numerous covers, etc. Going down, you’ll instantly notice that the interior is beyond elegant. From the stylish woodwork, to the fancy lighting, to the materials used. There is an overall sense of spaciousness and comfort. She has two double cabins forward, each with an en suite toilet but sharing a shower. There is a third guest cabin with own head compartment amidships on starboard side. The passage way aft connects the saloon to the huge master cabin with island bed and ample ensuite bathroom. To port aft you´ll find the semi-open fully equipped galley. Of course she is fitted out with everything you need to travel in great comfort, like; reversible air conditioning throughout, TV’s, dishwasher and a washing machine. This Beneteau ticks all the boxes.
DEUTSCH  Diese Beneteau 57, entworfen von Bruce Farr, befindet sich in einem hervorragenden Zustand und ist zweifellos eine der schönsten, die momentan auf dem Markt sind. Dieses Jahr wurden die Decks mit neuem 12mm Burma Teak verlegt. Dazu wurde auch noch in diesem Jahr der Rumpf mit Awlgrip in einem distinguierten Blau neu spritzlackiert. Darüber hinaus wurden im Jahr 2019 das stehende und das laufende Gut erneuert.  Sie ist kuttergetakelt mit einem Rollgroßsegel, Rollgenua, Rollstagsegel, Code 0, Sturmfock und einem Spinnaker. Weiter, ausgestattet mit einem 160 PS Dieselmotor, Bugstrahlruder, Generator, Wechselrichter, Batterieladegeräten und einem kompletten und teilweise erneuerten Raymarine-Navigationspaket mit Radar, AIS und Satellitentelefon. Außerdem gibt es einen Wassermacher, eine neue Rettungsinsel, elektrische Edelstahldavits, einen luxuriösen Cockpittisch mit eingebautem Kühlschrank, zahlreiche Abdeckungen, usw. Das Interieur dieser Beneteau 57 ist geschmackvoll, geräumig und komfortabel. Sie verfügt insgesamt über 4 Kabinen. Im Vorschiff sind zwei Doppelbett-Gäste-kabinen mit eigener Toilette. Diese zwei Kabinen teilen eine gemeinsame Duschkabine. Eine dritte Gästekabine mit eigener Toilette befindet sich mittschiffs auf der Steuerbordseite. Der Durchgang achtern verbindet den Salon mit der riesigen Eignerkabine mit Inselbett und eigenem Bad. An Backbord achtern befindet sich die halboffene, voll ausgestattete Kombüse. Natürlich ist sie mit allem ausgestattet, was Sie für eine komfortable Reise benötigen, wie z.B. eine Klimaanlage, Fernseher, Geschirrspüler und Waschmaschine. Diese Beneteau erfüllt (fast) alle Kriterien.
NEDERLANDS -    Deze Beneteau 57, ontworpen door Bruce Farr, verkeert in zeer goede staat en is ongetwijfeld één van de mooiste op de markt op dit moment. Dit jaar zijn de dekken voorzien van nieuw 12mm Birma teak. Tevens is dit jaar de romp opnieuw gespoten in Awlgrip in een gedistingeerde kleur blauw. Bovendien is in 2019 het staand én het lopend want vervangen. Ze is kotter-getuigd met een in-mast rolgrootzeil, rolgenua, rolstagzeil, Code 0, stormfok, en een spinnaker. Verder uitgerust met; een 160pk dieselmotor, boegschroef, generator, omvormer, acculaders, en een compleet en deels vernieuwt Raymarine navigatiepakket inclusief radar, AIS en satelliet telefoon.Verder een watermaker, een nieuw reddingsvlot, elektrische RVS davits, een luxe kuiptafel met ingebouwde koelkast, talloze covers, etc. Het interieur van deze Beneteau 57 is elegant, ruim en comfortabel. Ze heeft twee gastenhutten voorin, elk met een eigen toilet, maar met een gedeelde douche. Er is een derde gastenhut met eigen toiletruimte midscheeps aan stuurboordzijde. De doorgang naar achteren verbindt de salon met de grote eigenaarshut met ruime badkamer ensuite. Aan bakboord vindt u de halfopen kombuis. Natuurlijk is ze uitgerust met alles wat u nodig heeft om in alle comfort te reizen, zoals; airconditioning, Tv’s, vaatwasser en een wasmachine. Deze Beneteau heeft het allemaal.
ESPAÑOL -     Este Beneteau 57 diseñado por Bruce Farr está en gran condición y es sin duda uno de los más bonitos en el mercado en este momento. Este año, las cubiertas de teca han sido renovadas con nueva teca de Birmania de 12mm. Y, también este año se han repintado el casco con Awlgrip en un distinguido color azul. Además, la jarcia firme y la jarcia de labor han sido reemplazadas en el año 2019. Mehr anzeigen

name: 2017 Dufour 56 Exclusive2017 Dufour 56 Exclusive
description:
An exceptional sailboat, at the top of innovation This 17-meter yacht combines refined design and spectacular innovations with panache. She embodies all the audacity of an avant-garde project, which has been able to preserve the power of a yacht in a sailboat destined to provide the most intense sensations at sea. The Dufour 56 Exclusive boasts a very balanced hull, with a powerful stern section, a reduced submerged surface and thin appendages at the water outlets. Its high ballast ratio and hull stability allow the sailboat to support powerful equipment, without sacrificing comfort and safety on board. The sail plan has been developed to ensure maximum performance with minimum effort.
Available with management program until 31/12/2023 Mehr anzeigen

name: 2016 Hanse 5752016 Hanse 575
description: Hanse 575, years 2016 In the spring 2021 was made a complete restyling was with the transformation of the class from 2 to 1 without limits, below are the interventions made and the optional list: 1. registration class 1 no limit from the coast, installation of new instrumentation for class change (AIS, SART, EPIRB, NAVTEX + VHF) in addition to the raft and rockets, (over € 40,000 invested only for class change equipment) 2. Panda 6kw generator + 3-zone air conditioning + Inverter 3. Water maker 70L / h 4. Double basket dishwasher, ice maker, wine cellar, 55 inch TV with playstation, Nespresso coffee machine. 5. Fans in all cabins and dinette, new lights with built-in USB charge 6. 4 Under Water Light 7. Besenzoni electric gangway 250cm 8. New dark gray external cushions + sun bed + new carbon rudders 9. New full teak forward, deck and side aisles 10. New Anchor + 100 meters chain + remote control still wifi 11. 3 electric toilets 12. New mainsail and jib still to be installed 13. Double external B&G plotter + Autopilot + Radar + Ais 1 + Ais 2 14. Retractable bow thruster 15. Dinghy garage with electric winch for lifting the dinghy + air compressor (there is a Wiliams 285 turbojet 110hp from 2020 which would eventually be sold separately) 16. Electric platform at the stern with rail for climbing the Wiliams Turbojet 17. 2 Lewmar electric winches + 2 Lewmar manual winches 18. 2 Tables with electric leg in cockpit convertible into sunbed All the options listed above were purchased and installed new in 2021. The layout of the boat is 2 bow cabin + 2 toilets with electric toilet, 2 aft cabins + 1 toilet with electric toilet, fifth cabin to port with bunk beds. Bow crew cabin with toilet. Rolled mainsail plus jib. The owner was using the yacht 3/4 weeks a year + 3/4 weeks the yacht was in charter always with crew (skipper + Hostess), so no damage because the boat was always sails from the same skipper. The boat is sold by a Croatian company with unpaid VAT on display as it is registered as a charter boat. The boat will be available from October 2022. Generatore Panda 6kw + Aria condizionata 3 zone + Inverter   3. Water maker 70L/h   4. Lavastoviglie doppio cestello, ice maker, cantina vini, tv 55 pollici con playstation, macchina caffè Nespresso.   5. Ventilatori in tutte le cabine e dinette, nuove luci con charge usb incorporato   6. 4 Under Water Light   7. Passerella elettrica Besenzoni 250cm   8. Cuscineria esterna nuova grigio scuro + sun bed + nuovi timoni in carbonio   9. Full teck nuovo a prua, coperta e corridoi laterali   10. Nuova Ancora + 100 metri catena + telecomando ancora wifi   11. 3 wc elettrici   12. Randa e fiocco nuove ancora da installare   13. Doppio plotter B&G esterno + Autopilot + Radar + Ais 1 + Ais 2   14. Elica di prua retrattile   15. Piattaforma elettrica a poppa con binario per la salita del Wiliams Turbojet   17. 2 winch elettrici Lewmar + 2 winch manuali Lewmar   18. 2 Tavoli con gamba elettrica in pozzetto trasformabili in sunbedTutti gli optional sopra elencati sono stati acquistati ed installati nuovi nel 2021.   Il layout della barca è 2 cabina a prua + 2 toilet con wc elettrico, 2 cabine a poppa + 1 toilet con wc elettrico, cabina di quinto a sinistra con letti a castello.   Crew cabin a prua con wc.  Randa rollata più fiocco.  L'utilizzo è stato armatoriale per 3/4 settimane all'anno + 3/4 settimane di charter sempre con crew (skipper + Hostess).  La barca viene venduta da ditta croata con iva esposta non versata in quanto registrata come barca da charter.   La barca sarà disponibile da Ottobre 2022.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1850 Crew tender 17001850 Crew tender 1700
description:
A Crew tenders in the online auction. Anyone can easily bid until October 31, 2022 on the Bootveiling website.


A crew tender which was intended for the rough work. After its active service, the engines were taken out for a sister ship. This gives the new owner the opportunity to either re-motorize immediately or use the space as a houseboat / storage location. Repowering is of course also possible and then there are 2 engines of 979 HP which can handle a bollard pull of 5,000 kg. The top speed of this ship with engines was 36 knots.
EXTRA INFORMATION

The tender has no engines
Operation of equipment offered is unknown
Bootveiling is an independent specialized boat auction house. Our boats are sold under the auction conditions

name: 2003 Lagoon Lagoon 5702003 Lagoon Lagoon 570
description:
Lagoon 570 Catamaran 2003
New Zealand tax paid / Steuern für NZ sind bezahlt
2x 110hp Yanmar 2016 (890h)NZ$ 867,000 (EUR550,000)Whangarei New Zealand fully equipped
A fast and large, never chartered catamaran with many luxury amenities such as a dishwasher, washing machine, electric grill, microwave gas oven and large screen TV.Much new in 2021 and 2022.The engines, generator 12kW, rigging and many other things were redone in 2016 and 2017 for more than NZ$290.000 (EUR185,000).Originally built in 2003 to the highest specification for an Italian owner who only used the boat for three weeks. She was then laid up until the end of 2005 when she was purchased by the privies UK owner who has maintained and restored the catamaran as a thoroughbred ocean cruiser.  The hulls are vacuum-bagged laminate, with vinylester resin used throughoutBuilt by CNB, leaders in composite material manufacturing Classic ocean cruising catamaran, which has been very extensively restored, for a fraction of today's build cost. Don't miss this opportunity to acquire an extremely capable and reliableAfter owning the 570 for a decade of glorious ocean sailing, the privies owner started considering other options within the market and tried out various other vessels in order to find an alternative ocean going catamaran suitable for his circumnavigation needs. However, after realising that he was unable to find anything else as well built as this particular Lagoon 570, he decided that it would be much better to refit the existing boat.  As a result, in 2016, she has been restored with all new equipment, while retaining the integral overall build quality, hand built interior and workmanship of the original CNB build. The cost of the refit carried out in Canet en Roussillon, France.This four-cabin version with galley down in the port hull has had virtually all essential items replaced - engines, sails, standing rigging, generator, batteries, charger, solar panels, water-maker and more. Her cockpit features twin helm stations positioned aft and outboard, but still protected from the elements.  InventuryNever charteredTeak floorsLong, sleek hulls for added performance as opposedto the very wide hulls on the newer modelsHulls made of multi-directional fibreglass mat, withcarbon fibreReinforcement in high-load and stress areas

description:
Model: CLASSIC SAILING YACHT S&S 55FT Type: sailing yacht LOA (m): 16,90 Beam (m): 3,80 Draft (m): 2,00 Year built: 1982 Builder: Manfred Kessler Germany Country: Germany Designer: Sparkman & Stevens Displacement (t): 22 Ballast (tonnes): 8t keel bolts stainless steel lead CE norm: NA Hull material: wood epoxy Hull colour: repainted in 2015 white Hull thickness (mm): 5 layers of 7 mm cold moulded in epoxy Hull shape: S-bilged Keel type: long keel Superstructure material: mahogany Deck material: mahogany Deck finish: sanding and new Sikaflex in 2012 teak Cockpit deck finish: teak Window frame: mahogany Window material: glass Fuel tank (litre): 350 stainless steel Level indicator (fuel tank): yes Freshwater tank (litre): 900 stainless steel Level indicator (freshwater): yes Greywater tank (litre): 40 Wheel steering: yes More info on hull: shape based on the Sparkman & Stevens Bloodhound design ('30s) More info on paintwork: topsides overhauled & painted in west system 2016 Extra info: new cover for hatches (2017) What a beauty! This one-off classic lady shows in every inch she is a true eye-catcher. Once she draws your attention, you simply cannot stop looking at her. The low maintenace mahogany hull and structure is strong and solidly built. Inside the light and spacious deck house, with a basic, stylish and neat interior, you feel directly comfortable. The present owners, as you can see and feel when on board, keep this Classic Yawl in excellent condition. The last 10 years many upgrades have been done. If you are really looking for something different, this is an opportunity you cannot miss!

name: 1982 S&S 55 Based Modern Classic1982 S&S 55 Based Modern Classic
location: zierikzee, the netherlands. visit on appointment. , niederlande
description:
Beautiful modern classic, based on a design by Sparkman and Stephens.


The 'De Blauwe Maan' is truly a 'head turner'. In every port you will be welcomed with a smile and showered with positive reactions. Last but not least, the yacht is a pleasure to sail, in both light and heavy weather. The yacht provides a spacious and light deck saloon, attractively finished with authentic details.


General
Other:
The Blue Moon was designed and built in 1982 by Manfred Kessler, the underwater hull is based on the famous Sparkman & Stephens Bloodhound of the 1930s. The hull is 'cold moulded' 5 layers of 7 mm mahogany diagonally epoxy glued. The lead keel is fitted with stainless steel keel bolts. The hull was painted in 2016.

Accommodation
Other:
The owner's cabin in the bow is equipped with a sink, hidden toilet and various hanging and cupboards.

Engine, electrics, water
Propulsion: Propeller shaft with generator. Batteries are charged under sail.
Hot water: 220v (boiler 40 ltr) and motor

Rigging
Mizzen: With lazyjacks + monkey (sail between the mizzen and mainmast)
Genoa: Roller Genoa
Jib: Rolfok

Equipment
Tarpaulin(s): 1x awning cockpit, 1x awning foredeck
Swim platform: Teak swim platform, foldable against the hull.

name: 2013 Beneteau Oceanis 552013 Beneteau Oceanis 55
description:
The OCEANIS 55 is known for her refined design, excellent performance and features. This 2013 boat has always been kept in impeccable condition and is extremely well equipped. Probably one of the best maintained used boats in this category on the market! It has three double cabins, each with a wet cell. A hydraulic gangway from BESENZONI, a high-quality 3.4 m rib with a 15 HP YAMAHA engine and high-quality 7-zone cold foam mattresses in the owner's cabin are certainly outstanding from the long list of additional equipment.
A ship to look for...
 We would be happy to send you a detailed exposé!Show more

description:
Model: DIX HARVEY DH 550 Type: catamaran sailing yacht LOA (m): 16,75 Beam (m): 8,70 Draft (m): 1,10 Air draft (m): 25,00 Headroom (m): 2,00 Year built: 2016 Launched: 2016 Builder: JJ Provoyeur & R. Bertie Country: South Africa Designer: Dudley Dix & Phil Harvey Displacement (t): 14 CE norm: A Hull material: wood epoxy Hull colour: off-white Hull shape: round-bilged Keel type: long keel Superstructure material: wood epoxy Deck material: wood epoxy Fuel tank (litre): 2x350L stainless steel Level indicator (fuel tank): yes Fuel daytank (litre): 2x68L Level indicator (daytank): yes Freshwater tank (litre): 2x490L stainless steel Level indicator (freshwater): yes Blackwater tank (litre): 2x32L polyethylene Wheel steering: cable steering Inside helm position: yes Outside helm position: yes Emergency tiller: yes More info on hull: new coppercoat 2021 The Beautiful Dix/Harvey design with the elegant long curves of the superstructure really stands out! Built on a mahogany structure with plywood on red cedar stringers and glassfiber/epoxy reinforced hulls, this large cat is very stiff and light with a displacement of only 14 tonnes. The interior of the decksaloon is very light and spacious thanks to the oversized windows of shatterproof glass. Sleeping 6 in 3 large cabins with an owners cabin and bathroom in the portside hull. The clever layout of sails, sheets and winches makes it possible to sail her across the oceans with a small crew.
