name: 2008 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 54 DS2008 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 54 DS
description:
A maintainned 2008 example of the popular Sun Odyssey 54 DS, tax paid and spanish registered.Twin-level cockpit featuring double wheels aft, each binnacle contains molded consoles for sailing instruments, her current mooring and 2 garages/storages are available for separate discussion, the concession is valid until 2035.
The Sun Odyssey 54DS has 3 double ensuite cabins and 1 bunk bed cabin and is extremely spacious for 6 guests. The master cabin has a huge walk-in area and king sized berth. There are two other spacious double cabin berths for guest use, both with ensuite shower faacilities. This beautiful, spacious air-conditioned boat offers all the extras and amenities that one would expect of a quality luxury yacht. Real teak wood and leather has been used throughout.
 
DESCRIPCIONUn ejemplo mantenido en 2008 del popular Sun Odyssey 54 DS, con impuestos pagados y registrado en español.Cabina de dos niveles con ruedas dobles en la popa, cada bitácora contiene consolas moldeadas para instrumentos de navegación, Su amarre actual junto con 2 trasteros / Almacenaje de los cuales la concesión es válida hasta 2035, esta disponible aparte.
El yate de vela Sun Odyssey 54DS tiene 3 cabinas dobles con baños junto con una litera y es extremadamente espacioso para 6 personas. La cabina principal tiene una gran área para estar y una litera tamaño king. Hay otras dos literas de cabina doble espaciosas para uso de los invitados, ambas con instalaciones de ducha en suite. Este hermoso y espacioso barco con aire acondicionado ofrece todos los extras y comodidades que uno esperaría de un yate de lujo de calidad. Se ha utilizado cuero y madera de teca auténtica en todas partes.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2014 Hanse 5752014 Hanse 575
description: A very well maintained Hanse 575, first owner. Modern yacht and luxurious elegance combined with uncompromising functionality. American cherry interior with classic stripe flooring. Easy Tender System with bathing platform. Draft only 2.25 meters with L-keel. Salon with bench (U-shape), saloon table, extendable worktop in the pantry, black Floor lighting in the saloon and indirect lighting in the saloon and in the cabins Electronic tools for navigation: AIS (Transponder Class B), Rudder angle indicator, 2 Compass, Chain counter, Log ( 1 B and G Triton multi-display in the cockpit including transmitter and temperature), 2 displays (B and G Triton multi-displays above, one at each helm station), depth sounder (B and G Triton multi-display), log (1 B and G Triton multi-display in the cockpit incl. encoder), autopilot ((B and G with gyrocompass Fluxgate RC 42 NMEA)), 2 chart plotters with GPS (B and G Zeus 12''), radar (B and G 3G Broadband), wind measuring system (wind station B and G UKW V50 at the navigation table and 2 H50 helm stations). Staging and technical: Anchor (Delta 40 kg, 60m chain), Water pressure pump, 5 Batteries (4 x 165Ah, 1 x 90 Ah), Teak Side Decks, Battery Charger (AGM), Cockpit Shower (hot/cold), Dual Steering System (Carbon Style), Stern Thruster (24V retractable), Bow Thruster (24V), Gangway, 2 Automatic Bilge Pump, Teak Cockpit (with footrests), Shorepower connector, Electric Windlass (Lofrans, with Remote Control), swimming ladder, 2 Cockpit Table (of teak), 2 Railing passages (both sides), 4 winches electric (Lewmar 2 x 65 EST EVO, 2 x 55ST EVO). Domestic Facilities onboard: Water Heater, Reverse cycle Air Conditioning (32,000 BTU, 4 units), Inverter (12V -220V / 2500W), 12V Outlets (div), 220V Outlets (div), Heater (Hot water ring heater). Entertainment: 6 speakers (2 x in cockpit, 4 x interior high-end 2-way), stereo (FUSION MS-AV700i radio, CD/DVD player). Sails accessories: Gennaker equipment, ball-bearing mast slide (MDS Slider Case System for mainsail and jib), lazy bag, lazy jack, backstay adjuster (10mm), rigid boom vang. Kitchen and appliances: Freezer (70l, 230V, front opening), Stove, Refrigerator (70l, front opening), washer-dryer (combi), washing machine (combi). Upholstery: Sprayhood (with stainless steel frame and window), instrument panel. Accessories notes: large AC panel, extra wind station, comfort mattresses for all berths Easy Tender system (including more powerful hydraulics for the bathing platform) generator, FISCHER PANDA 10000i, 8kW with maintenance package (incl. large AC panel) rubbing strip Teak with stainless steel rubbing strake 4 additional cleats, 2 forward and 2 aft Spreader lighting, 4 up, 4 down 2 helm seats with teak covering 7 Matrix fans, waste water system FUSlON MS -NRX200 Remote control FUSION MS in Cockpit UNIDOCK Docking station for iPod/iPhone USB , Android FUSlON MS-BT200 Bluetooth, Audio / data interface 8 fenders / 4 mooring lines, 2 electric winch handles, 4 extra cleatsShow more

name: 2013 Hanse 5752013 Hanse 575
description:
A SEA VILLA with every comfort. Ample outdoor space thanks to the bimini, generous cockpit and garage for storing the tender. Synthetic teak: no maintenance! Very easy manoeuvring with stern thruster and bow thruster. Inside the boat you will feel at home: air conditioning, a large kitchen, washing machine, dishwasher and much more. The layout is really functional: 3 double cabins, 2 bathrooms with separate shower and a cabin with bunk beds. The owner has already done antifouling and engine overhaul, so all you have to do is start up and go. Used Hanse 575. Boat offered with exclusive sales contract. Authorised shipping brokerage company. This boat really exists: we were personally on board, checked the documents and carried out the photo shoot. The engine hours indicated refer to the date of this sheet. Book your private live video visit 45 minutes only for you. See the complete card directly on our website ABAYACHTING. The data in this sheet are not contractual.
__
UNA VILLA SUL MARE con tutti i comfort. Ampi spazi esterni grazie al bimini, al generoso pozzetto e il garage per ricoverare il tender. Teak sintetico: nessuna manutenzione! Manovre molto semplici con elica di poppa ed elica di prua. All'interno della barca ti sembrerà di essere a casa: aria condizionata, una grande cucina, lavatrice, lavastoviglie e molto altro. Il layout è davverò funzionale: 3 cabine matrimoniali, 2 bagni con doccia separata ed una cabina con letti a castello. Il proprietario ha già fatto antivegetativa e tagliando motore e perciò non ti resta che mettere in moto e partire. Hanse 575 usato. Possibilità di permuta. Possibilità di subentrare nel leasing attualmente in corso. Imbarcazione proposta con contratto di vendita in esclusiva. Società di mediazione marittima autorizzata. Questa barca esiste davvero: siamo stati personalmente a bordo, abbiamo controllato i documenti ed effettuato il servizio fotografico. Le ore di motore indicate si riferiscono alla data di realizzazione della scheda. Prenota la tua video-visita privata in diretta 45 minuti solo per te. Guarda la scheda completa direttamente sul nostro sito internet ABAYACHTING. I dati riportati nella presente scheda non sono da ritenersi contrattuali.
__
Une VILLA DE MER avec tout le confort. Ample espace extérieur grâce au bimini, cockpit généreux et garage pour ranger l'annexe. Teck synthétique : aucun entretien ! Manœuvres très faciles avec le propulseur de poupe et le propulseur d'étrave. A l'intérieur du bateau, vous vous sentirez comme chez vous : climatisation, grande cuisine, lave-linge, lave-vaisselle et bien plus encore. La disposition est vraiment fonctionnelle : 3 cabines doubles, 2 salles de bain avec douche séparée et une cabine avec des lits superposés. Le propriétaire a déjà fait l'antifouling et la révision du moteur, donc tout ce que vous avez à faire est de démarrer et de partir. Hanse 575 d'occasion. Bateau offert avec contrat de vente exclusif. Société de courtage maritime agréée. Ce bateau existe réellement : nous étions personnellement à bord, avons vérifié les documents et réalisé la séance photo. Les heures moteur indiquées font référence à la date de cette fiche. Réservez votre visite vidéo privée en direct 45 minutes uniquement pour vous. Voir la fiche complète directement sur notre site ABAYACHTING. Les données de cette fiche ne sont pas contractuelles.
__
Eine SEA VILLA mit allem Komfort. Viel Platz im Freien dank des Biminis, des großzügigen Cockpits und der Garage für das Beiboot. Synthetisches Teakholz: keine Wartung! Sehr einfaches Manövrieren mit Heckstrahlruder und Bugstrahlruder. Im Inneren des Bootes werden Sie sich wie zu Hause fühlen: Klimaanlage, eine große Küche, Waschmaschine, Geschirrspüler und vieles mehr. Die Aufteilung ist sehr funktionell: 3 Doppelkabinen, 2 Bäder mit separater Dusche und eine Kabine mit Etagenbetten. Der Eigner hat bereits Antifouling und Motorüberholung gemacht, so dass alles, was Sie tun müssen, ist zu starten und zu gehen. Gebrauchte Hanse 575. Boot wird mit exklusivem Kaufvertrag angeboten. Autorisierte Schiffsmaklerfirma. Dieses Boot gibt es wirklich: Wir waren persönlich an Bord, haben die Dokumente geprüft und das Fotoshooting durchgeführt. Die angegebenen Motorstunden beziehen sich auf das Datum dieses Blattes. Buchen Sie Ihre private Live-Video-Besichtigung 45 Minuten nur für Sie. Sehen Sie die vollständige Karte direkt auf unserer Website ABAYACHTING. Die Daten in diesem Blatt sind nicht vertraglich.
__
Un SEA VILLA con todas las comodidades. Amplio espacio exterior gracias al bimini, generosa bañera y garaje para guardar el auxiliar. Teca sintética: ¡sin mantenimiento! Muy fácil de maniobrar con hélice de popa y hélice de proa. En el interior del barco se sentirá como en casa: aire acondicionado, una gran cocina, lavadora, lavavajillas y mucho más. La distribución es realmente funcional: 3 cabinas dobles, 2 baños con ducha separada y una cabina con literas. El propietario ya ha hecho el antifouling y la revisión del motor, así que todo lo que tiene que hacer es arrancar y partir. Hanse 575 usado. Barco ofrecido con contrato de venta exclusivo. Empresa de corretaje marítimo autorizada. Este barco existe realmente: hemos estado personalmente a bordo, hemos comprobado los documentos y hemos realizado la sesión de fotos. name: 1987 Koopmans 16.501987 Koopmans 16.50
description:
well maintained blue water cruiser, proven ocean-worthy corten steel/aluminium


Beautiful   Koopmans 16.50 sailing yacht built in steel hull with aluminum deck and superstructure. Yacht architect Dick Koopmans sr. is one of the most well-known and experienced Dutch yacht architects and certainly needs no introduction to experienced sailors. His designs excel in seaworthiness and are therefore popular with departures, among others. The boat we are offering you on behalf of the 2nd owner is a high quality yacht built as a true offshore sailing yacht for the discerning sailor. This is expressed, among other things, by the deep keel, the heavy deck equipment and the fixed aluminum spray hood. It is an ideal comfortable departure boat, partly thanks to the beautiful practical interior. The boat has more than proven itself on numerous long ocean voyages.
The interior is certainly as beautiful as the exterior. Amidships is the saloon and here you will again find many examples of the great craftsmanship. To starboard is the practical galley. To port is the chart table. In the stern is the owner's cabin with also a large double bed with en-suite a spacious wet room with shower and toilet. In the forepeak is a cabin with a total of 4 beds. Entirely in the bow is a 2nd wet cell with, among other things, a washing machine. The engine room is large and the engine is easily accessible for service all around.
For those looking for a good sailing, perfectly maintained and luxuriously equipped quality yacht, this Koopmans 16.50 is an absolute must. This boat is mediated through the White Whale Yachtbrokers Enkhuizen office. If you are interested, please contact enkhuizen@wwy.nl or +31(0)228 855 380 for more information or to make an appointment for a viewing on board in Den Helder. Viewings are possible from Monday to Saturday.

name: 1989 Baltic 55 DP1989 Baltic 55 DP
description:
For sale is a Baltic 55 DP modified for exploration from 1989 
GRYNING is hull #9 and as such, the last of the popular Baltic 55's built. GRYNING was expertly outﬁtted for short handed passage making when built. She has primarily been captain maintained and constantly upgraded. 
In 2015 she was converted/upgraded for Polar Explrations and sailed into the most diﬃcult weather conditions in the North Sea, Med and North Atlantic Ocean, without any issues. With her shoal draft wing keel and user friendly deck layout, she is a perfect world cruiser. GRYNING was extensively reﬁt during winters 1999/2000, 2000/2001, 2003/2004, 2005/2006 and 2013 at the BALTIC YACHTS SHIPYARD. During the winter of 2013 she was at a Baltic yard where a lifecycle service was done.  GRYNING is a truly fast and comfortable passage maker. A lot of the upgrades, such as larger engine with matched propeller, carbon ﬁber rudder, carbon ﬁber pocket boom, carbon ﬁber mast and other sail handling equipment she has received over the past few years have further enhanced her speed and ease of handling.Under power she has a cruising speed of 8 knots at 2,200 rpm and 9+ knots at 85% engine power. At 6 knots she has a range of 1000 Nm under engine.She was 1st in class and second overall in the Marblehead-Halifax Ocean Race 2003, 3rd in class and third overall 2005 and 2nd in class in the Newport-Bermuda Race 2008. IRC measured weight 45,930 Ibs (20,834 kg). She is compliant with OGR 2023 speciﬁcations, with minor parts to be replaced. While from 1989, she is a unique yacht in several ways and has a number of features that are usually found on much more modern yachts. Main of these unique features are:

Mainsail Hydranet by Incidence Sails (2022)
Carbon ﬁber mast, Carbon ﬁber “canoe” boom, Carbon spinnaker pole and bowsprit (2006)
Carbon ﬁbre rudder redesigned to provide 16% improvement in eﬀort needed for steering (2005)
Higher horsepower diesel engine with low engine hours and high torque
Wing keel with only 2.18m draft
Hydraulic Reckmann roller furler for the Genoa driven by a Lewmar Commander power pack which has spare parts; new Hydraulic motor, more powerful, has been ﬁtted in 2018. This plant also power the windlass and the port halyard winch
Electrical Powered primary and mainsheet winches
Very sheltered central cockpit with rigid hood professionally build in 2016 by Loïc BAYZE in Bandol, France
All ceilings insulated with TRI Wool system
REFLEKS stove/heater with independant 25l diesel tank
EBERSPÄCHER D8L diesel cabin heater (new 2019)
New WEBASTO dual energy 50 litre water heater (2021)
AGM 24 V/DC service batteries 500 Ah (2019) - 10 batteries
AGM 12 V/DC starting battery 120 Ah (2019)
B&G forward scan sonar with 8’’ Hercules screen (2018)
New 2018 B&G Autopilot fully connected to instruments with hydraulic drive and course computer. Wired to sail to wind functions (2018)

CENTRAL AGENT
Full exposé on request.
For further information do not hesitate to contact us.
Your judel/vrolijk & co – brokerage team.Mehr anzeigen

description:
very nice Koopmans 54, ready for a new big trip


Do you dare? Do you dare to explore the world with SantanA? It will not lie with SantanA, she will sail you around with love, Give the feeling of safety and well-being. She is your home port. SantanA has proven itself as a strong and comfortable sailing yacht during her voyage across the world's seas. Due to her perfect insulation, she is suitable for sailing all cold areas. She offers a lot of space because of her wide hull. Because of the large windows through which a lot of light comes in, it is a great pleasure to live in this ship. Much attention has been paid to keeping the ship simple and clear in a technical sense. In this way all technology is accessible.
 The interior is made of teak. 1 cabin in the front of the ship with a double bed, 1 cabin starboard in front of the galley with a 2-person bunk bed and a large single bed in the front and a cabin under the cockpit on the starboard side with 1 bed / office in the back, good for rear guard at night. The beds are at least 2 meters long.

There is one large bathroom with an electric toilet (Tecma), washing machine 220 V, marble worktop with double sink and a shower with standing height. The floor is made of polyester.

The kitchen worktop is made of granite, there is a combination sink, small/large, with 2 taps, 1 of which is connected to salt/outdoor water. The drinking water system is electric. The hot water comes via the central heating boiler or via the boiler, the latter can be heated on 220V or via the engine. The hobs consist of 3 x 2 hobs, 2 x electric 220V/Generator and 1 x 2 on gas. There is also an oven/grill on 220V/Generator. There is 1 refrigerator (approx. 170 ltr.) and 1 freezer (50 ltr.) The latter can also be used as a refrigerator. Both run on their own Isotherm 24V compressor (air cooling).

Extra low sliding hatch over the entrance, and a retractable entrance door.

The yacht is heated by the central heating boiler and in addition, during engine operation, the cooling water can be used as interior heating by means of 2 heat exchangers.

The engine is a John Deere 6068T, 6.8ltr, 225 HP, Twindisk MG 5050 gearbox 2.45 : 1, 3-blade nickel alu-bronze propeller 28, pitch 20mm, wet exhaust with alarm. Hydraulic bow thruster (15HP) and centerboard is electrically hydraulically operated.

The ship is cutter rigged, with an aluminum 1280 Hallspar mast and boom. The sails were made in 2021 by sailmaker De Vries in Lemmer, consisting of: battened mainsail 72 m2, jib 26 m2, jib 62 m2 and a storm jib 15 m2 orange; the latter is not from 2021. The canvas is intended for the toughest conditions; Half winder 190 m2. The mainsail is attached to the mast with the Frederikson/Ronstan ball bearing profile 30mm. The backstay can be adjusted manually by means of a Holmatro hydraulic tensioner. (2021)
 We have thoroughly inspected the yacht; ask us for more information, if you find it desirable. Appointments for viewings can be arranged 6 days a week in advance directly with the White Whale Yachtbrokers Northern Netherlands; office in Sneek. mail: sneek@wwy.nl or call +31 515 423 467


General
Rudder: Transmission via rod control directly to rudder stock
Control: Whitlock, type Mamba, integrated with Withlock 1/4 Pk electric motor
Ballast: Lead cast in Epoxy
Other:
Displacement 30 tons gross, 8 tons net Ballast   approx. 9 tons of lead blocks cast in epoxy CE Norm   Yes (under construction) Material Hull  Aluminum Sheet thickness Keel/box 20 mm Sheet thickness hull  7 8 mm Sheet thickness superstructure  6 mm Sheet thickness tube cap 5 mm
Type Keel   Continuous keel with centerboard

Accommodation
Cabins: In the front: Owner's cabin, 2nd cabin with double and single berth, under cockpit, single berth
TV: Sony Bravia with Eminent streamer
Cooker & fuel: + 2 burners of gas

Engine, electrics, water
Year of manufacture: commissioned
Fuel tank number: 2 x 1,000 liters with 90 liter day tank
Propulsion: 3-blade Nickel Alu-Bronze
Consumption: at RPM 1,200 / 6 knots
Alternator: Bosch alternator 80/24
Solar panel: Composed to 24 Volt with regulator
Water system: Rheinstrom professional pump A800/50 on 220volt
Hot water: via central heating and boiler
Water tank & material: internally coated with epoxy/PU Food paint
Holding tank & material: Internally coated with Epoxy Barrier coat
Water maker: PUR survivor 35.5 liters per hour
Fuel Tank Gauge: Sight Glass
Other:
Batteries:
12 Volt   Starter batteries, 2x Exide 55 Ah, with high starting current
24Volt   Battery bank, 6x 210 Ah p/st

Rigging
Winches: Andersen winches. In the cockpit are 2 electric sheet winches ST62, for the Kluiver and 1 central electric winch ST58 for various purposes, including rolling up the jib. In front of the Fok there are 2 manually operated winches, ST52 In the center of the cockpit is 1 ST52 sheet winch for the Mainsail Next to the mast is on BB 1 manually operated halyard winch, ST52, for the jib and on SB there is 1 electric halyard winch for the mainsail On the mast is an ST42 for tensioning the foot
Jib: Jib is attached to the cutter stay, 26m2
Kluiver: Kluiver Profurl C480 roller reef system 62m2, with sunply
Half winder, bollejan: 190 m2
Number of masts: Deckstepped mast, Hallspar 1280, with tapered masthead Inertia moments mast are lxx 3163 and lyy 6035 in mm 303 x 204. On the mast are 2 aluminum spinnaker booms mounted on carts. The mast is partly equipped with plastic mast steps
Other:
Stay:   Is a combination of 1x19/14mm and Dyform. Insulated backstay 1x19/14mm, with matching backstay insulators. The backstay can be adjusted manually by means of a Holmatro hydraulic tensioner. (2021) Frontstay 1x19/14mm, Top mitt, bottom mitt, babystay and cutterstay are 12mm Dyform, Diamond stays are 7mm Dyform. Loose Backstays Armstar 14mm in combination with Dynema 14mm

Boom: The Boom Down Holder is a Proctor Cruising Boom Catch, manually adjustable.

Sailmaker de Vries, Lemmer, This material was chosen because it is possible to repair this material yourself on the way. Also intended for tough conditions.


Navigation and electronics
Rudder angle indicator: On Raymarine ST6001+

Equipment
Anchor windlass: Electric windlass, Lewmar Ocean Concept 3 , 100m/13mm anchor chain, G40
Fenders, lines: Complete
Swimming ladder: stainless steel

Safety
Radar Reflector: Tri-Lens

name: 2022 Dufour 5302022 Dufour 530
description:
The legendary Dufour Performance and Grand Large ranges come together. The latest fusion of two worlds has created a sailboat with incomparable characteristics. The Dufour 530 reflects Dufour's lively and vast know-how. Developed on the architectural basis of the Performance range, its authentic racer hull has been enthusiastically designed. Comfort is key during the cruise, so the main Grand Large features have been combined with an open, safe and fully equipped deck. And finally, breathtaking innovations. Three completely distinct maneuvering patterns, a cockpit with completely new functionality, a revolutionary bimini concept and a beautiful aesthetic. A spacious and elegant sailboat finished in every detail.
Available with management program until 31/12/2027 Mehr anzeigen

description:
DUFOUR 530 NEW.
SEAWAYS YACHTING - DUFOUR YACHTS DISTRIBUTOR FOR THE MARITIME ALPS.
DELIVERY TO GOLFE JUAN, POSSIBILITIES OF LEASING FINANCING, BERTH WITH OR WITHOUT RENTAL MANAGEMENT.
EASY VERSION
Version with 3 cabins / 3 bathrooms equipped with holding tanks, Automatic shower pump, Holding tanks, Grating in the bathrooms, Stove / 3-burner oven, Boston atmosphere (Teck - Corian Ash Concrete - Wenge floor - Gray Rabbani ), Interior LED lighting, 75hp Saildrive engine with 3-blade fixed propeller, Classic mast and full-batten Dacron mainsail, Dacron rail and self-tacking jib, Bowsprit, Fixed backstay, 2x T50 winches on coamings, Cockpit benches and aft seats in natural teak, LED navigation lights, Stainless steel swim ladder with handrails and teak slats, Removable companionway door, 3-position saloon table, Leather casing with wheel bars, Padded headboard in forward cabin, Coupe doors, Water pump electric sea, automatic bilge pump.
COMFORT PACKAGE
Lazy bag and lazy jack, Rigid vang, Flat Deck furler, Cold / hot cockpit shower, Cockpit table with storage, Electric windlass 1600W CPX4 / 24V, Battery charger, Additional service batteries, 220V circuit, Shore power and sockets in cabins and saloon, 60L water heater, Rolling blinds and mosquito nets for deck hatches, Opening portholes on cockpit in aft cabins, Wooden wine cellar, Electric aft platform opening, Outboard motor support, Aft window of roof.
OCEAN PACKAGE

SAILING + CRUISING ELECTRONIC PACK
Central loch speedometer wind vane anemometer - I70s display on port side, Evolution Raymarine autopilot - L&S hydraulic motor - P70 s display on starboard, VHF Ray 63, GPS AXIOM 7 on starboard, GPS AXIOM 12 PRO at the Cockpit Table, AIS 700 transmitter / receiver, cockpit VHF HP.
OPTIONS
Tunnel bow thruster, T50 BD electric coachroof winch, Teak on cockpit floor and aft door with black seals, Bimini double zone (helmsman + seats) with LED, Sprayhood, Covers for steering wheels + cockpit table, Protection Stainless steel bow, Main anchorage 25kg 32m of chain + 60m of ropes, 6 hawsers, 8 fenders, Cockpit bench cushions with backrests + rear seats + helmsman backrest, 12V/220V 2000W converter, Fusion audio handset + 2x saloon speaker + 2x cockpit speaker, Fresh water circuit with shore power.
Constantly looking to the future, Dufour designs each new model to give you pleasure and sensations in complete serenity, whatever your cruising plans and the use of your sailboat. For over 60 years, we have been designing and building innovative, high-performance sailboats.

name: 2007 Grand Soleil 542007 Grand Soleil 54
description:
This sleek lined Grand Soleil 54 is a high-performance cruising yacht with a powerful sail plan. Designed by Luca Brenta and built by Cantiere del Pardo. This Grand Soleil 54 has clutter-free teak decks with all lines lead back to the cockpit through below-deck races, flush hatches, a recessed sprayhood, and a tender garage with an electrical bathing platform. Main drop system with mainsail and furling genoa from 2016, gennaker, spinnaker plus carbon pole, jib, electric winches, hydraulic backstay tensioner, etc. Furthermore equipped with a 100hp Yanmar diesel engine, bow thruster, flex-o-fold prop, generator, complete navigation equipment including Navtex and AIS, complete safety equipment including life raft and Epirb, air conditioning, etc. Below decks are three large sleeping cabins all with ensuite head compartments plus a crew cabin in the bow. Feel free to contact us for the detailed spec list of this Grand Soleil 54 and/or visit our website for the photo-album.
Diese Grand Soleil 54 mit modernen und geschmeidigen Linien ist eine Hochleistungs-Kreuzfahrtenyacht mit einem leistungsstarken Segelplan.  Entworfen von Luca Brenta und gebaut worden von Cantiere del Pardo. Diese Grand Soleil 54 hat Teak Decks, Flush Luken, versteckt angebrachte Deckausrüstung, eine versenkbare Spritzkappe und eine Beibootgarage hinter der aufgeklappten Badeplattform. Main-Drop-System mit Großsegel und Genua von 2016, Gennaker, Spinnaker mit  karbon Spinnakerbaum, Fock, elektrische Winschen, hydraulische Achterstagspanner, usw. Weiterhin ausgestattet mit einem 100PS Yanmar Dieselmotor, Bugstrahlruder, Flex-O-Fold Propeller, Generator, komplette Navigationsausstattung inklusive AIS und Navtex, komplette Sicherheitsausstattung inklusive Rettungsinsel und Epirb, Klimaanlage, usw. Unter Deck drei große Schlafkabinen, alle mit eigenem Bad plus eine Crewkabine im Bug. Bitte kontaktieren Sie uns für die Ausstattungsliste von diese Grand Soleil 54 oder schauen Sie sich die Fotogalerie an auf unsere Webseite.
Este elegante Grand Soleil 54 es un yate de crucero de alto rendimiento con un poderoso plan de vela. Diseñado por Luca Brenta y construido por Cantiere del Pardo. Este Grand Soleil 54 tiene cubiertas de teca con pasillos despejados, escotillas enrasadas, una capota que se encaja, ocultándose por completo en la cabina y una amplia plataforma de baño que cuenta con un sencillo sistema para botar la embarcación auxiliar. Sistema maindrop con vela major y genova enrollable de 2016, gennaker, spinnaker más tangón de spinnaker de carbón, foque, cabrestantes eléctricos, tensor hidráulico para estay de popa, etc. Además equipado con un motor diesel de 100CV, hélice de proa, propellor flex-o-fold, generador, completo equipo de navigación incluido Navtex y AIS, completo equipo de seguridad incluido balsa salvavidas y Epirb, aire acondicionado, etc. Bajo la cubierta hay tres grandes camarotes grandes, todos con ba;o privado más un camarote de marinería en proa. Visite nuestra página Web para ver más fotos de este Grand Soleil 54
Deze strak gelijnde en elegante Grand Soleil 54 is een high performance zeiljacht met een krachtig zeilplan. Ontworpen door Luca Brenta en gebouwd door Cantiere del Pardo. Deze Grand Soleil 54 heeft teakdekken, flushluiken, een verzonken buiskap, schoten die onderdeks lopen en een bijbootgarage met elektrisch neerklapbaar zwemplateau. Verder een maindrop-systeem met grootzeil en rolgenua uit 2016, gennaker, spinnaker en carbon spinnakerboom, fok, elektrische lieren, hydraulische achterstagspanner, etc. Verder uitgerust met een 100pk Yanmar dieselmotor, boegschroef, flex-o-fold propeller, generator, complete navigatie-uitrusting inclusief Navtex en AIS, complete veiligheidsuitrusting inclusief reddingsvlot en Epirb, airconditioning, etc. Onder dek van deze Grand Soleil 54 drie grote hutten allen met eigen badkamer plus een hut voor de bemanning in de boeg. Neem gerust contact met ons op voor de specificatielijst en/of bezoek onze website voor het fotoalbum.
Cette magnifique Grand Soleil 54 est un yacht de croisiere de haute performance avec un plan de voile puissant. Conçu par Luca Brenta et construit par Cantiere del Pardo.  Cette Grand Soleil 54 a des ponts en teck avec le accastillage bien intégré, hublots flush. De plus, un capote de protection repliable et un garage a annexe avec plateforme de bain électrique. En outre système maindrop avec grand-voile et génois sur enrouleur de 2016, gennaker, spinnaker et tangon carbone, foc, winches électriques, tendeur de pataras hydraulique, etc. En outre un moteur diesel Yanmar de 100CV, propulseur d´étrave, hélice flex-o-fold, groupe électrogène, équipement de navigation complet incluant Navtex y AIS, équipement de sécurité complet incluant canot de sauvetage et RLS, climatisation, etc. Sous les ponts 3 cabines avec 3 salles d´eau et une cabine pour l´équipage à la proue.  Pour plus d´information de cette Grand Soleil 54 n´hésitez pas à nous contacter et/ou visitez notre site WebMehr anzeigen

name: 1970 Solent Arthur Robb 54' Classic Ketch1970 Solent Arthur Robb 54' Classic Ketch
description: Produced in 1970 by the Solent Universal Shipyard l.t.d of Southampton, it is a limited number series boat. Due to her characteristics she fits into the vein of Vintage Boats suitable for Cruises and Regattas. The boat has been used for private cruises and has had 3 previous owners. Over the years, this Ketch has made long ocean cruises reaching America, Iceland, Cape Horn, up to Alaska: she has certainly been designed for long voyages.

name: 2006 Knierim jv 53 custom Bank von Bremen2006 Knierim jv 53 custom Bank von Bremen
description:
For sale is the unique Knierim jv53 "BANK VON BREMEN" from 2006
The jv 53 BANK VON BREMEN is planned as a modern “Long Distance Performance Cruiser” for a sailing comradeship. She is mainly used for long distance cruising and racing around the world. The “BANK” was built by Knierim Yachtbau in Kiel, a high-tech composite boatyard at the Kiel-Channel. To ensure both, fast cruising as well as competitive racing the yacht is built in GRP with Epoxy resin and sandwich foam core. The “BANK” is fitted with a 11/12 three spreader carbon rig with back stay for easy handling. There is the option for either Spinnaker or Gennaker. The deck layout is designed for 10-12 crew with a large cockpit with 8 winches. The main engine is a 75 hp Volvo-Penta with 3-blade folding propeller. The engine was recently replaced and ran about 1.200h. 
The yacht is operated by the comradeship “SKWB” – “Segelkameradschaft das Wappen von Bremen e.V.” a non-profit organization which supports young people to get experience in blue water cruising and racing. The “BANK” is very well equipped and constantly upgraded to fulfil the organizations requirements. Regularly maintained by well-known shipyard Winkler in Bremen.
UPDATE 2022:

Updrage on the navigation electronics
New winches 2x Antal XT 70.2 and 6x Antal XT 62.2

Inverter (12V-220) 750 W

LCD TV 32'' on fwd bulkhead + Glomex antenna
Air-Condition for Saloon - Dometic 16000 BTU
Folding passarelle
Charter equipment (deck, safety, navigational, galley, bedlinen…)
 Looking for a used yacht? Select a Hanse yacht from our charter fleet, with special purchase conditi 
As an official Hanse representative, we make sure that all the yachts in our fleet are in top condition as our professionally educated Hanse service staff constantly supervises the condition of the yachts and their equipment. The yachts from our fleet and all their components are subject to regular scheduled services, maintenance and thorough check-ups throughout the year and that is reflected in their general condition. All services and maintenance tasks are done with top of the line spare parts and that ensures that everything works as it should.
 
After your purchase, our expert team can continue taking care of your yacht if you choose to do so and if your yacht stays in one of our bases.
 
If you are looking for the easiest way to finance the purchase, our Hanse Yachting World charter management program can help you finance the purchase of a used Hanse yacht and its maintenance. HANSE YACHTING WORLD CHARTER MANAGEMENT 
THE EASIEST WAY TO YOUR OWN HANSE YACHT!
 
For all of you seeking for the easiest way to your own Hanse Yacht here is our Hanse Yachting World charter management program that has already been recognized by many satisfied owners. Finally you can become a Hanse owner with minimal investment and enjoy all the benefits and advantages of yacht ownership without taking care of yacht maintenance. As an authorized Hanse Yachts dealer we can offer you the whole range of new and used Hanse yachts on favourable terms.
 
KEY BENEFITS:
 
- excellent booking results, with more than 20 weeks per season (fleet average of 21,5 weeks/yacht)
- financial security with insurance against loss of charter income
- high maintenance standards ensure best resale value for your yacht regardless of its age
- special purchase conditions for your yacht
- high-quality aftersales support with prompt processing of claims throughout warranty
- favourable financing conditions through affiliate leasing companies
- transparent cash flow reports through constant insight in income and expenses
 
HANSE YACHTING WORLD CHARTER MANAGEMENT PROGRAM
 
Intended for those who are aiming for maximum return on investment and flexibility in their holiday planning. The charter income is shared in 65% – 35% ratio in favour of the investor. The investor purchases the yacht in his name or in the name of his company and is more actively involved in the yachts business operations. A 30% down payment is sufficient to purchase a yacht while the rest can be financed by leasing. The charter income should cover the leasing annuities and the costs of maintenance, insurance and berth while, depending on the down payment amount, the investor can expect additional profit. This model also offers greater discounts when purchasing a yacht.
 
DESTINATION
 
Your new Hanse yacht, once it has entered our Hanse Yachting World Charter Management program, will be based on the Croatian coast, in one of our charter bases in marina Kaštela.
 
The Croatian coastline features 1185 islands and islets and offers fascinating places to discover. No matter if you are aiming to visit ancient ruins, peaceful bays with crystal clear water to swim in or vibrant and trendy towns, the Croatian coast has it all.
 
Fascinating nature, a long chain of rugged islands of Croatia’s mountainous coast, an abundance of anchorages and a stable climate make Croatia a cruising haven with the perfect sailing conditions. For all those keen on privacy or those who prefer untouched nature Croatia offers Mediterranean wild beauty, warm colours with beautiful light, generous and fragrant vegetation. Its coast alternates cliffs and caves, rocky inlets, fine pebble beaches and majestic bays. Traveling to Croatia is fast and easy, within 2 hours by plane you can reach it from almost any corner of Europe.
 
USING YOUR YACHT
 
If you thought that having your yacht in charter management meant that you never get to use it yourself, then think again.
 
In the Hanse Yachting World Ownership model you can use your yacht as much as you want but we recommend up to 4 weeks of usage per season, including 2 weeks in high season in order for the charter income to cover all your financing, maintenance, berth and other expenses. You can also use your yacht whenever it is not booked for charter.

description:
Beneteau Oceanis Clipper 523, ready to sail, located in Spain


This Beneteau Oceanis Clipper 523 in Spain is an extremely spacious, comfortable and seaworthy cruiser, ready to sail to any destination you propose. Only 2 owners: first one hardly sailed and second one sailed to the Med in 2013 and since then the boat is perfectly maintained and every year taken to the hard. Painted with Du-Pont system in 2021, shining now like new again. Yanmar engine in excellent condition, 2.300 engine hours. Handling is from the cockpit and the twin steering wheels allow the helmsman easy access to the controls and great visibility on either tack. Very generous accommodation with large, sociable saloon, a forward ensuite master cabin and two aft double berth ensuite cabins. There is also a crew cabin accessed by a deck hatch in the bow. For viewings contact Frans Bennekers, on spain@wwy.nl or phone +34 629 979 667.

name: 1996 Reinke 15M1996 Reinke 15M
description:
Dear interested parties,
please click this link, here you will get much more pictures:
https://www.boat24.com/de/segelboote/reinke/reinke-15m/detail/508521/
Unfortunately, I am selling our beautiful Reinke 15 M due to illness. Fully equipped and ready to sail around the world, or simply usable as a houseboat for up to 8 people. The boat is a shipyard construction in seawater-resistant aluminum by Benjamins, was first watered in 1996. After the purchase in 2012, a very extensive refit was carried out by professional boat builders, electricians, craftsmen, etc. from 2012-2016 and brought to the current state: Interior work carried out: -Partially completely gutted and newly insulated -New pantry with 2 plate induction cooker, cardanic suspended - new seating area in the lower salon - 220 volt refrigerator - 220 V freezer - oven with microwave, cardanically suspended - new tiled bathroom with shower and vacuum toilet in the foredeck - conversion to seawater 2 circuit cooling with wet exhaust -150 liter diesel day tank installed - conversion of the Webasto heating on pressureless system - New generator 4 KW power (Whisperpower) - 6 new AMG Whisperpower batteries a 200 Ah, 24 V system, with battery charge status indicator - Victron Energy Isolation Transformer (shore power disconnector) - internal manual switchover from generator to shore power charging - 2 starter batteries 24 V system - red light night equipment throughout the boat - 12 Volt radio battery, renewed in 2022 - 3 large powerful photovoltaic panels, each panel with its own charge controller (WE DO NOT NEED COUNTRY POWER) - Victron Energy Multiplus 24V, 5 KW charge controller / converter - Pure Water water desalination system, 220 V, 140 liters per hour - washing machine installed - all berths equipped with leeboards - completely new B&G navigation system with 2 screens and subsidiary instruments - new digital B&G broadband radar system 4 G - VHF radio system with 2nd speaker at the outside steering position - 2019 installation of shortwave / limit wave radio with Pactor modem for sending e-mails and reception of weather data Outside work during the refit: - Installation of Side-Power Ex 180 Dual bow thruster - Attachment of bathing platform with bathing ladder - Complete boat sanded down to bare aluminum - Professional installation in the underwater hull for antifouling - Deck completely re-primed and painted - Entire deck with anti-slip paint - Installation of 5 pieces Dorade Lüft ern - self-tacking furling jib system with new forestay and new jib - genoa furling system - battened mainsail converted to single-line reefing system - 2019 new forestay for furling genoa - 2019 installation of new anchor wiper with remote control from the outside steering position - 2019 new 100 meter galvanized 10 mm anchor chain - 2019 new mainsail tarpaulin - 2019 new life raft for 6 people - bow anchor and replacement plow anchor - new dinghy with 4 hp Yamaha outboard engine is part of the boat - dinghy suspension at the stern - storm jib and trisail new, unused Other: • Forepeak separated by a collision bulkhead • Two ASY twin keels in floor plates welded in • Ballast: 8,000 kg of lead in the keels and hermetically sealed The boat was only sailed a little after the refit and watering in 2016 due to time constraints, in winter it was always on land under tarpaulin cover, in 2019 the problem-free transfer from the Baltic Sea to the Mediterranean, The boat was only in the water for 5 months from 2019 to 2022 w against illness. The boat can be rented in Preveza until 15.9. can be viewed and test sailed by appointment. There is an airport here, 15 minutes from the city port.
On 16.9. the boat comes ashore and goes to dry storage.Show more

name: 2009 Hanse 540e2009 Hanse 540e
description:
ENGLISH - This Hanse 540e from 2009, designed by Judel & Vrolijk, is a stylish and sleek cruiser/racer. She has wide, teak-laid uncluttered decks, a low cabin-top, a spacious cockpit with dual wheel steering and a transom garage. She is well equipped with a fully battened mainsail with Lazy Bag, a furling genoa, a Code Zero, electric winches, and a self-tacking Jib-track integrated in the fore deck. Furthermore equipped with a 110hp diesel engine, folding prop, bow thruster, Panda Fisher generator and a full Simrad navigation package. Further to that a tender with outboard, life raft, cockpit cushions and a brand new new bimini.
Down below, this Hanse 540e offers a modern and spacious interior with mahogany woodwork, anthracite Corian worktops, good head room and ample storage. This yacht offers a spacious owner’s stateroom forward and two cabins with double berths aft. All three cabins feature their own bathroom to maximize the privacy of all guests. Furthermore, fitted out with; air conditioning in the saloon and electric toilets. A comfortable and powerful family cruiser
 
DEUTSCH - Diese Hanse 540e aus dem Jahr 2009, entworfen von Judel & Vrolijk, ist eine stillvolle und elegante Cruiser/Racer Yacht. Sie hat breite und übersichtliche Teakdecks, ein niedriges Kajütdach, ein geräumiges Cockpit mit Doppelradsteuerung und eine Heckgarage.  Sie ist gut ausgestattet mit einem durchgelattetes Großsegel mit Lazy Bag, Rollgenua, Code Zero, elektrische Winden,  und einer integrierten Selbstwendefockschiene. Außerdem, ausgestattet mit einem 110 PS Dieselmotor, Faltpropeller, Bugstrahlruder, Panda Fisher Generator und einem kompletten Simrad Navigationspaket. Darüber hinaus, ein Beiboot mit Außenborder, Rettungsinsel, Cockpitkissen und einen neuen Bimini.
Unter Deck bietet diese Hanse 540e ein modernes und geräumiges Interieur mit Mahagoniholz, anthrazitfarbenen Corian-Arbeitsplatten, guter Stehhöhe und viel Stauraum. Die Yacht verfügt über eine geräumige Eignerkabine im Vorschiff und zwei Kabinen mit Doppelkojen im Achterschiff. Um die Privatsphäre aller Gäste zu gewährleisten, verfügen alle drei Kabinen über ein eigenes Bad. Außerdem ist sie mit einer Klimaanlage im Salon und elektrischen Toiletten ausgestattet. Sie haben Lust auf Leistung und Komfort? Dann könnte dies die richtige Yacht für Sie sein.
 
ESPAÑOL - Este Hanse 540e de 2009, diseñado por Judel & Vrolijk, es un competitivo y elegante velero de crucero/regata. Tiene cubiertas de teca anchas y libre de obstáculos, escotillas enrasadas, una amplia bañera con dos grandes ruedas, y un garaje en popa. Está bien equipado con una vela mayor de sables con Lazy Bag, un génova enrollable, un Code Zero, cabrestantes eléctricos y una carrilera para el foque autovirante integrado en la cubierta de proa. Además, equipado con un motor diésel de 110 CV, hélice plegable, hélice de proa, generador Panda Fisher y un completo paquete de navegación de Simrad. Más aún, un bote auxiliar con fueraborda, balsa salvavidas, cojines de bañera y un nuevo bimini.
El interior de este Hanse 540e es espacioso y lujoso con carpintería de caoba, encimeras de Corian antracita, y suficiente espacio de almacenamiento. Hay un amplio camarote de propietario en proa, y dos camarotes con cama doble en popa. Los tres camarotes cuentan con su propio baño en suite para maximizar la privacidad de todos los huéspedes. Y por encima de todo eso, está equipado con; aire acondicionado en el salón y aseos eléctricos. Un velero sin compromisos.
 
NEDERLANDS - Deze Hanse 540e uit 2009, ontworpen door Judel & Vrolijk, is een stijlvolle cruiser/racer. Ze heeft ruime en overzichtelijke teakdekken, een lage opbouw, een ruime kuip met dubbele stuurwielbesturing en een garage. Ze is goed uitgerust met een volledig doorgelat grootzeil met Lazy Bag, een rolgenua, een Code Zero, elektrische lieren en een zelfkerende Jib-track geïntegreerd in het voordek. Verder uitgerust met een 110pk dieselmotor, klapschroef, boegschroef, Panda Fisher generator en een volledig Simrad navigatiepakket. Daarnaast ook nog een bijboot met buitenboordmotor, reddingsvlot, kuipkussens en een nieuwe bimini.
Benedendeks biedt deze Hanse 540e een modern en ruim interieur met mahonie houtwerk, antraciet Corian werkbladen, voldoende stahoogte en veel bergruimte. Verder is ze voorzien met airconditioning in de salon en elektrische toiletten. Dit jacht biedt een ruime eigenaarshut voorin, en twee hutten met tweepersoonsbed achter. Alle drie de hutten beschikken over hun eigen natte cel om de privacy van alle gasten te maximaliseren. Bent u op zoek naar prestaties en comfort? Dan zou dit het jacht voor u kunnen zijn.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1987 Custom Nautor's SWAN 531987 Custom Nautor's SWAN 53
location: port st louis du rhone, france méditerranée, frankreich
description:
Built in 1987 and following the design of the deck plan of the previous owner, Rafaela sailed only as a family. Departure of the site from Finland to the Mediterranean. Greece / Turkey during the first ten years. From 1997 to 2000 descent of the Red Sea, Indian Ocean, Cap-town, Brazil, Uruguay. Grounded in 2002, osmosis treatment in 2007 (and hydrogommage in 2021. ) Preparation in 2008 for a new start. Accident of the owner resulting in the immobilization of the sailboat until 2015. Change of owner in 2016. Departure in 2017. Rio de la plata, ascent from Brazil, Caribbean, Azores, France Mediterranean.
English Built in 1987 and following the previous owner's deck plan design, Rafaela sailed only on a family basis. Departure of the construction site from Finland to the Mediterranean. Greece / Turkey during the first ten years. From 1997 to 2000 descent of the Red Sea, Indian Ocean, Cape Town, Brazil, Uruguay. Grounded in 2002, osmosis treatment in 2007 (and hydroscrub in 2021. ) Preparation in 2008 for a new beginning. Owner's accident resulting in the sailboat being immobilized until 2015. Change of ownership in 2016. Departure in 2017. Rio de la plata, rise of Brazil, Caribbean, Azores, France Mediterranean.
Italiano Costruito nel 1987 e seguendo il progetto del piano di coperta del previous shipowner, Rafaela ha navigato solo su base familiare. Partenza del cantiere dalla Finlandia al Mediterraneo. Grecia / Turchia Durante i primi dieci anni. Dal 1997 al 2000 discesa del Mar Rosso, Oceano Indiano, Città del Capo, Brasile, Uruguay. Messo a terra nel 2002, trattamento di osmosi nel 2007 (e idroscrubino nel 2021). Preparation for 2008 for a new initiation. Incidente del proprietario con conseguente immobilizzazione della barca a vela fino al 2015. Cambio di proprietà nel 2016. Partenza nel 2017. Rio de la plata, ascesa del Brasile, Caraibi, Azzorre, Francia Mediterraneo.
Deutsch Erbaut im Jahr 1987 und nach dem Deckplanentwurf des Vorbesitzers, segelte Rafaela nur auf Familienbasis. Abfahrt der Baustelle von Finnland ins Mittelmeer. Griechenland / Türkei in den ersten zehn Jahren. Von 1997 bis 2000 Abstieg vom Roten Meer, Indischer Ozean, Kapstadt, Brasilien, Uruguay. Geerdet im Jahr 2002, Osmosebehandlung im Jahr 2007 (and Hydroscrubb im Jahr 2021). Vorbereitung 2008 auf einen Neuanfang. Unfall des Eigners, der dazu führte, dass das Segelboot bis 2015 stillgelegt wurde. Eigentümerwechsel im Jahr 2016. Abreise im Jahr 2017. Rio de la Plata, Aufstieg von Brasilien, Karibik, Azoren, Frankreich Mittelmeer.
Español Built in 1987 and siguiendo el diseño del plan de cubierta del propietario anterior, Rafaela navegó solo en familia. Salida de la obra de Finlandia hacia el Mediterráneo. Grecia / Turkey during the primeros diez años. From 1997 to 2000 descenso del Mar Rojo, Océano Índico, Ciudad del Cabo, Brasil, Uruguay. Puesta a tierra in 2002, tratamiento de ósmosis in 2007 (e hidrocrub in 2021). Preparation in 2008 for a nuevo comienzo. Accident of the owner that resulted in the inmovilización del velero hasta 2015. Change of tenure in 2016. Salida in 2017. Río de la Plata, ascenso de Brasil, Caribe, Azores, Francia Mediterráneo.
Россию Построенный В 1987 году и следуield Проекту Предущего Владелца, rafaela Плавала только на семейной. Выезд со строительной площадки из Финляндии в Средиземноморье. Греция / Турция в течение первых десяти лет. С 1997 по 2000 год спуск по Красному морю, Индийскому океану, Кейптауну, БразиУлии, Ў.ру Обоснован в 2002 году, лечение осмоса в 2007 году (и гидроскруб в 2021 году). Подготовка в 2008 году к новому началу. Несчастный случай владельца, в результате которого парусник был обездвижен 2 до. Смена собственника в 2016 году. Отъезд в 2017 году. Рио-де-плата, Подъем бразиии, карибского бассейна, азорских острововов, франции средиземноморья.mehr anzeigen

name: 1979 Fisksatra Varv Swede 551979 Fisksatra Varv Swede 55
description: Classic, fast 16 m yacht in the style of a comfortable archipelago cruiser with numerous innovations in recent years, including new engine, new sails, on-board electrics, electronics etc.. This yacht was not sailed from 2017 -2021 and was in the warehouse during this time. In 2022, extensive trips were made to Anholt, among other places. It is being sold due to age reasons. The Swede 55 was designed in 1975 by the Stockholm yacht designer Knud Reimers as a touring variant of the classic archipelago cruiser. The archipelago cruiser has been valued for its speed, beauty and sailing pleasure since the early 20th century. Based on the elegance of the model, a family-friendly yacht with more comfort was to be created. The slightly wider Swede 55 offers more space and a headroom of 189 cm under the stretched cabin structure. The seat recess is let in between the superstructure and the aft cabin. The aft cabin offers a comfortable place to sleep for 2 adults with a length of approx. 205 cm. The center cockpit is as safe as a comfortable motor glider. When the sea is rough, it is nice to have the ship a few meters behind you. The Swede 55 goes through the water extremely easily. Thanks to the slim shape, the boat has excellent rough water properties. As with a long-wheelbase car, the many meters between the keel and the rudder provide excellent directional stability. Above all, the Swede 55 is fast, which is interesting in addition to the fun on the water when cruising on long distances. Several participations in transatlantic regattas by Swede 55 yachts with good placings also testify to the high seas capability. The furling mainsail, self-tacking jib and 2 electric winches will allow you to manoeuvre easily; the accessories are not lacking: bow thruster, reversible climate control, 220v generator, ice-maker, tender garage, electric davits for the tender and much more.
Oh I forgot: it is an owner's version with 3 cabins, 2 bathrooms and crew cabin. Used Hanse 545. Boat offered with exclusive sales contract. Authorised shipping brokerage company. As she is very safe, she is easy to solo sail. Her interior is intended to make life onboard easier: she has forward and aft cabins that can be closed with watertight compartments. name: 1991 X-Yachts X-5121991 X-Yachts X-512
description:
It is to no surprise that the X-Yachts 512 was one of the best performance sailing yachts in the yachting industry.
The 90s were a time of innovation, creativity, and some off-the-wall thinking. The X-512 is exactly that. Armed with 6 black winches (2 Andersen 64 ectric + 2 Arken 54 electric + 2 Harken 48 manuals) and 2 carbon wheels and wite all grip mast, boom and vang. The engine is a Yanmar with 80 hp, 11 service batteries + 2 for the engine. Full Raymarine instruments and quick battery charger
Equipped with enough sails to make even Paul Cayard jealous, this X- 512 was bought originally in 1991. It was enjoyed and sailed through the Mediterranean until moving the boat to Carribbean for last cruise in 2012. The owner had it for about 20 years, until it was sold to its second owner, who also kept the boat in Mediterranean Sea.
We have just been aboard for a new photo shoot and to meet the actual owner.
Available for delivery on next autumn.
 
**This boat is Italian and as such, its sale is subject to Italian customs and practices on yachts brokerage, which state that the agency commission of 10% is paid in half between the seller and the buyer. The sale price published on this site is therefore calibrated so that the seller pays to the broker only 5% and does not include the other 5%, which must be paid directly by the buyer to the broker.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2020 Beneteau Oceanis 51.12020 Beneteau Oceanis 51.1
description:
This Single-Family Owned Oceanis 51.1 was sold new in 2020 from Beneteau, France, and very little used by the original owner, the boat looks as good as new.
One third of the Oceanis 51.1's hull is stepped. In addition to the aesthetics of this flared shape, the new hull creates additional interior space allowing for a new exciting  layout on a boat this size.
With emphasis on taut cruiser lines, she is a joy to move around and reassuringly safe.
The spacious cockpit, many relaxation and sun bathing areas, as well as an aft swim platform, promise true comfort.
The large hull portholes bathe the boat in light and elegantly emphasize the interior design by Nauta Design creating a wonderful atmosphere.
Brushed oak woodwork ambiances increases the feeling to be in a bigger boat.
 
Equipped with a low mileage 110 HP Yanmar turbocharged this Oceanis 51.1 has more than 25% of its value as optional: Code Zero sail and pool, special interior furniture and full sun cushions and cover set (summer and winter), 3 X Fridege/Freezer,  extra fuel and water tanks, connection to fresh water ashore, 2000W inverter, bow thruster, B&G electronic, electric winch, electric swimming platform.
 A lease with residual ability to takeover.
**This boat is Italian and as such, its sale is subject to Italian customs and practices on yachts brokerage, which state that the agency commission of 6% is paid in half between the seller and the buyer. The sale price published on this site is therefore calibrated so that the seller pays to the broker only 3% and does not include the other 3%, which must be paid directly by the buyer to the broker.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1930 Lawley 50ft Classic Yacht1930 Lawley 50ft Classic Yacht
description: JOUR DE FÊTE was built as FALCON in 1930 at the renowned yard of George Lawley and Sons, South Boston, to designs by the great Frank Paine, long -time associate of Starling Burgess, and one of the main stays of E. Coast yacht designing. Her name was later changed to HAYDAY, and then later back to FALCON.  The then FALCON was completely re-built by the renowned classic yacht restorer John Anderson, an English shipwright base in Maine, USA, finishing the job in 2007. It was when she was purchased by the current owner and imported into France in 2011 that FALCON became JOUR DE FÊTE. Since then, she has competed very successfully in the Mediterranean regatta circuit, earning an enviable reputation, not only for an ability to win races, but also for her outstanding condition and beauty.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1998 Amel Super Maramu1998 Amel Super Maramu
description:
The Amel Super Maramu is a long-distance blue water ketch rigged cruiser packed with features like push-button electric furling and winches, water-maker, and generator. It's the attention to detail that make Amels so desirable. The Amel Super Maramu is considered top of its class in terms of safety, construction, décor, security and handling considerations, both under power and under sail. The interior is Mahogany with two double cabins each with en-suite heads and spacious saloon, the Maramu is light and airy down below. The centre cockpit is a good size for entertaining with the helmsman's throne to port with all the necessary navigation equipment at your fingertips. Recent upgrades include lithium batteries.

name: 2004 Joubert-Nivelt TM 522004 Joubert-Nivelt TM 52
description:
Built through the plans of one of the greatest naval architecture firms, Joubert-Nivelt, at the Chevalier shipyard in Saintes in 2004 (17) and completed in her fitting out in Antibes in 2005, LAZY DAYS is a neo-classical jewel, of which only 5 units sail the seas of the world. She is a spacious, comfortable and luxurious boat with a plush interior and an exterior that refuses to leave anyone indifferent.  Her varnished teak roof, her perfectly slatted deck (redone in 2021) and her classic accessories make her a unique boat.  Extremely seaworthy in all weathers, LAZY DAYS can also dock as close to the coast as possible with a draught of only 1.80 m thanks to her bulbous shape. This same bulbosity ensures perfect rigidity to her surroundings in all scenarios, while providing unequalled sailing comfort. LAZY DAYS is in perfect condition thanks to her previous owners’ (especially the last ones’) constant embellishments over the last few years. The interior is built around a spacious saloon with beautiful dark woodwork and a galley to starboard which offers 4 double cabins and two shower rooms, both with electric toilets. The dining table can be converted into an additional double berth, while the back of the table can also be converted into a navigation bench.  LAZY DAYS is a yacht that will provide a unique feeling of exclusivity to all her guests onboard.

name: 2007 Beneteau cyclades 50.42007 Beneteau cyclades 50.4
description:
2007 BENETEAU CYCLADES 50.4,
XBOAT ref 4684. Simplicity and pleasure summarize the program of the Cyclades range well. Leave the city and civilization far behind you and set off on a Cyclades, with those who are dear to you, to live to the rhythm of the sun. Here are real cruising sailboats where we have made it easier at all levels: double steering wheel to improve navigation and circulation comfort, cockpit designed so that all maneuvers are really easy, genoa winches near the helmsman, supports instruments on the cockpit table and at the helm station consoles...

This CYCLADES 50.4 first hand from 2007 in perfect condition comes from a small rental company with a professional skipper on board. It can be seen in Guadeloupe until the summer of 2021, then will return to mainland France. Version 5 double cabins with TV, 2 x fridges and freezer, 3-burner gas cooker and grill, microwave, 60l water heater and 1000 liters of fresh water tanks. Long-distance cruising equipment (ZODIAC 2007 liferaft last revised September 2019, EPIRB distress beacon, AIS with transponder Advensea TR210, fixed and portable VHF) with complete RAYMARINE electronics (ST6002 pilot on cylinder, GPS/TRACTOR E80 with 8.4 color screen on cockpit table and 19 screen on chart table for on-board computer, RAYTECH NAVIGATOR 6.2 navigation software, Radar )and total autonomy (Watt&Sea 300W hydrogenerator, 1200W flexible solar panels, 100A and 300A Lithium-ion engine(1) and service(4) batteries from 2019, 140A bow thruster gel battery from 2019, converter r 1500W 12V/220V from 2017, 2 x battery chargers). Sails 2015 in good condition. Full-batten mainsail with 3 reefs (reef and cunningham bumps). Genoa on furler. Gennaker on furler. 1 x electric winch. Engine YANMAR 110CV.400 liter diesel tank.Three-bladed propeller.Mooring 100 meters (50m of chain and 50m of line) on DELTA anchor.Opening of lines with integrated accommodation ladders.Visit on request.

 More information and photos on the site xboat.frMehr anzeigen

name: 1991 Gib'Sea 52 Master1991 Gib'Sea 52 Master
description:
The first model was launched in 1987, and ended production ten years later, in '97. At first it was called Gib'Sea 522, then from 1990 52 Master, finally with an extension of the stern of 40 cm it became Gib'Sea 524. In total about 35 examples have been made. Typical comfortable and safe cruising boat, five cabins and three bathrooms. Characteristic on deck are the two wells, for helmsman and guests, and the large gangways. Below deck, the dinette consists of a large U-shaped dinette as opposed to a relaxation area with armchairs and a table. Good quality of construction and finishes. (cit. The Journal of Sailing)
English The first model was launched in 1987, and finished production ten years later, in 1997. First it was called Gib'Sea 522, then from 1990 52 Masters, finally with a stern elongation of 40 cm it became Gib'Sea 524. In total, about 35 were made. Typical comfortable and safe cruise boat, five cabins and three bathrooms. On the characteristic deck the two wells, for helmsman and guests, and the large passers-by. Below deck the dinette consists of a large U-dinette as opposed to a relaxation area with armchairs and coffee table. Good quality of construction and finishes. (cit. The Journal of Sailing)
Française Le premier modèle a été lancé in 1987, et a terminé la production dix ans plus tard, in 1997. D'abord il a été appelé Gib'Sea 522, puis à partir de 1990 52 Maîtres, enfin avec une élongation sévère de 40 cm, il est devenu Gib'Sea 524. Au total, environ 35 ont été faites. Bateau de croisière confortable et sûr typique, cinq cabines et trois salles de bains. Sur le pont caractéristique, les deux puits, pour le timonier et les invités, et les grands passants. Sous le pont, the dinette consists of a grand U-dinette with opposition to an espace détente with fauteuils and low tables. Good quality of construction and finitions. (cit. The Journal of Sailing)
Deutsch Das erste Modell wurde 1987 auf den Markt gebracht und zehn Jahre später, 1997, fertiggestellt. Zuerst hieß es Gib'Sea 522, dann ab 1990 52 Masters, schließlich mit einer Heckdehnung von 40 cm wurde es Gib'Sea 524. Insgesamt wurden etwa 35 gemacht. Typisch komfortables und sicheres Kreuzfahrtschiff, fünf Kabinen und drei Badezimmer. Auf dem charakteristischen Deck die beiden Brunnen, für Steuermann und Gäste, und die großen Passanten. Unter Deck besteht die Essecke aus einer großen U-Dinette im Gegensatz zu einem Ruhebereich mit Sesseln und Couchtisch. Gute Qualität der Konstruktion und Oberflächen. (cit. The Journal of Sailing)
Español The primer model fue lanzado in 1987, and finished the production die años más tarde, in 1997. Primero se llamó Gib'Sea 522, luego de 1990 52 Masters, finally with a severe alargamiento of 40 cm if convirtió en Gib'Sea 524 En total, se hicieron alrededor de 35. Typical barco de crucero with mod and seguro, cinco camarotes and tres baños. En la cubierta característica de los dos pozos, para timonel e invitados, y los grandes transeúntes. Debajo de la cubierta, the dinette consists of a large U-dinette en lugar of a relajación area with sillones and mesa de centro. Buena calidad de construcción y acabados. (cit. The Journal of Sailing)
Россию Первая модель была выпущена в 1987 году и закончена десять лет спустя, в 1997 году. Сначала он назывался Gib'Sea 522, затем с 1990 года 52 мастера, наконец, с кормовой удлинение 40 см он стал Gib'Sea 524. Всего было сделано около 35. Типичная комфортабельная и безопасная круизная лодка, пять кают и три ванные комнаты. На характерной палубе две колодцы, для рулевого и гостей, и большие прохожие. Под палубой динетт состоит из большой U-динетты, в отличие от зоны релаксации с креслами ил журны. Хорошее качество строительства и отделки. (цит. Иль Джорнале делла Вела) Mehr anzeigen

name: 1980 Koopmans 52 Kotter Ketch1980 Koopmans 52 Kotter Ketch
description:
Solid oceanworthy yacht in good condition.


The Koopmans 52 is a sturdy yacht with an elegant appearance and is suitable for long journeys. The design of D. Koopmans is characterized by a long and relatively narrow hull with an S-frame, which guarantees pleasant behavior in sea conditions. The boat is quite easy to sail short-handed for the experienced sailor. The cockpit offers good shelter, and you can navigate from the cockpit as well as inside the wheelhouse. The cutter ketch rigging can be reefed in steps so that it can withstand any storm. The owner has carried out ongoing maintenance, and the boat is almost ready for long journeys.
For those looking for a solid steel yacht, this Koopmans 52 cutter ketch is a good choice. Became curious? Please contact the White Whale Yachtbrokers Enkhuizen office via enkhuizen@wwy.nl or +31(0)228 855 380 for more information. The boat can be viewed in Preveza Greece, easily accessible by plane. Viewings are possible by appointment.

name: 2017 Bavaria 51 Cruiser2017 Bavaria 51 Cruiser
description:
Bavaria 51 cruiser risulta essere tra le barche più comode della sua categoria. La costruzione è, come sempre per Bavaria dal punto di vista strutturale, di buon livello. Le finiture sono piacevoli. Il Cruiser 51 offre il design esterno della linea BAVARIA CRUISER, che si è dimostrata ottimale come gli altri modelli Cruiser; una grande finestra panoramica con due portelli d'apertura e la più grande piattaforma a poppa ribaltabile esistente nel mercato.  Sotto coperta gli interni sono caratterizzati da un layout nuovissimo e ottimizzato. Come si è visto sugli altri modelli della linea CRUISER, ci sono i bordi arrotondati in tutto l'interno , l'abbondanza di legno massello e il tavolo della colazione innovativo. L'interno ha una nuova organizzazione tecnica al fine di ottimizzare l'accesso sopratutto alle zone motore e pompe servizi. La caratteristica unica del Cruiser 51 è il suo sistema Flexschott opzionale. Questo nuovo sistema mondiale permette di trasformare la cabina di prua grande armatoriale in due cabine. Barca utilizzata per charter da primaria società.  OTTIME CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA. English Bavaria 51 cruiser is among the most comfortable boats in its class. The construction is, as always for Bavaria from a structural point of view, of a good standard. The finishes are pleasant. The Cruiser 51 offers the exterior design of the BAVARIA CRUISER line, which has proven to be as optimal as the other Cruiser models; a large panoramic window with two opening doors and the largest folding stern platform on the market.  Below deck the interior is characterized by a brand new and optimized layout. As seen on the other models of the CRUISER line, there are rounded edges throughout the interior, an abundance of solid wood and the innovative breakfast table. The interior has a new technical organization in order to optimize access especially to the motor areas and service pumps. The unique feature of the Cruiser 51 is its optional Flexschott system. This new worldwide system makes it possible to transform the large owner's bow cabin into two cabins. Boat used for charter by primary company.  EXCELLENT GENERAL CONDITIONS, + AGENCY COMMISSIONS. FOR MORE INFORMATION VITTORIO ALFIERI +39 3478393700 * VISITS FROM OCTOBER 2022 * DELIVERY END OF SEASON 2022 *  INTERIORS 5 cabins, 3 bathrooms, 1 shower in a separate room 2 double V-shaped bow cabins with the possibility of removing bulkhead that separates them 1 bow cabins with overlapping beds 1 bathroom with shower in the bow serving the three cabins 1 double cabins at the stern, with private bathroom and shower 1 double cabins aft, with private bathroom 1 separate shower room Three-burner stove, gas oven, indoor refrigerator and frezeer Large convertible dinette with dining table and sofas  INSTRUMENTATION Ais Compass Odometer DSC VHF 300 I AIS Black box Garmin Depth depth sounder GPS 820 wifi Garmin Garmin Autopilot with Shadow Drive Bow thruster - bow thruster with dedicated 80 Ah battery Batteries 3x140Ah for services + 1x100Ah for motor Charger Courtesy lights 220V dock socket Electric Anchor Windlass Internal sockets 12v Internal sockets 220v Inverter Wind station GMI bundle 20 Garmin Winch 6 manuals Oven Speakers Radio AM/FM Fusion Stereo Fusion Internal refrigerator Webasto heating - double heaters with independent control thermostats for each room of the boat Autoclave Hot water boiler Sewage system with 3 tanks of 40lt/each  ARMAMENT Still Delta 20 kg + 80mt of 10mm chain Winch 6 manuals Mainsail 70,00 sqm Genoa 55,00 sqm Gennaker 200,00 sqm Gennaker Equipment Bow winder Wrap Randa Sprayhood Bimini Complete leather cushions Teak cockpit Cockpit table with ice compartment Outdoor shower Hydraulic platform that can be opened with remote control Bathing ladder Outboard motor support Blackouts with mosquito net for all osteriggi and portholes Water tanks increased to 800 lt Oak interior woods
Française Bavaria 51 cruiser est parmi les bateaux les plus confortables de sa catégorie. La construction est, comme toujours pour la Bavière d’un point de vue structurel, d’un bon niveau. Les finitions sont agréables. Le Cruiser 51 offre le design extérieur de la ligne BAVARIA CRUISER, qui s’est avéré aussi optimal que les autres modèles Cruiser; une grande fenêtre panoramique avec deux portes ouvrantes et la plus grande plate-forme arrière pliante du marché.  Sous le pont, l’intérieur se caractérise par un aménagement tout nouveau et optimisé. Comme on le voit sur les autres modèles de la ligne CRUISER, il y a des bords arrondis dans tout l’intérieur, une abondance de bois massif et la table de petit-déjeuner innovante. L’intérieur dispose d’une nouvelle organisation technique afin d’optimiser l’accès en particulier aux zones de moteur et aux pompes de service. La caractéristique unique du Cruiser 51 est son système Flexschott en option. Ce nouveau système mondial permet de transformer la grande cabine d’étrave du propriétaire en deux cabines. Bateau utilisé pour la location par la compagnie principale.  EXCELLENTES CONDITIONS GÉNÉRALES, + COMMISSIONS D’AGENCE. POUR PLUS D’INFORMATIONS VITTORIO ALFIERI +39 3478393700 * VISITES À PARTIR D’OCTOBRE 2022 * LIVRAISON FIN DE SAISON 2022 *  INTÉRIEURS 5 cabines, 3 salles de bains, 1 douche dans une chambre séparée 2 cabines d’étrave doubles en forme de V avec la possibilité de retirer la cloison qui les sépare 1 cabines avant avec lits superposés 1 salle de bain avec douche à l’avant desservant les trois cabines 1 cabine double à l’arrière, avec salle de bain privée et douche 1 cabine double à l’arrière, avec salle de bain privée 1 salle d’eau séparée Cuisinière à trois feux, four à gaz, réfrigérateur intérieur et réfrigérateur Grande dinette convertible avec table à manger et canapés  INSTRUMENTATION Ais Boussole Odomètre DSC VHF 300 I AIS Boîte noire Garmin Sondeur de profondeur GPS 820 wifi Garmin Pilote automatique Garmin avec Shadow Drive Propulseur d’étrave - propulseur d’étrave avec batterie dédiée de 80 Ah Batteries 3x140Ah pour les services + 1x100Ah pour le moteur Chargeur Lumières de courtoisie Prise d’accueil 220V Guindeau d’ancrage électrique Prises internes 12v Prises internes 220v Onduleur Station éolienne GMI bundle 20 Garmin Manuels de Treuil 6 Four Haut-parleurs Radio AM/FM Fusion Fusion stéréo Réfrigérateur interne Chauffage Webasto - double chauffage avec thermostats de contrôle indépendants pour chaque pièce du bateau Autoclave Chaudière à eau chaude Système d’égout avec 3 réservoirs de 40lt / chacun  ARMEMENT Toujours Delta 20 kg + 80mt de chaîne de 10mm Manuels de Treuil 6 Grand-voile 70,00 m² Gênes 55,00 m² Gennaker 200,00 m² Équipement Gennaker Enrouleur d’étrave Envelopper Randa Vaporisation Bimini Coussins complets en cuir Cockpit en teck Table de cockpit avec compartiment à glace Douche extérieure Plate-forme hydraulique pouvant être ouverte à distance Échelle de bain Support de moteur hors-bord Blackouts avec moustiquaire pour tous les osteriggi et hublots Réservoirs d’eau augmentés à 800 lt Bois intérieurs en chêne
Deutsch Bavaria 51 cruiser gehört zu den komfortabelsten Booten seiner Klasse. Die Konstruktion ist, wie für Bayern aus baulicher Sicht, von gutem Standard. Die Oberflächen sind angenehm. Der Cruiser 51 bietet das Exterieur-Design der BAVARIA CRUISER-Linie, das sich als ebenso optimal erwiesen hat wie die anderen Cruiser-Modelle; Ein großes Panoramafenster mit zwei zu öffnenden Türen und der größten klappbaren Heckplattform auf dem Markt.  Unter Deck zeichnet sich der Innenraum durch ein brandneues und optimiertes Layout aus. Wie bei den anderen Modellen der CRUISER-Linie zu sehen ist, gibt es abgerundete Kanten im gesamten Innenraum, eine Fülle von Massivholz und den innovativen Frühstückstisch. Der Innenraum hat eine neue technische Organisation, um insbesondere den Zugang zu den Motorbereichen und Servicepumpen zu optimieren. Das Alleinstellungsmerkmal des Cruiser 51 ist sein optionales Flexschott-System. Dieses neue weltweite System ermöglicht es, die große Eigner-Bugkabine in zwei Kabinen umzuwandeln. Boot, das von der Hauptgesellschaft für die Charter verwendet wird.  AUSGEZEICHNETE RAHMENBEDINGUNGEN, + AGENTURPROVISIONEN. Español El crucero Bavaria 51 se encuentra entre los barcos más cómodos de su clase. La construcción es, como siempre para Baviera desde un punto de vista estructural, de buen nivel. Los acabados son agradables. El Cruiser 51 ofrece el diseño exterior de la línea BAVARIA CRUISER, que ha demostrado ser tan óptima como los otros modelos Cruiser; un gran ventanal panorámico con dos puertas que se abren y la plataforma de popa plegable más grande del mercado.  Debajo de la cubierta, el interior se caracteriza por un diseño nuevo y optimizado. Como se ve en los otros modelos de la línea CRUISER, hay bordes redondeados en todo el interior, una gran cantidad de madera maciza y la innovadora mesa de desayuno. El interior cuenta con una nueva organización técnica con el fin de optimizar el acceso especialmente a las áreas de motor y bombas de servicio. La característica única del Cruiser 51 es su sistema Flexschott opcional. Este nuevo sistema mundial permite transformar la cabina de proa del gran propietario en dos cabinas. Barco utilizado para el alquiler por la empresa primaria.  EXCELENTES CONDICIONES GENERALES, + COMISIONES DE AGENCIA. PARA MÁS INFORMACIÓN VITTORIO ALFIERI +39 3478393700 * VISITAS A PARTIR DE OCTUBRE DE 2022 * ENTREGA FIN DE TEMPORADA 2022 *  INTERIORES 5 cabañas, 3 baños, 1 ducha en una habitación separada 2 cabinas de proa dobles en forma de V con posibilidad de retirar mamparo que las separa 1 cabinas de proa con camas superpuestas 1 baño con ducha en la proa que sirve a las tres cabinas 1 cabinas dobles en la popa, con baño privado y ducha 1 cabinas dobles a popa, con baño privado 1 cuarto de baño separado Estufa de tres quemadores, horno de gas, refrigerador interior y frezeer Gran comedor convertible con mesa de comedor y sofás  INSTRUMENTACIÓN Ais Brújula Odómetro DSC VHF 300 I AIS Caja negra Garmin Sonda de profundidad de profundidad GPS 820 wifi Garmin Piloto automático Garmin con Shadow Drive Propulsor de proa - propulsor de proa con batería dedicada de 80 Ah Baterías 3x140Ah para servicios + 1x100Ah para motor Cargador Luces de cortesía Toma de acoplamiento de 220 V Molinete de anclaje eléctrico Enchufes internos 12v Enchufes internos 220v Inversor Estación eólica GMI bundle 20 Garmin Manuales de Winch 6 Horno Altavoces Radio AM/FM Fusión Fusión estéreo Frigorífico interno Calefacción Webasto - calentadores dobles con termostatos de control independientes para cada habitación del barco Autoclave Caldera de agua caliente Sistema de alcantarillado con 3 tanques de 40lt/cada uno  ARMAMENTO Still Delta 20 kg + 80mt de cadena de 10mm Manuales de Winch 6 Vela mayor 70,00 m² Génova 55,00 m² Gennaker 200,00 m² Equipo Gennaker Bobinador de proa Envolver Randa Capucha de pulverización Bimini Cojines de cuero completos Cabina de teca Mesa de cabina con compartimento de hielo Ducha exterior Plataforma hidráulica que se puede abrir con control remoto Escalera de baño Soporte de motor fuera de borda Apagones con mosquitera para todos los osteriggi y ojos de buey Los tanques de agua aumentaron a 800 lt Maderas interiores de roble
Россию Крейсер Bavaria 51 является одной из самых комфортабельных лодок в своем классе. Конструкция, как всегда для Баварии со структурной точки зрения, имеет хороший стандарт. Отделка приятная. Cruiser 51 предлагает внешний дизайн линейки BAVARIA CRUISER, который оказался таким же оптимальным, как и другие модели Cruiser; большое панорамное окно с двумя открывающимися дверями и самой большой складной кормовой платформой на рынке.  Подпалубный интерьер характеризуется совершенно новой и оптимизированной планировкой. Как видно на других моделях линейки CRUISER, во всем интерьере есть закругленные края, обилие массива дерева и инновационный стол для завтрака. Интерьер имеет новую техническую организацию для того, чтобы оптимизировать доступ особенно к моторным зонам и сервисным насосам. Уникальной особенностью Cruiser 51 является опциональная система Flexschott. Эта новая всемирная система позволяет превратить носовую каюту большого владельца в две кабины. Лодка используется для чартера основной компанией.  ОТЛИЧНЫЕ ОБЩИЕ УСЛОВИЯ, + АГЕНТСКИЕ КОМИССИИ.
