name: 1977 Jongert 16 M KETSCH REDUZIERT1977 Jongert 16 M KETSCH REDUZIERT
description: Ketch, jib furler, bow cabin, owner's cabin, guest cabin, saloon, 2 x toilet electr. + sink, electric cooker, oven, refrigerator, freezer, sink, autopilot, echo sounder, speedometer, chart plotter, compass, VHF radio, wind indicator, camper hood, deck hatch, pulpit, pushpit, anchor box, anchor with chain, bow anchor winch el., Underwater paint, gangway, bow thruster, battery charger, electric bilge pump, pressurized water system, hot water system, deck washing system, generator, shore connection, The yacht was purchased in Mallorca in 2018 and sailed to the mainland. From there it was brought to the owner's premises by road transport. A shelter was built here especially for the ship, under which the ship was completely restored or refurbished by June 2020. The following work was carried out: - Hull gutted to 85% - Hull completely sandblasted - Hull fittings partially renewed - Hull repainted in Awlgrip - Antifouling renewed from scratch - Bow thruster 3.7 KW installed - Teak deck 12 mm massive renewed - All hatches resealed and chrome/stainless steel parts refurbished - grating cockpit and teak floors renewed - aluminum masts repainted with Awlgrip - running and standing rigging completely renewed - all winches overhauled - interior floors renewed - ceilings and panels reupholstered - mahogany internals completely refurbished - electrics partially renewed and expanded - contemporary navigation renewed (Raymarine) - Complete engine room renovated and painted - Engine and generator overhauled - Hatch glasses renewed - Upholstery renewed - Decorations (curtains) renewed. - Toilet systems renewed electrically - Taps renewed - Victron charger 40 A - 8 new batteries each 165 A - Guest cabin with V bed usable as a double bed - BB side in the passage guest toilet with shower - BB side in the passage guest cabin with bunk beds - Stb. side in the passage Mastercabin with pull-out double bed and closed wet room with shower/toilet - Stb. side companionway with fixed stairs to the protected middle cockpit - Benches all around with teak grating and storage space - Good all-round view with centrifugal discs at the helm - Port side helm - Bb .-side passage to the aft saloon - pantry with electric stove/4 hotplates - starboard side navigation table with oven - large U-shaped sofa in the rear with large table - generator 8 KW Onn According to the valuation report from summer 2020, the general condition was first class and 80 % described as new. Valuation report is of course available to us. The teak deck is laid in first-class craftsmanship 12 mm. Paintwork without defects. The condition inside can also be described as 80% as new. All restoration work has been done in a first class manner. The ship makes an almost new impression and is equipped without \\\"frills\\\" for a long trip with up to 6 people. The cost of the restoration is around EUR 200,000. Or do you simply want to have a cabin that can be used as a wardrobe or storage space (which is always useful on a boat)? Then this Bavaria 50 with 5 cabins, 3 doubles and 2 bunk beds, is the one for you. Furthermore, with the mainsail furler and jib furler you can do all the manoeuvres without leaving the cockpit while sailing, while the bow thruster will help you with mooring manoeuvres. name: 2009 Beneteau Cyclades 50.52009 Beneteau Cyclades 50.5
description:
A BENETEAU CYCLADES 50.0 from 2009 is for sale
The Beneteau Cyclades 50.5 is a real space giant - it has a headroom of 2 meters throughout the ship. She offers 3 guest cabins and a very spacious owner's cabin in the bow (this can be converted into two double cabins if required).
The Beneteau Cyclades 50.5 has very spacious interior and exterior areas (saloon/pantry/cockpit) and has been equipped with everything the ambitious sailor needs.
The "Nameless" has the best sailing characteristics, due to the shape of the hull and an optimal sail area - ballast ratio, its weight (13.0 tons) and of course the battened main and 120% furling genoa. In addition, there is a grandiose rudder effect, which is further reinforced by the two steering wheels.
The ship easily reaches speeds of 6-7 knots in light winds.
With a little more wind and support from favorable waves, the ship is also happy to make it to 8 - 9 knots.
The 110 hp Yanmar diesel works reliably with a consumption of only approx. 3 l/h at a normal cruising speed of approx. 6 knots!
The ship has been approved according to the specifications of the See BG and is therefore disproportionately equipped.
These include in detail:

autopilot
radar
GPS
plotter
FM
bow thruster
electric windlass
electric toilet
Radio with external speakers and external controls
Full batten, new 2018
Furling jib, new 2018
Spray hood, new 2018
Antifouling, new 2018
Rudder bearings, new 2018
Stove, new 2018
Liferaft and EPIRB

Due to the See BG approval, the ship can also be used for training trips and examinations.
The ship is well maintained above average, undergoes regular maintenance and was equipped according to the "cruising ship" principle.
In 2021/22 an extensive refit was carried out. carried out the following work:

Checking of all structural connections
Reconstruction of 5 cabins to 4 cabins / adaptation of the owner's cabin
Dismantling of 3 toilets to 2 toilets with electric toilets and 1 shower
Renewal of all upholstery
Kitchen makeover (new countertop, sink, etc.)
Plotter Raymarine new
engine service
All lamps new
Replacement of all sheets and halyards
New construction Binimi
New construction Maindrop
Replacement slide system
Sails (main and genoa) new (laminate)
Partial replacement of windows
Renewal of blinds
Installation of Selden electric winch
Radio / bluetooth new
Reconstruction of the underwater hull
Revision hull and subsequent foiling
Teak deck Plasdeck in the cockpit, laid on all walking surfaces and on the bathing platform

Basic equipment such as extensive cordage, reliable anchor gear made of stainless steel, large fenders, reasonable running gear, good display devices such as a compass, rev counter, etc. are a matter of course.
The price of €150,500 is excl. VATPrice including VAT: €179,000.
The ship can be viewed in Stralsund and test sailed.
We are at your disposal for any questions or a visit.
Your judel/vrolijk & co - brokerage team. show more

name: 2017 Dufour 512 Grand Large2017 Dufour 512 Grand Large
location: marines de cogolin, france méditerranée, frankreich
description:
The Dufour 512 Grand Large sailboat is a monohull, built by the Dufour Yachts shipyard in France. This sailboat, made by the naval architect Umberto Felci, is 14.75 m long. Production started in 2015. 39 copies of the boat were produced. The 2016 vintage of the Grand Large range, the Dufour 512 is a yacht with luxurious amenities. Following the success of the Dufour 500 (2012), produced in more than 140 units, the Dufour shipyard offers you a revisited version of this model, which benefits from all the innovations and features integrated into the latest models of the Grand Large range.

name: 2010 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 50 DS2010 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 50 DS
description:
Il Sun Odyssey 50 DS è frutto della collaborazione dei più grandi nomi del design e dell’architettura navale: Philippe Briand per la performance e lo Studio Garroni per lo stile. Questo team ha creato la barca a vela ideale per soddisfare le vostre più alte aspettative: linea pura, coperta DS certificata Veritas, chiglia e appendici eleganti e veloci, spazi interni moderni a garanzia del comfort della nuova generazione Sun Odyssey.Non è un caso se tutti i comandi siano posizionati in modo ottimale nel pozzetto, ripartiti in 3 zone: uno spazio dedicato alla navigazione con doppio timone a ruota, uno spazio conviviale e confortevole intorno ad un grande tavolo nel pozzetto ed una bella zona relax. I winchs ben dimensionati ed il potente verricello elettrico facilitano le vostre manovre di navigazione. Aria condizionata e riscaldamento webasto in tutte le cabine con due macchine Cucina completa di 3 fuochi a gas, forno, lavello e frigorifero Dinette con Divano e tavolo da pranzo Pavimento interno in legno  STRUMENTAZIONE Bussola Doppia timoneria GPS esterno Raymarine Axiom 9 Ecoscandaglio Pilota automatico Log Stazione vento VHF Salpancora Elettrico Presa 220V da banchina Caricabatterie Prese interne 12v Prese interne 220v Altoparlanti Radio AM/FM Stereo Impianto TV Aria condizionata Clima reversibile Riscaldamento Webasto Autoclave Boiler per l'acqua calda Generatore Paguro 6,5kw  ARMAMENTO Ancora Cuscineria completa interna ed esterna NUOVA Teli copri finestra Camminamenti laterali in teak Pozzetto Teak Tavolo pozzetto Doccia esterna Piattaforma Scaletta da bagno Winch Winch Elettrico  Randa (39,00 mq) Genoa (62,10 mq) Spinnaker (141,00 mq) Avvolgi Fiocco Avvolgi Randa

This team has created the ideal sailboat to meet your highest expectations: pure line, Veritas certified DS deck, elegant and fast keel and appendages, modern interior spaces to guarantee the comfort of the new Sun Odyssey generation.It is no coincidence that all the controls are optimally positioned in the cockpit, divided into 3 zones: a space dedicated to navigation with double wheel rudder, a convivial and comfortable space around a large table in the cockpit and a beautiful relaxation area. The well-sized winchs and the powerful electric winch facilitate your navigation maneuvers. Россию Sun Odyssey 50 DS является результатом сотрудничества крупнейших имен в военно-морском дизайне и архитектуре: Филиппа Бриана за перформанс и студии Garroni за стиль. Эта команда создала идеальный парусник для удовлетворения ваших самых высоких ожиданий: чистая линия, сертифицированная Veritas палуба DS, элегантный и быстрый киль и придатки, современные внутренние пространства, гарантирующие комфорт нового Sun Odyssey generation.It не случайно, что все органы управления оптимально расположены в кокпите, разделенном на 3 зоны: пространство, предназначенное для навигации с рулем с двумя колесами, удобное и комфортное пространство вокруг большого стола в кабине и красивая зона отдыха. Лебедки хорошего размера и мощная электрическая лебедка облегчают ваши маневры навигации. name: 2019 Fountaine Pajot SABA 502019 Fountaine Pajot SABA 50
description:
ENGLISH -   This Fountaine Pajot Saba 50 from 2019 not only offers superb comfort both inside and out, but also great performance thanks to her light but strong construction. Her main features are the wide hydraulic up/down platform to launch the dinghy, and her huge lounging areas; the topside sundeck atop the coach roof, the forward lounge, and the spacious covered aft cockpit.  The helm station is well protected by a bimini, offers great visibility and is quickly accessible from the aft deck.   She is very well equipped with two 75 hp Volvo Penta diesel engines, generator, water maker, integrated solar panels, Garmin navigation package including radar, dinghy with outboard, life raft, underwater lighting, hydraulic gangway, etc. A wide sliding glass door separates the outside from the inside of this Fountaine Pajot Saba 50. The saloon is bathed in natural light through the panoramic windows and overhead hatches. Especially the galley with centre island is enviable. This Saba is an owner’s version. The port hull features the master stateroom with an island berth, a small desk, enough storage space, and an ensuite bathroom. This stateroom takes up about three quarters of the port hull, which still leaves room for a full guest cabin and ensuite head forward. The starboard hull has two ample guest staterooms fore and aft both with ensuite bathroom and a crew cabin amidships with own head. And to make your stay even more comfortable she is fitted out with luxury furnishings, air conditioning, heating, washing machine, dish washer, etc. You’ll be enchanted the moment you step on board.
DEUTSCH -  Diese Fountaine Pajot Saba 50 von 2019 bietet nicht nur innen und außen hervorragenden Komfort, sondern auch eine überzeugende Leistung dank ihre leichte und starke Konstruktion.  Ihre Hauptmerkmale sind das hydraulischen Plattform um das Beiboot zu Wasser zu lassen, und ihre riesigen Sitz- und Lounge-Bereichen auf das Achterdeck, das Vorschiffsbereich, und auf dem festen Bimini-Dach. Das Steuercockpit, gut geschützt durch ein Bimini, bietet einen wunderschönen Blick und ist vom Achterdeck aus schnell erreichbar. Diese Katamaran ist sehr gut ausgestattet mit zwei 75 PS Volvo Dieselmotoren, Generator, Wassermacher, integrierten Sonnenkollektoren, Garmin Navigationspaket inklusive Radar, Beiboot mit Außenborder, hydraulische Gangway, Rettungsinsel, Unterwasserbeleuchtung, usw. Eine große Glasschiebetür trennt das Achterdeck vom Hauptsalon dieser Fountaine Pajot Saba 50. Das Interieur ist angenehm luftig und vor allem die L-förmige Pantry mit Mittelblock ist beneidenswert. Diese Saba ist eine Eigner-Version. Der Backbordrumpf verfügt über die Eignerkabine mit einem Inselbett, einem Schreibtisch, viel Schrankraum und einem eigenen Bad. Die Eignerkabine nimmt etwa drei Viertel des Backbordrumpfes ein. Der Rest des Backbordrumpfes ist reserviert für eine Gästekabine mit eigenem Bad. Der Steuerbordrumpf verfügt über zwei geräumige Gästekabinen mit eigenem Bad, und eine Crewkabine mittschiffs mit eigener Nasszelle. Und, um Ihre Aufenthalt an Bord noch komfortabler zu machen ist sie außerdem ausgestattet mit Klimaanlage, Heizung, Waschmaschine, Geschirrspüler, usw.  Dieser Fahrtenkat bietet Alles.
NEDERLANDS -  Deze Fountaine Pajot Saba 50 uit 2019 biedt niet alleen veel comfort zowel binnen als buiten, maar ook uitstekende zeileigenschappen dankzij haar lichte en sterke constructie. Een paar belangrijke kenmerken zijn haar brede hydraulische platform om de bijboot te water te laten, en de riante lounge- en zitgedeeltes. De verhoogde stuurstand aan stuurboord wordt goed beschermd door een bimini, biedt goed zicht, en is snel en gemakkelijk bereikbaar vanuit het achterdek. Deze catamaran is goed uitgerust met twee 75PK Volvo Penta dieselmotoren, generator, watermaker, geïntegreerde zonnepanelen, Garmin navigatie-uitrusting inclusief radar, bijboot met buitenboordmotor, reddingsvlot, hydraulische gangway, onderwaterverlichting, etc. Een brede glazen schuifdeur scheidt het achterdek van de hoofdsalon van deze Fountaine Pajot Saba 50. Het interieur baadt in natuurlijk licht en is zeer comfortabel. Vooral de keuken in L-vorm met eiland is benijdenswaardig. Deze Saba is een eigenaarsversie. De bakboordromp beschikt over de eigenaarshut met dubbel bed, een bureau, een eigen badkamer, en voldoende opbergruimte.  De eigenaarshut neemt ongeveer driekwart van de bakboordromp in beslag. De rest van de romp is gereserveerd voor een gastenhut met dubbel bed en eigen badkamer. De stuurboordromp beschikt over twee ruime gastenhutten met eigen badkamer, en een crewcabine met eigen natte cel midscheeps. Om het verblijf aan boord nog aangenamer te maken is deze cat voorzien van airconditioning, verwarming, wasmachine, vaatwasser, etc.  Je bent verkocht het moment je aan boord stapt.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2002 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 52.22002 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 52.2
description: CAP'MED BOAT & YACHT Consulting is pleased to present this superb Sun Odyssey 52.2 in owner's suite version, 3 cabins, equipped for a round-the-world trip with generator, watermaker, solar panels, electric winches, new tender, teak deck.-Sails : The staysail and the mainsail are 4 years old, in very good condition. name: 2004 Grand Soleil 502004 Grand Soleil 50
description:
ENGLISH - This Grand Soleil 50, built by Cantiere Del Pardo, has been very well updated and upgraded by her current owner and is equipped with the right gear to sail long distances. She is a real fast performance cruiser and has teak laid decks, a wide teak laid cockpit with contoured benches, a hinged swimming platform and a deep sail locker in the center of the fore deck. The deck layout is well thought out and the visibility forward is outstanding, mainly because of the low deck house. Very well equipped with; a 75hp diesel engine, retractable bow thruster, folding prop, generator, complete B&G navigation pack, new solar panels, water maker, new bimini and sprayhood, new dinghy with outboard, new life raft, etc. Furthermore, sloop rigged with new Lazy Bag and Lazy Jacks, sails from 2018 and electric winches. The interior of this Grand Soleil 50 is airy and light, and offers great comfort. She can accommodate up to 8 persons in her master cabin with ensuite fore, her two guest cabins aft sharing the second head compartment and the convertible saloon. And to make your stay on board even more enjoyable she is fitted out with air conditioning, electric toilets, plenty of storage space, etc. In short: a well-equipped and very well updated sailing yacht that offers liveability and seaworthiness in all comfort.
DEUTSCH - Diese Grand Soleil 50, gebaut von Cantiere del Pardo, wurde von ihrem jetzigen Eigner sehr gut aktualisiert und verbessert und ist mit der richtigen Ausstattung ausgerüstet um lange Strecken zu segeln. Sie ist eine echte Hochleistungs-Kreuzfahrtenyacht und ist versehen mit Teakholz Decks, ein geräumiges Cockpit mit konturierten Bänken, eine aufklappbare badeplattform, und einen tiefen Segellast. Das Decklayout ist gut durchdacht und die Sichtweite nach vorne ist sehr gut wegen des niedrigen Deckhauses. Diese 50-fusser ist sehr gut ausgestattet mit einem 75PS Dieselmotor, einziehbares Bugstrahlruder, Faltpropeller, Generator, komplettes B&G Navigationspaket, neue Sonnenkollektoren, Wassermacher, neues Bimini und Spritzverdeck, neues Beiboot mit Außenborder, neue Rettungsinsel, usw. Weiter, Slup-getakelt mit neuen Lazy Bag und Lazy Jacks, Segeln von 2018, und elektrischen Winden. Das Innere dieser Grand Soleil 50 ist hell und luftig und bietet großen Komfort. Sie bietet Platz für bis zu 8 Personen in ihrer Eignerkabine mit eigener Nasszelle, ihre zwei Gästekabinen mit zweite Nasszelle, und der umbaubare Essecke im Salon. Um ihren Aufenthalt an Bord noch angenehmer zu gestalten ist diese Yacht versehen mit Klimaanlage, elektrischen Toiletten und viel Stauraum.  Kurz gesagt: eine sehr gut ausgestattete und aktualisierte Segelyacht die Seetüchtigkeit und Konvenienz in allem Komfort bietet.
ESPAÑOL - Este Grand Soleil 50, construido por Cantiere del Pardo, ha sido muy bien actualizado y mejorado por su propietario actual y está equipado para navegar largas distancias. Es un verdadero crucero de gran rendimiento y tiene cubiertas de teca, una amplia bañera de teca, una plataforma de baño abatible, y un compartimiento profundo para guardar las velas. El diseño de cubierta está bien pensado, y la visibilidad hacia adelante está muy bien debido a la caseta de baja altura. Muy bien equipado con un motor diésel de 75CV, propulsor de proa retráctil, hélice plegable, generador, completo equipo de navegación de B&G, nuevos paneles solares, desalinizadora, nuevo bimini y capote, nuevo bote auxiliar con fueraborda, nueva balsa salvavidas, etc. Además, nuevo Lazy Bag y Lazy Jacks, velas de 2018 y cabrestantes eléctricos. El interior de este Grand Soleil 50 es espacioso y luminoso, y ofrece un gran confort. Este velero puede acomodar hasta 8 personas en su camarote principal con baño privado, sus dos camarotes de invitados con el segunda baño y el salón convertible. Para que su estancia a bordo sea aún más agradable, está equipada con aire acondicionado, inodoros eléctricos, y mucho espacio de almacenamiento. En resumen: un yate de vela muy bien equipada y actualizada que ofrece gran habitabilidad y navegabilidad.
NEDERLANDS - Deze Grand Soleil 50, gebouwd door Cantiere del Pardo, is zeer goed geüpdatet en geüpgraded door haar huidige eigenaar en is uitgerust met de juiste uitrusting om lange afstanden te varen. Dit snelle performance toerjacht heeft teakdekken, een ruime teak cockpit met voorgevormde banken, een neerklapbaar zwemplatform en een grote bergruimte voor de zeilen in het voordek. De dek-layout is goed doordacht en het zicht naar voren is dankzij de lage opbouw uitstekend. Zeer goed uitgerust met een 75pk dieselmotor, intrekbare boegschroef, klapschroef, generator, complete B&G navigatie-uitrusting, nieuwe zonnepanelen, watermaker, nieuwe bimini en buiskap, nieuwe bijboot met buitenboordmotor, nieuw reddingsvlot, etc. Verder, sloep-getuigd met nieuwe Lazy Bag en Lazy Jacks, zeilen uit 2018 en elektrische lieren. Het interieur van deze Grand Soleil 50 is ruim en licht en biedt veel comfort. Ze biedt plaats aan maximaal 8 personen. De eigenaarshut met ensuite bevindt zich voor, en de twee gastenhutten die de tweede natte cel delen, bevinden zich in het achterschip. Indien nodig, kan de eethoek in de salon omgebouwd worden naar een extra bed. Om uw verblijf aan boord nog aangenamer te maken is ze verder uitgerust met airconditioning, elektrische toiletten en volop opbergruimteMehr anzeigen

name: 2004 Beneteau 502004 Beneteau 50
description:
Very well maintained, first owner, private use only


Very well maintained Beneteau 50 in ownersversion (3 cabins) from her first owner. Sailing under Belgium flag, VAT paid. Only private used since new and truly in very good condition. The hull has been repainted some years ago and looks absolutely great. Last winter (feb-2022) the entire underwatership has been redone, see 2 pictures in the overview. The engine has only 1.220 hours since 2004. She is fully equipped with 4x electric winches (!) , airco (no generator), bowthruster, teak decks (in good condition), bimini, radar, etc. Original mainsail on boom and furling genua. Only downside of this beautiful yacht is the varnish on some interior panels, which is partly coming loose. So some paintwork in the interior to be done if desired. It is not moist, it is a problem of the last layer of paint from the yard and easily fixed. Beside some farnish issues, the nterior is truly in great condition. Mooring in Port Grimaud paid for entire 2022 season!!
This could be an ideal long distance cruiser with some upgrades. You buy a boat that is in the basis in truly super condition, ready for many years to come. If you have more questions, or like to make an appointment to visit this Beneteau 50 in Port Grimaud (FR), please contact White Whale Cote D'Azur at international@wwy.nl or call +31 (0) 646 086 467.
Do you want to sell your boat? White Whale Yachtbrokers has 11 offices in Europe. We sell your boat no matter where she is located, at a low commission. No start-up costs, always no-cure-no-pay, advertising on the top 30 leading websites in Europe including yachtworld.com. Ask us for a proposal for your yacht. In some cases we also trade in used boats.

Model: GERMAN FRERS 50 KETCH Type: sailing yacht LOA (m): 14,90 Beam (m): 4,30 Draft (m): 2,20 Draft min (m): 1,20 Air draft (m): 18,00 Headroom (m): 2,07 Year built: 1976 Launched: 1983 Builder: Belarmino Sarmiento Country: Argentina Designer: German Frers (no. 697) Displacement (t): 15,92 Ballast (tonnes): 3,8 lead CE norm: NA Hull material: wood Hull colour: white Hull shape: with Skeg V-shaped hull Keel type: lifting keel Superstructure material: wood Deck material: wood Deck finish: teak Superstructure deck finish: teak Cockpit deck finish: teak Antifouling (year): 2022 Sigma Echofleet 530 black Dorades: white painted steel Window frame: stainless steel Window material: green tempered glass Deckhatch: stainless steel Portholes: stainless steel Mast can be lowered: manual Steadying sail with mast: Mizzen Fuel tank (litre): 300 stainless steel Level indicator (fuel tank): Float type Fuel daytank (litre): stainless steel Freshwater tank (litre): 400 stainless steel Level indicator (freshwater): Float type Blackwater tank (litre): 227 polyethylene Level indicator (blackwater): Float Type Blackwater tank extraction: deck extraction Wheel steering: cable steering Outside helm position: in cockpit cable steering Emergency tiller: yes More info on hull: In very good conditions More info on paintwork: In very good conditions Extra info: Hardwood under waterline & Cetro in whole strakes naturally Extra info: dried for 10 years, hand cut In 1976 Jose Caporaso ordered a comfortable and fast cruising ketch designed by German Frers to built in the most traditional way in wood by Belarmino Sarmiento in Buenos Aires. Interiors were made also in strong but light African woods. Launched in 1983 she started her first long passage to Brazil in 1985 and in 1988 she was sold to a Spanish owner for a circumnavigation until 2000. Since 2014 sailed and refurbished in the UK by her present owner who took full advantage of the safe simplicity of her effortless passage making in variable wind conditions. Faultless sea keeping in motion.

IT
The boat is a real gem. Beautiful and refined, both in its interior spaces and in its deck, it is a boat equipped with everything that can offer a unique navigation experience, fun but in great comfort and elegance, a boat for true amateurs. The boat is not only beautiful, but equipped with every comfort. It has air conditioning, an electric generator that allows you to have electricity without sacrifice, has three refrigerators, a three-burner stove with oven and a large and welcoming dinette. The deck is like a great lady of the sea with large spaces where you can relax in the sun and a cockpit where six people eat comfortably. Rigging and equipment for a fast boat, which is not afraid of demanding conditions and knows how to have fun even in light winds. Its four cabins make it a perfect boat for those who want to enjoy an experience of maximum comfort and fun aboard a boat with a unique charm.

description:
Ocean version The "Ocean" configuration is perfect for owners who prefer a more traditional maneuvering scheme with the sheets positioned on the coamings, the halyards maneuvers and the mainsail traveling close to the helm station.
Dufour 470 is the successful combination of Dufour know-how and the company's desire to innovate. This model, heir to its predecessor, reflects the shipyard's DNA but with an imprint of modernity. The line of the hull and the fluidity of the layout of the main deck make this sailboat an authentic icon which, due to its modernity, simplicity and elegance, has already become a new "classic". Spacious master cabin with private bathroom. Atmospheric and luxurious teak paneling. The sails are still in new condition. Among other things, equipped with; Hydraulic bow thruster, lift keel, hydraulic anchor winch with stainless steel chain, Andersen winches of which 3 electric, fixed windscreen, folding bathing platform, 6.5 kW generator, leather upholstery, foam insulation, thermopane glazing, 3000 watt inverter, electric hob with oven, microwave, 2x electric toilet, only 3 hull fittings, holding tank above the waterline. name: 2002 Beneteau First 47.72002 Beneteau First 47.7
description:
Designed by Bruce Farr, the Beneteau First 47.7 builds on the phenomenal success of her smaller sister the 40.7, over 300 of which are now afloat.
The Beneteau First 47.7 offers a variety of standard rig, keel, engine and accommodation configurations to create a boat that is optimised towards either racing or cruising.
This is not new – several of the big production builders do the same – but Beneteau appear to do it to best effect.

2014 ROBERTSON AND CAINE LEOPARD 48 – Blow n Go
BUILDERS REMARKS: The award-winning Leopard 48 offers blue water performance and comfortable living spaces; this catamaran is a popular member of the Leopard line. The Leopard 48 features a large forward cockpit with direct access from the saloon and a stairway to the forward platform. Other exterior bonuses include a large and open aft cockpit with cockpit table. A raised helm station, providing excellent panoramic visibility, allows for excellent blue water maneuverability. The galley of the Leopard 48 comes equipped with top-of-the-line appliances and ample prepping space. The expertly-designed interior makes sailing not only fun, but also incredibly comfortable. Her modern lines and open floor plan set a new standard for the modern cruising catamaran.
BROKERS REMARKS: BLOW N GO is a fantastic example of the new to the market Leopard 48 featuring the awesome forward cockpit. This yacht has the desirable cherry wood interior, which exudes class. The Yanmar engines purr along and the Northern Lights Generator power up the fully air-conditioned interior to keep your guests cool in luxurious comfort. Owner very motivated to sell.
Huge price drop. This is now the best value and youngest Leopard 48 available.
 AVAILABILITY: Available Now. This vessel sustained some damage from Hurricane IRMA, and has been repaired following the builders guidelines. The pictures in the vessel were taken after the repairs were completed. Please contact your broker for more detailed information on the repairs.

name: 2019 Dufour 48catamaran2019 Dufour 48catamaran
description:
REVOLUTION: the world of CATAMARANS has now a new point of reference; the CAT48 'DUFOUR designed by Felci Yachts. The reverse bows and futuristic lines unimaginable until yesterday make it the true EVOLUTION of the SPECIES. The communication between the various areas of the boat incorporates many completely innovative solutions. The large external cockpit covered by the flybridge, positioned on the same level as the interior living room and kitchen are distinctive elements. The fly takes on a new dimension; not only the command place of the boat and space dedicated to sunbathing, but also that, unprecedented for this size, of a raised lounge to enjoy special moments of relaxation in a privileged position. The habitability is worthy of a 5-star suite, with 5 cabins equipped with dedicated services.
Available with management program until 31/12/2024 Mehr anzeigen

name: 2010 Custom Bert Mauri Massimo Bert Mauri Composite 482010 Custom Bert Mauri Massimo Bert Mauri Composite 48
description:
Il cantiere Mauri, diretto da Bert e suo figlio Francesco, hanno prodotto negli anni delle eccellenze. Con il loro artigianato fuori dall'ordinario hanno creato accessori e componenti in composito frutto di studi pluriennali. Il Composite 48 prodotto da questo cantiere è un Custom che rientra nella categosia dei fast cruiser. Come tale si presenta con un'inconfondibile pianta triangolare, un'ampia superficie velica, un baglio che si prolunga fino a poppa.  Questa barca in particolare è stata costruita per uso familiare da Bert Mauri, è stata poi acquistata da un secondo proprietario e successivamente dall'attuale veditore. Questo composite ha sempre navigato nel mediterraneo ma molti dettagli costruttivi la rendono adatta anche agli oceani più duri: tambuccio estradossante il foro di apertura - coperta del pozzetto a chiusura vano motore che ha una ghiotta generosa per non far andare acqua nel vano anche prendendo grandi onde - timoni solidi e fatti su misura come la colonnina   Bert Mauri and his son Francesco distinguished their production through the years as Italian excellence. Their visionary skills together with decades of experience produced out-of-the-ordinary accessories and components. Composite 48 it's a Custom from this shipyard and can be enclosed in the fast cruiser's list. As such, this vessel is distinguished by a triangular plan, a large sail area, a beam reaching till the stern. This vessel was created by Bert Mauri for family use, it was then sold once and then bought by the current owner. It use to sail just on the Mediterranean sea but its construction features make it worthy of the worst ocean condition.
English The Mauri shipyard, directed by Bert and his son Francesco, have produced excellence over the years. With their out-of-the-ordinary craftsmanship they have created composite accessories and components that are the result of multi-year studies. The Composite 48 produced by this shipyard is a Custom that falls into the category of fast cruisers. As such it has an unmistakable triangular plan, a large sail area, a beam that extends to the stern.  This boat in particular was built for family use by Bert Mauri, it was then purchased by a second owner and later by the current veditore. This composite has always sailed in the Mediterranean but many construction details make it suitable even for the hardest oceans: extradosing drum the opening hole - cockpit blanket with engine compartment closure that has a generous glutton to not let water go into the compartment even taking large waves - solid and custom-made rudders such as the column   Bert Mauri and his son Francesco distinguished their production through the years as Italian excellence. Their visionary skills together with decades of experience produced out-of-the-ordinary accessories and components. Composite 48 it's a Custom from this shipyard and can be enclosed in the fast cruiser's list. As such, this vessel is distinguished by a triangular plan, a large sail area, a beam reaching till the stern. This vessel was created by Bert Mauri for family use, it was then sold once and then bought by the current owner. It use to sail just on the Mediterranean sea but its construction features make it worthy of the worst ocean condition.
Française Le chantier naval Mauri, dirigé par Bert et son fils Francesco, a produit l’excellence au fil des ans. Avec leur savoir-faire hors du commun, ils ont créé des accessoires et des composants composites qui sont le résultat d’études pluriannuelles. Le Composite 48 produit par ce chantier naval est un Custom qui entre dans la catégorie des croiseurs rapides. En tant que tel, il a un plan triangulaire incomparable, une grande surface de voile, une poutre qui s’étend jusqu’à la poupe.  Ce bateau en particulier a été construit pour un usage familial par Bert Mauri, il a ensuite été acheté par un deuxième propriétaire et plus tard par le veditore actuel. Ce composite a toujours navigué en Méditerranée mais de nombreux détails de construction le rendent adapté même aux océans les plus durs: tambour d’extradosage le trou d’ouverture - couverture de cockpit avec fermeture du compartiment moteur qui a un glouton généreux pour ne pas laisser l’eau entrer dans le compartiment même en prenant de grandes vagues - gouvernails solides et sur mesure tels que la colonne   Bert Mauri et son fils Francesco ont distingué leur production à travers les années comme une excellence italienne. Leurs compétences visionnaires ainsi que des décennies d’expérience ont produit des accessoires et des composants hors du commun. Composite 48 c’est un Custom de ce chantier naval et peut être inclus dans la liste des croiseurs rapides. En tant que tel, ce navire se distingue par un plan triangulaire, une grande surface de voile, une poutre atteignant jusqu’à la poupe. Ce navire a été créé par Bert Mauri pour un usage familial, il a ensuite été vendu une fois puis acheté par le propriétaire actuel. Il avait l’usage de naviguer juste sur la mer Méditerranée, mais ses caractéristiques de construction le rendent digne des pires conditions océaniques.
Deutsch Die Mauri-Werft, die von Bert und seinem Sohn Francesco geleitet wird, hat im Laufe der Jahre Exzellenz hervorgebracht. Mit ihrer außergewöhnlichen Handwerkskunst haben sie Composite-Accessoires und -Komponenten geschaffen, die das Ergebnis mehrjähriger Studien sind. Der von dieser Werft produzierte Composite 48 ist ein Custom, der in die Kategorie der schnellen Kreuzer fällt. Als solches hat es einen unverwechselbaren dreieckigen Grundriss, eine große Segelfläche, einen Strahl, der sich bis zum Heck erstreckt.  Insbesondere dieses Boot wurde von Bert Mauri für den Familiengebrauch gebaut, es wurde dann von einem zweiten Besitzer und später von der aktuellen Veditore gekauft. Dieser Verbundwerkstoff ist schon immer im Mittelmeer gesegelt, aber viele Konstruktionsdetails machen ihn auch für die härtesten Ozeane geeignet: Extradosierung trommeln das Öffnungsloch - Cockpitdecke mit Motorraumverschluss, die einen großzügigen Vielfraß hat, um auch große Wellen nicht in den Raum eindringen zu lassen - solide und maßgefertigte Ruder wie die Säule   Bert Mauri und sein Sohn Francesco zeichneten ihre Produktion im Laufe der Jahre als italienische Exzellenz aus. Ihr visionäres Geschick zusammen mit jahrzehntelanger Erfahrung brachte außergewöhnliche Accessoires und Komponenten hervor. Composite 48 ist es ein Custom von dieser Werft und kann in die Liste der schnellen Kreuzer aufgenommen werden. Als solches zeichnet sich dieses Schiff durch einen dreieckigen Grundriss, eine große Segelfläche und einen bis zum Heck reichenden Strahl aus. Dieses Schiff wurde von Bert Mauri für den Familiengebrauch geschaffen, es wurde dann einmal verkauft und dann vom jetzigen Besitzer gekauft. Es segelt nur auf dem Mittelmeer, aber seine Konstruktionsmerkmale machen es der schlechtesten Meeresbedingung würdig.
Español El astillero Mauri, dirigido por Bert y su hijo Francesco, ha producido excelencia a lo largo de los años. Con su artesanía fuera de lo común, han creado accesorios y componentes compuestos que son el resultado de estudios de varios años. El Composite 48 producido por este astillero es un Custom que entra en la categoría de cruceros rápidos. Como tal, tiene una planta triangular inconfundible, una gran área de vela, una viga que se extiende hasta la popa.  Este barco en particular fue construido para uso familiar por Bert Mauri, luego fue comprado por un segundo propietario y más tarde por el actual veditore. Este compuesto siempre ha navegado en el Mediterráneo, pero muchos detalles de construcción lo hacen adecuado incluso para los océanos más duros: tambor de extradosificación del orificio de apertura - manta de la cabina con cierre del compartimiento del motor que tiene un glotón generoso para no dejar que el agua entre en el compartimento incluso tomando grandes olas - timones sólidos y hechos a medida como la columna   Bert Mauri y su hijo Francesco distinguieron su producción a través de los años como excelencia italiana. Sus habilidades visionarias junto con décadas de experiencia produjeron accesorios y componentes fuera de lo común. Composite 48 es un Custom de este astillero y se puede incluir en la lista del crucero rápido. Como tal, este buque se distingue por una planta triangular, una gran área de vela, una viga que llega hasta la popa. Este buque fue creado por Bert Mauri para uso familiar, luego fue vendido una vez y luego comprado por el propietario actual. Solía navegar solo en el mar Mediterráneo, pero sus características de construcción lo hacen digno de la peor condición oceánica.
Россию Верфь Маури, руководимая Бертом и его сыном Франческо, на протяжении многих лет производила превосходные результаты. Благодаря своему необычному мастерству они создали композитные аксессуары и компоненты, которые являются результатом многолетних исследований. Composite 48, производимый этой верфью, является Custom, который попадает в категорию быстрых крейсеров. Как таковой он имеет безошибочный треугольный план, большую площадь паруса, балку, которая простирается до кормы.  Эта лодка, в частности, была построена для семейного использования Бертом Маури, затем она была куплена вторым владельцем, а затем нынешним ведитором. Этот композит всегда плавал в Средиземном море, но многие детали конструкции делают его пригодным даже для самых тяжелых океанов: экстрадозный барабан открывающегося отверстия - одеяло кабины с закрытием моторного отсека, которое имеет щедрое обжорство, чтобы не пропускать воду в отсек даже принимая большие волны - твердые и изготовленные на заказ рули, такие как колонна.   Берт Маури и его сын Франческо отличали свое производство на протяжении многих лет как итальянское превосходство. Их дальновидные навыки вместе с многолетним опытом создали необычные аксессуары и компоненты. Composite 48 это Custom с этой верфи и может быть включен в список быстрого крейсера. Как таковое, это судно отличается треугольным планом, большой площадью паруса, балкой, доходящей до кормы. Это судно было создано Бертом Маури для семейного пользования, затем оно было продано один раз, а затем куплено нынешним владельцем. Он используется для плавания только по Средиземному морю, но его конструктивные особенности делают его достойным худших условий океана.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1980 Cheoy Lee 48 Ketch1980 Cheoy Lee 48 Ketch
description:
48 footer in concours condition


This is every sailor's dream! This Cheoy Lee 48 was bought 6 years ago by the current owner and completely refitted. The boat has just returned from her last trip to Norway and is now in our sales marina for your viewing. Besides that the boat is fantastically equipped, the boat is also in concours condition. There is no overdue maintenance, no open ends, everything works, everything shines. In the specifications you can find what has been renewed, it is almost too much to mention, but we will still list a few important items: - The underwater hull was completely bare in 2017 and after the correct drying time, it was reapplied with an epoxy system built up. - The hull has been rolled in a two-component paint system in a very nice color. - The original Perkins engine has been completely overhauled and runs like a charm. - The standing rigging has been completely renewed, the running rigging largely, the sails were also renewed in 2019/2020. - The sprayhood, rear tent and much of the navigation equipment is from 2018.
Are you looking for a boat to live on? Are you looking for a combination between comfortable travel and a long stay on board or do you want to sail the Dutch waters with a fantastic ship, don't wait too long with your viewing ... this is the boat you are looking for! The boat can be delivered anywhere in Europe.

name: 1988 Jeanneau Sun Kiss 471988 Jeanneau Sun Kiss 47
description:
CAP'MED BOAT & YACHT Consulting is pleased to offer you this superb SUN KISS 47 designed by Jeanneau in 1988.
The boats built during this period are recognized for being of exceptional design quality, a skilful balance between solidity, comfort and performance.
The large width of the Sun Kiss 47 induces an airy layout where nothing disturbs the view. The side barrotage of the coachroof gives a particular character to the saloon which recalls wooden constructions with their beams extending from the varangage. The double series of horizontal glazing offers exceptional lighting. The general finish of the Sun Kiss 47 is superb with its real teak woodwork, "solid" moldings. name: 2021 Bavaria Cruiser 462021 Bavaria Cruiser 46
description:
This almost NEW luxury sailboat, not yet 1 year old! with 3 cabins with folding bathing platform is ready to sail away.


This luxurious bavaria 46 with a wonderfully spacious cockpit, a well-arranged deck, spacious gangways is only 10 months old, she really smells like new inside! She is ready for her new happy owner. This beautiful yacht is a unique opportunity to sail with an almost new yacht this summer.
The Bavaria Cruiser 46 is equipped with the most luxurious options such as a bow thruster, two chartplotters on the steering positions, auto-pilot, electric windlass, bimini, cockpit tent and 3 cabins, each with a private bathroom with shower and toilet. You have all the luxury on board to go on a sailing trip with many friends or family. The fold-out bathing platform is great for swimming, supping or surfing.
You can enjoy all the large and small waters of Europe with every possible luxury.

name: 2007 Hanse 470e2007 Hanse 470e
description:
Just a very careful owner for this Hanse 47e that, since 2007 has been run and managed by its Italian Owner Eduardo, spending the summer season between the Mediterranean Sea, off season on the hard.
The 470 has been exactingly engineered to deliver a blend of performance attributes and cruising comfort. The result is an easy-to-handle, spirited racer-cruiser that packs plenty of cabin space and amenities into its beamy hull.
The team at Hanse conceived the interior design of the 470 and worked with Judel/Vrolijk designers to define a sailboat with comfortable accommodations and the sailing ability: At the heart of the success is a canoe body shape with a clean entry, full beam, and flat sections aft that make the boat look more like a racer than a cruiser.
One of the most noticeable deck features on the Hanse 470 is the sculpted deck plates that cover halyards, self-tacking jib sheet, topping lift, and other lines led aft. This arrangement keeps the coach roof clear and unencumbered. The interior and exterior cushions are in special Alcantara tissue. 
The interior layout includes a very large forward owners cabin, main saloon is set up with a dinette to portboard and two built-in arm chairs and a small side table in the same location. Aft two smaller side-by-side cabins with toilet and separate shower.
The Hanse 470 is a cruising boat for those who love to sail, and a club racer for those who enjoy a summer cruise. Its construction quality and price point qualify it as a cost-effective alternative in the 40/50-footer marketplace.
 
**This boat is Italian and as such, its sale is subject to Italian customs and practices on yachts brokerage, which state that the agency commission of 10% is paid in half between the seller and the buyer. The sale price published on this site is therefore calibrated so that the seller pays to the broker only 5% and does not include the other 5%, which must be paid directly by the buyer to the broker.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2006 Sly 472006 Sly 47
description:
INGLESE
With this boat you will not go unnoticed! Do you know what it means to ALWAYS go sailing? This is a boat where the engine is really auxiliary and with a gust of wind it starts to move, without losing the comfort of a 3-cabin, 2-bathroom boat. The boat is manoeuvrable and sailing manoeuvres are facilitated by 2 electric winches, while you can anchor comfortably in the roadstead thanks to the chain meter counter in the cockpit and in no time at all open a canvas supported by two carbon supports that will protect you from the sun. The hull, deck and mast (with boomerang spreaders) are in carbon while the synthetic teak is of the latest generation. The current owner has carried out numerous restyling works: interior 2018, sails 2017, synthetic teak, autopilot + gps plotter 2021, sprayhood 2021 and much more.
Used Sly 47. Boat offered with exclusive sales contract. Authorised shipping brokerage company. This boat really exists: we were personally on board, checked the documents and carried out the photo shoot. The engine hours indicated refer to the date of this sheet. ITALIANO
Con questa barca non passerai inosservato! Sai cosa significa andare SEMPRE a vela? Questa è una barca dove il motore è realmente ausiliario e con un refolo di vento inizia a muoversi, senza perdere le comodità di un 3 cabine e 2 bagni. La barca è maneggevole e le manovre a vela sono agevolate da 2 winch elettrici, mentre potrai ancorare comodamente in rada grazie al conta metri catena in pozzetto ed aprire in pochissimo tempo un telo sorretto da due supporti in carbonio che ti proteggerà dal sole. Lo scafo, coperta e albero (con crocette a boomerang) sono in carbonio mentre il teak sintetico è di ultima generazione. L'attuale armatore ha effettuato numerosi lavori di restyling: interni 2018, vele 2017, teak sintetico, pilota automatico + plotter gps 2021, sprayhood 2021 e molto altro.

Le bateau est maniable et les manœuvres de navigation sont facilitées par 2 treuils électriques, tandis que vous pouvez jeter l'ancre confortablement dans la rade grâce au compteur de chaîne dans le cockpit et en un rien de temps ouvrir une toile soutenue par deux supports en carbone qui vous protégera du soleil. La coque, le pont et le mât (avec barres de flèche boomerang) sont en carbone tandis que le teck synthétique est de dernière génération. Mit diesem Boot werden Sie nicht unbemerkt bleiben! Wissen Sie, was es bedeutet, IMMER segeln zu gehen? Dies ist ein Boot, bei dem der Motor wirklich ein Hilfsantrieb ist und bei einem Windstoß beginnt es sich zu bewegen, ohne den Komfort eines Bootes mit 3 Kabinen und 2 Bädern zu verlieren. Das Boot ist wendig und die Segelmanöver werden durch 2 elektrische Winden erleichtert, während Sie dank des Kettenzählers im Cockpit bequem auf der Reede ankern und im Handumdrehen eine von zwei Karbonstützen getragene Plane öffnen können, die Sie vor der Sonne schützt. Der Rumpf, das Deck und der Mast (mit Bumerangspreizen) sind aus Carbon, während das synthetische Teakholz der neuesten Generation ist. name: 1983 Colin Archer Colina 41  TOP1983 Colin Archer Colina 41  TOP
description:
Beautiful Colin Archer -Colina 41- for health reasons for sale on behalf of a customer.
The Colina 41 deckhouse, SY Svea Marie is a charming and characterful classic sailing yacht. Svea Marie was brought into a technically and substantially very good condition by the previous owner with extensive, value-preserving work.
The fuselage is made of plastic and the superstructure is made of wood. For lovers who are looking for a solid, high-quality built and independent classic sailing yacht, we recommend a viewing. Hull / deck and rig: * Colina Deckshaus 41 * Build number: #03/83 * Shipyard: Juelsminde Bootsbyggerie / Denmark * Design by: Colin Archer and J. Hansen * Underwater hull was revised in 2019 by Wrede * Diesel tank completely cleaned in 2015 * The deckhouse and all other wooden parts (outside) were repainted in 2018 with 4 coats of paint * Bright deckhouse with interior helm and a C-shaped sofa with a large table for 6 people * Interior in high-quality mahogany * L-pantry with many storage options * Located under the deckhouse the engine room * In the saloon there is a charming bar and a height-adjustable saloon table * The two saloon sofas on port and starboard can be converted into 2 berths * In the stern is the spacious owner's double berth * In the bow area there is another V- Berth * In the passage area on port side is a wet room with shower * Another wet room is located aft toilet / shower * Both wet rooms ellen have electric DOMETIC toilets with new vanity tops and sunken sinks - New 2015 * Pantry with gas stove (2 flames) and oven * Electric refrigerator with connection for freezer box - New 2016 * Stainless steel double sink, with worktop and fittings - New 2016 * Hot water pressure system / cold with boiler- New 2016 * All waste water hoses- New 2018 * 1x holding tank * 2x gray water tank * All winches 2016 completely dismantled and overhauled * High-quality beige carpeting throughout the ship- New 2015 * Mainsail 35.5 sqm * Furling system for the jib 48, 5 sqm * Furling jib 26 sqm * All sails were checked annually and repaired if necessary * Mainsail cover * Lazy bag mainsail recovery system Electronics and navigation: * C-Tek MXS25 charger 12 / 25 A from 2015 * 2 separate batteries for the bow thruster * 2x batteries á 145 AH (12 V) for the service * Entire battery system was completely rebuilt in 2016 and professionally * RAY50 VHF radio DSC/ ATIS from 0 6.2015 * 4x multifunction displays from RAYMARINE i70 Color for Wind | Log | Lot and water temperature from 06.2015 * RAYMARINE radar * RAYMARINE GPS chartplotter A 125 series 12» * new autopilot from Raymarine from 2021 * Navtex * ICOM IC-M 91D handheld radio from 2016 * AIS transmit/receive * 2x magnetic compass Equipment and accessories: * WEBASTO Diesel heating * SIDEPOWER SE 170 / 250 TC bow thruster from 08.2016 * Fenders & mooring lines * Hydraulic windlass * Anchor with 70 m anchor chain * Stainless steel bathing ladder 3-way foldable for the mirror- New 2017 * The yacht is sold with pot and pan * EPIRB GME MT 403 G Float Free from 2016 * Fixed winter tarpaulin * Remote throttle switch * Fixed propeller * New Davids for dinghy new in 2021 * Antifouling new in 2021

name: 1984 Nautica Sloop 4451984 Nautica Sloop 445
description:
Malù Yachting represented an innovative shipyard during the 1980’s. It was characterized by the meticulous and constant search for the most appropriate materials and technologies to build yachts with attention to details. The boat for sale is the model Sloop 445 and she is a completely custom one-off designed in 1984 by renowned Italian yacht designer Luca Brenta and produced in 1985 to very high construction standards. The hull is made of wood externally covered with Kevlar fibres and it was built by Nautica C4 of Treviso.Sloop 445 is an admirable cruiser with an excellent interior and deck finishes. The yacht is in very good general condition thanks to the attentions of the current owner who has carried out the following works:- new rigging 2019- antifouling 2021- S-Drive transmission in 2018- rudder shaft and rudder rebuilt in 2021- new teak in the main deck in 2018- cleaning tanks in 2018- new electric windlass in 2018- new boat cover 2019Nanni 65 CV engine was replaced in 2001 and it has regularly been serviced each year. This cruiser is ready to sail and ideal for long range cruising and it is equipped with original documents and technical drawings. Interesting opportunity of mooring a few miles from the enchanting Venice Lagoon. More info on request.
 
 
Malù Yachting ha rappresentato una innovativa realtà produttiva nel campo della cantieristica navale durante gli anni Ottanta. Il suo tratto distintivo è dato dalla ricerca puntigliosa e costante di materiali e delle tecnologie più appropriate per realizzare yacht curati nei minimi dettagli. Lo Sloop 445 proposto in vendita è un modello one-off completamente custom progettato nel 1984 dal noto yacht designer italiani Luca Brenta e prodotto nel 1985 secondo elevatissimi standard costruttivi. Lo scafo è in legno rivestito esternamente con fibre di Kevlar ed è stato realizzato dalla Nautica C4 di Treviso. Si tratta, pertanto, di un cruiser ammirevole per le ottime finiture interne e di coperta. Lo yacht si presenta in buonissime condizioni generali grazie alle innumerevoli attenzioni dell’attuale armatore che ha realizzato i seguenti lavori: - sartiame nuovo 2019- antivegetativa 2021- revisione trasmissione S-Drive 2018- asse timone e timone rifatto 2021- teak coperta rifatto 2018- pulizia serbatoi 2018- salpa ancora elettrico 2018- telo copri barca 2019Il motore è stato sostituito nel 2001 con un Nanni (65 CV) ed è stato regolarmente tagliandato ogni anno. Imbarcazione pronta alla boa, ideale per le crociere e dotata di tutta la documentazione originale compresi disegni di progetto. Interessante opportunità di usufruire di possibile posto barca a poche miglia dall’incantevole Laguna di Venezia.  Maggiori informazioni disponibili su richiesta.Mehr anzeigen

White painted deck (2021/2022) TBS non-skid profile mats Superstructure deck finish: (New 2012+refit 2021). White painted superstructure (2021/2022) teak Cockpit deck finish: (New in 2012 + refit in 2021). White painted cockpit (2021/2022) teak Antifouling (year): 2022 Dorades: aluminium with plastic air-vents (4 x air-vent : New in 2022) Window frame: aluminium Window material: Hora tempered and harded glass (10 mm and 6 mm - 1998) double glazing Deckhatch: Lewmar (1998) with beige covers (2020) Portholes: stainless steel Insulation: (40 - 50 mm) (2000) foam Fuel tank (litre): 450 L (in the keel - 1996) steel Fuel daytank (litre): 90 L (2000) aluminium Level indicator (daytank): yes Freshwater tank (litre): 1000 L (cemented steel - 2000) steel Blackwater tank (litre): 350 L (not connected at this moment - 1996) steel Wheel steering: stainless steel covered with leather (1996) Inside helm position: via the autopilot (2000) Outside helm position: connected on to the quadrant (1996) cable steering More info on hull: Epoxy on underwater hull before first layor antifouling applied Extra info: Stainless steel hawse-holes, gunwales, stanchion bases, bowsprit Beautiful Custom Built Yacht for a Lifetime ! The current (first) owner has recently carried out a complete professional refit on the Carena 47 and no expense has been spared. The boat is very suitable for long sea voyages and also for permanent residence. The boat is easily operated by a small crew. The hull is Corten steel, the deck is steel and the superstructure is aluminum.

name: 2005 Catalina Morgan 4402005 Catalina Morgan 440
description:
The Catalina Morgan 440 were voted the Best Production Cruiser from 40 to 45 Feet in Cruising World Magazine 2005 because they are comfortable, roomy and affordable. Gerry Douglas, designer of the Catalina Morgan 440 said ‘We envisioned a manageable rig and an aft cockpit with a raised deck saloon that was large. All equipment and ergonomics were specifically selected and designed for comfort and ease of handling’. Numerous opening hatches make the interior modern, light and airy. Pipe Muh Bligh handles well, is responsive and easy to sail. The cockpit is extremely comfortable with good all round viability with all sailing lines leading aft. All mast control lines are led through rope clutches to a two-speed electric power winch on the cabin top. The deck is well thought out with recessed anchor locker, electric windlass with foot switch and a sturdy anchor roller, midship cleats and stainless steel grab handles on the cabin roof. A swim platform with ladder gives easy access into water.
Sadly because of travel restrictions imposed due to covid the owners have been unable to return to the boat to take care of her.  The price has been substantially reduced to reflect the work required to bring her up to scratch, but represents excellent value for money for the DIY buyer. Whilst structurally and mechanically sound, she requires a certain amount of repair and refurbishment to bring her back to spec. More photos available on request
Viewing by appointment at our Grenada Office Mehr anzeigen

name: 2003 X-Yachts X-462003 X-Yachts X-46
description:
Only 2 very careful owners for this X-46. Between 2003 and 2010 she was skippered and managed by its first owner who bought her brand-new. The second and current owner took her over in 2010 and sailed her for just a month a year, off season on hard for two months. She supports the same standard features as the other X-Yachts such as sandwich hull and deck, steel hull girders, composite keel with low CGF, Awllgripped hull; all items for optimum sailing performance.
A Volvo Penta – D2 – 75/S 75HP diesel engine mounted on rubber suspension with S-drive installation and 3 blades Flex-O-Fold propeller. The engine is run with freshwater cooling system. The engine control panel is placed in a recess with a plexiglass for protection. It incorporates an rpm-meter, acoustic alarm for oil pressure and cooling water temperature and an hour counter that doesn't work. Double stainless steel fuel tank 220-litre each with transfer pump.
Included is also the best deck gear on the market such as carbon mast, boom and spinnaker pole by Nordic Mast, ball bearing blocks throughout and needle rudder bearings. Hydraulic vang and backstay with two-way control. Dyneema sheets, spectra halyards and 6 oversized Harken winches.
Below deck large salon with dining table with seating around which can convert into very large double bed, linear kitchen with pantry along the port side and teak wood furniture. Pantry with 2 fridges and a 2-burner stove with oven. Three cabins equipped with thicker mattresses. Eberspächer heating system with outlets in all the cabins and dinette. Holding tank and electric head in front toilet, but the sink furniture needs a replacement.
Safety, high stability and easy handling are key elements ensuring the new owners, families and crews enjoyable voyages.
 
INSTRUMENTS: Raymarine Double (inside and outside) GPS Cartographic Radar 12"  dual display, autopilot, 4 B&G Jumbo instruments at mast foot + 2 in the deckhouse + 1 in the owner's cabin, LED lightsStereo system (inside and outside), Bluetooth, TV, Wi-Fi, Vhf (inside and outside)  and portable, Epirb, Inverter MasterVolt 12-2000 kw, Water maker 60 l / h, extra batteries
SAILS: Full batten mainsail in Kevlar and Taffetà on Harken travellers and furling Kevlar jib, Gennaker, Code 0, Spinnaker.
OTHER EQUIPMENT: Main anchor  Delta 15 kg, 12.5 metre 12" chain  + 50 m spliced line, 2nd anchor Bruce 15 kg, 3rd anchor Fortress , 8 person life raft Bimini Top on the helm wheel + cockpit cover (left/right), cockpit and deck cushions, carbon gangway, Dinghy with 6 HP SUZUKI outboard.
LAST WORKS PERFORMED:
2012 New teak deck (Except for the coachroof) - Cantiere Stella Polare Maestri d'ascia
2013 Mainsail in Kevlar and Taffetà - Speed Sails
2017 New Sail Drive + Gasket
2019 New Seacocks + bronze wire valves, replacement of all pipes in the bathrooms and galley, replacement of electric head in front toilet - Cantiere Nautilus Fiumicino
2020 New Shrouds + Backstay and Forestay, New paint  for mast, boom and spinnaker pole - Cantiere Nautilus Fiumicino
2021 New Sprayhood
2022 Quickwork sand-blast and antifouling (undergoing)
 
NOTE: THE PRICE ALSO INCLUDES THE PROPERTY CONCESSION OF THE BERTH IN "MARINA DI CAPITANA" (SOUTH SARDINIA - ITALY) UNTIL 2038.
 
**This boat is Italian and as such, its sale is subject to Italian customs and practices on yachts brokerage, which state that the agency commission of 10% is paid in half between the seller and the buyer. The sale price published on this site is therefore calibrated so that the seller pays to the broker only 5% and does not include the other 5%, which must be paid directly by the buyer to the broker.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2008 Dick Zaal OCEAN WANDERER 452008 Dick Zaal OCEAN WANDERER 45
description:
OCEAN WANDERER design is actually a modification of the Contest 44 by DICK ZAAL, renowned Dutch designer of CONTEST yachts for 30 years, and as the name invokes, ocean passages requirements and sea-worthiness are the main concern behind this yacht’s concept; thus the special emphasis on a stronger hull, prevention in case of container-collisions or similar mishaps.
With a center-cockpit, spacious deck and interior layouts, she is not only a strong fast Blue-Water cruiser but also a very comfortable live-aboard yacht.
This particular model was commissioned by the current owner in 2009 and professionally built to CE norms, strictly following the instructions of the architect Mr. Zaal.
The round bilge wooden strip-planking hull was firstly built on template frames and vacuum sheathed in and out with Aramid & high modulus fibers using epoxy resin. The thickness of wooden core is 27mm and the total hull thickness is minimum 45 mm on the topsides increasing to 120mm at the stem. The finishing topcoat is in INTERNATIONAL oyster-white color paint over epoxy filler.
The bullet-proof hull is in perfect condition – plans and photos under construction are available.
With her 6.2 Tons of ballast and round hull shape, she has a calculated POSITIVE STABILITY   of 150 degrees, which can hardly be surpassed by any yachts in the market.
Despite the heavy structure, her sailing performance is excellent even in light winds.
 
Due to pressing family matters, the seller had to abandon his original plans of circumnavigation and she is now awaiting another caring, discerning owner.

name: 2023 Grand Soleil 42 LC2023 Grand Soleil 42 LC
description:
BOAT TO BE CONFIGURATED!
precio base: 329.000€
Grand Soleil 42 LC Standard version includes: Hull and deck in sandwich with unidirectional and biaxial fiberglass impregnated with epoxy - vinylester skin coat. Carbon bowsprit integrated to the hull. Two instrument pods for 7" plotter. Selden Furlex TD304 furling jib with under deck drum. Carbon arch with mainsail sheet fixed point. 4 Harken Radial chromed STC 46.2 winches. Aluminum mast with two sets of spreaders stinless steel wire rigging. Stern platform with hydraulic opening. L shape keel with cast iron blade and lead torpedo, draft 2,25 mt. Keel surface treated with epoxy cicle. Seacocks and thru-hulls fitting by Marine Composite Valve Truedesign. Flush deck hatches with blinds and flyscreen. Gas struts for hatches on deck. 8 hull windows for saloon, owner cabin and aft cabins. Holding tank in all heads. 3 service batteries Exide AGM 12V 90 Ah. 1 engine battery Exide AGM 12V 70 Ah. Standard version with 3 cabins 2 heads. Oak interiors. L shape kitchen with white resin worktops. Top opening fridge 90 lt. Led lights for both interiors and exteriors. 12 V outlets in each area (heads excluded). Sail locker. Volvo engine 50HP with sail drive. Water tank capacity 300lt. Fuel tank capacity c.a. 200lt
El casco del GS 42 LC, diseñado una vez más por Marco Lostuzzi, garantiza, por un lado, un alto nivel de estabilidad gracias a los generosos volúmenes y, por otro, altos niveles de rendimiento garantizados por un plano vélico bien proporcionado. Al igual que sus hermanos mayores de la gama Long Cruise, el 42 LC está diseñado para ofrecer el máximo confort y una vida de lujo a bordo.
*Los datos de equipamiento e imágenes especificados en este anuncio son ejemplos de configuración, contacte con nosotros para informarse de las opciones y precios para configurar su barco nuevo.

name: 1984 Reinke Hydra SC1984 Reinke Hydra SC
description:
Tried and tested, safe long-haul yacht for all areas of the world to cast off immediately! Brief profile: - cutter rigged - twin engines - 1 fixed keel - steel - separate helm station aft - very large center cockpit as the main living area with good protection from the elements - fully equipped for the long journey. We are selling the 'September' in the middle of our circumnavigation, which started in mid-2016 and is now taking much longer than expected. That's why we switch to a boat that allows us - we are around 60 years old - to sail even at an advanced age. The ship is immediately ready to continue! Buy fresh linens and let's go! We're still on our way. The ship can be viewed and sailed in Cherbourg, France, from mid-October.
We have continually improved and invested in the ship over the years. In 2019 the entire deck was sandblasted and rebuilt. Practically all of the wooden parts on the ship (cockpit and steering position) were also rebuilt. The partially dilapidated steel underneath was replaced and re-welded. Defects on the steel hull caused by internal water caused by previous owners have also been remedied. In 2016 we had two new Beta Marine engines installed. We have the strong rig regularly inspected by riggers and renewed if necessary (partly strengthened). In February 2022 we had all 14 side windows sandblasted and replaced and the hull repainted. We spent a lot of time in very hot, very wet, as well as very cold areas (below -10 degrees) and often far away from civilization for a long time. The ship is equipped accordingly. See the 'Additional equipment' section.

description:
OCEANIS 45 (3 CABINS, 2 BATHROOMS), YEAR 2019.
VISIBLE IN GOLFE JUAN, IN PERFECT CONDITION AND WELL EQUIPPED.
FIRST HAND, CONSTANT MAINTENANCE, NO CLAIMS.
Version: L-shaped galley, saloon with sliding bench seat, 3 double cabins, 2 bathrooms. Light oak woodwork, dark laminate flooring, worktop covering in light gray Corian.
Essential finish: Storage under floor, stainless steel fiddle for fenders in cockpit locker, leather sheathing on stainless steel handrails, pivoting base on rear side of cockpit table (luxury).
Engine: YANMAR 4JH57 CR SD 42kW (57 HP) (1100 hours, regular maintenance according to manufacturer requirements).
Rigging, fittings and sails: Furlström headsail (Code 0) Elvström Sails, Battened mainsail and roller-furling genoa, Mainsail sheet with additional winches, Genoa track traveler adjustment, Code 0 fittings, Vang rigid, Polyester hoop with mainsail sheet pulley, visible wind vane.
Interior equipment: Blind with integrated mosquito net, rear coachroof windows, porthole opening onto cockpit in aft cabins, automatic shower pump, wine storage under the floor, gas stove with 2 x burners, gas oven, 130L refrigerator and cold preserver 100L, double berth in the saloon.
Upholstery: Comfort saloon upholstery, cockpit cushions, custom-made cabin mattress protection.
Deck equipment: Teak cockpit floor, teak cockpit benches and aft platform covering, "luxury" cockpit table with cover, steering wheel covers, electrically tilting aft platform with remote control, sprayhood (taupe), bimini (taupe), lazy-bag (light grey), outboard motor support, cockpit shower, swim ladder.
Electrical system: Bow thruster, windlass with remote control and control at the helm station, H45 port maneuvering electric winch, LED courtesy lighting, LED navigation lights, LED interior lighting, 60 Amp battery charger, 4 x 110 A service batteries, 40L water heater, 220V circuit with shore power and saloon and cabin power points.
Water circuit: Fresh water circuit with shore power, hot/cold water cockpit shower, manual toilet + black water tank, sea water/fresh water foot pump, additional 200 L tank.
Hifi and electronics: HiFi fusion Interior and exterior speakers, B&G electronics at the helm consoles including 2 x Triton 2 displays, B&G Zeus 12 wide wireless multifunction touch screen (Navionics Silver cartography included), wind sensor (wind indicator-anemometer), probe ( Loch, Speedo, Temperature), VHF Ray50 ASN + HP cockpit, NAC3 autopilot (gyro compass included), V50 fixed VHF with H50 cockpit handset, AIS receiver.
Mooring and mooring: Mooring lines and towing hawser, fenders with sock, full mooring including chain dia 10mm and anchor 16kg.
Safety: Full equipment 6 people and offshore life raft <24h.
Dinghy: Folding dinghy 2.40m.Mehr anzeigen

description: CAP'MED is pleased to present this magnificent Lagoon 450 F full options, equipped with a generator, a watermaker, solar panels, etc. This undisputedly popular catamaran will give you all the sensations you aspire to imagining your cruise. The Lagoon 450 is also very reliable, and you will not regret having chosen to sail under its sails!Mehr anzeigen

name: 2015 Lagoon 450 F2015 Lagoon 450 F
description:
ENGLISH - Lagoon 450, 4-cabin version with raised fly bridge from 2015 for sale. With the 450 F it is all about space and comfort. She is solidly built and one of her key features is that she is big enough to easily accommodate 2 families but that she is also small enough for an experienced couple to handle. Obviously, this catamaran is also the perfect choice to cross big waters and living aboard. She offers plenty of different zones on the boat to hang out, like the forward cockpit, the fly helm and the aft cockpit. She is well equipped with two Yanmar diesel engines of 54hp each, generator from 2020, B&G navigation equipment, dinghy with outboard, davits, air conditioning throughout, etc.The large salon of the Lagoon 450 F is airy and bright thanks to the big windows.  The ample U-shaped galley is located aft and forward of that is the big navigation station. The roomy L-shaped sofa and dining table can, if necessary, be converted into an extra berth. Each hull offers 2 comfortable double bed cabins with en-suite bathrooms. Further to that, there are two single bed crew cabins, one in each peak of the hull. This multi hull delivers great comfort and space, is stable when anchored and offers solid performance while sailing.
DEUTSCH - Lagoon 450 Vierkabinen-Version mit Flybridge aus dem Jahr 2015 zu verkaufen.  Bei diesem Katamaran dreht sich alles um Platz und Komfort. Eines ihrer Hauptmerkmale ist, dass sie groß genug ist um problemlos zwei Familien unter zu bringen, aber auch klein genug und einhandtauglich-freundlich ist für ein erfahrenes Segelpaar. Selbstverständlich, ist dieser Kat auch die perfekte Wahl, um lange Fahrten zu machen und an Bord zu leben. Außerdem bietet sie viele verschiedene Zonen auf dem Boot zum Entspannen, wie der U-sitzbank auf dem Vorschiff, die Sonnenliege auf dem Kabinendach, das Cockpit und der Flybridge. Sie ist ausgestattet mit zwei Yanmar Dieselmotoren je 54 PS, Generator von 2020, B&G Navigationsausstattung, Beiboot mit Außenborder, Davits, Klimaanlage, usw.Der Salon dieser Lagoon 450 F ist dank der großen Fenster rundum, hell und luftig. Die Kombüse in U-Form befindet sich an Backbord und die Sitzgruppe befindet sich an Steuerbord. Und die Navigationsecke bietet freier Sicht nach vorn durch die großen Aufbaufenster. Jeder Rumpf beherbergt zwei Doppelkabinen mit eigenem Bad.  Darüber hinaus gibt es, in beide Vorpieken, auch noch zwei Einbett-Crew-Kabinen. Dieser Kat ist nur komfortabel, sondern bietet sie auch solide Leistung beim Segeln und Stabilität beim Ankern. 
ESPAÑOL - Lagoon 450 con flybridge del año 2015 para la venta. Con el 450F se trata de espacio y comodidad.  Es un catamarán sólidamente construido y una de sus características principales es que este yate es suficientemente grande para acomodar fácilmente a 2 familias, sino también suficiente pequeña para manejar por una pareja. Obviamente, este catamarán también será la opción perfecta para navegar por los océanos y vivir a bordo. Además, este yate ofrece un montón de diferentes zonas para relajarse, como la bañera detrás, la segunda bañera delantera, el gran solárium en la caseta, y por supuesto el flybridge. Bien equipado con dos motores diésel Yanmar de 54 CV cada uno, generador de 2020, equipo de navegación de B&G, bote auxiliar con fueraborda, pescantes, aire acondicionado, etc. El salón de este Lagoon 450 F es luminoso gracias a las ventanas panorámicas. La cocina es en forma de U para el confort en el mar. Se encuentra la estación de navegación a babor y el sofá en forma de L y la mesa de comedor a estribor.  Cada casco ofrece 2 cómodos camarotes de cama doble con baño privado. Además, hay dos cabinas de tripulación en proa. Este catamarán ofrece máxima confort y espacio, es muy estable si está anclado, y ofrece un rendimiento sólido si navega.   
NEDERLANDS - Lagoon 450 met flybridge uit 2015 te koop. Bij de 450 F draait alles om ruimte en comfort. Ze is solide gebouwd, en één van haar belangrijkste kenmerken is dat ze groot genoeg is om 2 families te herbergen, maar dat ze ook klein en handelbaar genoeg is voor een (ervaren) zeilerspaar. Uiteraard is deze catamaran ook de perfecte keuze voor lange reizen en leven aan boord. Ze biedt een zee van ruimte aan dek, zoals het voor- en het achterdek, de loungebedden op de kajuitopbouw en uiteraard de flybridge. Goed uitgerust met twee Yanmar dieselmotoren van elk 54 PK, generator uit 2020, B&G navigatieapparatuur, bijboot met buitenboordmotor, davits, airconditioning, etc. De salon van de Lagoon 450 F is licht en ruimtelijk dankzij de grote raampartijen. De kombuis in U-vorm en het navigatiestation bevinden zich aan bakboord en de ruime zitgroep met L-bank bevindt zich aan stuurboord. Elke romp biedt twee comfortabele tweepersoonshutten met eigen natte cel. Verder, bevinden zich in beide voorpieken, ook nog twee eenpersoons crewhutten. Deze toercatamaran biedt niet alleen ruimte, maar ook stabiliteit tijdens het ankeren en goede prestaties tijdens het varen.Mehr anzeigen

WATER MAIDEN, the Carole Marine cat-rigged sailing yacht was designed emphasizing simplicity and ease of handling. Obviously, this will appeal to a broader range of sailors than just beginners. This is an ideal single hander able to get underway in less than 5 minutes.

name: 1986 Nelson 461986 Nelson 46
description:
Nelson 46, one of the most coveted hulls of the 1980s. A good sized boat, heavy and solid, the deck and well equipped the central cockpit is very deep and gives a feeling of protection to those who sail. Ocean ketch designed by Laurent Giles. Boat that tightens well upwind and safe for navigation even with important winds. Central cockpit with double entrance. Copper coat hull in good condition and serviced engine. Bright interior thanks to the use of light wood instead of the mahogany that is usually encountered on this model. Last sailing summer 2021. Available immediately.
Oceanic ketch designed by Laurent Giles. The boat tightens well upwind and is safe for navigation even with important winds. Central cockpit with double entrance. name: 2005 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 452005 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 45
description:
Spacious and well priced


Please note: this boat is available from October-2022!
Well maintained Sun Odyssey 45 with 4 double cabins and 2 bathrooms. She sails under the Croatian flag. This boat had a full makeover in 2015. The sails are from 2014 and in good condition. The spray hood and the bimini top were replaced in 2016. She has a bow thruster and outdoor GPS. Do not compare the state of maintenance with an average ex-charter yacht.
All photos are taken by us and show the actual condition. We have inspected this yacht very thoroughly, ask us for more information if necessary. Are you looking for a comfortable, fully equipped, spacious and well maintained yacht? Call or email us for more information or to make an appointment in Zadar (Croatia). Your yacht broker is White Whale Croatia, +385 98 574 232 or croatia@WWY.nl.
