name: 1989 JPM, SA COTRE 13M1989 JPM, SA COTRE 13M
description:
1989 JPM, SA CUTTER 13M,
XBOAT ref 5279.After years of oceanic happiness, I am parting with my trusty boat. L'Aquarelle is a sailboat in laminated polyester, built individually on a Jean Michelot plan, and launched in 1989 under the French flag. Length H.T 13 M, Beam: 4 M, Draft: 1.80 M , Weight: 14 tons, It is a cutter rig for long voyages around the world, designed and fitted out for sailing with the family and in safety with a large central cockpit, 2 large double cabins, 1 large saloon, 1 Toilet, 1 large galley, 1 workshop, 1 sail locker and numerous chests and storage spaces. large reserves of water and diesel, a water maker and central heating. It is suitable for sailing in the most difficult places: very thick hull, hollow keel (with internal ballast) and straight for beaching, stainless steel bow reinforcement plate. After a first tour of the North and South Atlantic in 1998/1999, the boat was completely overhauled, re-equipped and renovated by the Teck-Inox shipyard in La Rochelle in 2006, all the equipment was purchased new or overhauled in 2006 including: An anti-osmosis treatment - New mast - New standing and running rigging including 2 Facnor furlers, spinnaker pole, downhaul, Walder brake, mast rung - New Genoa and Staysail - Mainsail Full Batten with trolley revised - New Leasy bag - New asymmetrical spinnaker - new carpentry and interior fittings - Stainless steel tanks with inspection hatches for water and diesel - Revised engine (Volvo Penta TAMD 31 A) 18OO h - 2 alternators 80 and 120 Amp/H - New Python Drive coupling - Revised inverter - New shaft - Max prop propeller - New windlass motor - Side Power SE 100 bow thruster new 2019 - Webasto heating - New Paguro generator - Overhauled watermaker - 3 new 70W solar panels - 12V and 220V electrical installation refurbished - Caribe 2.50 dinghy - 8CV outboard - Pilot Autohelm 7000 type 2 revised - VHF RT 550 AIS/ASN - new portable VHF - Radar Furuno 1623 - 2 fixed GPS - Radio short wave and marine band - Radio CD AM FM - Watchmate AIS receiver - New AIS transponder - EPIRB ocean signal beacon - 6-seater Viking survival in container. base. The owner guarantees that the boat will be returned to the buyer in perfect working order, both in terms of the sails, the engine, all the instruments and accessories and undertakes, after the purchase, to show all the details of the boat to its new owner. name: 1993 X-Yachts X-4121993 X-Yachts X-412
description:
1993 X-YACHT X 412,
XBOAT ref 3594.Very beautiful racing / cruising sailboat with hull signed Niels Jepessen, the X 412 represents the spirit of the Danish shipyard: High quality of construction and finish, fast and comfortable sailboat.

This model has a set of NorthSails sails in good condition, a teak cockpit and a teak interior with 4 double cabins (including 1 with 2 superimposed berths), galley and 2 bathrooms/ WC.

Marconi sloop rig at the head. Mast located on the keel. Frame changed before 2012 (Rod Inox), running backstays. Hydraulic backstay. Winch LEWMAR 43ST x 4 and 52ST x 2. Polyester hull and steel structure. Bulb keel. Hull fittings 2014 .Hull redone in 2014 (3 epoxy layers and 4 coppercoat layers).

SIMRAD navigation unit (aircraft to be revised). GEONAV GPS and IPAD holder for plotter. NAVICOM RT 650 VHF with AIS (2016) and additional handset. COBRA HH150 portable VHF. FUSION MS-CD600 radio. charge regulator. EFOY 140 fuel cell overhauled in 2021 ensuring autonomous battery supply. Shore power socket with extension cord and 220 DOLPHIN 25 Ah charger (silent mode).

10-person liferaft, Annex 2021 with Torqeedo 603 electric motor.

Teak cockpit with folding table and hand shower. Fresh water capacity 170 litres. Water heater 15 liters (overhauled 2022).

More details and visit on request.

 More information and photos on the site xboat.frMehr anzeigen

name: 1964 Camper & Nicholsons Classic Sloop1964 Camper & Nicholsons Classic Sloop
description:
A legend! ROCQUETTE is a classic 43 ft racing sloop built in 1964 following a Peter Nicholson drawing in response to the American challenge in the Admiral's Cup.Considered very innovative concept at the time, this extremely robust offshore ocean racer sailed by her architect himself, fulfilled all expectations in winning every race in the year of her launch.
“ROCQUETTE is clearly a new type of offshore racer” - Yachting World Annual, 1966. Peter Nicholson’s personal boat, ROCQUETTE was sold in early 1965 to a new owner. ROCQUETTE has been run by a crew of passionate sailors in about forty RORC races and she sailed in all weather conditions in the West Atlantic from Ireland to Spain until the early 70s.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2009 Pronavia 42 Sport IRC2009 Pronavia 42 Sport IRC
description:
The Pronavia 42 Sport IRC is a moderate displacement, high ballast ratio racer with a generous sail area. Below decks the design allows the navigator to sit either side of the central navigation station over the engine. Assassin has proven herself on the race course: Solent Series 2019 1st Class 1 and Overall, and many trophies since, including 1st Class 1 Nabb Tower Race, Carthew Diamond Trophy 1st Class 1 Ramsgate Week 2020, 1st Gold Cup, & 1st Class 1 & 2nd overall Ramsgate Week 2022. 2022 IRC rating 1.135.
Viewing by appointment only through the Essex office - 01621 785600Mehr anzeigen

name: 2013 Bavaria Vision 422013 Bavaria Vision 42
description:
Bavaria Vision 42 fully equipped and in mint condition
We would like to downsize and therefore offer our Vision42 for sale. The yacht is in mint condition and has been lovingly maintained by the owner. She is fully equipped with all options available at the time of purchase (without air conditioning): teak deck on all surfaces, bow and stern thruster foldable with joystick operation including motor, 3 electric winches with trim control + 2 manual winches, furling mainsail, gennaker rollable, anchor winch , deck wash system with 2 outlets, sprayhood and bimini (2016 new from Sunbrella), complete navigation incl. radar, diesel generator Panda Fischer, heating, remote control for autopilot and heating, hot water boiler, inverter (4 KW) on all sockets, additional gray water tank made of chrome steel, Teak skirting board including bathing platform, folding propeller, electric height-adjustable tables (cockpit and saloon), Fusion Marine sound system and TV also in owner's cabin, ventilated bed in owner's cabin, etc. Incl. Weber boat trailer and summer tarpaulin (2-piece) New Underwater (2022) with long-term lying package and long-term antifouling (10-year guarantee) carried out by Rettich / Bodman for 30,000 euros. New price including 19% VAT Euro 385,000.-, new price today approx. 500,000.- Euro.Show more

name: 1993 Fountaine Pajot Venezia 421993 Fountaine Pajot Venezia 42
description:
ENGLISH - This Fountaine Pajot Venezia 42 has been thoroughly refitted both technically as optically. Literary everything has been overhauled, rebuilt, renewed, checked and updated. The owner, a skilful engineer, has spent 3.5 years, 3000 hours and a mind-boggling amount of 300.000 euros to bring this catamaran in her current ready-to-go on a world cruise condition. The list will be too long to sum up everything. But, to give you an idea about the works carried out we can tell you that e.g., the entire hull under the waterline had a full preventive osmosis treatment, got an extra 2 layers of tri-directional long strand glass fibre with epoxy resin and received a 5-layer copper coat. The original non-sked deck surface has been replaced by a new non-skid layer, the saloon roof has been reinforced, deck- and escape hatches have been replaced, the complete electrical system has been re-engineered and rewired, the freshwater system has been replaced, spade rudders were redesigned, etc. etc.  She is, of course, very well equipped with two 30hp diesel engines, bronze folding props, 5kW generator, solar panels, lithium batteries, a comprehensive navigation package, water maker, life rafts, etc. Also, the interior of this Fountaine Pajot Venezia 42 has not been overlooked. The liner in the saloon has been renewed, the galley has been overhauled, all lights have been replaced, floors have been reinforced, etc. Furthermore, she is fitted out with new upholstery, new toilets, new mattresses, new faucets, a washing machine, etc. This cat is a safe and highly reliable cat; everything is well thought out, all works are carried out with precision, and only high-quality materials have been used. This is absolutely a must see to believe catamaran.
DEUTSCH - Diese Fountaine Pajot Venezia 42 wurde sowohl technisch als auch optisch voll und ganz überholt. Im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes wurde alles überholt, umgebaut, erneuert und aktualisiert. Der Eigner, eine erfahrener Ingenieur, hat 3.5 Jahre, 3000 Arbeitsstunden, und auch die unglaubliche Summe von 300.000 Euro investiert, um diese Fahrtenkat in seinen jetzigen Weltumsegelung-Kondition zu bringen. Die Liste wäre zu lang, um alles zu erwähnen. Aber um Ihnen eine Vorstellung von den durchgeführten Arbeiten zu geben, können wir Ihnen sagen, dass z.B. die Rümpfe unter der Wasserlinie einer vollständigen präventiven Osmose-Behandlung bekommen haben, zwei zusätzliche Schichten dreidirektionaler Langstrang-Glasfaser mit Epoxidharz aufgetragen sind, und danach 5 Schichten Kupferschicht angebracht sind. Die originale rutschfeste Decksoberfläche wurde ersetzt durch eine neue rutschfeste Schicht, das Salondach wurde verstärkt, Decks- und Notluken wurden ersetzt, das gesamte elektrische System wurde komplett neu überarbeitet und neu verkabelt, das Frischwassersystem wurde ersetzt, die Ruder wurden neu überarbeitet, usw. usw. Sie ist natürlich sehr gut ausgestattet mit zwei 30PS Dieselmotoren, Bronze Faltpropeller, 5kW Generator, Sonnenkollektoren, Lithiumbatterien, eine umfassende Navigationsausrüstung, Wassermacher, Rettungsinseln, usw. Auch das Innere dieser Fountaine Pajot Venezia 42 wurde nicht vernachlässigt. Das Innenfutter des Salons wurde erneuert, die Kombüse wurde überholt, alle Lampen wurden ersetzt, die Böden wurden verstärkt, usw. Außerdem ist sie mit neuen Polstern, neuen Toiletten, neuen Matratzen, neuen Wasserhähnen, einer Waschmaschine, usw. ausgestattet. Dieser Multirumpf ist eine ganz sichere und äußerst zuverlässige Yacht; alle Arbeiten wurden mit Präzision ausgeführt und nur hochwertige Materialien wurden verwendet. Diese Fountaine muss man sehen um es zu glauben!
NEDERLANDS - Deze Fountaine Pajot Venezia 42 onderging zowel technisch als optisch een ingrijpende refit. Letterlijk alles is gereviseerd, verbouwd, vernieuwd, gecontroleerd en geactualiseerd. De eigenaar, een vakkundig ingenieur, heeft 3.5 jaar, 3000 manuren en een duizelingwekkend bedrag van 300.000 euro geïnvesteerd om deze catamaran in haar vaarklaar-voor-een-wereldcruise-conditie te brengen. De lijst zou te lang zijn om alles op te sommen. Maar, om u een idee te geven van de uitgevoerde werkzaamheden kunnen we u vertellen dat bijvoorbeeld; de romp onder de waterlijn een complete preventieve osmose behandeling heeft gekregen, 2 extra lagen tri-directionele glasvezel met epoxy hars zijn aangebracht, alsmede 5 lagen Coppercoat. De originele antislip deklaag is vervangen voor een nieuwe antislip deklaag, het kajuitdak is verstevigd, dek- en vluchtluiken zijn vervangen, het complete elektrische systeem is opnieuw ontwikkeld en bekabeld, het zoetwatersysteem is vervangen, de balansroeren zijn verbeterd cq aangepast, etc. etc. Ze is natuurlijk zeer goed uitgerust met twee 30pk dieselmotoren, bronzen klapschroeven, 5kW generator, zonnepanelen, lithium accu's, een uitgebreide navigatie-uitrusting, watermaker, reddingsvlotten, etc. Ook het interieur van deze Fountaine Pajot Venezia 42 is flink aangepakt; de plafondvoering in de salon is vernieuwd, de kombuis is gerenoveerd, alle verlichting is vervangen, vloeren zijn verstevigd, etc.  Verder is ze uitgerust met nieuwe bekleding, nieuwe toiletten, nieuwe matrassen, nieuwe kranen, een wasmachine, etc. Deze catamaran is een veilige en zeer betrouwbare catamaran; alles is goed doordacht, werkzaamheden zijn met precisie uitgevoerd, en alleen materialen van hoge kwaliteit zijn gebruikt. Dit is absoluut een catamaran die je gezien moet hebben om het te geloven.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2018 Lagoon 422018 Lagoon 42
description: This wonderful Lagoon 42, the world's best-selling catamaran, is the 4/6 cabin version, particularly popular with families and charter companies. Established in May 2018, she has enjoyed chartering in beautiful Croatia but with fairly little utility. The Lagoon 42 has a unique visual identity with sleek curves and a groundbreaking single-tier cockpit. The elegant and functional interior by the Italian design agency Nauta is made of hazelnut wood with light floors. The 4 double cabins have their own bathrooms. The aft cabins have island beds and bathrooms with separate showers. There are one-man cabins in the arches. The spacious lounge has an L-shaped sofa and a 2-seater bench around the saloon table. The latter is lowered to convert the lounge into a large bed. In total, up to 12 people can sleep on board. The kitchen is well equipped with a 3 burner gas hob, gas oven, fridge, freezer, cupboards and benches with storage space. Chart table faces starboard. The unique single deck cockpit and transom steps are clad in teak. There is also an additional fridge here. Stairs lead to the double seat helm position protected by a hard top and 360 degree spray capability. Great communication with those staying in the cockpit. With the exception of the spinnaker sheets, which have their own winches on the side decks, all halyards and reef lines are routed back to the winches at the helm position. A winch is electric. From the helm position a small staircase leads to the roof with sunbathing opportunities with two mattresses and 3 solar panels. The front trampolines are good for sunbathing and serve as another area on board. Even when there are a lot of people on board, there is always a place where you can sit fairly undisturbed. This striking Lagoon 42 is very well equipped for long cruising including larger tanks for water and fuel, larger engines 2 x 57hp with collapsible propellers, watermaker, larger gel battery bank, solar panels, 3.40m aluminum bottom Hypalon tender and 20hp Honda Outboard engine, spinnaker with sock and code zero on a single line furler, commercial use safety equipment etc. A very spacious and comfortable catamaran that sails better than many expected.It is in top condition and ready to sail. So you can set sail immediately. Optional delivery to almost any location - by appointment. Viewing and testing at any time, but by prior arrangement. I am happy to send the sales specifications. Please contact me for more information. Serious offers consideredShow more

name: 1983 Nautor Swan 421983 Nautor Swan 42
description:
This 1983/85 Swan 42 is the number 34 of those 38 boats built for the 42 feet series, special boats that seem to defy time and just won’t age. Iconic model of the 80s, designed by Ron Holland and built by Nautor Swan famous for its "any weather" sailing skills, can be simply described as follows: brutal, raw and insanely safe.
Refinished over the years by its 3 owners, equipped with a complete sail set and 2007 Volvo Diesel 55 HP with 3000 engine hours.
Jump onboard the iconic 1980s Finnish boat, the ideal boat for the experienced deep water sailors!!

name: 1985 Nautor's Swan (FI) Swan 421985 Nautor's Swan (FI) Swan 42
description: It is the penultimate SWAN 42 built in 1985 for a very experienced American owner who kept her on the US East Coast. Then she sailed to Britain to a new owner who left her in the Solent. She has been in her current possession since 2008 and is now sailing in the Mediterranean, more specifically in the Balearic waters. This Swan is very special. She is a gem. She is in immaculate condition as her last owner made great efforts to keep her at the highest level and improve her sailing and comfort standards. In the beginning she was a semi-custom yacht with many special features and equipment not normally found on a Swan of this size. She is now in immaculate and brilliant condition. The list of comfort features is impressive: Two toilets (Jabsco plumbing new in 2020), Centerline twin berth in owner's cabin aft with en suite toilets, She also has a Swan 46 front opening fridge, freezer, 6KW generator, central heating, watermaker and A/ C in saloon, central heating, retractable max power thruster. All functions have been properly maintained and are in excellent condition. The Swan is a top quality, comfortable cruising boat upgraded for club racing or special events such as the Swan Cup. She can easily be operated by two people and is equipped to be sailed with one hand. CONSTRUCTION: Hull: Dark blue Awlgrip top (2020), gold Cavetti line, double white waterline. Special care of the hull Underwater hull, twice a year - before and after the regatta season (October to June): Patent for summer trips and grinding the hull as fine as possible, polishing very smooth for the October to June regatta season Keel: Lead Scheel keel with stainless steel trailing edge 2m draft. Service and screw control in June 2018 for the Swan Cup Deck: Full teak deck, renewed in 2012 Anchor shaft not standard with Lofrans 1000W windlass (service 2020), double bow roller, deck washer, dolphin seat. 3 Dorade boxes, gas box with extra wide cockpit drainage and stainless steel mast at the stern with radome, antennas and outboard crane. Mechanicals: Mitsubishi 50hp diesel engine (2012 -870 hours) - new bearings/gearbox/shaft all new 2018 Last engine service: 2020 Max-Prop 3-blade variable pitch propeller new built 2018 Fisher Panda 6KW generator, 2008 - 225 hours - full overhaul service 2018 Man Power Bowthruster retractable with own batteries (2) - joystick in cockpit Electrical System: Service Battery: ...Ah 12v Deep Cycle Engine Battery: Ah 12v Start Both are charged by the engine alternator, generator and battery charger from shore power. Inverter (1000W} hot water tank (2008) heated by engine, generator and shore power. Lighting in saloon, galley, chart table, toilets and owner's cabin and forward cabin replaced with 12V LEDs. Hella 12- Volt electric fans in all accommodation 12 sockets in cockpit and chart table 220v sockets throughout accommodation Plumbing: Watermaker (2012- 36h} - Fully serviced 2020 Hot and cold fresh water pressure system with single handle sink mixers Two Jabsco- Marine toilets with hand pumps - New 2021 Hot and cold fresh water bath shower in cockpit Tank capacity: Fuel: 2X155 liters in 2 stainless steel tanks Water: 530 liters in 3 stainless steel tanks Spar and rigging Nautor spars in anodised aluminum - complete review and control in 2018 Masthead -Double spreader slop rig, mast on keel stepped Navtec pole rigging, 2018 renewed Harken mast rail system spinnaker pole and jockeym Ast in composite (repainted in 2018 and repainted in 2020 respectively) Updated running gear, all in Dyneema. Runners (2) and babystay in textile Furlex Electric genoa furler (2018 - Service 2021) with own battery Winches: All new 2015 Lewmar halyards 2X 46 Control lines 2X 40 Primaries 2X 65 Spinnaker 2X 54 Main 1X40 2 Selden electric winches (2020) - E40i on each side of the companionway, for genoa halyards Sails: Various sets of sails are provided as we have not cast since 2008 when we bought the boat. We will focus on the racing sails (all North): Mainsail 3D1 Endurance 19,800 Dpi 2017 (light use) Genoa Super Light -150% 3D1 7,500 Dpi 2018 (light use) Genoa Medium Light - 130% 3D1 16,800 Dpi 2018 (light use) Genoa 2 120% 3D1 2020 (new) Genoa 3 120% 3D1 2018 (light use) Genoa 4 100% 2015 (new) JB 3 3D1 Endurance 22400 Dpi (2020 - new - never used) S 1.5 2020 (new) S 12017 S 2 2018 (new) S 4 2018 (new) A2 2015 (New, never used) A4 2015 (light use) A 1.5 2012 (light use) Cruising sails include: Mainsail, Genoa, Al, A2, Sl and Parasailor, in good working condition. - 3DL Marathon Cruising mainsail - 3DL Marathon furling genoa We also have in stock a complete set of used racing sails (QUANTUM), used genoas (North) and a mainsail and genoa (Doyle) that come from the previous owner (2008) and have not been checked . Navigation Eguipement: The equipment was completely renewed in 2010/2012, among others: B&B 3000 Compass Mini Gyro MFD 12 Monitor NAVNET 3D - FURUNO Plotter FURUNO GP 7000 - old but efficient to support the installation Radomo 45cm 2KW Maxsea Time Zero -updated 2020 Halcyon 2000 pack B&G Pilot compass with Navtex AIS remote control connected to the MFD 12 B&G display in the nav station B&G dispays in the cockpit (3) and on the mast (2018)(2) New B&G plotter (Vulcan 7' - 2918) Laptop with Emails and Maxsea - Connection to MFD FURUNO learn SSB 700 with ground plate learn IC M930 VHF B& G Radar Charts MED Domestic amenities: 3 burner stainless steel stove with oven (2010) Electric extractor hood over stove Two independent cooling systems - shore powered compressors (2010) and Generator Generator powered system plus 12V for fridge and freezer with jumper plates (Swan 46 front loading fridge 130 liters and top loading freezer 17 5 liters - last service 2021 1 Radio/CD system with speakers in saloon, owner's cabin (new 2020) and cockpit (new 2020) with dial. Accommodation: FOc'sle: 2 full berths and 4" pillows with fill,. Hanging locker, shelves and cabinets to starboard. Forward heads: Jabsco toilet (service 2020), sink and shower, cabinets outboard and under sink, shower sump with Pump, teak grating Opening transom and deck hatch Saloon: port settee convertible into a double berth, starboard settee, bookshelves, cupboards and storage The saloon upholstery has been reupholstered in blue Alcantara Lighting on Leds converted (warm white). 3 opening skylights. State of the art table. Galley: 3 burners with oven (see above), double sink, Swan 46 130 liter front loading fridge. Top loading 175 liter freezer. Extractor hood. Chart table: XXL size with electronics (see above) and hidden safe Owner's cabin: Center double berth, P&S bench seats, extensive cupboards and storage Escape hatch over and opening hatch to cockpit En suite toilets: J absco toilet (service 2020) with large seat, washbasin and shower, cupboards outside and under the washbasin, shower drain with pump, teak grille, mirror and 2 opening hatches; extractor hood. The Swan has undergone three major refits 2011/2012 : Teal deck re-done and hatches re-done 2015: Tops re-painted 2018/2019 : Engine & Transmission - Both S&P verticals of the roof whistle gelcoat and paint re-done. 2020: tops new paint and new anti-slip paint - paintwork redone from forecastle to saloon.Show more

name: 1981 Tayana Yachts Vancouver 421981 Tayana Yachts Vancouver 42
description:
Seaworthy, spacious cruiser



On behalf of the 1st owner we offer you this Tayana Vancouver 42. This Taiwan-built yacht is a renowned design by Robert Harris and excels in seaworthiness due to the long keel and pointed stern. The boat was originally delivered in the Netherlands in 1981. It is a typical departure boat and many sister ships have made long journeys. The teak deck is original, is fixed, is leak-free but will require attention in the coming years. When setting the asking price, major maintenance such as replacement of navigation equipment has been taken into account.
The interior is made of solid teak wood. Upon entering, on the left is the navigation area with drying cabinet for wet sailing gear. To the right is the galley with refrigeration and petrol stove with oven. Amidships is the spacious saloon. In the stern is a very spacious bed, accessible from both port and starboard. In the bow is also a double cabin and toilet room. There is plenty of storage space throughout the boat. The Perkins engine is well maintained and runs well. This is accessible by removing the floor panels. If you are interested, please contact the White Whale Yachtbrokers Enkhuizen office via enkhuizen@wwy.nl or +31(0)228 855 380 for more information. Viewings are possible from Monday to Saturday, by appointment only. Your yacht broker is Robert de Vries.
If you are planning to sell your own boat, please contact White Whale Yachtbrokers for a no-obligation valuation. With 6 offices in the Netherlands, we are always nearby. See www.WWY.nl for more information.

name: 1978 Camper & Nicholsons 39 Ketch1978 Camper & Nicholsons 39 Ketch
description:
Ketch over 11 meters in length, the Nicholson 39 replaced the 38 feet produced by Camper & Nicholson. The idea was to offer a comfortable and safe boat, without seeking fast performance at all costs. Compared to 38 feet, the sail area of this fiberglass hull has been increased by 25 percent and a large deck space has been created in the forward section for maneuvering.
Below deck, the forward cabin offers two "V" beds and is connected to a hallway with a spacious bathroom and a wardrobe. The saloon is made up of a comfortable room, with an L-shaped sofa. Aft is the well-equipped galley and three berths. This sleeping area has also a bathroom with shower.

name: 2014 Hallberg-Rassy 4122014 Hallberg-Rassy 412
description:
ENGLISH - This Hallberg Rassy 412, designed by Germán Frers, is one of the yard’s quicker models but still retains the excellent solid build quality. Not only does she have a quite fast hull and sail plan configuration, she also is a serious cruiser that can surely be sailed extensively on long passages. She has beautiful teak-laid decks that are fitted out with high-quality deck gear, and a large teak-laid aft-cockpit (no, not a center cockpit) with a big centreline wheel console. The 3-spreader mast, the boom and rigid vang are from Seldén, as well as the below deck electric jib furler. She is furthermore, fitted out with an upgraded Elvström Epex membrane mainsail and genoa, a code zero, and four electric winches. Further to that, equipped with; a 75hp Volvo diesel, bow thruster, a folding prop, generator, and a comprehensive navigation package including radar and AIS. The interior of this HR 412 is finished in mahogany and the outstanding joinery that Hallberg Rassy is known for. You will feel instantly feel at home. She has two double bed staterooms and two ample bathrooms with toilet, wash basin and shower. Two more berths are available in the saloon after the cushions of the backrests of the sofas are flipped up. Also worth mentioning is the large cockpit locker to starboard aft. It’s pretty hard not to like this Swedish beauty.
DEUTSCH - Diese Hallberg Rassy 412, entworfen von Germán Frers, ist eine der schnellsten Yachten der Edelwerft. Sie ist äußerst solide gebaut worden, ist verlässlich, hat schnelle Linien, und hat ein moderner Segelplan mit hohem Drei-Saling-Mast von Selden. Weiter, hat sie mit Teakholz belegte Decks die mit einer hochwertige Deckausrüstung ausgestattet sind, und ein großzügiges mit Teakholz belegtes Achtercockpit (nein, kein Mittelcockpit). Die elektrische Fockroller  und die Ankerwinsch sind unter Deck montiert.  Weiter, ausgestattet mit einem Elvström Epex Membran Großsegel und Genua, einem Code Zero und vier elektrischen Winden. Darüber hinaus, ist sie mit einem 75 PS starken Volvo Dieselmotor, einem Bugstrahlruder, einem Faltpropeller, einem Generator und einem umfassenden Navigationspaket mit Radar und AIS ausgestattet. Unter Deck fällt sofort die für Hallberg Rassy sehr gute Holzverarbeitung auf. Sie werden sich auf Anhieb wie zuhause fühlen. Sie verfügt über zwei Doppelbett-Kabinen und zwei geräumige Bäder mit Toilette, Waschbecken und Dusche. Dazu, stehen im Salon stehen zwei weitere Schlafplätze zur Verfügung, wenn man die Kissen der Rückenlehnen der Sofas hochklappt. Bemerkenswert ist die riesige Backskiste an Steuerbordseite achtern. Es wird nicht schwer sein sich in diese schwedische Schönheit zu verlieben.
ESPAÑOL - Este Hallberg Rassy 412, diseñado por Germán Frers, es uno de los modelos más rápidos del astillero. La construcción es muy sólida, y el plano de vela moderno está hecho para un fácil manejo. Tiene cubiertas de teca con grandes escotillas montadas a ras y un generoso bañera de popa (no, no tiene un bañera central). Las drizas se ocultan bajo el techo de la cabina y son manejadas por 4 cabrestantes eléctricos. El enrollador eléctrico de genoa tiene un tambor montado bajo la cubierta. También, el winche eléctrico está montado bajo la cubierta. Además, equipado con un vela mayor, un genoa y un Code Zero. Más aún, un motor diésel de 75 CV, hélice de proa, hélice plegable, un generador y un completo equipo de navegación que incluye radar y AIS. Bajo cubierta de este Hallberg Rassy 412, el interior es espacioso y luminoso. Hay grandes claraboyas y ventanas y la ebanistería está excelente. Tiene dos camarotes con cama doble y dos baños amplios con inodoro, lavabo y ducha. Si es necesario, se pueden convertir los dos sofás en el salón en dos literas.  También cabe destacar el gran armario de la bañera situado a estribor en la popa. Una verdadera belleza sueca. 
NEDERLANDS - Deze Hallberg Rassy 412, ontworpen door Germán Frers, is een van de snellere modellen van de werf. Ze is solide gebouwd, heeft een snel onderwaterschip en dito zeilplan. Ze heeft ruime, overzichtelijke teakdekken en een teakgelegde achterkuip (nee, geen middenkuip) met een grote maar toch elegante stuurstand. Verder beschikt ze over een krachtig tuigage met een lange deck-stepped Seldén mast met drie zalingen. Het voorzeil kan opgerold worden met een elektrisch rolsysteem dat onderdeks verwerkt zit. Ook de elektrische ankerlier is netjes verborgen onder dek. Ze is uitgerust met een Elvström Epex grootzeil en Genua, een Code Zero en 4 elektrische lieren. Verder, uitgerust met een 75pk Volvo dieselmotor, boegschroef, klapschroef, generator, en een compleet navigatiepakket inclusief radar en AIS. Het interieur van deze HR412 is, zoals je gewend bent van Hallberg Rassy, hoogwaardig en weldoordacht. Ze beschikt over twee tweepersoonshutten en twee ruime natte cellen met toilet en douche. In de salon zijn eventueel nog twee slaapplaatsen te creëren door de rugleuningen van de banken omhoog te klappen. Ook vermeldenswaard is de vrij grote bakskist in de kuip. Een échte Zweedse schoonheid.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1969 Frans Maas Hawk 421969 Frans Maas Hawk 42
description:
Beautiful classic sharp yacht, specially built for Fastnet racing


Frans Maas designed the Hawk 42 in 1968 especially for the Fastnet race. Several were built, including yard number 249, the Timujin (the original name of the Calypso) which went into the water in April 1970. This Hawk is the last in a series of 4 (of which 2 in polyester). In short, a unique classic racer. The first thing you notice about the Calypso is the beautiful classic line that is so characteristic of the racers of the early 1970s. After that, the most striking thing is the very spacious cockpit. And then immediately follow the wide gangways. All this makes it very pleasant to stay outside on the Calypso, both in harbor and under sail. The Calypso has a classic interior which has been consciously kept as much as possible, but to which luxury has been added over the years. For example, a hot air heater and a 4-burner stove with a spacious oven have been installed. Remarkable are the very practical sea berths (with every type of wind a very comfortable place to sleep) and the spacious fold-out table where 8 people can eat. The 2 meter long benches can be widened, creating 2 extra sleeping places. Sufficient storage space is available both under the sea berths and in the very generously sized wardrobe. Over the past 20 years, a lot of major maintenance has been carried out by Skip Maritiem in Hindeloopen (NL). The teak deck was completely re-rubbered in 1994 and partly replaced, but will require attention in the coming years. The asking price takes into account major maintenance / replacement of the deck. View the full advertisement for detailed information. Became curious? Please contact the White Whale Yachtbrokers Enkhuizen office via enkhuizen@wwy.nl or +31(0)228 855 380 for more information. Viewings are possible from Monday to Saturday, by appointment only.
If you are planning to sell your own boat, please contact White Whale Yachtbrokers for a no-obligation valuation. With 6 offices in the Netherlands, we are always nearby. See www.WWY.nl for more information.

description: In the best shipyard tradition, the Moody 41 DS sets standards for safe and sporty sailing. The walkaround deck, the high freeboard and the double forestay guarantee safety and comfort, while the high rig in combination with 83 sqm sail area inspires performance. name: 2002 X-Yachts X-4122002 X-Yachts X-412
description:
Excellently maintained X-412, ready to sail for a new owner.


Beautiful X-412, ready to sail for a new owner. This X-412 is well maintained and fully equipped.
When you see her, she immediately makes an impression, there is a serious ship here. As befits a real X, this X-412 is beautifully finished and has a perfect balance between comfort and performance.
When you step on board, the wide and easily accessible gangways stand out. These are finished with teak, which needs attention, but they offer plenty of space, which makes a tour around the deck easy and safe. The cockpit is spacious and from behind the large steering wheel you have a good overview of the ship and the environment. All lines lead back to the cockpit for easy handling and there are plenty of trim options to get the most out of the ship. It is an X-Yacht so comfort is important but fast sailing is simply ingrained in the DNA.
For such a sporty ship it is striking how beautifully and comfortably it is finished inside the ship. The famous Scandinavian high-quality finishing is also clearly visible in this X-412. In the stern are two spacious cabins with storage space for guests. Amidships is the spacious saloon with a comfortable round seat on the port side with a table in the middle where all those on board can easily join. The wet room for the guests can also be found on the same side.
Opposite this is the spacious galley on starboard. Of course equipped with hot and cold running water, cooling, stove and the necessary storage space. The extensive chart table can also be found to starboard. Here you can find some of the navigation instruments and of course the operation of the on-board systems. In the forepeak is the very spacious owner's cabin with its own wet cell and of course also the necessary storage space.
All in all, it is clear why the X-412 was a success for the yard, she has a timeless design, sails like the fire brigade, is super comfortable and has a chic finish too!
Interested? please do not hesitate to contact us via tel.: +31 (0) 168-820208 or email: info@wwy.nl

Including advertising on the most relevant and leading websites including Yachtworld.com. No start-up costs, always no-cure-no-pay!! Feel free to ask us for a proposal for your own yacht.

description:
Yacht broker Dick Schmeinck 088-2502502


Finngulf 41   Sporty yacht with excellent sailing characteristics! Designed by a talented world-class naval architect. Handmade, traditional joinery combined with clean modern lines, create this contemporary performance cruiser. Designed for speed and convenience. Provides an unforgettable sailing experience for both the race crew and the cruise family. The Finngulf 41 has a large recessed steering wheel with a large seat for the helmsman/woman. Year of construction is 2003. The yacht came into service as a demo yacht for the yard, from 2004 to 2007. From February 2008 to the present, this yacht has been owned by the first owner. Below decks, the Finngulf has a lot of space and a lot of light, with a large saloon and spacious galley. The entrance is easily accessible. Do not wait any longer! This is a beautiful yacht, in very good condition and ready to sail.

name: 1980 Hallberg-Rassy HR 411980 Hallberg-Rassy HR 41
description:
IT
Hallberg-Rassy 41 was built between 1975 and 1981. A total of 105 hulls were built. The Hallberg-Rassy 41 quickly became a trend setter. This was the first boat with a proper walk to the aft cabin below deck and the first Hallberg-Rassy with a blue stripe around the cockpit. The Hallberg-Rassy 41 is a long-distance cruiser with a separate keel and rudder, and among other things an edge around the cockpit, which is slightly raised, to give space for the passage below deck.
UK
Hallberg-Rassy 41 was built between 1975 and 1981. A total of 105 hulls were built. The Hallberg-Rassy 41 quickly became a trendsetter. This was the first boat with a proper walk to the aft cabin below deck and the first Hallberg-Rassy with a blue stripe around the cockpit. The Hallberg-Rassy 41 is a long-distance cruiser with a separate keel and rudder, and among other things, a rim around the cockpit, which is slightly raised, to give space for the passage below deck.

name: 1989 Jeanneau Voyage 12.501989 Jeanneau Voyage 12.50
description:
The Jeanneau 12.50  Voyage is one of the most successful early models. This Voyage 12.50 was built in 1989 by a standard version layout with two guest cabins aft with en suite basin, one bunked bed cabin at middle boat and the owner cabin in the front. Two toilet, one aft with just head and shower and one in the front with electric head.
The interior is a good compromise between seagoing and in-harbour comfort with a very good chart table and big saloon with U-shaped dining table (convertible), with bottle storage within and seats a good crowd on all around the settees. Opposite to dining table is the linear galley with plenty of storage fridge and a 3-burner stove with oven. Aft to port is the sit-down navigation station, which features a hinged, openable panel for easy access to the back of the instrument panel.
Equipped with 45 HP YANMAR diesel engine with unknown engine hours. Includes also 8  winches, battened Main Sail on trailer with lazy bag and lazy Jack, self furling jib, furling Genoa, Gennaker everything in good conditions and revised among the years.
LAST WORKS PERFORMED:
2019• Antifouling, transom general refit, hull polishing• New furling genoa and main sail• New cockpit teak• New inox mast handrails with steps• Sun/wind protection for side cockpit• New cream-colored cushion covers (for inside)• Lengthening modification on the bow bed• Fresh + salt water foot pumps in the galley
2020• New fridge coil• Led lamps in the dinette and in the bathrooms
2021• Solar panels• Cockpit cushions• Led lamps in the cockpit• New fold-down table in the cockpit
2022• Bathrooms: new ceiling and large mirrors
 
**This boat is in Italy and as such, its sale is subject to Italian customs and practices on yachts brokerage, which state that the agency commission of 10% is paid in half between the seller and the buyer. The sale price published on this site is therefore calibrated so that the seller pays to the broker only 5% and does not include the other 5%, which must be paid directly by the buyer to the broker.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1981 Oyster 41 (ex IOR Racer)1981 Oyster 41 (ex IOR Racer)
description:
Ex IOR racer, refit 2000


This Oyster 41 from 1981 has undergone a total refit since 2000 and is in very good condition. A total of 27 ships of this highly competitive IOR one-tonner design by Stephen Jones were built by Oyster navy from 1980 to 1987.
The deck layout is well thought out and the batter of good quality. No less than 11 Lewmar winches are mounted around the cockpit to use the sheets and trim lines. The rod-rigged rigged fractional mast is very easy to trim with the back and checkstays. An extra genaker boom has been placed on the foredeck, the sails are still in good condition, the Genoa is even as good as new from 2020.
The interior was completely renovated in 2000 and redesigned, while the kitchen was enlarged and the benches were lowered to normal height. A lot of new cupboard and storage space has also been created. It was decided to keep the boat as open and light as possible. The 4 berths in the stern can therefore only be closed with a curtain. The forecastle with toilet space and double cage can be closed with a door. The engine was replaced in 2000 and concealed in a formwork. By sliding it forward, the engine is accessible all around for service. This Oyster 41 is still a very fast yacht by today's standards, which will do well on the competition course. Yet she is also easy to sail with a small crew, so that the boat is certainly also suitable for a sporty family. The mediation takes place via the White Whale Yachtbrokers Enkhuizen office. If you are interested, please contact enkhuizen@wwy.nl or +31(0)228 855 380 for more information or to make an appointment for a viewing on board. Viewings are possible from Monday to Saturday.

description:
The Westerly Oceanlord 41 is a proven blue-water cruiser combining excellent sea-worthiness, speed and handling, with plenty of space below decks. She has most recently crossed from South Africa to Grenada in 2022. She has a large aft stateroom with full en suite head, comfortable double V berth and shower forward, roomy saloon and large comfortable well protected center cockpit. This boat is well equipped for off shore cruising with lots of recent upgrades, including NEW rigging 2021, NEW electric windlass 2021, New Rocna anchor 2021, NEW dinghy, NEW hard dodger and hard top bimini with removable sides 2021, NEW Dinghy davits 2018, NEW inverter 2022, NEW Lithium Hubble batteries 2022, NEW Marine Air conditioner 2022, NEW Raritan Electroscan sewage sanitizing device. name: 1939 buchholz-werft 75 kr-klasse1939 buchholz-werft 75 kr-klasse
description: Historical seafaring cruiser from 1939. As there are very few left. Signs of wear can be seen on the deck and interior. The underwater hull and the exterior paintwork were completely renewed in 2021. The planking of the hull and the interior frames are in good condition and show no signs of decomposition. The solid wood is in very good condition. No damage can be seen on the rigging with all parts of the standing and running rigging including the mast and spars, the sails are in good condition. Engine (Volvo Penta, 60 hp) and gearbox (ZF Friedrichshafen) were reinstalled in 2021. Approximately 120 operating hours. Shaft system including propeller are in very good condition (screw new in 2021). The entire electrical system and all navigation instruments (including autopilot) were reinstalled in 2021.Show more

name: 2004 Wauquiez 40 PS2004 Wauquiez 40 PS
description:
Wauquiez 40 PS (pilot saloon) For Sale - Canary Yacht Brokers.
 
This unit is number 99 of only 120 built, a boat of excellent qualities that has had a single owner since new. Built in 2004, it has a great aesthetic that lasts through the years and offers everything that a modern boat has.
 
Inside, we have 2 cabins and a spacious saloon, in the aft main cabin a very comfortable double bed with a wardrobe for clothes and wood finishes. It has built-in stereo sound that can be controlled from the cabin. Reading lamps and blinds to hide the sun and clarity. Full bathroom with separate shower, sink and toilet.
 
In the second cabin we find a V-shaped double bed ideal for guests or crew. It has easy access to another full bathroom.
 
In the saloon a spacious living room that can easily seat 6 people around the table that is convertible. Plenty of storage space, an impeccable full galley with fridge and freezer, oven and hobs in perfect condition and without use, all finished in smooth stone and wood, easy to clean and maintain. Lots of light in the living room since it is the life of the boat giving an almost 360 degree view of the boat and the environment from a comfortable position.
 
Chart table and navigation area and electric control in a comfortable position, it has Autopilot, Radar and VHF in the cockpit.
 
Outside it has a large cockpit with cushions, hood (sprayhood) and helm position with controls at hand from the same; pilot, wind, depth and chartplotter.
 
There is plenty of storage and stowage. Nothing like enjoying its folding bathing platform, ideal for accessing the boat from the sea and storing whatever you want.
 
Rigging renovated and revised with available invoice.
 
Sails: main in good used condition and new Genoa 150%
 
Yanmar-5JH3E Engine - 56Hp
 
Life Raft to review.
 
An ideal boat for life on board and the pleasure of sailing.

name: 2007 Dufour 425 Grand Large2007 Dufour 425 Grand Large
description:
Model: DUFOUR 425 GRAND LARGE Type: sailing yacht LOA (m): 12,45 LWL (m): 11,23 Beam (m): 4,16 Draft (m): 2,10 Air draft (m): 17,10 Headroom (m): 1,95 Year built: 2007 Launched: 2008 Builder: Dufour Country: France Designer: Umberto Felci Displacement (t): 11,31 Ballast (tonnes): 2,44 Gross tonnage: 8,8 CE norm: A Hull material: GRP Hull colour: white Hull shape: round-bilged Keel type: fin keel with bulb Superstructure material: GRP Deck material: GRP Deck finish: non-skid moulded in Superstructure deck finish: non-skid moulded in Cockpit deck finish: teak Antifouling (year): 2022 (+Hull polish) Window frame: aluminium Window material: polycarbonate Deckhatch: yes Fuel tank (litre): 160 polyethylene Level indicator (fuel tank): Gauge Freshwater tank (litre): 440 in 2 tanks polyethylene Level indicator (freshwater): Gauge Blackwater tank (litre): 110 polyethylene Wheel steering: cable steering Outside helm position: cable steering Emergency tiller: yes Info for internal use: Hull in good shape With the Dufour 425, the builder's design team has delivered a modern-styled fast cruiser that targets the mid-size market with touches of flair and performance. the Dufour 425 is a fast, modern cruiser with good passage making potential and a good comfort quotient for when you arrive in the next port.It has large, well-secured cleats, a dedicated life-raft locker, and hard points in the cockpit on which to fasten harness tethers-all features for comfortable cruising. There have been many updates and improvements in 2022 as detailed in the specifications.
For more information: DUFOUR 425 GRAND LARGE for sale at De Valk Yachtbrokers - Click here:Mehr anzeigen

name: 1987 Motorsailer Natascha 1221987 Motorsailer Natascha 122
description:
Built by Staak Werft Lübeck Shipyard in 1987 and registered in 1996, this beautiful steel Motor Sailer Natascha 122 is one of those special boats that seems to defy time and just won’t age.
Refinished over the years by its owners, equipped with a complete sail set, oversized shrouds and a Mercedes OM 314 80 HP with 1500 engine hours.
Jump onboard the iconic 1980s Dutch boat, the ideal boat for the experienced deep water sailors!!
 
**This boat is Italian and as such, its sale is subject to Italian customs and practices on yachts brokerage, which state that the agency commission of 10% is paid in half between the seller and the buyer. The sale price published on this site is therefore calibrated so that the seller pays to the broker only 5% and does not include the other 5%, which must be paid directly by the buyer to the broker.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2007 Malo Malo 40 Classic MK Il2007 Malo Malo 40 Classic MK Il
description:
Malö 40 Classic, un superbo yacht di alta qualità dal cantiere di Orust. Versione a due cabine pronta per andare ovunque. Malö 40 Classic è una grande imbarcazione di 40 piedi della massima qualità assoluta. Versione 2 cabine. Ciò consente di utilizzare un enorme gavone con accessi dal pozzetto e dal bagno di poppa. Tale gavone, unito allo spazio dell'altrettanto grande gavone di poppa ( grazie alla versione classic), ed ai gavoni panca-timoniere e saplancora, consente lo stivaggio di materiale ed attrezzature per la navigazione oceanica.  OTTIME CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA. PER MAGGIORI INFORMAZIONI: LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069 Pronta alla boa per la stagione, Vele nuove nel 2022, manutenzione approfondita e sostituzione dell'intero pacco batterie.   INTERNI 2 Cabine 1 bagno e locale doccia in cabina armatoriale a prua Cabina di prua con letto a V con materassi in lattice sagomati modello Portofino da giugno 2019 e locale doccia Cabina di poppa con un grande letto a 2 piazze e un armadietto. Un ulteriore bagno più grande con lavello, wc e doccia  Salone con 2 divani comodi e spaziosi, troviamo anche il piano di carteggio sul lato a dritta con tutta la strumentazione per la navigazione Cucina dotata di frigo-congelatore a pozzetto da 75 lt, lavello, 2 fuochi a gas e forno tradizionale ENO, piano in corian Interni in meravigliose condizioni e mobilio con legno massello di mogano e English Malö 40 Classic, a superb high quality yacht from the Orust shipyard. Two-cabin version ready to go anywhere. Malö 40 Classic is a large 40-foot boat of the highest absolute quality. Version 2 cabins. This allows you to use a huge locker with accesses from the cockpit and the aft bath. This locker, combined with the space of the equally large stern locker (thanks to the classic version), and the bench-helmsman and saplancora lockers, allows the stowage of material and equipment for ocean navigation.  EXCELLENT GENERAL CONDITIONS, + AGENCY COMMISSIONS. FOR MORE INFORMATION: LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069 Ready for the buoy for the season, New sails in 2022, thorough maintenance and replacement of the entire battery pack. Française Malö 40 Classic, un superbe yacht de haute qualité du chantier naval Orust. Version à deux cabines prête à aller n’importe où. Malö 40 Classic est un grand bateau de 40 pieds de la plus haute qualité absolue. Version 2 cabines. Cela vous permet d’utiliser un énorme casier avec des accès depuis le cockpit et la baignoire arrière. Ce casier, combiné à l’espace du casier arrière tout aussi grand (grâce à la version classique), et aux casiers de banc-timonier et de saplancora, permet le rangement du matériel et de l’équipement pour la navigation océanique.  EXCELLENTES CONDITIONS GÉNÉRALES, + COMMISSIONS D’AGENCE. POUR PLUS D’INFORMATIONS : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069 Prêt pour la bouée pour la saison, Nouvelles voiles en 2022, entretien minutieux et remplacement de l’ensemble de la batterie.   INTÉRIEURS 2 Cabines 1 salle de bain et salle d’eau dans la cabine principale à l’avant Cabine avant avec lit en V avec matelas en latex en forme de modèle Portofino à partir de juin 2019 et salle de douche Cabine arrière avec un grand lit de 2 carrés et un casier. Une autre salle de bain plus grande avec lavabo, toilettes et douche  Salon avec 2 canapés confortables et spacieux, nous trouvons également la surface de cartographie sur le côté tribord avec tout l’équipement pour la navigation Cuisine équipée avec réfrigérateur-congélateur cockpit de 75 lt, évier, 2 brûleurs à gaz et four ENO traditionnel, plateau en corian Intérieur en merveilleux état et Deutsch Malö 40 Classic, eine hervorragende, hochwertige Yacht der Orust-Werft. Zwei-Kabinen-Version, die überall hinführbar ist. Malö 40 Classic ist ein großes 40-Fuß-Boot von höchster absoluter Qualität. Kabinen der Version 2. Dies ermöglicht es Ihnen, ein riesiges Schließfach mit Zugangen vom Cockpit und der Achterbadewanne zu verwenden. Dieses Schließfach, kombiniert mit dem Platz des ebenso großen Heckschranks (dank der klassischen Version) und der Bank-Steuermann- und Saplancora-Schließfächer, ermöglicht das Verstauen von Material und Ausrüstung für die Seeschifffahrt.  AUSGEZEICHNETE ALLGEMEINE BEDINGUNGEN, + AGENTURPROVISIONEN. FÜR WEITERE INFORMATIONEN: LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069 Bereit für die Boje für die Saison, Neue Segel im Jahr 2022, gründliche Wartung und Austausch des gesamten Batteriepacks.   INNENRÄUME 2 Kabinen 1 Badezimmer und Duschbad in der Masterkabine im Bug Bugkabine mit V-Bett mit geformten Latexmatratzen Portofino Modell ab Juni 2019 und Duschbad Achterkabine mit einem großen 2-Quadrat-Bett und einem Schließfach. Ein weiteres größeres Badezimmer mit Waschbecken, WC und Dusche  Wohnzimmer mit 2 bequemen und geräumigen Sofas, wir finden auch die Kartierungsfläche auf der Steuerbordseite mit allen Geräten für die Navigation Küche ausgestattet mit 75 lt Cockpit Kühl-Gefrierkombination, Spüle, 2 Gasbrenner und traditionellem ENO-Ofen, Corian Top Interieur in wunderbarem Zustand und Möbel mit massivem Español Malö 40 Classic, un magnífico yate de alta calidad del astillero Orust. Versión de dos cabinas lista para ir a cualquier parte. Malö 40 Classic es un gran barco de 40 pies de la más alta calidad absoluta. Versión 2 cabinas. Esto le permite utilizar un enorme casillero con accesos desde la cabina y el baño de popa. Este casillero, combinado con el espacio del casillero de popa igualmente grande (gracias a la versión clásica), y los casilleros de banco-timonel y saplancora, permite la estiba de material y equipo para la navegación oceánica.  EXCELENTES CONDICIONES GENERALES, + COMISIONES DE AGENCIA. Россию Malö 40 Classic, превосходная высококачественная яхта с верфи Orust. Двухкабинная версия готова к работе в любом месте. Malö 40 Classic - это большая 40-футовая лодка высочайшего абсолютного качества. Каюты версии 2. Это позволяет использовать огромный шкафчик с доступами из кабины и кормовой ванны. Этот шкафчик, совмещенный с пространством столь же большого кормового шкафчика (благодаря классическому варианту), а также шкафчиков-скамеек-рулевых и сапланкор, позволяет укладывать материал и оборудование для океанской навигации.  ОТЛИЧНЫЕ ОБЩИЕ УСЛОВИЯ, + АГЕНТСКИЕ КОМИССИИ. ДЛЯ ПОЛУЧЕНИЯ ДОПОЛНИТЕЛЬНОЙ ИНФОРМАЦИИ: LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069 Готов к бую на сезон, новые паруса в 2022 году, тщательное техническое обслуживание и замена всего аккумуляторного блока.   ИНТЕРЬЕРЫ 2 каюты 1 ванная комната и душевая комната в главной каюте в носовой части Носовая каюта с V-образной кроватью с фасонными латексными матрасами модели Portofino с июня 2019 года и душевой комнатой Кормовая каюта с большой 2-х квадратной кроватью и шкафчиком. Еще одна большая ванная комната с раковиной, туалетом и душем  Гостиная с 2 удобными и просторными диванами, мы также находим картографическую поверхность по правому борту со всем оборудованием для навигации Кухня оборудована 75-литровым кокпитом, холодильником-морозильной камерой, раковиной, 2 газовыми конфорками и традиционной духовкой ENO, верхом кориана Интерьер в прекрасном состоянии и name: 1979 Red Rabbit 401979 Red Rabbit 40
description:
Beautifully lined


This Red Rabbit is a sharp yacht designed and built by Heilmann. The hull is from 1979 but the boat in general and the interior was not finished until many years later (1990) and looks like new. This yacht is remarkably spacious both on the outside and below deck, so it has a lot of living space. The Red Rabbit is ideal for pleasant holidays and long journeys. The owner has maintained the boat beautifully and kept it up to date. The boat is ready for your viewing in Lemmer.


Accommodation
Cabins: Aft cabin is a large owner's cabin, in the point a double bunk bed and in the saloon two longitudinal beds above the benches

Domestic Facilities onboard: Warm Water System, 12V Outlets, 2 Manual Toilet. Safety equipment: barometer (hygrometer and clock), binoculars, radar reflector, chart set. Entertainment: 4 speakers, satellite antenna TV, radio AM/FM (and CD). name: 2022 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 4102022 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 410
description: The new Janneau Sun Odyssey 410: sailing has never been more comfortable than on board this 41-foot boat. The powerful, dynamic hull design and the new, innovative interior design merge in the Sun Odyssey 410 into the perfect symbiosis of sailing and life on board. During the development of this sailing boat, the Jeanneau engineers placed particular value on building this boat safely and completely for families. This model features sidewalls that are free of obstructions and a comfortable coaming. The boom is designed to be low, which makes access to the sail easier and increases the sail area. The central winches can be controlled from the cockpit, further increasing safety on board. The Sun Odyssey 410 is designed as a complete sailboat so that the skipper can fully concentrate on the art of sailing. Price ex works plus pre-carriage and accessory options We would be happy to make you a personal offer and look forward to hearing from you. name: 1995 Catalina 4001995 Catalina 400
description:
The Catalina 400 was the first twin helm station boat built in the USA and emulates the success of European production boats with its twin helms and wide stern. Its spacious cockpit and voluminous interior offer more than generous accommodation while underway and at anchor. Above deck you can comfortably walk between the twin helms and folding table to all the control lines in the cockpit. It is easy to walk along the decks to the large chain locker and windlass. Below deck the cabinetry is nicely finished and there is enough ash and teak to look classic while still maintaining a fresh modern appearance.
Viewing by appointment through our Grenada Office +1 473 422 6418Mehr anzeigen

name: 2022 Bali CATSPACE2022 Bali CATSPACE
description:
Bali Catspace Sail represents a REVOLUTIONARY way of conceiving a boat as a real houseboat. In just 40 feet you find the spaces of a LARGE catamaran. Below deck there are 4 large double cabins, each with its own bathroom; the forward cabins, thanks to the 90 ° orientation, are as spacious as the aft ones. Externally the liveability of the Flybridge is spectacular as well as the bow cockpit. From a sailing point of view, the self-tacking jib and the square Top mainsail make it very easy to manage.
Available with management program until 31/12/2027 Mehr anzeigen

name: 2018 Bavaria 41 Cruiser2018 Bavaria 41 Cruiser
description:
Bavaria 41 Cruiser: un 41 piedi dalle atmosfere interne rinnovate. Disegnato dallo studio di Bruce Farr, stupisce per le prestazioni. Una barca senza compromessi concepita per la crociera e costruita per durare nel tempo. Il Bavaria 41 Cruiser è un profondo reastyling del Bavaria cruiser 40 new, una barca che a suo tempo ha innovato il mondo dei 40 piedi. Nel 41 sono stati rivisti alcuni volumi interni, e soprattutto il modo di far circolare l’aria all’interno creando un passauomo in più a centro tuga. La lunga vita del modello che fu realizzato per la prima volta (Bavaria 40) nei primi anni del nuovo millennio, ha fatto sì che già dal 2007 la barca, in confronto alla concorrenza, risultasse volumetricamente più piccola. Barca utilizzata per charter da primaria società.  OTTIME CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA. English Bavaria 41 Cruiser: a 41-foot yacht with a renewed interior atmosphere. Designed by Bruce Farr's studio, it impresses with its performance. An uncompromising boat designed for cruising and built to last. The Bavaria 41 Cruiser is a deep reastyling of the Bavaria cruiser 40 new, a boat that once innovated the world of 40 feet. In 41 some internal volumes were revised, and above all the way to circulate the air inside creating an extra manhole in the center of the deckhouse. The long life of the model that was first made (Bavaria 40) in the early years of the new millennium, has meant that since 2007 the boat, in comparison with the competition, was volumetrically smaller. Boat used for charter by primary company.  EXCELLENT GENERAL CONDITIONS, + AGENCY COMMISSIONS. Un bateau sans compromis conçu pour la croisière et construit pour durer. Le Bavaria 41 Cruiser est un profond reastyling du Bavaria cruiser 40 new, un bateau qui a autrefois innové le monde de 40 pieds. En 41 quelques volumes internes ont été révisés, et surtout la façon de faire circuler l’air à l’intérieur créant un trou d’homme supplémentaire au centre du rouf. La longue durée de vie du modèle qui a été fabriqué pour la première fois (Bavaria 40) dans les premières années du nouveau millénaire, a signifié que depuis 2007, le bateau, par rapport à la concurrence, était plus petit en volume. Deutsch Bavaria 41 Cruiser: eine 41-Fuß-Yacht mit einer erneuerten Innenatmosphäre. Entworfen von Bruce Farrs Studio, beeindruckt es durch seine Leistung. Ein kompromissloses Boot, das für Kreuzfahrten entwickelt wurde und auf Langlebigkeit ausgelegt ist. Der Bavaria 41 Cruiser ist ein tiefes Reastyling des Bavaria Cruiser 40 neu, ein Boot, das einst die Welt von 40 Fuß innovierte. In 41 wurden einige innere Volumen überarbeitet und vor allem die Luftzirkulation im Inneren, wodurch ein zusätzlicher Schacht in der Mitte des Deckshauses entstand. Die lange Lebensdauer des Modells, das erstmals in den frühen Jahren des neuen Jahrtausends (Bavaria 40) hergestellt wurde, hat dazu geführt, dass das Boot seit 2007 im Vergleich zur Konkurrenz volumetrisch kleiner war. Boot, das von der Hauptgesellschaft für die Charter verwendet wird.  AUSGEZEICHNETE RAHMENBEDINGUNGEN, + AGENTURPROVISIONEN. Español Bavaria 41 Cruiser: un yate de 41 pies con un ambiente interior renovado. Diseñado por el estudio de Bruce Farr, impresiona por su rendimiento. Un barco sin concesiones diseñado para cruceros y construido para durar. El Bavaria 41 Cruiser es un reastilado profundo del Bavaria cruiser 40 new, un barco que una vez innovó el mundo de los 40 pies. En el 41 se revisaron algunos volúmenes internos, y sobre todo la forma de hacer circular el aire en el interior creando una alcantarilla extra en el centro de la cubierta. La larga vida útil del modelo que se fabricó por primera vez (Bavaria 40) en los primeros años del nuevo milenio, ha significado que desde 2007 el barco, en comparación con la competencia, era volumétricamente más pequeño. Barco utilizado para el alquiler por la empresa primaria.  EXCELENTES CONDICIONES GENERALES, + COMISIONES DE AGENCIA. Россию Bavaria 41 Cruiser: 41-футовая яхта с обновленной атмосферой интерьера. Разработанный студией Брюса Фарра, он впечатляет своей производительностью. Бескомпромиссная лодка, предназначенная для крейсерства и построенная на длительный срок. Bavaria 41 Cruiser - это глубокая перестройка Нового крейсера Bavaria 40, лодки, которая когда-то внесла инновации в мир 40 футов. В 41 году некоторые внутренние объемы были пересмотрены, и прежде всего для циркуляции воздуха внутри, создавая дополнительный люк в центре рубки. Долгий срок службы модели, которая была впервые изготовлена (Bavaria 40) в первые годы нового тысячелетия, означал, что с 2007 года лодка, по сравнению с конкурентами, была объемно меньше. Лодка используется для чартера основной компанией.  ОТЛИЧНЫЕ ОБЩИЕ УСЛОВИЯ, + АГЕНТСКИЕ КОМИССИИ. All invoices are available): 6 LEWMAR radial winches, 2x6 SPINLOCK halyard stopper, PERFORMANCE package (flex pen cruising sail, halyard for gennaker and spinnaker , anchor light and three-color top light in LED, inhauler for headsail, RONSTAN deck fittings, line-adjustable and ball-bearing genoa slide, ball-bearing mainsheet blocks, genoa sheet deflection blocks with ball bearings), COMFORT package: lazy jacks including internal lines, cockpit seat cushions, teak on cockpit thwarts, EBERSPÄCHER Diesel hot air heating, 2x reading lights on the main bulkhead, WINNER crockery for 6 people, VION instrument set: barometer, thermohygrometer and clock. ELECTRONICS package: RAYMARINE Ray 54E VHF marine radio system with DSC, class D, RAYMARINE C80 GPS/plotter with Raystar 125 GPS antenna, installed on the chart table, radio/CD player with MP3 and two inside and outside speakers, underwater hull coating with 1x epoxy primer and 2x Antifouling, 2-blade folding propeller, mainsail HAGOORT Sails 52 sqm in flex pen cruising quality, with 2 RONSTAN slides for 2 top plates throughout, high apect jib HAGOORT Sails 36 sqm in flex pen cruising quality, working jib 26.5 sqm HAGOORT Sails Off Shore Performance , Spinnaker HAGOORT Sails, full radial 1.5 oz 120 sqm, gennaker 103 sqm, stripper, Dyform shrouds, complete spinnaker equipment with boom, barberhaulers, downhaul, blocks and sheets as well as all fittings, PROFURL headsail furling system, SPARCRAFT rod kicker, sprayhood including stainless steel bracket with leather sheathed, headsail cover, mainsail cover, steering wheel cover, midships cleats, anchor roller foldable with LEWMAR electric windlass, Lifelines on deck, teak deck on cockpit thwarts, teak deck on cabin roof, removable cockpit table, storage space for life raft in transom, 2nd aft cabin behind bathroom, FRIGOMATIC cooling system for cool box, second FRIGOMATIC front loader fridge, curtains for all hatches, cold foam mattresses (14cm) for all berths including 2nd aft cabin, Alcantara upholstery in saloon, hot water supply, hot water shower in transom, night lighting in LED, RAYMARINE ST60 Value 3 Pack with log, depth sounder and wind, Raymarine ST60 Close Hauled Wind, RAYMARINE 2KW Radar, RAYMARINE S1G/SPX10 SmartPilot with ST6002 unit , Raymarine Ray 54E VHF marine radio system with second control in the cockpit, antenna splitter, NAVIONICS card chip for plotter, voltmeter, PHILIPPI Accumonitor, starter battery plus 2x 110Ah consumer battery including shore power connection, 3 220V sockets, JEFA extra steering wheel covered with leather. Underwater hull newly coated by a specialist company in autumn 2016, yacht is completely polished and "ready to sail". We are looking forward to your visit! -The sale takes place in the mediation order.- More information at www.winner-yachts.deShow more

Excellent and very well equipped sea sailor from 2nd owner with extensive sailing wardrobe and navigation equipment


Colvic Victor 41 excellent sea sailor from 2nd owner in excellent condition. Extensive sailing wardrobe and navigation equipment suitable for seagoing vessels. The boat is ideally suited for tall people. The headroom is 2.30 mtr. She is sold too little, partly due to the age of the owner. He is the 2nd owner since 2007. The sailing area is from 2007 to 2013: IJsselmeer, Markermeer and North Sea. From 2013 to 2020  Atlantic Ocean, Spain and Portugal. The ship is damage free  The sailing wardrobe has been expanded; 2 x Mainsail. Good condition, 2 x Genoa, of which 1 in good condition, the other needs to be checked, 1 x Genaker (Bolle Jan) in good condition, 1 x Spinaker The Perkins MD60 diesel engine is well maintained, the engine works perfectly. name: 1986 One Design 401986 One Design 40
description:
Originally conceived as an offshore racing vessel, Roc was strongly built to cope with any weather conditions and keep going, no matter what.  She has completed three OSTARs, three Round Britain & Ireland races, three AZABs, a Solo 1000 mile offshore race, Bermuda One Two, Three Peaks Race, Petit Bateau singlehanded races, RORC two handed races, Triangle two handed races and the Universal 500 with a number of wins and good placings.  Well laid out for shorthanded sailing and with a practical seagoing layout below, she has proved to be a fast and easily handled cruising yacht.

name: 2007 Pogo Pogo40 Class402007 Pogo Pogo40 Class40
description: My class40 has a current class40 certificate from 2022. I achieved this after many modifications, such as increasing the buoyancy body from 3100l to 5150 and greater protection of the cockpit. In addition, the ship is certified according to IRC rating and can also be counted in these races. This ship is fully equipped and has, for example, two completely separate on-board systems. From the mast unit, to the computer, to the separate drive rams on the rudders. These can be quickly switched over by a switch in the event of a failure. This winter the entire rig was renewed and the Dyneema forestay (€25,000). Also the old antifouling was stripped off and new primer and offshore EU International antifouling was sprayed on. The Facnor-Fuler renewed, the traveler renewed and relocated across the entire stern, the mast sliders changed to larger, easy-running rakes, etc. In the last three years, the ship has been restored to an unprecedented top condition and can be used as a fast racing cruiser or regatta ship. The Pogo40 has never been used as a charter ship and has been used very little by the two previous owners. Alone Between 2011 and 2017 it stood on the drydock and not used. See equipment below: This class40 has a current class40 certificate which was renewed in 2022. This includes e.g. an increase in the buoyancy body to 5150l. So this boat is unsinkable. this boat comes more than fully equipped with a good inventory and in present ownership has had a considerable investment with a recent refit and all upgrades for a current class40 certificate. So you can use this boat for class 40 transat races or as a race cruiser. This boat has two independent navigation systems, from the mast unit through the computers and the autopilot rams. These systems can be quickly changed to the desired system with a switch. 2017 update the water ballast system,and Installing larger diameter pipes to transfer the water more quickly from side to side. Installation of the traveler rail appeared across the entire width of the boat. Modification of mast top and rode rig to allow code sails to be set from the mast top or 7/8(fractional). New sprayed international antifouling EU offshore white. In order to ensure an independent power supply, a Hydrogenerator Watt&Sea Racing Version new installed in 2022. All the Rod Rigging are new this year and the Dyneema textile Forestay(25.000€). carbon mast and boom checked and repainted 2022. The Pogo40 was never used as a Charterboat and the previous owners used the boat very little. Between 2011 and 2017 the boat was just on the drydock in France. this boat was never in this perfect condition before and is ready for all kind of sea journey. name: 2002 Beneteau First 40.72002 Beneteau First 40.7
description:
Beneteau First 40.7 "Corse Edition" del 2002, allestimento 3 cabine e 1 bagno, albero a 3 crocette e chiglia lunga in piombo, barca comoda per la crociera veloce ed ottima per divertirsi in regata. Da Vedere!!!! ALTRE FOTO IN ARRIVO..........  Lista Lavori e Migliorie 2021/2022  2021  Installazione di N.2 Batterie Nuove agli Ioni di Litio Smart con compatibilità con smartphone/bluetooth. Gestione batteria “intelligente” Victron e ingresso solare . Installazione di Nuova Strumentazione B&G Vulcan 9 Pilota Automatico B&G.  Installazione di Nuovo Flexiteak nel pozzetto e sulla spiaggetta di poppa.  2022  Nuovo sartiame permanente. Nuovo collo d'oca. Carena portata a zero, applicazione di fondo epossidico e antivegetativa. Nuove boccole del timone. Nuove prese a mare (plastica). Nuovo sistema di raffreddamento del motore, pulizia iniettori, nuova pompa dell’acqua, applicazione antiruggine e riverniciatura. Nuova Elica a 3 Pale abbattibili (Flexofold). Sostituzione Anodi. Service dell’unità Saildrive, sostituzione guarnizioni e cuffia. Controllo generale dell'impianto elettrico del motore. Nuovo pannello solare da 80w. Tagliando stagionale di motori e saildrive, cambio olio e filtri ecc. Nuova Catena di ancoraggio verniciata ogni 5m, 8mmx50m. Nuovi Materassi Custom, strato superiore antibatterico argento in memory foam multi densità e strato inferiore traspirante con 2 set di lenzuola. Nuovo Tavolo da pozzetto con gamba del tavolo a montaggio laterale regolabile e rimovibile. Nuovo Copriruota Timone in Sunbrella (installazione di velaio professionista). Nuova Drizza e Sostituzione Parziale di Sartiame Tessile. Valvola a Y sul serbatoio. Installati nuovi cavi vhf coassiali e luci led. Ripetitori strumentazione all’albero. Riparazione del lazybag. Nuova rete di sicurezza. Nuove dotazioni di sicurezza, salvagente anulare, razzi ecc. Nuova passerella in alluminio e bilanciere inox.  EXTRA  La barca è dotata di Nuove Vele in Carbonio (Main e G2) e di Spinnaker All Round acquistabili a parte al prezzo di € 16.000
English Beneteau First 40.7 "Corse Edition" of 2002, equipment 3 cabins and 1 bathroom, mast with 3 crosses and long keel in lead, comfortable boat for fast cruising and excellent for having fun in the race. New outlets to the sea (plastic). New engine cooling system, injector cleaning, new water pump, anti-rust application and repainting. New Propeller with 3 Folding Blades (Flexofold). Anode replacement. Service of the Saildrive unit, replacement of gaskets and headset. General control of the electrical system of the motor. New 80w solar panel. Seasonal cutting of engines and saildrive, oil change and filters etc. New anchor chain painted every 5m, 8mmx50m. New Custom Mattresses, silver antibacterial top layer in multi-density memory foam and breathable bottom layer with 2 sets of sheets. New Cockpit table with adjustable and removable side mounting table leg. New Rudder Wheel Cover in Sunbrella (installation of professional sailmaker). New Straightness and Partial Replacement of Textile Rigging. Y-valve on the tank. Installed new coaxial VHF cables and LED lights. Instrumentation repeaters at the shaft. Repair of the lazybag. New safety net. New safety equipment, life ring, rockets etc. New aluminum gangway and stainless steel rocker. Новая солнечная панель мощностью 80 Вт. Сезонная резка двигателей и парусного привода, замена масла и фильтров и т.д. Новая якорная цепь окрашена каждые 5м, 8ммх50м. Новые матрасы Custom, серебряный антибактериальный верхний слой из пены с памятью различной плотности и дышащий нижний слой с 2 комплектами листов. Новый стол в кабине с регулируемым и съемным боковым креплением ножки стола. Новая крышка рулевого колеса в Sunbrella (установка профессионального парусника). Новая прямолинейность и частичная замена текстильной оснастки. Y-образный клапан на баке. Установлены новые коаксиальные УКВ кабели и светодиодные фонари. name: 2007 Beneteau Oceanis 402007 Beneteau Oceanis 40

name: 1966 Custom 7,5 KR Seekreuzer1966 Custom 7,5 KR Seekreuzer
description:
Elegant sea cruiser classic 7.5 KR (12 M) Bj 1966 LORD - call sign DG6585 - born Stettiner Yachtwerft
Very extensively restored
7.5 KR classic in extremely good, solid workmanship and perfect condition for sale immediately.
Very seaworthy long keeler, beautiful, elegant crack, natural finish and eye-catcher in every port. After purchasing the boat in 2008, the owner had it restored by an experienced boatyard over a period of 2 years (70,000 euros). The boat sailed from 2010 in the North Sea (Holland and Frisian Islands) then in the Baltic Sea, Denmark to the east coast of Sweden. Since then it has been constantly invested and the boat is in perfect condition. The berth is on the Flensburg Fjord at the Robbe & Berking pier for classic yachts. The winter storage is in the Robbe&Berking hall (with air humidification). The ship has been extensively restored by Robbe & Berking classic yacht shipyard in the last 2 years. Summer and winter berths can be taken over.
Shipyard work 2008-2022 (invoices available)
Deck rebuilt with completely new plywood and new teak deck on top
Renewal of the bulwark molding with cap molding and gunwale made of mahogany
Completely new construction of the cockpit coaming in mahogany
Replacement of outer skin planks where necessary, 7 running meters
Completely new transom
Hull fully stripped to below the waterline
Profile painting from the shipyard - structure and hull, 7 layers EPIFANES 2 component paint
Interior complete floorboards painted with 2 component paint
In 2022 the entire underwater hull was recaulked. The ship is dry.
Engine OM 636 (Mercedes Benz) 42 hp, diesel, two-circuit cooling - annual maintenance by the shipyard - good condition - the engine is currently removed for the major inspection and in a specialist company.
Transmission new 2011
Seacocks checked annually by shipyardShow more

name: 1986 Comar Comet 121986 Comar Comet 12
description:
SINGLE-OWNER
A Vallicelli One Tonner ideal for cruising, but with strong racer attitudes.
It was 1985 when the drawing of the Comet 12 was born from the pencil of the designer Andrea Vallicelli. Produced in series by Comar, this 12-meter One Tonner was considered among the avant-garde prototypes of the Forlì shipyard for its slender lines, the low deckhouse and the stern spoiler; characteristics that made it one of the most competitive models in the national offshore racing circuit. Thanks to the spaciousness of the interiors, even the cruising version, in which the displacement and profile of the keel mainly vary, does not disappoint expectations, combining the qualities of a racer with those of a comfortable "houseboat". In fact, the interiors include two double berths, a large saloon, bathroom, kitchen and a very large calavele aft.

This Bavaria 38-3 is easy to sail and steer. All sails can be operated from the cockpit so a great yacht for those who want to start sailing. This three cabin version offers 2 bathrooms, both with toilet, a lot of living space and ample storage space. A powerful Volvo Penta 40 HP provides the extra power when needed. Come over to our sales marina to visit this nice family cruiser, we are open 7 days a week.

Model: HUISMAN STARON OCEAN RACER VAN DE STADT Type: sailing yacht LOA (m): 11,98 Beam (m): 3,50 Draft (m): 1,95 Headroom (m): 1,90 Year built: 1972 Launched: 1972 Builder: Huisman Country: The Netherlands Designer: van de stadt Displacement (t): 8,5 Ballast (tonnes): 2,7 Hull material: aluminium Hull colour: off-white Keel type: yes Superstructure material: aluminium Deck material: wood Deck finish: teak Superstructure deck finish: teak Antifouling (year): 2022 Window frame: aluminium Deckhatch: yes Insulation: 40-60mm foam plates Fuel tank (litre): 120 aluminium Fuel tank 2 (litre): 300 aluminium Level indicator (fuel tank): yes Freshwater tank (litre): 120 + 60 polyethylene Level indicator (freshwater): yes Tiller: yes Emergency tiller: yes The "Gioia" of the type Staron Ocean Racer was built at the Royal Shipyard Huisman in the Netherlands. The yacht was built by Van de Stadt as a fast ocean racing yacht and also won the race from Ostend to Plymouth. The hull was made of 5.4amg aluminum (frames distance 30 cm) and the deck as well as the interior fittings were made of teak. The yacht was sailed by her owners (3) with pleasure around the world and in all safety. Extensive refit work was carried out from 2001. The ship is in good condition.

name: 2006 Nautitech 40 Open2006 Nautitech 40 Open
description:
2006 NAUTITECH NAUTITECH 40,
XBOAT ref 2977. Boat easy to maneuver, great habitability.

The Nautitech 40 is a comfortable and safe boat. Everything is done to make you feel in a cozy and reassuring cocoon, both on deck and in the cabin. the Nautitech 40 offers great performance at sea.

This Nautitech 40 has been well maintained in the Seychelles since (2011), she was previously in the Mediterranean on charter with a pro skipper, around 8 weeks a year.

Engines (2013) and (2016), standing rigging 2011 for the shrouds and (2013) stays, windlass (2012), trampoline (2015), furler (2013), teak exterior (2013), gas cooker (2015), mattress covers (2014), interior floors (2014), led lighting, sails 2018, Garmin electronics (2018) last refit July (2019).
