name: 1977 unbekannt 30er schärenkreuzer- lotus1977 unbekannt 30er schärenkreuzer- lotus
description: Sailing yacht 30s skerry cruiser - Lotus Top Touring skerry cruiser - Original! Location Bavaria district of Landsberg am Lech A fast touring skerry cruiser is for sale directly from the first owner because of hobby task (78): Sail number GER 51 Length: 11.97 m Width: 2.15 m Draft: 1.50 m Displacement: 2.6 to inboard engine 20 hp Sail area nominal: 30m²; with main and genoa 45m². Current sailing wardrobe: 1 large, 1 top reacher, 1 reacher, 1 large genoa, 1 genoa, 1 jip, 2 spi/radial + triradial, the Lotus was built and delivered in 1977 by master boat builder Paul Roth in Diessen am Ammersee. The ship has always been in the Augsburg Sailing Club in recent years. The Lotus was only sailed by the first owner and his family and was lovingly cared for in winter by the Liebner boat building master company in Pürgen near Landsberg am Lech. The Lotus is spacious, has a double cabin both in the fore and aft and a spacious saloon. The ship is a spacious tourer for the whole family, also ideal for large areas such as Lake Constance or the Baltic Sea. The Lotus is a fast, easy-to-handle ship that can also be used one-handed. She is true to track and still agile (single rudder). Otherwise, the ship is fully equipped and ready to sail. Is currently in winter storage near Landsberg. Serious prospects only, pleaseShow more

name: 2022 Dufour 3902022 Dufour 390
description:
DUFOUR 390 NEW.
SEAWAYS YACHTING - DUFOUR YACHTS DISTRIBUTOR FOR THE MARITIME ALPS.
DELIVERY TO GOLFE JUAN, POSSIBILITIES OF LEASING FINANCING, BERTH WITH OR WITHOUT RENTAL MANAGEMENT.
STANDARD EQUIPMENT
Boston atmosphere, 3 cabins / 2 heads with toilets equipped with a holding tank, Electric shower pump, Large model toilet, LED interior lighting, Starboard L-shaped galley, Rolling blinds for deck hatches, Fully battened mainsail + jib self-tacking on furler, bowsprit, automatic reefing points returning to the cockpit, LED navigation lights, leather sheathing with wheel bars, stainless steel swim ladder, 2 x 105Ah in Service Battery, 1 x 105Ah in Engine Battery, Water 380L, Fuel 200L.
COMFORT VERSION
2-burner stove/oven, Natural teak cockpit benches, Cockpit shower (cold/hot), 25A battery charger, 105Ah additional service battery, 40L water heater, 220V circuit with shore power and 220V sockets in the cabins and the saloon, Coachroof rear windows, 700W electric windlass with remote control, Wooden cockpit table, Blinds with integrated mosquito nets, Wooden wine cellar, Rigid vang, Beige lazy-bag + lazy-jacks, Outboard motor support, Mainsail rail on the coachroof.
SAILING + CRUISING ELECTRONIC PACK
RAYMARINE central log speedo wind vane anemometer + I70s display to starboard, Evolution autopilot with rotary engine + P70S display, VHF Ray53 - DSC, GPS AXIOM 9 cockpit table, AIS 700HP transceiver, cockpit VHF.
OPTIONS
50 HP engine - Saildrive, Cockpit bottom, Natural teak solid wood aft platform, Porthole opening onto cockpit in port aft cabin, Porthole opening onto cockpit in starboard aft cabin, Sprayhood with handrail, Bimini with LED strip, Main anchor (anchor + chain + rope) + 3 hawsers + 6 fenders, Seat cushions and cockpit backrests, 12V/220V 300W converter, Radio CD player compatible with MP32 + Waterproof loudspeakers in the cockpit for radio/CD.
Constantly looking to the future, Dufour designs each new model to give you pleasure and sensations in complete serenity, whatever your cruising plans and the use of your sailboat. For over 60 years, we have been designing and building innovative, high-performance sailboats.
Find out more: www.seaways-yachting.comMehr anzeigen

name: 2017 Bali 4.02017 Bali 4.0
description:
Bali 4.0 (2017) in excellent condition. 4 cabin 4 heads. Standard equipment as per standard specification available on request. She will be ready for takeover October 2022.Additional Options:- 220V shore power plug for electrical circuit with outlet in cabins, saloon & galley- Combined battery charger 50 Amp - Inverter 12/220v, 1600VA, Battery controller- Fridge freezer 272 L (220V) with dedicated inverter- LED navigation lights- Cockpit extension by tilting platform- Davits for dinghy- SS pulpits with Polywood seating- Hot & Cold cockpit shower- Electrical 1000 W windlass- Solent furler system-  2 extra service batteries of 110 amp for a total capacity of 440 amp-  Aft cockpit courtesy lighting-  Extra Fresh water tank of 400 L for a total capacity of 800lts-  Corner sofa and meridian/daybed cushions-   Salon tilting bay/door mechanically assisted by pneumatic struts-   Second ladder on portside to access to bimini-   Electrical winch for mainsail halyard, furler line , mainsail track and davits-   Automatic reefs-  Saloon to forward-cockpit window fully retractable-  Saloon Lateral sliding windows-  Forward cockpit and helmsman seat cushions, 12 V outlets (1 per cabin and 1 at chart table)-  Gas oven-  Reinforced Dacron Full-Batten Mainsail & Solent with UV protection +Lazy-Bag & Lazy-Jack-  Upholstery: color diamond – Taupe-  Countertop and galley counter with corner sofa on port with cushions-  Stern spring cleats-  Raymarine Electronic Pack 1 including : autopilot P70S , GPS plotter AXIOM 7", MULTI I70S and VHF RAY 60-  20kg Anchor + 70m of Ø10mm chain + bridle-  6 big fenders & 4 mooring lines- Helmsman canvas bimini top, stainlees steel frame - TOUPE COLOR- Enclosure for bimini at steering station - TOUPE COLOR- Sunbathing cushions for fore deck- Sunbathing cushion for coachroof- Blackout curtains at each cabin & corridors, Curtains for forward bay-  2 forward cockpit removable tables-  Convertible aft cockpit table for double berth-  Radio CD(MP3/USB) player with saloon and cockpit speakers- 12 V fan per cabin ( 4 pcs )- Folding chairs for saloon/cockpit ( 3 pcs)- Charter equipment (deck, safety, navigational, galley, bedlinen…)
AVAILABLE FOR THE BALI WORLD CHARTER MANAGEMENT PROGRAM
If you would like to own a yacht but you are not sure you could finance it, maintain it or you do not have enough available time to use it as much as you would like to, Bali Yachting World charter management is the best choice for you.  Join our charter management program and carelessly enjoy in your dreams coming true. The program is designed to help you find the easiest way to finance the purchase of the yacht and its maintenance out of charter income while requiring the lowest possible initial investment.KEY BENEFITS:- excellent booking results, with more than 20 weeks per season (fleet average of 21,5 weeks/yacht)- financial security with insurance against loss of charter income- high maintenance standards ensure best resale value for your yacht regardless of its age- special purchase conditions for your yacht- high-quality aftersales support with prompt processing of claims throughout warranty- favourable financing conditions through affiliate leasing companies- transparent cash flow reports through constant insight in income and expense
The listed price is valid for our Charter Management Program, otherwise, a 6% surcharge applies.Mehr anzeigen

very well maintained ex charter boat


BOAT FOR SALE FROM 15.10.2022 after charter season!!!!
Very well maintained ex charter yacht ELAN 40 IMPRESSION with 3 double cabins and 2 bathrooms. She sails under the Croatian flag.
The sails are from 2017 and in good condition - serviced in 2022.
Roll Genoa 140 % - Original - "Onesails" - regularly serviced - last 03/2022. Roll Mainsail - Original - "Onesails" - regularly serviced - last 03/2022.

name: 1997 Trident WARRIOR 401997 Trident WARRIOR 40
description:
This is a beautiful sea going 40-foot sloop rigged cutter, meaning that there is a stay-sail on the bow. She is fully equipped, from dishes in the galley to tools in the tool locker. She has fresh bottom paint, recent Main and Genoa sails, recent dinghy and Yamaha outboard motor, and 2018 emergency raft. The 50 hp Volvo diesel engine was rebuilt in 2018. She has solar cells and a portable Honda generator. A new chart plotter was just installed and she has send/receive transponder to identify Fortuna to other boats. She was custom built by a retired British Navy Commander, and sold to the current owners after a serious illness. She sailed from England to the US, through Panama Canal and on to the South Pacific.
Fortuna has been meticulously maintained. She now sits in Grenada and is Ready to Sail.
Viewing by appointment at our Grenada Office +473 403 9296 or info(at)clarkeandcartercaribbean.comMehr anzeigen

name: 1987 Dehler 381987 Dehler 38
description:
The Dehler 38 was designed by the infamous Van Der Stadt team as a performance racer-cruiser with family sized accommodation. Dehler are known for building quality yachts. Palma is easily sailed with all lines leading aft to the cockpit. Below decks her beamy accommodation provides plenty of space. Lots of recent upgrades include NEW rigging including mast, stays and furler (2021), NEW strong stainless steel arch for dinghy and solar panels (2021), copper coat anti-fouling(2019), New Raymarine autopilot (2020), electric windlass (2020), NEW Rocna anchor & 65 meters of galvanized chain (2020). All thru hulls have been changed to Trudesign (2019), all drinking water hoses changed in (2020), deck painted with anti skid paint (2022).
Viewing by appointment at our Grenada Office - 473 422 6418 Mehr anzeigen

name: 1983 Jeanneau Sun Fizz1983 Jeanneau Sun Fizz
description: The Sun Fizz is a really well thought out boat, two aft cabins to be the envy of a recent IMS, a bow cabin that we can well define as owners, a lovely separate bathroom and another that's sacrificed a little more and through the right aft cabin leads. Drawn in pencil by Philippe Briand in the late 1970s. The Sun Fizz is a fine example of good shipbuilding, the right compromise between economy and robustness. The Sun Fizz has no structural counter-shapes, its spars and madieri are tightly covered with the hull and the sandwich deck avoids a lot of weight at the tip, making it more stable and faster. Born as a classic fast cruiser with no pretensions to regatta, the Sun Fizz was built in sloop and ketch versions, both with fixed drift and mobile drift. Electronic tools for navigation: DSC VHF, Plotter with GPS antenna. Staging and technical: Engine Alarm, Water pressure pump, 4 Batteries, Deck Shower, Courtesy Lights, Gangway, Automatic Bilge Pump, Shorepower connector, Electric Windlass, Strand rigging, Outboard Engine Support Bracket, cockpit table, Folding living room table, deck hatches, 7 Winch. Domestic Facilities onboard: Warm Water System, Seawatermaker (da Revisionare), 12V Outlets, 220V Outlets, Heater (Webasto), 2 Manual Toilets. Safety equipment: barometer, binoculars, nautical charts, first aid kit, life jackets, safety equipment within 12 nm, distress flares, life jackets, distress signals, radar reflector, lifebelt with throw line and marker buoy, chart set. Entertainment: Speakers, Radio AM/FM, Stereo, VHS. Sails accessories: Gennaker equipment, spinnaker equipment, jib furling system, lazy bag, lazy jack, cutter stay, main sheet traveller, boom vang. Kitchen and appliances: Galley. Upholstery: Cushions, Cockpit Cushions, Window Cover, Sunshade.Show more

name: 1968 Le Comte North East 381968 Le Comte North East 38
description: A boat builder prepared the classic sailing yacht, which is suitable for blue water and equipped accordingly, for the long voyage and sailed with her from the Baltic Sea to the Canary Islands. She is ready to sail and can set sail again straight away. This Youtube video shows INA in its current condition: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oy-pyoAghgg She is currently on land in Madeira and can be viewed if you are seriously interested. Le Comte yachts are known for their exceptional build quality. For more info on the boat type there is an article here: https://www.soundingsonline.com/boats/lecomte-northeast-38 INA is an honest old school sailing yacht. With her long keel and overhangs she sails beautifully in almost all conditions! The boat is designed to be a pleasure to sail and not, like many modern yachts, a compromise between comfort and sailing characteristics. She already had difficulties with her sandwich deck (foam core), which, however, were almost completely resolved after the 2017 repair. At the beginning of 2021 we identified and treated the beginning of osmosis. As additional protection and to protect the environment, we have applied self-mixed Coppercoat as a long-term antifouling. Facts Lecomte Northeast 38 MK II Year of construction: 1968 Loa: 11.66m Lwl: 8.13m Width: 3.33m Draft: 1.70m Sail area: approx. 58m2 Displacement: approx. 9t Ballast: 2.7t Above deck: -Outer skin, Deck and superstructure painted with International Perfection in 2017. The paint already has some quirks, but still has a nice shine. Running decks with International anti-slip additive. -Many wooden parts renewed: Foot rail teak 2017 Cockpit coaming glued Gabon/Teak 2017 Cube grating cockpit 2019 - Electric windlass Lofrans Tiger, engine and relay 2020 -Two large Lewmar hatches in good condition, the front one can be opened forward and provides good ventilation on the Anchorage -Two large dorade fans -Sprayhood from 2010 in moderate condition, new windows 2021 -Large cockpit With a width of about 1.95 and a length of well over 2m. The gratings in front of the control column can be raised to create a lying surface. Great for long sailing or sleeping on the anchorage. -Winches: 2 halyard winches on the main mast, one on the mizzen reefing winch on the boom 4 sheet winches in the cockpit, two self tailing All winches are well maintained and working -Stern anchor locker with access through the aft deck -4HP Mercury outboard 2T -AWN inflatable boat with aluminum floor and air keel Rigg: INA is Rigged as a yawl and has the forestay set at 10/10. There is a second forestay to set stay sails, which can be easily set with a pelican hook. -Standing rigging 2010, forestay 2022 Sails: -Spinnaker in good condition with snuffer -two genoas in moderate condition, one with new leech lines and colorful UV protection -Stay rider jib+storm jib, both old and stained but doing their job -New mainsail 2022, heavy Cloth dimension poliant AP410, double stitched, third reef extra small for heavy weather - mizzen needs to be renewed. Navigation is also available for nice weather sailing and anchoring: -Steering compass + small compass in the saloon -Large chart table perpendicular to the direction of travel -Nasa clipper duet Log/Lot 2018 recently had misfires, so the old Nasa echo sounder is now connected again -Raymarine autopilot ACU-100 with wheel drive and p70 display, matching i70 wind display (networked via SEATALK). The wheel drive and the wind sensor are repaired but work. -AIS Icom MA 510TR 2022 with its own antenna in the mizzen -Furuno radar from the Navnet2 series, could also play maps. -Garmin GPS 152 ca.2018 -M-tech VHF with DSC and connection to the GPS -Nasa EasyNavtex -Steamer light is missing -Anchor light/Trinity LED -two electric bilge pumps, automatic broken in the small one -Whale gusher titanium manual bilge pump 2022 Engine: Mercedes Om 615 suction diesel 55Ps 2l Classic shaft system, three-blade bronze propeller, shaft bearings 2021, Volvo Penta sleeve Great engine, reliable and cheap to maintain! Manifold flange and oil cooler corroded. Oil and filter change done in 2022. Many spare parts: injection pump, alternator, starter, diesel pump, cylinder head gasket, injection nozzles, thermostats, glow plugs, filters Approx. 130l diesel in the keel tank + reserve can Below deck: INA was completely rebuilt in the mid-80s. A lot of good wood was used! In some places, however, the expert eye can see that it is not a shipyard expansion, even if it was carried out by a boat builder. You get into the boat via the motor box. This can be completely dismantled in just a few simple steps, so that you can work on the engine from all sides. Starboard is the navigation system, on port side is the spacious dog berth. 2.10x1.30 narrower towards the foot end. It is great for the free watch or for guests. Further ahead on the left is the dinette, which can easily be converted into a large lying surface of 2.10x1.60. On the other side is the kitchenette with double sink, worktop and two-burner gas stove (2020). A special detail is a pull-out board in the kitchen, which serves as an additional seat at the table or as a shelf when cooking. Forward lockers are to starboard and bathroom with Jabsco toilet, washbasin and shower facility to port. In the bow is the owner's berth, also 2.10 long. All upholstery is from the 80s and in rather poor condition. The paint on the interior is in mixed condition. Since a lot of it is teak, you can simply remove the paint if you want. The headroom is approx. 1.85 in the saloon, a little less in the foredeck. Comfort: -the wiring and the switch box are old but tidy, well-kept and clear -gel batteries 4x 100Ah, old unknown but still with good performance -wind generator Rutland 914i 2019 -three older solar panels, two in the mizzen, one on the spray hood with MPPT charge controller -Victron Energy BMV-700 battery monitor with percentage display -older Sterling power charger with IoUo characteristic -Cool box Dometic CFX 35 2021, no energy probems even when freezing -Webasto Air Top 40 diesel warm air heating with multicontrol panel 2019. Air vents in the bathroom, foredeck, two in the saloon. Hot air hoses may need to be repaired - 400l fresh water from the tank in the keel. The tank is clean and freshly coated. Thanks to the activated carbon filter, you can also drink chlorinated water from the tank. -All lamps LED -nice sound system with car amplifier from Blaupunkt and two mobile three-way bookshelf speakers from Sony. The car radio is spinning and probably needs to be replaced -USB sockets in the dogs and owner's berth for charging the cell phone -Pressure water pump leaks when running Other: The owners have lived on board the last few years and have sailed a lot with INA, even in bad weather. She is ready for new adventures and does not have to be used to the tough everyday life of a long-distance yacht. It is also a real eye-catcher and regularly inspires friends of classic lines. The decision to sell is difficult for them, as a lot of time, energy and money have gone into this boat! Unfortunately the owner can't stay below deck at 1.92m and as they plan to live on board for many more years it's time for them to scale up.Show more

name: 1976 Nautor Swan 381976 Nautor Swan 38
description:
A Nautor Swan in the online auction. Anyone can easily bid until October 31, 2022 on the Bootveiling website.


A unique opportunity to purchase an iconic, ready-to-go, 1976 Nautor Swan 38. The Swan was designed by the famous Sparkman & Olin Stephens, who have built 116 boats. The boat has an original, white gel-coat hull, a teak-lacquered interior and a beautiful teak deck with a brand new Seldén mast. Rigging and genoa were renewed in 2020. All winches are self-steering. The engine was overhauled in 2014.
The Nautor Swan 38 is a boat you can rely on for the rest of your life. A boat that will take you everywhere. In terms of build quality, design pedigree, strength, longevity and appearance, this boat can rival any other yacht produced anywhere, anytime. But what makes the Swan 38 better than any other yacht of its size is its ability to navigate the open seas in all weather conditions, while keeping the crew comfortable, confident and equipped. The hull is sturdy, hand-welded fiberglass with front and backstay and a keel-striped mast. As a cruiser, the full underbody, which offers volume for comfort and storage, the moderate fin and protected skeg rudder, ensure a design that is healthy, seaworthy and comfortable at sea. The Swan 38 is a moderate sloop with a high ballast/displacement ratio and a massive rigging, which can travel long distances.
EXTRA INFORMATION

The boat is registered in the Dutch Land Registry under number. The costs of the notarial transfer are for the buyer.
The boat was last out of the water in April 2022 for maintenance and anti-fouling.
Bootveiling is an independent specialized boat auction house. Our boats are sold under the auction conditions.

Genoa reefing system: Yes

name: 1979 Vilm 36 B1979 Vilm 36 B
description:
Well maintained shallow draft cruiser


The Vilm 36 B is a solidly built motorsailer by the German shipyard Bootsbau Ruegen-Lauterbach and we offer it to you on behalf of the 2nd owner. The design offers the comfort of sheltered sails combined with a spacious center cockpit. It is an ideal sailing yacht for both sheltered shallow sailing areas and blue water cruising. The hull is made of polyester, and the superstructure of mahogany. In the cockpit you are well sheltered and you can operate the engine and sails. Crossbreeding is very easy with the turning jib. There are two headsails, both on furlers, the front lined on a fixed bowsprit. Navigation mainly takes place in the cockpit under the fixed hood.
The forward cabin is one large open space with the long kitchen to starboard and the wet cell and sitting area to port. The table can be lowered to create an extra bed. In the bow is a double bed. The aft cabin offers plenty of space and there is a washbasin in addition to two berths. The engine is accessible through the floor in the cockpit.
If you are interested, please contact the White Whale Yachtbrokers Enkhuizen office via enkhuizen@wwy.nl or +31(0)228 855 380 for more information. Viewings are possible from Monday to Saturday, by appointment only. Your yacht broker is Robert de Vries.
If you are planning to sell your own boat, please contact White Whale Yachtbrokers for a no-obligation valuation. With 6 offices in the Netherlands, we are always nearby. See www.WWY.nl for more information.

name: 2022 Prout 382022 Prout 38
description:
privately used catamaran from 2001. in good condition


The Prout catamarans have a long and great history in boat building.
The Prout brothers are considered to have laid the foundations and are considered the grandfathers of today's cruising catamaran models.
The Prout 38 model has a lot of space and is a very sturdy boat.
The example in the ad is in good condition and built in 2001. It needs a refit which can be done locally.
It has 2 cabins 1 main and a forward cabin has been converted into large storage space. Of navigational extras, the catamaran is equipped with a radar and central computer for navigation.
This is an elegant, comfortable catamaran for you, your family and friends. It can be used for short and long trips through its width, height and layout. Call or email us for more information or to make an appointment in Zadar (Croatia). Your yacht broker is White Whale Croatia, +385 98 574 232 or croatia@WWY.nl
Do you want to sell your boat? White Whale Yachtbrokers has 11 offices in Europe. We sell your boat, wherever she is, for a low commission. Floris Vos 0031 88 2502500


Very neat Lagoon 380 S2 in the 4 cabin version. This ship is the 2nd private owner and has only sailed privately. Very comfortable ship with plenty of space suitable for a small crew, but with its 4 cabins also suitable for 8 people. She is equipped with a very extensive equipment. Above the cockpit is a custom-made hardtop bimini and for the cold days even 3 heating systems. The solar panel in combination with the wind generator makes it possible to sail for several days without shore power. A lot of navigation equipment has been replaced in 2021 for the most modern Raymarine version. The VAT has been demonstrably paid. You are most welcome to come and view the ship by appointment.

name: 2004 Island Packet 3702004 Island Packet 370
description:
The Island Packet 370 is a serious offshore cruiser with a traditional long keel and cutter rig.  Beautifully built and fitted out, the comfortable interior and high specification make them ideal for spending extended periods aboard.  This excellent example is fully equipped and is presented for sale in really nice condition.

name: 2008 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 39i Performance2008 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 39i Performance
description: CAP MED BOAT & YACHT Consulting is pleased to present this superb Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 39i which has just returned from a 14 month Atlantic loop and is ready to set off again for new adventures. This boat is equipped for the big trip, it has been carefully maintained by its various owners. With its large draft and its large mast, this sailboat is "a good walker" which allows you to cover great distances with a good level of comfort. Its 60L/h watermaker, wind turbine and solar panel give it a good level of autonomy for the trip. In addition, the sails and the standing rigging were changed in 2021 (before leaving on the trip). Bombard is held on the rear apron which avoids having a heavy gantry. All the safety equipment is up to date. Contact: Anthony CEGRI on 07 81 62 18 65 - 0033 781 621 865

name: 1973 Tyler Victory 40 Ketch1973 Tyler Victory 40 Ketch
description:
STAR CHALLENGER is a sailing vessel “Ketch” with a long keel. 
The perfect example of a classic yacht, with all the commodities for cruising and life onboard.
The Principle dimensions and parameters; All dimensions are taken from the manufacturer’s  brochure. 
L.O.A. : 11, 52 m 
SSR : 814553 
Beam : 3, 47 m 
Draft : 2,10 m 
Gross tonnage : 15,2  
T.R.B. : 15,43  
Year of construction : 1973 
Builder : Tyler boat CO LTD 
Designed by : Van der Stat 
Engine : Perkins 72 hp 
Accommodation : 7 Berths. 
Hull 
The vessel has a hull of GRP, with encapsulate keel. Bulkheads and semi bulkheads are  of GPR construction. The hull’s GRP construction utilizes a lay-up of polyester resin.
The keel is GRP long fin type with encapsulated ballast to the hull. The keel is in good condition.
Bilge  
Access to the bilge is made by lifting floor boards.
Engine 
The vessel is fitted with an inboard Perkins 72 H P diesel engine. The propeller is three  bladed and is in good order.
Spray hood, Dodgers and other Canvas Work. 
The cockpit has a fully enclosable canvas tent supported by targa and steel tubing which can fold away; It is in good condition. 
Cockpit 
The vessel benefits from a deep, safe center cockpit for six adults. There is 2 manual  bilge pumps . Two large cockpit drains are fitted.  
Deck Fittings 
The following are fitted: 
Bow cleat on either side. 
Mid- cleat on either side. 
Cockpit winches all two speed Lewmar. 
Electrical Installation 
The main electrical system is 12 V. With a control panel; Consisting of 24V circuit  breakers for various functions and an AC section of 4 circuit breakers, polarity light  and RCD. 
There are 2 x 110 Amp. Batteries in a ventilated waterproof storage under the aft berth  and 1 starter battery with emergency connecting switch and fitted fuses. There is a Victron 40 Amp. smart battery charger  in the engine room. 
Mast, Boom and Spars 
A white painted Sailspar masts. A white painted Sailspar boom and vang with kicking strap
The mast is stepped to a stainless steel deck plate and supported internally by a steel post to the keel.
Chain plates 
– A substantial stem head forestay fitting bolted through to the original welded  fitting in anchor locker.  
– Inner forestay eye bolted through deck to chain plate in anchor locker – 2 Lower shrouds forward of the mast, 1 port, 1 starboard, through deck to chain plates  on forward saloon bulkhead.  
2 lower shrouds aft of mast, 1 port 1 starboard, through deck to substantial fitting mid  ships 
-4 shrouds, 2 port 2 starboard trough deck to same substantial fitting mid ships. -1 Backstay fitted to transom, and through transom to chain plates port and starboard. All chain plates are well attached to the hull.
Standing Rigging 
New set of standing rigging in 10 mm and 8 mm 1 x 19 in June 2012.  Shrouds and backstay have swagded ends and bottlescrews with correctly placed  splitpins.
Rigging-Running 
1 Foresail furling control rope 
2 Foresail sheets. 
2 Inner foresail sheets 
2 Foresail track control rope 
 Foresail, mainsail and spare halyards1 Mainsail furling control in boom. 1 Boom preventer 
1 Main sheet 
2 Main sheet track control ropes. 
1 Main boom topping lift. 
Fresh Water 
 l fresh water tanks under the saloon seating, in the center. 
1 electric pressure pump. 
Fuel Installation 
The stainless steel diesel tank is below the cockpit.
Hatches 
There are 3 main hatches with an internal external locking devise. “ in Aluminium and  one inox. 
All hatches were found to be in good order. 
Interior 
The saloon has two settee berths, a galley and chart table opposite on the portside. There is a double berth in the aft cabin with its own head. 
The interior is in good condition. 
Heads 
The vessel is fitted with two Jabsco toilets and a holding tank is under the floorboards. 
Windows 
3 windows are fitted to each side of the coach roof. They are Lemar in alumninium  frames. The windows were in good order. 
Electronic and Navigation Equipment 
Radar: Kodem 3404 
Ploter: Garmin GPS Map 182 C 
GPS: Kodem 
VHF: Silva S 15

name: 2021 Pedro H2home 1150 Cruise Edition2021 Pedro H2home 1150 Cruise Edition
description:
The H2home has been developed for pure enjoyment. Designed as a holiday home to discover rivers and lakes. The H2home is easy to sail.


H2home 1150 Cruise Edition
The H2home has been developed for pure enjoyment. Designed as a holiday home to discover rivers and lakes. The H2home is easy to sail (in many areas without a license) and therefore for everyone who really wants to enjoy free time and vacation.
The Pedro H2home Cruise Edition is of course also available in the large version, the 1490 (ask for the options).
In contrast to the H2home, the H2home Cruise Edition has been designed with a sophisticated hull shape for excellent sailing characteristics and an extreme amount of storage space. The standard Volvo-Penta D2-75 engine (other or double motorization possible) ensures that you can move around with a very low noise level and that makes this H2home extremely suitable for longer trips. Thanks to the draft of 80 cm and headroom of 2.95 m, you can reach the most beautiful places on the water with all comfort. The materials used are low-maintenance. The superstructure is made of 100 mm insulated sandwich panels with a distinctive design, combined with plastic frames with double insulating safety glass. As a result, the insulation value is exceptionally high. Your sailing season can be extended with this and offers the possibility to stay on the H2home all year round. The layout can be filled in entirely according to your own wishes; so you can completely determine your own interior and atmosphere. It is also possible to use the roof as a roof terrace, the possibilities are endless.
The H2home is characterized by the following features:
-Perfect sailing characteristics due to hybrid and diesel propulsion by means of a propeller shaft.
-Very low noise level while sailing.
- Optimal insulation.
-Flexible layout.
-Lots of storage space.
-Low maintenance.
-High quality.
- Pronounced design on the outside through panels in many colors and designs
-Wheelchair-friendly version on request.
The flexible interior layout makes the H2home a ship with many possibilities. Share with us your personal wishes.


Engine, electrics, water
Hot water: Boiler 40 liters

name: 1990 Westerly 38 Oceanranger1990 Westerly 38 Oceanranger
description:
The Westerly Oceanranger 38 is a true "go anywhere" cruising yacht, designed to handle long passages in safety and comfort, yet is equally suited to coastal cruising in home waters. Price not negotiable Works carried out in 2017: • Engine overhaul with broken support welding • Replacement of the battery charger • Replacement of the main autoclave pump • Replacement of the bow shower drain pump • Change of the water heater, now also electric • Overhaul of the general electrical system • Addition of n ° 2 batteries (currently 5 batteries of 100Ah) • TV system with television • Remaking of part of the deck teak controls • Intervention on the mast with replacement of the mainsail guide plate and replacement on the mainsail of the garrocci with trolleys • Electric bilge pump installation in main bilge and engine compartment • Manual bilge pump repair

Prix ​​non négociable Travaux réalisés in 2017: • Examen du moteur avec soudage de soutien cassé • Remplacement du battery charger • Remplacement de la pumps à main autoclave • Remplacement de l'étrave de la pompe de drain de douche • Changer chauffe-eau, maintenant il est aussi électrique • Examen du système électrique général • Ajout de batteries n ° 2 (actuellement 5 batteries 100Ah) • Système tv avec tv • Relooking d'une partie des coments de teck de plate-forme • Intervention sur arbre avec remplacement of the plaque of invitation of the guides of grand-voile and remplacement on the grand-voile garrocci par des chariots • Installation of a pumps à cale électrique dans la main cale et le compartiment moteur • Réparation manuelle de la pompe à cale

Preis nicht verhandelbar Im Jahr 2017 durchgeführte Arbeiten: • Motorprüfung mit defektem Stützschweißen • Batterieladegerät-Wechsel • Austausch der Haupt-Autoklavenpumpe • Austausch des Duschablasspumpenbogens • Austausch des Duschablasspumpenbogens • Wasserererhit-Wechsel • Austausch der Haupt-Autoklavenpumpe • Austausch des Duschablasspumpenbogens • Wasserererhit Batterien (derzeit 5 100Ah-Batterien) • TV-System mit TV • Umkäuung eines Teils der Deck-Teak-Coments • Eingriff am Baum mit Austausch des Einladungsschildes der Großsegelführungen und Ersatz am Garrocci-Großsegel durch Truptum im Bilinerpollispe Bilge- und Motorraum • Manuelle Bilgenpumpenreparatur

name: 1975 Assmann Bohlmann Konstruktion1975 Assmann Bohlmann Konstruktion
description: MOTOR GLIDER - STAHL - ASSMANN WERFT We offer you a ketch rigged motor glider on customer order. This double buckling cleat, designed by Dieter Bohlmann and built by the Assmann shipyard in Norddeich, was produced in an extremely solid construction. The boat is in good condition and is ready for the next holiday cruise. The ALDEBARAN is a solid motorsailer that is equally suitable for weekend trips as well as long trips. The yacht is very extensively equipped, please ask for the complete inventory and list of accessories. The ship was extensively overhauled in winter storage 2021/22. Masts, trees, gratings, jibs, boat hooks, name and home port signs, and doors were sanded down and repainted. Damaged areas on the superstructure and deck were treated and repainted (invoice available) All batteries were renewed in June 2022 (invoice available). A new window was installed in the sliding door on starboard. The on-board toilet has been overhauled. Antifouling from autumn 2021 Hull including rubbing strip repainted in autumn 2020 Technical data: Two-master, ketch-rigged Designer: Dieter Bohlmann Werft Assmann, Norddeich, built in 1974/75 Double-buckled steel, base plate 10 cm, thickness decreasing, above the waterline 4mm LüA 11.40 m LüD 10 m B 3.60 m TG 1.45 m long keel weight 12t (crane states: 16 t) AS 15-71 CR, reduction 2.91:1 engine: Mercedes OM 314, 50 KW hydraulic steering system with interior and Outside steering position Cooling system in the keel (no pipes) Sailing on the wind approx. 60 sqm sail area Working deck with Polygripp covering (non-slip) Welded cleats on which the whole ship can be lifted Elaborate self-development, almost exclusively wood paneling with many details The boat can be booked in Mönkeberg by appointment can be visited near Kiel. Feel free to call. Nils Thomsen Schiffswerft Laboe GmbH & Co. KG Börn 17 24235 Laboe Phone: +49 4343 4211-48 Fax: +49 4343 4211-98 www.schiffswerft.deShow more

description:
Model: BAVARIA 36 CRUISER Type: sailing yacht LOA (m): 11,40 LWL (m): 9,49 Beam (m): 3,60 Draft (m): 1,55 Air draft (m): 16,50 Headroom (m): 1,85 Year built: 2003 Launched: 2003 Builder: Bavaria Yachtbau Country: Germany Designer: J&J Design Displacement (t): 4,7 Ballast (tonnes): 1,34 CE norm: A Hull material: GRP Hull colour: white Hull shape: round-bilged Keel type: fin keel Superstructure material: GRP Deck material: GRP Deck finish: non-skid moulded in Superstructure deck finish: non-skid moulded in Cockpit deck finish: teak Antifouling (year): 2022 Window frame: aluminium Window material: perspex Deckhatch: yes Fuel tank (litre): 150 polyethylene Level indicator (fuel tank): Gauge Freshwater tank (litre): 120 + 130 polyethylene Level indicator (freshwater): Gauge Blackwater tank (litre): 80 polyethylene Blackwater tank extraction: deck extraction + pump Wheel steering: cable steering Outside helm position: cable steering Emergency tiller: yes More info on hull: In very good conditions Info for internal use: Teak in cockpit needs care The Bavaria Cruiser 36 is designed with a couple or single-handed sailor in mind. name: 2003 Bavaria Cruiser 362003 Bavaria Cruiser 36
description:
We bought a new boat and are now sadly selling our Bavaria 36-2 "Ditchie". We are the second owner and have had a lot of fun with her for 10 years.
This Bavaria 36 is the rare owner or 2 cabin version. Instead of the third cabin to starboard, this version has a larger bathroom. At the back of the bathroom there is a wet closet for sailing gear and life jackets. Aft and accessible via the starboard cockpit locker lid is a huge locker. In it we had kept our SUP, the bikes and much more.
Because the bathroom is not built into the front cabin as usual, the front cabin is also much more spacious than in the three-cabin version. And finally, the asymmetrical layout results in a much larger bed in the back hut.
Ditchie features a deep (195 cm) lead fin keel instead of the usual cast iron keel. The higher density creates significantly less drag and the low center of gravity results in a very stable ship. She also has a folding propeller and proper sails. This combination ensures that Ditchie is amazingly fast.
The other equipment is also impressive. She has a folding steering wheel, which greatly simplifies access from behind, has a Raymarine chartplotter, Raymarine autopilot, etc. All Lewmar windows are watertight and the glass panes are not brittle as is often the case on Mediterranean boats come. All windows have mosquito screens and curtains or blinds. The entire boat and the interior still make a very neat impression.
Because the backrests of the bench seats on the Ditchie can be removed with a flick of the wrist and these can be clicked into place in front of the side bench seats, there are two more comfortable sleeping places in the saloon. A great solution if more than four people spend the night on the Ditchie want.
The entire plumbing was renewed in 2021, not just the toilet itself, but also all hoses, clamps and pumps. All lighting has been converted to LED. The batteries, the supply battery is a gel battery, are in excellent condition.
Over the years we haven't really had any significant problems with the Ditchie. You can see that she was almost exclusively in fresh water. There is almost no rust or weathering.
In 2019, a Selden gennaker boom was installed, which makes jibing under the gennaker much easier. The saildrive seal was renewed in 2020 and the teak deck resealed where necessary. The Furlex was overhauled in 2021, the Rodkicker's gas spring was renewed in 2020 and the anti-fouling and anodes just renewed.
USB charging sockets are installed at the chart table and in the cockpit.
There are at least two additional sets of sails that are viable.Show more

name: 1978 Beck & Sohne 22er schärenkreuzer1978 Beck & Sohne 22er schärenkreuzer
description:
Hi! Due to enlargement I part with a heavy heart from my skerry cruiser. It is a classic 22 skerry cruiser. The boat was built by the Beck & Sons shipyard on Lake Constance based on a design by Knut Reimers for a touring 22er. He was sailed there until 2014. Since then on the Baltic Sea. I sailed the boat on the Baltic Sea for 4 years. It has excellent sailing characteristics. It sails fast and stays on course without being windy.

In 2014 a Harbeck trailer was made.
A new engine was installed in 2015.
In 2017, a Bartels lower deck furling system was installed for the jib and genoa. The lines are routed below deck and end in the cockpit on curry clamps.
In 2018 the boat received a large cockpit tent with standing height and access to the rear hatches.
Data: Engine: ALLPa Mini SF-7 Diesel (Base Farymann 1 cylinder 7PS/5.15KW)
Overall length: 11.40 m
Overall width: 2.35 m
Draft: 1.40 m
Weight: 2800kg
Year of construction 1978

Remarks:

For the headsails, there are two built-in Bartels furling systems on the lower deck. The lines are routed below deck and end in the cockpit on curry clamps. On the starboard cockpit side for the jib or genoa and on the port cockpit side for the light wind sail.
New interior upholstery
There is a tarpaulin for the entire boat for winter and for summer.
Table for inside and in the cockpit.
The boat is currently in a hall near Husum.
If you are interested, I will send you short videos.
I can transport the boat to the desired port.
The Harbeck trailer can be purchased separately.


Asking price for the boat: €22,000.00Show more

name: 1994 CR CB 3701994 CR CB 370
description:
Built in Sweden by C & R Yachts according to high quality standards, this model was produced from 1987 to 1999. This boat is equipped with a furling self-tacking jib, but is also equipped with a classic genoa, for higher sailing performance. The teak deck is in very good conditions.The interior layout features a double berth forward with two wardrobes. The main salon with L-shaped settees port and starboard. The centreline dining table, with bottle storage within, has two fold-up leaves and seats a good crowd on both settees. Aft to starboard is the sit-down navigation station. Opposite to board is the L-shaped galley with plenty of storage. Aft to starboard is the toilet and aft to board is a cabin with a double berth, with wardrobes.

name: 2002 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 372002 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 37
description:
Neat Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 37


The jeanneau SO37 is a wonderfully spacious and well sailing family ship. Neatly built and more importantly, the current owners have looked after it very well. the maintenance was done on time and inside the ship looks like she just came from the yard. The layout has been tried and tested 'Jeanneau' with a very large wet cell on bb, in front of the chart table and a 2-seater bench, and the round seat on starboard. and beyond that the galley; behind it is one spacious double cabin with ample headroom and in front another spacious 2-person cabin.
The cockpit tent provides shelter in bad weather and provides extra living space. From a motor point of view, she is well equipped with a Volvo Penta MD2030.
Interior photos are made by us and show the current status. We have thoroughly inspected the yacht; ask us for more information, if you find it desirable.

Lovingly maintained classic sailing yacht, a Double Ender from Jachtwerf Mulder in B-Antwerp. The sailing yacht is equipped with five berths, a galley, toilet and navigation area. This S-truss with mizzen shows a stable sailing behavior and is certainly also very suitable for solo sailing. The serious sailor will eventually want to replace the sails. The seller has invested a lot in the sailing yacht over the years and it has paid off. With her sharp bow, stern and her striking bulwark she is a beautiful appearance. name: 1968 Chris-Craft Apache 371968 Chris-Craft Apache 37
description:
"Disegnata nel 1965 per Chris Craft, uno dei primi cantieri al mondo a costruire in serie imbarcazioni in fibra di vetro, l'Apache 37 ha potuto avvantaggiarsi di molte astuzie gia' testate da Olin Stephens su Intrepid (disegno S&S 1834, vittoriosa per ben due edizioni della Coppa America, 1967 e 1970). Cosi' l'Apache 37 gia' negli anni '60 nasceva con skeg e timone separato, che rispetto alla tradizionale chiglia lunga aveva il vantaggio di diminuire molto la turbolenza di scia e con uno scafo a dislocamento decisamente leggero. Benche' sembri piu' una barca da crocera pura che un purosangue da regata, l'Apache ha delle doti velocistiche di tutto rispetto, e come molte creature nate dalla insuperabile e insuperata genialita' di Olin Stephens, che curo' personalmente le fasi di prove in vasca, l'Apache 37 ha delle doti nelle andature di bolina per l'epoca difficili da eguagliare. Non bisogna pero' lasciarsi fuorviare dalle doti veliche dell'Apache, perche' gli interni offrono spazi che per l'epoca erano decisamente inconsueti e capaci di ospitare in grande comodita' una famiglia intera (2+4)."  BUONE CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA, PRONTA ALLA BOA. PER MAGGIORI INFORMAZIONI: LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069 Refit completo nel 1992 e nel 2014  INTERNI 4 posti letto, 1 bagno Cabina di prua con 2 letti a V singoli trasformabile in letto matrimoniale Bagno completo di lavello, wc e doccia Dinette con tavolo da pranzo, 2 panche e cucina dotata di lavello, acqua salata e dolce, frigo a pozzetto, 2 fuochi a gas e forno tradizionale A poppa troviamo 2 letti singoli, uno a sinistra e uno a destra della scala contenente il vano motore  STRUMENTAZIONE 2 Bussole GPS B&G Ecoscandaglio Log Pilota automatico VHF Stazione vento NUOVA NEL 2019 Salpancora Elettrico Presa 220V da banchina Caricabatterie Prese interne 12v Prese interne 220v Autoclave Boiler per l'acqua calda  ARMAMENTO Ancora Bimini Cappottina Tendalino Cuscineria Pozzetto Randa Tormentina Fiocco Avvolgi Fiocco NUOVO nel 2019 Lazy Bag 4 Winch nel pozzetto + 2 sull'albero Camminamenti laterali in teak Pozzetto in Teak Cancelletto di poppa Doccia esterna Scaletta da bagno
Note sul prezzo: BUONE CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA, PRONTA ALLA BOA. PER MAGGIORI INFORMAZIONI: LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069
English "Designed in 1965 for Chris Craft, one of the first shipyards in the world to build fiberglass boats in series, the Apache 37 was able to take advantage of many cunning already tested by Olin Stephens on Intrepid (S&S 1834 design, victorious for two editions of the America's Cup, 1967 and 1970). Thus the Apache 37 already in the 60s was born with skeg and separate rudder, which compared to the traditional long keel had the advantage of greatly decreasing the turbulence of the wake and with a hull with a decidedly light displacement. Although it looks more like a pure crossboat than a thoroughbred regatta, the Apache has respectable speeding skills, and like many creatures born from the unsurpassed and unsurpassed genius of Olin Stephens, who personally cared for the trials in the tank, the Apache 37 has qualities in the bolina gaits for the era difficult to match. However, we should not be misled by the sailing qualities of the Apache, because the interiors offer spaces that at the time were decidedly unusual and capable of housing a whole family in great comfort (2-4)."  GOOD GENERAL CONDITIONS, AGENCY COMMISSIONS, READY FOR THE BUOY. FOR MORE INFORMATION: LUCA ABATE (39 340 86 12 069) Complete refit in 1992 and 2014  Interior 4 beds, 1 bathroom Bow cabin with 2 single V beds convertible into double bed Bathroom complete with sink, toilet and shower Dinette with dining table, 2 benches and kitchen equipped with sink, salt and sweet water, cockpit fridge, 2 gas fires and traditional oven At the stern we find 2 single beds, one on the left and one to the right of the ladder containing the engine compartment  Instrumentation 2 Compasses GPS B&G Sounder Log Autopilot Vhf New Wind Station IN 2019 Electric Salpancora Outlet 220V from quay Charger Internal sockets 12v Internal sockets 220v Autoclave Boiler for hot water  Armament Still Bimini Hood Awning Cuscineria Pozzetto Randa Tormentina Bow Wraps Flake NEW in 2019 Lazy Bag, New 4 Winch in the cockpit plus 2 on the tree Teak side walkways Teak well Stern gate Outdoor shower Bathroom ladder
Française « onçu en 1965 pour Chris Craft, l’un des premiers chantiers navals au monde à construire des bateaux en fibre de verre en série, l’Apache 37 a pu profiter de nombreuses ruses déjà testées par Olin Stephens sur Intrepid (design S&S 1834, victorieux pour deux éditions de l’America’s Cup, 1967 et 1970). Ainsi, l’Apache 37 déjà dans les années 60 est né avec le skeg et le gouvernail séparé qui par rapport à la quille longue traditionnelle a eu l’avantage de diminuer considérablement la turbulence du sillage et avec une coque avec un déplacement décidément léger. Bien qu’il ressemble plus à un bateau croisé pur qu’une régate de pur-sang, l’Apache a des compétences respectables de vitesse, et comme de nombreuses créatures nées du génie inégalé et inégalé d’Olin Stephens, qui a personnellement pris soin des essais dans le réservoir, l’Apache 37 a des qualités dans les démarches bolina pour l’époque difficile à égaler. Cependant, nous ne devrions pas être induits en erreur par les qualités de voile de l’Apache, parce que les intérieurs offrent des espaces qui à l’époque étaient décidément inhabituels et capables de loger toute une famille dans un grand confort (2-4). »  BONNES CONDITIONS GÉNÉRALES, COMMISSIONS D’AGENCE, PRÊTES POUR LA BOUÉE. POUR PLUS D’INFORMATIONS: LUCA ABATE (39 340 86 12 069) Remise en état complète en 1992 et 2014  Intérieur 4 lits, 1 salle de bain Cabine d’arc avec 2 lits simples V convertibles en lit double Salle de bains complète avec évier, toilettes et douche Dinette avec table à manger, 2 bancs et cuisine équipée d’évier, sel et eau douce, réfrigérateur cockpit, 2 feux de gaz et four traditionnel À l’arrière, nous trouvons 2 lits simples, un à gauche et un à droite de l’échelle contenant le compartiment moteur  Instrumentation 2 Boussoles GPS B&G Sirène rapport Pilote automatique Vhf Nouvelle station éolienne en 2019 Salpancora électrique Sortie 220V du quai Chargeur Prises internes 12v Prises internes 220v Autoclave Chaudière pour eau chaude  Armement Encore Bimini Capot Auvent Cuscineria Pozzetto Randa Tormentina Arc Wraps Flake NOUVEAU en 2019 Sac paresseux, Nouveau 4 Treuil dans le cockpit plus 2 sur l’arbre Passerelles latérales en teck Bien teck Porte de poupe Douche extérieure Échelle de salle de bains
Deutsch "Entworfen 1965 für Chris Craft, eine der ersten Werften der Welt, die Fiberglasboote in Serie baute, konnte die Apache 37 viele Von Olin Stephens auf Intrepid getestete Schlauheit nutzen (S&S 1834 Design, siegert für zwei Ausgaben des America es Cup, 1967 und 1970). So wurde der Apache 37 bereits in den 60er Jahren mit Skeg und separatem Ruder geboren, was im Vergleich zum traditionellen Langkiel den Vorteil hatte, die Turbulenzen des Wakes stark zu verringern und mit einem Rumpf mit einer entschieden leichten Verschiebung. Obwohl es eher wie ein reines Kreuzboot als wie eine Vollblutregatta aussieht, hat der Apache respektable Geschwindigkeitsfähigkeiten, und wie viele Kreaturen, die aus dem unübertroffenen und unübertroffenen Genie von Olin Stephens geboren wurden, der sich persönlich um die Prüfungen im Panzer kümmerte, hat der Apache 37 Qualitäten in den Bolina-Gangs für die Ära, die schwer zu erreichen war. Wir sollten uns jedoch nicht von den Segelqualitäten des Apachetäuschen lassen, denn die Innenräume bieten Räume, die damals ausgesprochen ungewöhnlich waren und in der Lage waren, eine ganze Familie in großem Komfort zu beherbergen (2-4)."  GUTE ALLGEMEINE BEDINGUNGEN, AGENTUR PROVISIONEN, BEREIT FÜR DIE BUOY. FÜR MEHR INFORMATIONEN: LUCA ABATE (39 340 86 12 069) Komplette Refit in 1992 und 2014  Innere 4 Betten, 1 Badezimmer Bugkabine mit 2 Einzelbetten für Doppelbett Badezimmer komplett mit Waschbecken, WC und Dusche Essecke mit Esstisch, 2 Bänken und Küche mit Spüle, Salz und Süßwasser, Cockpit-Kühlschrank, 2 Gasfeuer und traditionellem Backofen Am Heck finden wir 2 Einzelbetten, eines links und eines rechts von der Leiter mit dem Motorraum  Instrumentation 2 Kompasse GPS B&G Echolot Protokoll Autopilot Vhf Neue Windkraftstation IN 2019 Elektrische Salpancora Ausgang 220V vom Kai Ladegerät Interne Buchsen 12v Interne Buchsen 220v Autoklaven Kessel für Warmwasser  Bewaffnung Noch Bimini Haube Markise Cuscineria Pozzetto Randa Tormentina Bogen Wraps Flake NEU im Jahr 2019 Lazy Bag, Neu 4 Winde im Cockpit plus 2 auf dem Baum Teak-Seitenstege Teak gut Stern-Tor Außendusche Badezimmerleiter
Español "Diseñado en 1965 para Chris Craft, uno de los primeros astilleros del mundo en construir barcos de fibra de vidrio en serie, el Apache 37 fue capaz de aprovechar muchos astutos ya probados por Olin Stephens en Intrepid (diseño S&S 1834, victorioso para dos ediciones de la America's Cup, 1967 y 1970). Así, el Apache 37 ya en los años 60 nació con skeg y timón separado, que en comparación con la quilla larga tradicional tenía la ventaja de disminuir en gran medida la turbulencia de la estela y con un casco con un desplazamiento decididamente ligero. Aunque parece más un travesaño puro que una regata pura, el Apache tiene respetables habilidades de exceso de velocidad, y como muchas criaturas nacidas del genio insuperable e insuperable de Olin Stephens, que se preocupaba personalmente por las pruebas en el tanque, el Apache 37 tiene cualidades en las marchas de bolina para la época difícil de igualar. Sin embargo, no debemos ser engañados por las cualidades de navegación de los apaches, porque los interiores ofrecen espacios que en ese momento eran decididamente inusuales y capaces de albergar a toda una familia con gran comodidad (2-4)."  BUENAS CONDICIONES GENERALES, COMISIONES DE AGENCIA, LISTAS PARA LA BOYA. PARA MÁS INFORMACIÓN: LUCA ABATE (39 340 86 12 069) Reacondicionamiento completo en 1992 y 2014  Interior 4 camas, 1 baño Cabina de proa con 2 camas individuales V convertibles en cama doble Baño completo con lavabo, aseo y ducha Dinette con mesa de comedor, 2 bancos y cocina equipada con fregadero, sal y agua dulce, nevera de cabina, 2 fuegos de gas y horno tradicional En la popa encontramos 2 camas individuales, una a la izquierda y otra a la derecha de la escalera que contiene el compartimiento del motor  Instrumentación 2 Brújulas GPS B&G Sonda Registro Piloto automático Vhf Nueva Estación Eólica EN 2019 Salpancora Eléctrica Outlet 220V del muelle Cargador Tomas internas 12v Tomas internas 220v Autoclave Caldera para agua caliente  Armamento Todavía Bimini Capucha Toldo Cuscineria Pozzetto Randa Tormentina Arco Wraps Flake NUEVO en 2019 Bolsa Perezosa, Nueva 4 Winch en la cabina más 2 en el árbol Pasarelas laterales de teca Pozo de teca Puerta de popa Ducha al aire libre Escalera de baño
Россию "Разработанный в 1965 году для Крис Крафт, одна из первых верфей в мире, чтобы построить стекловолокна лодки в серии, Apache 37 удалось воспользоваться многими хитростью уже испытаны Олин Стивенс на Intrepid (S'S 1834 дизайн, победив два издания Кубка Америки, 1967 и 1970). Таким образом Apache 37 уже в 60s было принесено с skeg и отдельно рулем, который сравнено к традиционному длиннему килю имело преимущество значительно уменьшать турбулентность следа и с корпусом с решительно светлым смещениям. Хотя это больше похоже на чистый кросс-лодку, чем чистокровный регаты, Apache имеет респектабельные навыки ускорения, и, как и многие существа, рожденные от непревзойденного и непревзойденного гения Олин Стивенс, который лично заботился о испытаниях в танке, Apache 37 имеет качества в болина походки для эпохи трудно соответствовать. Тем не менее, мы не должны быть введены в заблуждение парусные качества Apache, потому что интерьеры предлагают пространства, которые в то время были явно необычными и способны жилья всей семьи в большой комфорт (2-4) ".  ХОРОШИЕ ОБЩИЕ УСЛОВИЯ, АГЕНТСКИЕ КОМИССИИ, ГОТОВЫЕ К БУЮ. name: 2014 Dehler 382014 Dehler 38
description:
The Dehler 38 is always what you make of it: a luxurious cruising ship with bathing platform, cockpit table and teak deck. Or, if your family crew likes things sporty, a thrilling performance yacht.
The Dehler 38 Blue Chip brings the best of both worlds, it is equipped for maximum comfort, with Dacron sails, cockpit table, bathing platform and with a luxurious 3-cabin interior while it is also a true racer with plenty of high perfomance sails and special modifocations that make it even more competitive in ORC racing. When racing, the cockpit table and bathing platform can be removed while the dek equipment needed for racing is also included.
This is a true cruiser racer that has already proven itself with many trophies in ORC racing and even in the World cup.
Available for handover in late October 2022. The listed price is valid if the yacht stays in our charter management program, otherwise a 6% surcharge applies. List of options and packages added to the standard equipment:

name: 1987 Gib'Sea 106 Master1987 Gib'Sea 106 Master
description: General: The Gib'Sea 106 Master is a solid shipyard built sailing yacht with stable, seaworthy sailing characteristics. All lines are led to the cockpit and are operated with the self-tailing winches. The foresail is equipped with a furling reefing installation. The tiller can be raised after sailing and the overflow is in front of the spray hood. As a result, there are few obstacles in the cockpit, which makes the Gib'Sea suitable for sailing with the family. The navigation equipment is placed at the cabin entrance under the large spray hood. The cockpit can be completely covered with a tarpaulin. The underwater hull will be equipped with new antifouling in the spring of 2022. Interior: This 'Master' version has a single owner's cabin at the stern on port side and a wet cell on starboard side. In addition to a pump toilet and sink, the wet cell also has a cupboard for sailing clothes. Next to the cabin entrance is the chart table on starboard and port side a well-equipped galley with stove, oven, double sink, deep refrigerator and plenty of storage space. A boiler provides hot water. The saloon is spacious enough for 6 people to sit, standing height is good with approx. 1.85 m. The front cabin has a V-bed, with a washbasin with mirror on port side and a wardrobe on starboard side. The Gib'Sea offers enough comfort for sailing holidays, with family or small crew.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2001 Najad 3732001 Najad 373
description:
Seaworthy, good sailing quality yacht


Najad Yachts is one of the oldest and most experienced Swedish yacht builders. The yard certainly needs no introduction to experienced sailors. The Najad 373 is a high quality yacht built as a true offshore sailing yacht for the discerning sailor. The center cockpit is deep, well-arranged and well protected. The teak deck looks good and the deck layout is well thought out. Frogs, scepters and other fittings - they are all bolted through metal counterplates which are firmly laminated to the hull and deck.
The interior is certainly as beautiful as the exterior. Amidships is the saloon and here you will again find many examples of the great craftsmanship. To port is the practical galley. To starboard is the chart table and the spacious wet cell with shower and toilet. In the forepeak is a double cabin. In the stern is the owner's cabin with a spacious double bed. The engine room is large and the engine is easily accessible for service all around.
For those looking for a good sailing quality yacht, this Najad 373 is an absolute must. We cordially invite you for a viewing in Den Oever. If you have any questions or would like to make an appointment, please do not hesitate to contact us at enkhuizen@wwy.nl. Your yacht broker is Robert de Vries, tel. 06-50201336.

name: 2010 Nauticat 3312010 Nauticat 331
description:
In beautiful condition, used very little!


The Nauticat 331 was introduced in 2010 in a new model. In that year, this boat was the first at Boot Düsseldorf. The ship was also delivered in 2010 and from that year the owner has owned the boat. The boat has been used so little that everything is still in new condition. The engine has less than 400 hours on the clock and the interior is beautiful without any traces of use. Few motorsailors are of such good quality as the Finnish-built Nauticat. The boat is also very well equipped with the extra icing on the cake: the recently completely renewed navigation equipment. The Ilona is a ketch rigged yacht with a furling mainsail in the mast, the mizzen has a battened mainsail, the genoa is also a furling reef system. The boat has always been on fresh water and has never sailed on larger water than the IJsselmeer and Wadden Sea. At the moment the boat is located right next to our sales harbor in the hall.


Accommodation
TV: Sat. antenna

name: 2019 Dufour 390 Grand Large - 390 GL2019 Dufour 390 Grand Large - 390 GL
description:
Want to make sure you have this Dufour bestseller for the next season? We offer you this splendid example of a Dufour 390, in like-new condition and already ready to sail. The current owner has also taken great care in the outfitting in terms of performance, with extra-standard Offshore sails by Elvstrom with zero tails and furling, equipping the rigging with German-style mainsail sheet, genoa sheet point adjustable from the cockpit and manual adjustment of the backstay. If you would also like a refined interior, you will appreciate the extra standard finish of upholstery, interior and teak planking. The electronics have also been customised with a beautiful Raymarine Axiom 12 in the cockpit, Raymarine pilot actuator instead of the standard version, chain counter, I70 display also at the helm and remote control for the pilot. Don't let it get away! Used Dufour 390 Grand Large. Layout 3 cabins and 2 bathrooms. Boat offered with exclusive sales contract. Authorised shipping brokerage company. L'électronique a également été personnalisée avec un magnifique Raymarine Axiom 12 dans le cockpit, un actionneur de pilote Raymarine au lieu de la version standard, un compteur de chaîne, un écran I70 également à la barre et une télécommande pour le pilote. Ne le laissez pas s'échapper ! Dufour 390 Grand Large d'occasion. Aménagement 3 cabines et 2 salles de bain. Bateau proposé avec contrat de vente exclusif. Société de courtage maritime agréée. name: 1999 bootswerft diethelm baars decksalonyacht1999 bootswerft diethelm baars decksalonyacht
description: Repainted in 2020, saloon furnishings and all fixtures are mahogany. The sailing yacht is in good condition. The deck is clean, all bolts such as stanchions and the bathing platform are bolted clean and the screw holes are sealed against water ingress. There are 3 winches each for jib and mainsail and 1 windlass, self-furling. There is a shower on the deck. The seat thwarts are covered with teak. The control panel for the engine with the engine-specific displays is error-free and in good condition. The attached nautical displays are easy to read and functional. The mast is made of aluminum and has two spreaders. The interior of the saloon is made of mahogany wood, as are all fixtures. The pantry consists of a 12 V refrigerator, a square double sink with pressurized water supply, a gimballed two-flame gas cooker, oven and several storage compartments. The stable table, top made of mahogany, can be lowered and used as an additional place to sleep. The wet room is equipped with a pump toilet and washbasin with pressurized water supply and can be ventilated through a Lewmar glass hatch. The engine is located under the saloon floor next to the helm and is easily accessible.Show more

name: 1998 Barberis 3811998 Barberis 381
description:
Bellissimo Barberis 381 del 1998, realizzato sugli stampi dell'ex COMET 375 progettato da Jean Marie Finot e Doug Peterson, è un tipico esempio di crociera veloce. I punti di forza sono l'ottimo passaggio sull'onda e la manovrabilità. L'armo è in testa d'albero, tutte le manovre sono rinviate in pozzetto, dove sono ospitati la colonnina della timoniera a ruota e il trasto randa (in prossimità della discesa sottocoperta). Versione con 3 cabine e 1 bagno, nel 2017 dopo essere acquistato dall'attuale proprietario sono stati eseguiti i seguenti lavori:  Revisione e controllo generale impianto elttrico e sostituzione di tutte le plafoniere. Rifacimento completo impianto elettrico testa d'albero Revisione e controllo di tutto l'impianto idraulico Controllo e sostituzione pompe di sentina Installazione di nuovo impianto di riscaldamento WEBASTO Rivestimento Fono Assorbente per vano motore Disalberamento e successivo Alberamento Smontaggio e rimontaggio bulbo con sigillante Sikaflex Trattamento completo al bulbo con prodotti Epossidici Jotun Trattamento Antiosmosi completo carena Sostituzione di tutte le prese a mare ed i passascafi presenti in carena Sbarco motore -controllo a banco e sostituzione di tutte le parti non funzionanti Sostituzione cuffia Sail Drive Montaggio sfiati inox+scarico+portagomma+tubo Montaggio ombrinale+scarico+portagomma+tubo Sostituzione Randa FB NORDAC ND72MA completa di stecche lunghe carrellata Revisione e lavaggio Genoa Sostituzione cucina 3 fuochi e forno a gas -fermapentole tre fuochi - spondina proteggi fiamma Sostituzione toilette e Lavello Sostituzione miscelatori bagno e cucina Rivestimenti piano cucina Rifacimento cuscineria dinette Sostituzione di tutti i meterassi delle cabine Verniciatura cielini Verniciatura interna Sostituzione sedile di prua Verniciatura specchio di poppa e righe di bellezza blu Sostituzione Sprayhood Nuovo Easy Bag steccato con cuffia albero separata Nuovo Lazy jack con occhi in teflon impiombati Nuovo Telo Bimini a tre archi.
Note sul prezzo: IVA Inclusa
English Beautiful Barberis 381 of 1998, made on the molds of the former COMET 375 designed by Jean Marie Finot and Doug Peterson, is a typical example of fast cruising. The strengths are the excellent passage on the wave and the maneuverability. The rig is at the head of the mast, all the maneuvers are postponed in the cockpit, where the wheel and the mainsail trasto (near the descent below deck) are housed. Version with 3 cabins and 1 bathroom, in 2017 after being purchased by the current owner the following works were carried out:  Overhaul and general control of the electrical system and replacement of all the ceiling lights. Complete renovation of the electrical shaft head system Overhaul and control of the entire hydraulic system Bilge pump control and replacement Installation of a new WEBASTO heating system Sound Absorbing coating for engine compartment Dismasting and subsequent Tree Disassembly and reassembly of the bulb with Sikaflex sealant Complete bulb treatment with Jotun Epoxy products Complete antiosmosis treatment hull Replacement of all sea intakes and hull feeders in the hull Engine landing - bench control and replacement of all non-functioning parts Sail Drive headset replacement Stainless steel vents mounting+ exhaust+ hose holder+ hose Cable mounting+drain+tire holder+hose Replacement Randa FB NORDAC ND72MA complete with long slats Overhaul and washing Genoa Replacement kitchen 3 burners and gas oven - three-burner pot stop - flame protection side rail Replacement of toilet and sink Replacement of bathroom and kitchen mixers Kitchen top coverings Dinette cushion makeover Replacement of all cabin meters Ceiling painting Internal painting Bow seat replacement Transom painting and blue beauty stripes Sprayhood Replacement New Easy Bag with separate shaft cap New Lazy jack with spliced Teflon eyes New Bimini Cloth with three arches.
Française Le magnifique Barberis 381 de 1998, fabriqué sur les moules de l’ancien COMET 375 conçu par Jean Marie Finot et Doug Peterson, est un exemple typique de croisière rapide. Les points forts sont l’excellent passage sur la vague et la maniabilité. Le gréement est en tête du mât, toutes les manœuvres sont reportées dans le cockpit, où la roue et la grand-voile trasto (près de la descente sous le pont) sont logées. Version avec 3 cabines et 1 salle de bain, en 2017 après avoir été acheté par le propriétaire actuel, les travaux suivants ont été effectués:  Révision et contrôle général du système électrique et remplacement de tous les plafonniers. Rénovation complète du système de tête d’arbre électrique Révision et contrôle de l’ensemble du système hydraulique Contrôle et remplacement de la pompe de cale Installation d’un nouveau système de chauffage WEBASTO Revêtement insonorisant pour compartiment moteur Démâtage et arbre subséquent Démontage et remontage de l’ampoule avec le scellant Sikaflex Traitement complet des ampoules avec les produits Jotun Epoxy Coque complète de traitement antiosmose Remplacement de toutes les prises d’eau en mer et des mangeoires de coque dans la coque Atterrissage du moteur - contrôle du banc et remplacement de toutes les pièces non fonctionnelles Remplacement du casque Sail Drive Montage d’évents en acier inoxydable + échappement + support de tuyau + tuyau Montage de câble + drain + support de pneu + tuyau Remplacement Randa FB NORDAC ND72MA complet avec longues lattes Révision et lavage Gênes Cuisine de remplacement 3 brûleurs et four à gaz - arrêt de pot à trois brûleurs - rail latéral de protection contre les flammes Remplacement des toilettes et de l’évier Remplacement des mitigeurs de salle de bain et de cuisine Revêtements de cuisine Relooking du coussin de dinette Remplacement de tous les compteurs de cabine Peinture au plafond Peinture interne Remplacement du siège avant Peinture d’imposte et rayures de beauté bleues Remplacement de la hotte de pulvérisation Nouveau sac facile avec bouchon d’arbre séparé Nouveau jack paresseux avec yeux en téflon épissés Nouveau tissu Bimini avec trois arches.
Deutsch Beautiful Barberis 381 von 1998, hergestellt auf den Formen des ehemaligen COMET 375 von Jean Marie Finot und Doug Peterson, ist ein typisches Beispiel für schnelles Cruisen. Die Stärken sind die hervorragende Passage auf der Welle und die Manövrierfähigkeit. Das Rigg befindet sich an der Spitze des Masts, alle Manöver werden im Cockpit verschoben, wo das Rad und das Großsegel Trasto (in der Nähe des Abstiegs unter Deck) untergebracht sind. Version mit 3 Kabinen und 1 Badezimmer, im Jahr 2017 wurden nach dem Kauf durch den jetzigen Eigentümer folgende Arbeiten durchgeführt:  Überholung und allgemeine Kontrolle der elektrischen Anlage und Austausch aller Deckenleuchten. Komplettsanierung des elektrischen Wellenkopfsystems Überholung und Steuerung des gesamten Hydrauliksystems Steuerung und Austausch von Bilgenpumpen Installation einer neuen WEBASTO Heizungsanlage Schallabsorbierende Beschichtung für Motorraum Entmastung und nachfolgender Baum Demontage und Remontage der Glühbirne mit Sikaflex Dichtmittel Komplette Zwiebelbehandlung mit Jotun Epoxy Produkten Komplette Antiosmose-Behandlungshülle Austausch aller Seeeinlässe und Rumpfzuführungen im Rumpf Triebwerkslandung - Tischsteuerung und Austausch aller nicht funktionierenden Teile Sail Drive Headset Ersatz Edelstahl-Lüftungsschlitze Montage + Auspuff + Schlauchhalter + Schlauch Kabelmontage+Ablass+Reifenhalter+Schlauch Ersatz Randa FB NORDAC ND72MA komplett mit langen Lamellen Überholung und Waschen Genua Ersatzküche 3 Brenner und Gasofen - Drei-Flammen-Topfstopp - Flammenschutz-Seitenschiene Austausch von Toilette und Waschbecken Austausch von Bad- und Küchenarmaturen Küchenbeläge Dinette Kissen Makeover Austausch aller Kabinenzähler Deckenmalerei Innenlackierung Ersatz des Bugsitzes Riegelmalerei und blaue Schönheitsstreifen Austausch der Spritzmaske Neue Easy Bag mit separater Schaftkappe Neue Lazy Jack mit gespleißten Teflonaugen Neues Bimini-Tuch mit drei Bögen.
Español El hermoso Barberis 381 de 1998, hecho sobre los moldes del antiguo COMET 375 diseñado por Jean Marie Finot y Doug Peterson, es un ejemplo típico de crucero rápido. Los puntos fuertes son el excelente paso en la ola y la maniobrabilidad. La plataforma está en la cabecera del mástil, todas las maniobras se posponen en la cabina, donde se alojan la rueda y el trasto de la vela mayor (cerca del descenso debajo de la cubierta). Versión con 3 cabinas y 1 baño, en 2017 tras ser comprada por el actual propietario se realizaron los siguientes trabajos:  Revisión y control general del sistema eléctrico y sustitución de todas las luces de techo. Renovación completa del sistema de cabezal del eje eléctrico Revisión y control de todo el sistema hidráulico Control y reemplazo de la bomba de achique Instalación de un nuevo sistema de calefacción WEBASTO Revestimiento absorbente de sonido para el compartimento del motor Desmontaje y posterior árbol Desmontaje y remontaje de la bombilla con sellador Sikaflex Tratamiento completo de bulbos con productos Jotun Epoxy Casco completo de tratamiento antiósmosis Sustitución de todas las tomas marítimas y alimentadores del casco en el casco Aterrizaje del motor: control de banco y reemplazo de todas las piezas que no funcionan Reemplazo de auriculares Sail Drive Ventilaciones de acero inoxidable montaje + escape + soporte de manguera + manguera Montaje del cable + drenaje + soporte de neumáticos + manguera Reemplazo Randa FB NORDAC ND72MA completo con listones largos Revisión y lavado de Génova Cocina de reemplazo 3 quemadores y horno de gas - parada de olla de tres quemadores - riel lateral de protección contra llamas Sustitución del inodoro y el lavabo Sustitución de mezcladores de baño y cocina Revestimientos de encimera de cocina Cambio de imagen del cojín dinette Sustitución de todos los contadores de cabina Pintura de techos Pintura interna Reemplazo del asiento de proa Pintura de travesaño y rayas de belleza azules Reemplazo de sprayhood Nuevo Easy Bag con tapa de eje separada Nuevo gato perezoso con ojos de teflón empalmados Nuevo paño Bimini con tres arcos.
Россию Красивый Barberis 381 1998 года, сделанный на пресс-формах бывшего COMET 375, разработанного Жаном Мари Фино и Дагом Петерсоном, является типичным примером быстрого крейсерства. Сильными сторонами являются отличный проход на волне и маневренность. Буровая установка находится во главе мачты, все маневры откладываются в кабине, где размещены колесо и грот trasto (возле спуска под палубой). Версия с 3 каютами и 1 ванной комнатой, в 2017 году после покупки нынешним владельцем были проведены следующие работы:  Капитальный ремонт и общий контроль электрической системы и замена всех потолочных светильников. Полная реконструкция системы электрической головки вала Капитальный ремонт и управление всей гидравлической системой Управление и замена трюмного насоса Установка новой системы отопления WEBASTO Звукопоглощающее покрытие для моторного отсека Дисмастинг и последующее дерево Демонтаж и повторная сборка колбы с герметиком Sikaflex Полная обработка луковиц эпоксидными продуктами Jotun Полная антиосмозная обработка корпуса Замена всех морских водозаборов и кормушек корпуса в корпусе Посадка двигателя - стендовое управление и замена всех неработающих деталей Замена гарнитуры Sail Drive Монтаж вентиляционных отверстий из нержавеющей стали + выхлоп + держатель шланга + шланг Монтаж кабеля + слив + держатель шин + шланг Замена Randa FB NORDAC ND72MA в комплекте с длинными планками Капитальный ремонт и мойка Генуи Замена кухни 3 конфорки и газовая духовка - трехконфорочная горшоковая остановка - огнезащитная боковая рейка Замена унитаза и раковины Замена смесителей для ванной и кухни Кухонные покрытия Макияж подушки Dinette Замена всех бортовых счетчиков Покраска потолков Внутренняя покраска Замена носового сиденья Фрамуговая роспись и синие полосы красоты Замена опрыскивателя Новая сумка Easy Bag с отдельной крышкой вала Новый ленивый домкрат со сращенными тефлоновыми глазами Новая бимини ткань с тремя арками.Mehr anzeigen
