name: 1946 Baglietto 6 m Stazza Internazionale1946 Baglietto 6 m Stazza Internazionale
description:
Barca a vela d'epoca, costruita nel 1946 nel Cantiere Baglietto (Varazze), nel 1996 giunge al Cantiere Tecnomar di Fiumara grande a Fiumicino dove viene completamente restaurata. La chiglia è stata sostituita totalmente insieme al calcagnolo di poppa, inoltre le maestranze del cantiere guidate dal mastro d'ascia Giorgio Rossi hanno curato il rifacimento di alcuni madieri in acciaio, sostituito tutte le tavole di fasciame dell’opera viva che interessavano la sostituzione della chiglia, sono stati rifatti il ponte in tek, i cieli della tuga interponendo uno strato di compensato marino curando la proporzione delle doghe del ponte e facendo sì che vi fossero state meno giunture possibili sulla coperta. Gli interni originali sono stati ripristinati compreso un lavabo rifatto a mano da una lastra di rame, gli impianti rifatti, e celati il più possibile al fine di non avere un impatto “tecnologico” con l’ambiente interno, è stato installato inoltre un frigorifero, anche lui nascosto. L’albero originale, è stato aperto longitudinalmente e ricostruito nelle sue parti anteriore e posteriore centrali, dotandolo delle canalizzazioni per gli impianti elettrici e radio, la sua attrezzatura, in parte mancante, è stata ricostruita basandosi su l’esempio di un altro albero uguale, scovato nel sottotetto dello YCI a Genova e su i vecchi fori presenti sull’albero stesso; il sartiame è stato rinnovato. La pala del timone con il suo asse sono stati ricostruiti ex novo sulla foggia del malconcio timone originale. Per dati e foto aggiornate prego contattarci via email. Additional Information Batterie 2 x 60 amp del 2015. Carena maggio 2018. Ponte e pozzetto in teak del 2000. Impianto idraulico e elettrico in buone condizioni. Albero Silver Spruce portato a zero e ricoppalato nel 2018 (come nuovo) Sartiame spiroidale Inox 2000. Sartie a 49 fili piombati in ottime condizioni - Volanti Spectra Bompresso in mogano.
English Vintage sailboat, built in 1946 in the Baglietto Shipyard (Varazze), in 1996 arrives at the Tecnomar Shipyard in Fiumara grande in Fiumicino where it is completely restored. The kilo was replaced totally together with the aft cast, in addition, the construction workers led by the axe master Giorgio Rossi took care of the refurbishment of some steel gunners, replaced all the planks of the living work that affected the replacement of the keel, the tek bridge was redone, the skies of the deckfold interposed a layer of marine plywood taking care of the proportion of the slats of the bridge and making sure that there had been as few joints as possible on the Indoor. The original interiors were restored including a hand-redone sink from a copper slab, the redone systems, and concealed as much as possible in order not to have a "technological" impact with the internal environment, a refrigerator was also installed, also hidden. The original shaft, was opened longitudinally and rebuilt in its central front and rear parts, equipping it with ducts for electrical and radio systems, its equipment, partly missing, was rebuilt based on the example of another equal tree, found in the attic of the YCI in Genoa and on the old holes present on the tree itself; the rigging has been renovated. The rudder blade with its axis have been rebuilt from scratch on the shape of the battered original rudder. For up-to-date data and photos please contact us by email. Additional Information 2 x 60 amp batteries from 2015. Hull May 2018. Teak bridge and cockpit from 2000. Plumbing and electrical system in good condition. Silver Spruce tree brought to zero and recouped in 2018 (as new) Sartiame spiroidale Inox 2000. 49-wire rigging swooped in excellent condition - Spectra steering wheels Mahogany bompresso.
Française Le voilier vintage, construit en 1946 dans le chantier naval de Baglietto (Varazze), arrive en 1996 au chantier naval Tecnomar de Fiumara grande à Fiumicino où il est entièrement restauré. Le kilo a été remplacé totalement avec la fonte arrière, en outre, les ouvriers de la construction dirigés par le maître de hache Giorgio Rossi a pris soin de la remise à neuf de certains artilleurs en acier, remplacé toutes les planches de l’ouvrage vivant qui a affecté le remplacement de la quille, le pont tek a été refait, le ciel du matelot interposé une couche de contreplaqué marin en prenant soin de la proportion des lattes du pont et en s’assurant qu’il y avait eu aussi peu de joints que possible sur le Intérieur. Les intérieurs d’origine ont été restaurés, y compris un évier refait à la main à partir d’une dalle de cuivre, les systèmes refaits, et caché autant que possible afin de ne pas avoir un impact « technologique » avec l’environnement interne, un réfrigérateur a également été installé, également caché. L’arbre d’origine, ouvert longitudienment et reconstruit dans ses parties avant et arrière centrales, l’équipant de conduits pour les systèmes électriques et radio, son équipement, en partie manquant, a été reconstruit sur la base de l’exemple d’un autre arbre égal, trouvé dans le grenier de la YCI à Gênes et sur les vieux trous présents sur l’arbre lui-même; le gréement a été rénové. La lame de gouvernail avec son axe a été reconstruite à partir de zéro sur la forme du gouvernail d’origine battu. Pour obtenir des données et des photos à jour, veuillez nous contacter par e-mail. Informations complémentaires 2 batteries de 60 ampères à partir de 2015. Hull mai 2018. Pont en teck et cockpit à partir de 2000. Plomberie et système électrique en bon état. L’épinette d’argent ramenée à zéro et récupérée en 2018 (en tant que nouvelle) Sartiame spiroidale Inox 2000. Gréement de 49 fils plongé en excellent état - Volants Spectra Bompresso en acajou.
Deutsch Vintage Segelboot, Baujahr 1946 in der Baglietto Werft (Varazze), im Jahr 1996 kommt auf der Tecnomar Werft in Fiumara grande in Fiumicino, wo es vollständig restauriert. Das Kilo wurde komplett zusammen mit dem Achterguss ersetzt, außerdem kümmerten sich die Bauarbeiter um den Axtmeister Giorgio Rossi um die Sanierung einiger Stahlschützen, ersetzten alle Bretter der lebenden Arbeiten, die den Ersatz des Kiels beeinträchtigten, die Tek-Brücke wurde erneuert, der Himmel der Deckfalte stellte eine Schicht aus Marinesperrholz, die sich um den Anteil der Latten der Brücke kümmerte und sicherstellte, dass es so wenig Fugen wie möglich gegeben hatte. Indoor. Die ursprünglichen Innenräume wurden restauriert, einschließlich einer handsanierten Spüle von einer Kupferplatte, den redone Systemen, und so viel wie möglich verdeckt, um keine "technologische" Auswirkungen auf die innere Umgebung zu haben, wurde auch ein Kühlschrank installiert, auch versteckt. Der ursprüngliche Schacht, wurde längs geöffnet und in seinen zentralen vorderen und hinteren Teilen wieder aufgebaut, mit Kanälen für elektrische und Funksysteme ausgestattet, seine Ausrüstung, teilweise fehlte, wurde nach dem Beispiel eines anderen gleichen Baumes, der im Dachgeschoss des YCI in Genua gefunden wurde, und auf den alten Löchern, die auf dem Baum selbst vorhanden sind, wieder aufgebaut; die Takelage wurde renoviert. Die Ruderklinge mit ihrer Achse wurde in der Form des ramponierten Originalruders von Grund auf neu aufgebaut. Für aktuelle Daten und Fotos kontaktieren Sie uns bitte per E-Mail. Zusätzliche Informationen 2 x 60 Ampere Batterien aus dem Jahr 2015. Rumpf Mai 2018. Teakbrücke und Cockpit aus dem Jahr 2000. Sanitär- und Elektrosystem in gutem Zustand. Silberfichte auf Null gebracht und 2018 wieder hereingeholt (neu) Sartiame spiroidale Inox 2000. 49-Draht-Rigging in ausgezeichnetem Zustand - Spectra Lenkräder Mahagoni bompresso.
Español Velero vintage, construido en 1946 en el astillero Baglietto (Varazze), en 1996 llega al astillero Tecnomar en Fiumara grande en Fiumicino, donde está completamente restaurado. El kilo fue reemplazado totalmente junto con el reparto de popa, además, los obreros de la construcción liderados por el maestro de hacha Giorgio Rossi se encargaron de la renovación de algunos artilleros de acero, reemplazaron todos los tablones del trabajo vivo que afectaba a la sustitución de la quilla, el puente tek fue rehecho, los cielos de la cubierta interpusieron una capa de madera contrachapada marina cuidando la proporción de los listones del puente y asegurándose de que hubiera quedado con tan pocas articulaciones como sea posible en el Interior. Los interiores originales fueron restaurados incluyendo un fregadero de redone a mano de una losa de cobre, los sistemas de redona, y oculto tanto como sea posible con el fin de no tener un impacto "tecnológico" con el medio ambiente interno, también se instaló un refrigerador, también oculto. El eje original, fue abierto longitudinalmente y reconstruido en sus partes delanteras y traseras centrales, dotándolo de conductos para sistemas eléctricos y de radio, sus equipos, parcialmente faltantes, fue reconstruido sobre la base del ejemplo de otro árbol igual, encontrado en el ático de la YCI en Génova y en los viejos agujeros presentes en el propio árbol; el aparejo ha sido renovado. La hoja del timón con su eje ha sido reconstruida desde cero en la forma del timón original maltratado. Para obtener datos y fotos actualizados, póngase en contacto con nosotros por correo electrónico. Información adicional 2 pilas de 60 amperios de 2015. Casco Mayo 2018. Puente de teca y cabina desde 2000. Fontanería y sistema eléctrico en buen estado. El árbol de pícea de plata se puso a cero y se acojo en 2018 (como nuevo) Sartiame spiroidale Inox 2000. Aparejos de 49 hilos en excelentes condiciones - Ruedas de dirección Spectra Bompresso de caoba.
Россию Винтажный парусник, построенный в 1946 году на верфи Baglietto Shipyard (Varazze), в 1996 году прибывает на верфь Tecnomar в Фиумара Гранде в Фьюмичино, где он полностью восстановлен. Килограмм был заменен полностью вместе с афты литые, кроме того, строители во главе с топором мастер Джорджо Росси позаботился о ремонте некоторых стальных артиллеристов, заменили все доски живой работы, которые повлияли на замену киля, Тек мост был переделан, небо палубы вмешался слой морской фанеры заботиться о доле рейки моста и убедившись, что было несколько суставов, как это возможно Крытый. Оригинальные интерьеры были восстановлены в том числе ручной рекрасить раковину из медной плиты, переделанные системы, и скрытые как можно больше, чтобы не иметь "технологическое" воздействие с внутренней средой, холодильник был также установлен, также скрыты. Первоначальный вал, был открыт продольно и перестроен в его центральной передней и задней частей, оснастив его воздуховодами для электрических и радиосистем, его оборудование, частично отсутствует, был восстановлен на примере другого равного дерева, найденного на чердаке YCI в Генуе и на старых отверстиях, присутствующих на самом дереве; фальсификация была отремонтирована. Лезвие руля со своей оси было перестроено с нуля по форме потрепанного оригинального руля. Для получения данных и фотографий обращайтесь к нам по электронной почте. Дополнительная информация 2 х 60 ампер батареи с 2015 года. Халл май 2018 года. Тик мост и кабина с 2000 года. Сантехника и электрическая система в хорошем состоянии. Серебряная ель доведена до нуля и окупилась в 2018 году (как новая) Сартиам спиройдейл Инокс 2000. 49-проводная фальсификация налетела в отличном состоянии - Колеса рулевого управления Spectra Бомпрессо из красного дерева.Mehr anzeigen

description:
A Jeanneau symphony online auction. Anyone can easily bid until October 31, 2022 on the Bootveiling website.


Sailboat Jeanneau Symphonie from 1983 is the little brother of the Jeanneau Melody and rightly a Cruiser Racer. The Jeanneau is distinguished by its elegant, smart design with timeless lines. A very beautiful and well-maintained sailing yacht for the sporty sailor or to be used as an ideal holiday sailing yacht. Very seaworthy and spacious from a time when quality was still of paramount importance to the yard. The ship is stable, fast and very habitable with sufficient space (also under the helm). So plenty of possibilities.
Do you want a sportier Jeanneau that certainly sails fast with light? Then this is the boat that suits you.
Extra information

The engine block damper was replaced in June 2022 and the alternator in 2019. The 2 100A batteries were replaced in 2018, as was the water filter.
The Jeanneau was last out of the water in 2022 for maintenance and anti-fouling.
There is no anchor winch available. The mainsail has 20% wear and the genoa furler 20%.
The boat is registered.

name: 1981 Bianca Riviera1981 Bianca Riviera
description: Bianca Riviera Drawn by the legendary design office ?Sparkman and Stevens? is the ?Bianca Riviera? built by the Bianca shipyard in Rudkoebing. represents an early draft of a cruiser-racer that combines good sailing characteristics with roadworthiness. The large saloon (approx. 8 seats) in particular contributes significantly to this. In addition to the double berth in the foredeck, the Bianca Riviera has a dog berth aft, a large double bed in the saloon (table must be folded) and another berth on the portside bench seat. All bunks are about 2 m long. In the passage to the forecastle there is the toilet room, which can be separated by a door to the forecastle cabin and a folding door to the saloon and is therefore also suitable for changing. The galley on starboard is equipped with a sink, kerosene stove and a fridge. A cooler (12/220V) is also available. A chart table with sufficient storage space is built into the port side in the longitudinal direction. Thanks to the halyards that are redirected to the cockpit and the self-steering system, the boat can be sailed single-handedly and thanks to the auxiliary stay for the reefable working jib, it is also well equipped for bad weather. Because the Bianca Riviera has been fitted with a pre-balanced spade rudder (refurbished and lengthened in 2018) since around 1980, the boat is light and agile to sail. The steering wheel makes it possible to take comfortable positions to windward and leeward. The Bianca Riviera was regularly serviced and renewed and was always indoors in winter. Last winter, among other things, the engine and the sail drive (including cuff) were overhauled and 2 new 120 Ah AMG consumer batteries were installed. name: 1976 Comar Comet 7.701976 Comar Comet 7.70
description: Designed by Jean Marie Finot, the Comet 770 is an IOR class cruising boat built from 1972 to 1978 in 236 units by the Comar shipyard. A technique was used for the construction, innovative at the time, without floors: the fin of the keel was therefore bolted to a larger surface than the keel. The solution of arranging the anchor shaft at the foot of the mast is also original, to avoid having weight on the bow. It is a fast boat, easy to manoeuvre, with a light and precise rudder, low heel and low pitching movement. The absence of floors in the rest of the structure also made it possible to have a greater head height below deck, where there is a double cabin in the bow with a marine toilet, retractable kitchen and a saloon with a seat that converts to a double berth.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2012 M Boats FRESET 32 custom2012 M Boats FRESET 32 custom
description:
For sale is the custom Daysailer FRESET 32 from 2012 in excellent condition
Broker´s Comment:If you are looking for a unique single-hand Daysailer, thrilling performance and shallow draft look no further! FRESET is the ultimate Daysailer in the 10 m range. FRESET is a custom one-off project built for the legendary and  well  respect  yacht  collector  Jack  Setton.  Mr.  Setton  is  very  well  known  in  the  Superyacht  World previously  being  the  original  owner  of  among  others  the  194ft  expedition  superyacht  SENSES  and  60ft Daysailer  CIAO  GIANNI.  He  was  intimately involved  with  the  design  and  specification  of  FRESET  in cooperation with the well-known Naval Architect Germán Frers.  Builder´s Comment: FRESET it is a cat rigged shallow draft Daysailer optimized as a tender to suit a large Motoryacht and also fits inside a 40’container. She has single-hand capabilities and at the same time an ample cockpit able to carry several  guest  in  comfort  for  short  sailing  trips.  A  13  hp  engine  with  sail  drive  and  folding  propeller  will accelerate her up to nearly seven knots. The carbon self standing mast carries an efficient full batten square head mainsail. Thanks to her centerboard keel and twin rudder arrangement which draws only 80 cm she will be an ideal beach boat or lake cruiser.  
CENTRAL AGENT
Please don´t hesitate to contact us for any further questions or to arrage a viewing.
More detailed high-res pictures on request.
Your judel/vrolijk & co  - brokerage Team!Mehr anzeigen

name: 2013 Comar Comet 31 S2013 Comar Comet 31 S
description:
"Il Comet 31s è l’ultimo nato dei piccoli di Comar Yachts, con il Comet 2s e il Comet 26s, chiude la nuova gamma delle barche disegnate da Sergio Lupoli, che Massimo Guardigli ha voluto per incentivare la navigazione a vela e avvicinare anche chi, per la prima volta, vuole divertirsi con la propria barca in famiglia. In particolare questo Comet 31 è stato pensato per offrire il massimo del comfort e della manegevolezza ad una famiglia di quattro persone, con possibilità di 2 posti letto per gli ospiti. Di impostazione sportiva il Comet 31 pur essendo una barca contenuta nelle dimensioni è decisamente ampio negli interni e ben rifinito, in modo da rendere gradevole la permanenza a bordo anche in caso di piccole crociere. Il sistema di costruzione è tutto in doppia pelle laminata in fusione sottovuoto e postcurata a 70 gradi. L’intera struttura “ragno del fondo” viene laminato insieme allo scafo. Molto luminosa negli interni, con pareti chiare in texture, ampie finestrature e arredi semplici, il C31 ha un’altezza interna di circa 1,90 metri (meno solo nella cabina di prua) e una cabina di poppa molto ampia. Il pozzetto è notevole con panche lunghe tanto che le panche laterali sono un comodo prendisole. Il paramare è studiato per essere ergonomico in crociera e regata. Interessante la delfiniera, nata per consentire l’utilizzo del Gennaker, nasconde completamente l’ancora liberando completamente la prua."  OTTIME CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA. PER INFORMAZIONI: ABATE LUCA +39 340 86 12 069 Tagliando motore eseguito per la stagione  INTERNI 1 Cabina, 1 Bagno 2 posti lentto nel V di prua Dinette con 2 divani contrapposti e tavolo da pranzo al centro Piano di carteggio sul lato Sx all'ingresso mentre al lato Dx troviamo la cucina completa di 2 fuochi a gas e forno, frigorifero a pozzetto con motore sostituito nel 2020 e un lavello. Cabina a poppa lato Dx con letto matrimoniale separata Bagno completo con wc elettrico, doccia e lavello al lato Sx  STRUMENTAZIONE Bussola GPS Raymarine Ecoscandaglio Log Pilota automatico Raymarine Stazione vento Raymarine VHF Salpancora Elettrico Presa 220V da banchina Caricabatterie 2 Batterie (1x 80Ah + 1x120Ah) Prese interne 12v Prese interne 220v Altoparlanti Radio AM/FM Stereo Autoclave Predisposizione Boiler Impianto acque nere con Serbatoio Acque Nere 40 lt  ARMAMENTO Ancora Cuscineria Pozzetto Teak nelle panche laterali in pozzetto Oscuranti vetri Tendalino Spry hood Randa full batten Fiocco Gennaker 85,00 Code 0 su frullone 55 mq Attrezzatura Gennaker Avvolgi Fiocco Carrelli a sfera randa Harken Sail Bag  Vang rigido Doccia esterna  Scaletta da bagno Supporto motore fuoribordo 4 Winch Circuito terzaroli

English "The Comet 31s is the latest addition to the small of Comar Yachts, with the Comet 2s and the Comet 26s, closes the new range of boats designed by Sergio Lupoli, which Massimo Guardigli wanted to encourage sailing and also bring closer those who, for the first time, want to have fun with their boat in the family. In particular, this Comet 31 has been designed to offer maximum comfort and manageability to a family of four, with the possibility of 2 beds for guests. Of sporty setting, the Comet 31 despite being a boat contained in size is decidedly large in the interior and well finished, in order to make it pleasant to stay on board even in the case of small cruises. The construction system is all in double laminated leather in vacuum casting and post-cured at 70 degrees. The entire structure "bottom spider" is laminated together with the hull. Very bright in the interior, with light textured walls, large windows and simple furnishings, the C31 has an internal height of about 1.90 meters (less only in the bow cabin) and a very large aft cabin. The cockpit is remarkable with long benches so much so that the side benches are a comfortable sundeck. The paramare is designed to be ergonomic in cruising and racing. Interestingly, the dolphin, created to allow the use of the Gennaker, completely hides the anchor completely freeing the bow."  EXCELLENT GENERAL CONDITIONS, + AGENCY COMMISSIONS. Française « Le Comet 31s est le dernier ajout au petit de Comar Yachts, avec les Comet 2 et les Comet 26, ferme la nouvelle gamme de bateaux conçus par Sergio Lupoli, que Massimo Guardigli voulait encourager à la voile et aussi rapprocher ceux qui, pour la première fois, veulent s’amuser avec leur bateau dans la famille. En particulier, ce Comet 31 a été conçu pour offrir un maximum de confort et de facilité de gestion à une famille de quatre personnes, avec la possibilité de 2 lits pour les invités. De cadre sportif, le Comet 31 bien qu’il s’agisse d’un bateau de taille contenue est décidément grand à l’intérieur et bien fini, afin de le rendre agréable à rester à bord même dans le cas de petites croisières. Le système de construction est tout en cuir double laminé en coulée sous vide et post-durci à 70 degrés. Toute la structure « araignée de fond » est laminée avec la coque. Très lumineuse à l’intérieur, avec des murs texturés clairs, de grandes fenêtres et un mobilier simple, la C31 a une hauteur intérieure d’environ 1,90 mètre (moins seulement dans la cabine avant) et une très grande cabine arrière. Le cockpit est remarquable avec de longs bancs à tel point que les bancs latéraux sont une terrasse confortable. Le paramare est conçu pour être ergonomique en croisière et en course. Fait intéressant, le dauphin, créé pour permettre l’utilisation du Gennaker, cache complètement l’ancre libérant complètement la proue.  EXCELLENTES CONDITIONS GÉNÉRALES, + COMMISSIONS D’AGENCE. Deutsch "Die Comet 31s ist die neueste Ergänzung zu den kleinen Comar-Yachten, mit den Comet 2s und den Comet 26s, schließt die neue Reihe von Booten von Sergio Lupoli ab, die Massimo Guardigli zum Segeln ermutigen und auch diejenigen näher bringen wollte, die zum ersten Mal Spaß mit ihrem Boot in der Familie haben wollen. Insbesondere wurde dieser Comet 31 entwickelt, um einer vierköpfigen Familie maximalen Komfort und Handlichkeit zu bieten, mit der Möglichkeit von 2 Betten für Gäste. Von sportlicher Einstellung, ist die Comet 31, obwohl sie ein Boot ist, das in der Größe enthalten ist, im Innenraum ausgesprochen groß und gut verarbeitet, um es auch bei kleinen Kreuzfahrten angenehm zu machen, an Bord zu bleiben. Das Konstruktionssystem ist komplett aus doppelt laminiertem Leder im Vakuumguss und bei 70 Grad nachgehärtet. Die gesamte Struktur "Bottom Spider" ist zusammen mit dem Rumpf laminiert. Sehr hell im Innenraum, mit hell strukturierten Wänden, großen Fenstern und einfacher Einrichtung, hat der C31 eine Innenhöhe von ca. 1,90 Metern (weniger nur in der Bugkabine) und eine sehr große Achterkabine. Das Cockpit ist bemerkenswert mit langen Bänken, so sehr, dass die Seitenbänke ein bequemes Sonnendeck sind. Die Paramare ist ergonomisch im Cruisen und Rennsport konzipiert. Interessanterweise verbirgt der Delfin, der geschaffen wurde, um die Verwendung des Gennakers zu ermöglichen, den Anker vollständig, wodurch der Bogen vollständig befreit wird. "  AUSGEZEICHNETE RAHMENBEDINGUNGEN, + AGENTURPROVISIONEN. Español "El Comet 31s es la última incorporación a los pequeños de Comar Yachts, junto con los Comet 2 y los Comet 26s, cierra la nueva gama de barcos diseñados por Sergio Lupoli, que Massimo Guardigli ha querido fomentar la navegación y también acercar a aquellos que, por primera vez, quieren divertirse con su barco en familia. En concreto, este Comet 31 ha sido diseñado para ofrecer el máximo confort y manejabilidad a una familia de cuatro, con la posibilidad de 2 camas para invitados. De aspecto deportivo, el Comet 31 a pesar de ser un barco contenido en tamaño es decididamente grande en el interior y bien acabado, con el fin de que sea agradable permanecer a bordo incluso en el caso de cruceros pequeños. El sistema constructivo es todo en doble piel laminada en fundición al vacío y post-curado a 70 grados. Toda la estructura "araña de fondo" está laminada junto con el casco. Muy luminoso en el interior, con paredes de textura ligera, grandes ventanales y mobiliario sencillo, el C31 tiene una altura interna de unos 1,90 metros (menos solo en la cabina de proa) y una cabina de popa muy grande. La cabina es notable con bancos largos tanto que los bancos laterales son una terraza cómoda. El paramare está diseñado para ser ergonómico en cruceros y carreras. Curiosamente, el delfín, creado para permitir el uso del Gennaker, oculta completamente el ancla liberando completamente la proa".  EXCELENTES CONDICIONES GENERALES, + COMISIONES DE AGENCIA. Россию «Comet 31s является последним дополнением к небольшому из Comar Yachts, с Comet 2s и Comet 26s, закрывает новую линейку лодок, разработанных Серджио Луполи, которые Массимо Гвардильи хотели поощрять парусный спорт, а также сблизить тех, кто впервые хочет повеселиться со своей лодкой в семье. В частности, эта Comet 31 была разработана, чтобы предложить максимальный комфорт и управляемость семье из четырех человек, с возможностью 2 кроватей для гостей. Из спортивной обстановки Comet 31, несмотря на то, что является лодкой, содержащейся в размерах, определенно велика в интерьере и хорошо отделана, чтобы было приятно оставаться на борту даже в случае небольших круизов. Конструкция выполнена из двойной ламинированной кожи в вакуумном литье и после отверждения при 70 градусах. Вся конструкция «донного паука» ламинирована вместе с корпусом. Очень яркий в интерьере, со светлыми текстурированными стенами, большими окнами и простой мебелью, C31 имеет внутреннюю высоту около 1,90 метра (меньше только в носовой кабине) и очень большую кормовую кабину. Кокпит примечателен длинными скамейками настолько, что боковые скамейки являются удобной солнечной палубой. Парамаре спроектирован так, чтобы быть эргономичным в крейсерстве и гонках. Интересно, что дельфин, созданный для того, чтобы позволить использовать Геннакера, полностью скрывает якорь, полностью освобождая нос».  ОТЛИЧНЫЕ ОБЩИЕ УСЛОВИЯ, + АГЕНТСКИЕ КОМИССИИ. ДЛЯ ИНФОРМАЦИИ: АБАТЕ ЛУКА +39 340 86 12 069 Резка двигателя, выполненная по сезону  ИНТЕРЬЕРЫ 1 каюта, 1 ванная комната 2 места в носовой части V Столовая с 2 противоположными диванами и обеденным столом в центре Диаграмма с левой стороны у входа, в то время как с правой стороны мы находим кухню в комплекте с 2 газовыми конфорками и духовкой, холодильником в кабине с замененным в 2020 году двигателем и раковиной. name: 1998 Etap 32i1998 Etap 32i
description:
Nice and well maintained Etap 32i, ready to sail for a new owner.


This Etap 32i is well maintained and ready to sail for a new owner. The design of the Etap 32i is characterized by its good sailing characteristics, plenty of space on board and of course the double hull shell, which makes the ship unsinkable. Perhaps a more interesting aspect of Etap's construction method is that, thanks to the double shell, there is virtually no condensation on board. This provides a very pleasant and comfortable living environment on board, especially in the spring and autumn.
The decks are easily accessible and offer a good grip due to the anti-slip mats, which were newly painted in 2022. Another interesting fact is that the current owner also had the ship fitted in 2022 with a new set of sails consisting of a mainsail and a furling genoa. And for enthusiasts, there is also the original spinnaker on board.
The cockpit seats are equipped with teak and the standard EVS steering system has been replaced by a conventional tiller with autopilot. Incidentally, the EVS system is still in the possession of the owner and if you want it, you can place it back relatively easily. From the cockpit you have a good overview of the ship, the environment and the instruments which are neatly placed above the cabin entrance.
Inside the ship, you immediately notice how light and spacious the interior is. To port is a practical galley with the chart table opposite. Amidships two comfortable sofas and a table in the middle. Incidentally, in the photos the benches are covered with covers, underneath is the original Etap upholstery which, thanks to those covers, is in good condition.
In the forepeak is a double bed with the necessary storage space. In the stern is the second double cabin on the port side and on the starboard side is the wet cell. This Etap 32i has always been well maintained and is ready to sail for a new owner.
Interested? Please do not hesitate to contact us by phone: +31 (0) 168-820208 or email: info@wwy.nl
*All footage is from July 2022.

name: 2021 Latitude 46 Tofinou 9.72021 Latitude 46 Tofinou 9.7
description:
The Tofinou 9 is the result of the Latitude 46 team's desire to build on the classic heritage and quality of the shipyard by bringing in technological innovation and design. For this reason, the French shipyard has worked hand in hand with the world of industrial and automotive design to ensure that the ever-popular Tofinou family style continues. Its family look remains unchanged, but its lines have been modernised to make it more aggressive.
From a technical point of view, a more powerful, wider, but still transportable hull has been chosen, to experience more intense sensations downwind. With this new hull, the Latitute shipyard has completely redesigned the deck layout and appendages to improve life on board and ergonomics when manoeuvring TOM RIDER.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2020 TES Yacht 32 Dreamer2020 TES Yacht 32 Dreamer
description: The new yacht to order. It is a large yacht, almost 10m long, perfect for long voyages on both inland and marine waters (construction category B or C depending on the type of ballast). It has a very spacious interior that gives a sense of comfort and intimacy for 6-8 crew members. The yacht has a bow cabin and two stern cabins. In the central part of the yacht there is a spacious and comfortable mess hall along with a separate ergonomic kitchen equipped with all necessary amenities. The unit also has a sanitary cabin with shower and sink. The Dreamaera cockpit offers a contoured, comfortable seat for the helmsman and comfortable seats for the crew. It is designed for sailors, which ensures maximum ergonomics and ease of use. The device is equipped with a long bokszpryt gangway, thanks to which the entrance to the port is extremely easy and convenient, even through the beak. Perfectly behaves both under sail and on the engine. It has an impressive straightening moment that makes Tes 32 Dreamer the most stable and safest Polish sailing yachts. Due to the large interior space of the yacht and its comfort while sailing, it is undeniable to talk about the family character of this craft. The unit has been attracted to sailors and charter companies for many years! Any item we build to order please contact us for details.Show more

name: 2001 Etap 32s2001 Etap 32s
description:
Nice unsinkable sailboat for a weekend away or a holiday. This Etap 32s guarantees a lot of water sports fun.


The Etap 32S is a fun, smooth sailing yacht that an active couple or young family can enjoy. She is equipped with many options such as electric anchor winch and a revised sail drive with new folding propeller. The fresh, modern interior appeals to everyone with its round shapes and playful Etap character. A beautiful yacht on which 4 people can spend a great holiday or weekend within European waters, guaranteeing lots of sailing fun! The current owner has renewed many parts such as the gas installation, saildrive overhaul, new 3-blade folding propeller, new refrigerator, new furling genoa and new Zippack/lazy bags.

description:
1951 GERMAN STEEL BOAT 32,
XBOAT ref 5170. One of a kind - Steel Cruiser: a traditional long keel sailboat. Apparently built around 1950 for a wealthy Dutch pharmacist. in recent years in a shed to be restored... then went last year 2020 from the town of Damp in the East Sea of ​​Germany over the rough seas of the North Sea and the Islemeer to the south coast of England and back to France without ease and can call herself and a proven blue water cruiser.-2 solar panels (including a fairly powerful one from 2020)-3 powerful batteries with split system. (All batteries are from 2020 and have been charged over the winter month)-Fridge (can be gas or electric powered)-2 stove burners (alcohol - very safe!!! for no fumes from a gas system) gas !!)-Raymarine Auto Pilot ST400+ (tiller)- Low-end chart plotter-Jabsco toilet from 2020- Sprayhood from 2019 -12v- TV and Fans and other Boat- Solid and very useful stainless steel davits Powered by a powerful 56 hp four cylinder VW inboard diesel engine, which was fitted new in 2015 and has a few hours on it.- It has a furled headsail and a furled mainsail (everything is brought back to the cockpit, not need to move!)-Life raft (good but needs a new overhaul)-Fuel tank consists of a stainless steel tank (refitted in 2016) containing approx. 100 litres.Comes with a good quality perfect sized Talamex Dinghy MUIR electric windlassThe boat needs painting and hull cleaning above water to restore it to perfect shape.The yacht is complete with almost everything you need to go cruising. name: 1976 Contest Yachts 31ht1976 Contest Yachts 31ht
description:
Contest 31 HT yacht brought to Poland in 2014. The previous owner had owned the yacht since 1989, the yacht was never chartered. After being brought to Poland, a general inspection was performed (no osmosis centers), the hull was ground in the yacht shipyard and a new anti-osmotic system was installed as a preventive measure. In 2017, a new plotter, echo sounder, log, anemometer (all Raymarine devices) were installed, and all permanent rigging was replaced with new ones. Sails in very good condition, Rolfok and Rolgrot. The engine is regularly serviced in very good condition, the water pump was replaced last year. The yacht has a decent refrigerator installed (not a refrigerator) with a compressor at the stern, thanks to which you can not hear its work inside. Gas heating running very quietly. The yacht is very fast and very fast, I am selling it due to the lack of time for sailing.

Contest 31 HT Yacht, die 2014 nach Polen gebracht wurde. Der Vorbesitzer hatte die Yacht seit 1989 besessen, die Yacht wurde nie gechartert. Nach Überführung nach Polen wurde eine Generalinspektion durchgeführt (keine Osmosezentren), der Rumpf in der Yachtwerft geschliffen und vorsorglich eine neue Antiosmoseanlage eingebaut. Im Jahr 2017 wurden ein neuer Plotter, ein Echolot, ein Logbuch und ein Anemometer (alles Raymarine-Geräte) installiert, und die gesamte permanente Takelage wurde durch neue ersetzt. Segel in sehr gutem Zustand, Rolfok und Rolgrot. Der Motor wird regelmäßig gewartet und ist in sehr gutem Zustand, die Wasserpumpe wurde letztes Jahr ersetzt. Die Yacht hat einen anständigen Kühlschrank (kein Kühlschrank) mit einem Kompressor am Heck, dank dessen Sie den Betrieb im Inneren nicht hören können. Gasheizung läuft sehr leise. Die Yacht ist sehr schnell und sehr schnell, ich verkaufe sie wegen Zeitmangel zum Segeln.

name: 1998 Seaquest SJ 3201998 Seaquest SJ 320
description:
Seaquest SJ 320, fully ready to sail for a new owner!


Offered, beautiful Seaquest SJ320 from 1998. A great mix between amazing sailing characteristics and comfort. On board you will find three cabins, a toilet room, chart table and galley. This ship has been sailing in the Netherlands since 2003 and is largely only used for comfortable and fast tour sailing.
The SJ320 is characterized by a very stiff hull with a long waterline and very good sailing characteristics and is very fast. The ship has an excellent overall performance, both in light and heavy weather. The ship is easy to keep in the groove, sails close to the wind and has a manageable sail plan without backstays.
This ship has been on shore every winter with the current owner (in the past 15 years). In the spring of 2022, the old layers of paint were stripped down to the gelcoat and completely rebuilt. (5x epoxy layer / 2x hard antifouling). The three valves have also been replaced.
Are you looking for a ready to sail, fast, comfortable and sporty ship? Do not hesitate and contact White Whale WIllemstad, +31 (0) 168 820 208 / info@WWY.nl   This ship can be viewed by appointment in Sint Annaland (NL).

Do you also want to sell your boat? White Whale Yachtbrokers has 11 offices in Europe. We simply sell your boat from your own berth, for a low commission. Free advertising on the most relevant and leading websites including Yachtworld.com. No start-up costs, always no-cure-no-pay!! Feel free to ask us for a proposal for your own yacht.

name: 2017 C&C mega 30 gruntowna przebudowa2017 C&C mega 30 gruntowna przebudowa
description: Mega yacht after renovation, opportunity Mega 30 after thorough reconstruction. The hull, ballast and mast come from the Mega 30 yacht imported from the Netherlands, produced by the American C&C shipyard. The yacht has a unique lifting keel solution. Thanks to it, there is the possibility of both safe sailing, as on an irreversible ballast yacht, and entering shallow bays as in a dagger boat. A combination of safety in sea swimming, sightseeing and mooring in charming bays and corners inaccessible to other people, unique on the Polish market. Originally, the Mega 30 yacht was the American equivalent of the Micro class in Europe, i.e. it could be pulled out of the water with a three-axle trailer and pulled along the way, only the yacht size is typically American, i.e. large. The dimensions of the boat are 2.75 meters in width, 9.5 meters in length, the draft with the keel lowered is approximately 1.6 meters, the draft with the keel raised is approximately 0.75 meters. As you can see from the above dimensions, the boat is large, spacious, very comfortable to live in, and at the same time gives great opportunities for sailing in sea and inland waters, and with a raised keel it can enter unique, unknown places. Due to the great solution with the raised keel, we decided (based on the hull and ballast) to carry out a thorough reconstruction of the yacht, which included a new bottom grate, new bulkheads and a new deck on a spacer. Everything, including the bulkheads, is made of laminate. Note - the yacht does not have a single laminated wooden element. Therefore, the typical scourge of yacht interiors, i.e. the smell of rotting wood, does not apply to this boat. Full photographic documentation of the conversion is available for inspection and transfer to the buyer. Indeed, the interior is completely odor-free, and any interior hull surfaces can be safely wet-wiped clean with sanitizing and nice-smelling chemicals. The yacht does not have closed spaces that are not accessible (e.g. lining and hull), so there is nowhere to infest the musty and you can keep it clean and fresh for many years. The yacht also does not have permanently glued textile elements, such as carpets, which are always a source of unpleasant odors on other yachts. The ability to keep the interior fresh and smell nice for many years is unique on the Polish yacht market and this type of solution was modeled on French yachts such as Pogo 30. The yacht is equipped with a Volvo - Penta inboard engine. During the reconstruction of the Jach, the engine underwent a general overhaul at the Atom Marine company from Gdańsk. The ballast is lifted electrically, using an electric motor driven planetary gear. The ballast lifting drive is the original American, also completely renovated during the reconstruction. In the event of a power cut, the ballast is lifted by a crank. Works fine. The deck equipment was purchased entirely new for rebuilding, all Selden blocks and cleats, Lewmar capstans, stainless steel from Kulig (baskets, rails). Original mast and boom, new rigging, new sails, made by Vector Sails based on original sails used in the pattern. In addition to the boats made by Vector Sails lazyjack with a cover for the mainsail, a roller seal with a UV belt. The yacht is equipped with a 2-meter mainsail rail, which allows very comfortable sailing and effective mainsail trimming at the same time. In addition, there are two lockers in the cockpit, including one with a tourist gas cylinder for the stove. The mast The yacht is folded backwards in the cheeks and the yacht has a transom-mounted mast support. Due to the large height of the mast, this was only done on land. The bow deck in the form of a "sundeck", ie flat in shape, allows you to sunbathe or have a good time in the evening. Spacious, comfortable cockpit, equipped with a removable table (the mainsail deck is moved on the rail towards one of the railings, then the boom does not interfere, and a table is mounted in the yacht's axis, the fixing of which is located at the mainsail rail). The wood on board is used to a very limited extent. All exterior wood is Irokko impregnated with Owatrol marine oil. Inside, the yacht is equipped with a water system including a stainless steel washing water tank and a water pump. Water is supplied to the sink in the kitchen and to the bathroom with a shower. Water outlets from the kitchen sink and bathroom washbasin are located on the brass side passages, each equipped with a ball valve (as on sea-going yachts). The installation of a sea toilet was abandoned in favor of a much more practical chemical toilet. The electrical installation consists of two separate circuits. One circuit is to start the Volvo - Penta engine, and the other circuit is for the pumps, lighting, refrigerator outlet, and radio. The kitchen is equipped with a place for a compressor refrigerator. Unfortunately, while sailing at sea with a large inclination, the refrigerator broke down and you need to buy another one. The yacht has a gas cooker in the kitchen, powered by a tourist cylinder. The sleeping places are divided into three zones. A triangular bow berth for two people, a large aft berth under the cockpit for another two people, one full berth in the living room and one short seat that can be a berth for a child. As you can see, the boat has a lot of places to spend the night, which allows you to spend a long vacation in comfortable conditions and beautiful places. Following the example of French yachts, the yacht was equipped with a technical room located behind the bathroom. In this room, in addition to the diesel fuel tank, there is a place for a Webasto, a transformer for charging batteries from the shore. In addition, there is a large number of things necessary on the boat, such as mooring lines, cables, water hose, folding bike, cockpit table, spare sails, bucket, mop, etc. This allows you to keep order and rest space during your vacation on the yacht. Inside the cabin is a full standing height (188 cm). The inside of the cabin is very bright thanks to the large windows on the sides and the front of the cabin. The interior is very spacious and functional, it includes lockers and wardrobes for clothes, towels, shoes, luggage, etc. The yacht also has a huge storage space under the bunks. The body is permanently connected to the hull, made of laminate, the furniture is made of birch plywood, varnished with two-component sea varnish. The yacht was adapted to the installation of warm air heating (Webasto), but due to the overnight stay only in ports, electric heaters were used, connected to the 230 V socket of the Yacht's installation. Very nice boat - harmonious shapes combined with tasteful colors. Classic, fashionable gray deck combined with textiles in sandy colors. The interiors are transparent, bright, in a modern style modeled on the French Pogo 30. The boat, despite its considerable size, is easy to transport. This is due to the ballast being lifted. Thanks to it, it is possible to easily transport the boat, because the boat, placed on a large trailer or a truck box, fits in a vertical size of 4 meters. Thus, it is a ballast yacht that can not only be used in sea waters but also taken to the lake. In addition, the retraction of the keel also allows the Yacht to drive into the hangar. The ballast is also easy to disassemble, e.g. to drive a boat into a hangar, as the entire keel is unscrewed from the lifting mechanism. Reassembling the ballast is also easy. The mattresses were removed during wintering. We plan to take pictures of mattresses (they are red) after vacuuming the interior in the near future. Currently, the yacht stands ashore on a port trailer. To sum up a great boat and a great camper van on the water Mehr anzeigen

name: 1934 Marker Rondbouw MK751934 Marker Rondbouw MK75
description:
Historic Marker Roundhouse from 1934, built by Van Goor in Monnikendam


The Markerrondbouw is a real classic, only 34 of these ships were built between 1934 and 1947. In 1931, the Boatswain family on Marken  stood at the cradle of the development of a new type of vessel for fishing: the MarkerRoundbouw. Despite the closure of the Zuiderzee by the Afsluitdijk, the Markers were not discouraged by this, defied the closure and continued fishing. This ship was riveted of iron, 10 meters long and 3.4 meters wide, had a full, high head and was built round like a barge. The first Marker round building came into service in 1934 as MK75, this ship did not yet have an engine, it was only installed 12 years later when the ship was sold to Urk. At the moment, the Netherlands still has 7 MarkerRound buildings that are original or restored.

Sailing material: dacron and cotton

name: 2008 Seaquest Yachts 32 - SJ3202008 Seaquest Yachts 32 - SJ320
description:
Very fresh cruiser/racer from the first owner. Perfect for ORC/IRC competitions as well as fun weekends and holidays on the water.


Seaquest 32 "Lucifer": Beautiful cruiser/racer from the first owner ready for the upcoming (competition) sailing season. To this day, the yacht is provided with all the necessary maintenance and is in top condition in Scheveningen.
This sailing yacht is plug and play for both cruising and (ORC/IRC) competitions due to the correct deck layout, sailing wardrobe and the necessary luxury on board. The praising article below from Sailing magazine gives a good impression of the ship.
The Lucifer has always been very well maintained and improved by its passionate, competitive sailing owners and equipped with all the necessities a sailor could wish for:

New saildrive seal + regular service (08-2022)
John keel stepped mast + (2018) rod rigging
Extensive Quantum/North-Sails sailing wardrobe
Nexus NX2 race computer system + 2x mast/2x cockpit displays and steerpilot.
Garmen GND 10 wind transducer (2015) AIS and splitter (Watch Eye, 2017)
Raymarine autopilot SPX5 (2017) and drive unit (2021)
VHF NX2000 with DSC and Watch Eye AIS/splitter
4x Harken 40 self tailing winches
Harken/Spinlock deck gear
JEFA rudder 2011
Tuffluff arrow forestay system 2019

With enough interior space and comfort, the Lucifer also lacks for a weekend away or holiday. Equipped with 6 fixed beds, simple galley with refrigerator, separate toilet and good finish, a nice place to stay.
Sailing magazine:
"The SeaQuest 32 seems to us to be a promise for the competition courses. The construction, the standing and running rigging and the deck equipment are of excellent quality. The boat runs well. High and fast, especially in the light weather that we encountered during the sea trial. the figures, we are convinced that the boat also performs well in stronger winds.
Everything that has to do with boating is good for this Seaquest. The heavy weights are in the right place. The plane is solidly reinforced and the construction of the keel on the plane seems solid. The ventilation and the construction of, for example, the stanchions are also good."
In short, are you looking for a real competitive sailor with enough comfort that you can start immediately? Please contact White Whale Yachtbrokers Willemstad: oscar@wwy.nl or call +31631901231

name: 1987 Jouet 9401987 Jouet 940
description:
The Jouet 940 is a comfortable deck saloon cruising yacht with an interior steering position.  With a fully furling rig this is an easy boat to sail shorthanded and the layout below offers up to six berths, with two double sleeping cabins separate from the main accommodation.  The shallow draft twin keels make the boat ideal for exploring the shallow water of the East Coast and beyond.  This good example has been much updated with new standing and running rigging, recent sails, new batteries and charger and much else besides and comes complete with a dinghy.  She's ready to go!
Viewing by appointment through our Suffolk Office 01473 659 681.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1986 Moody 31 MKII twin keel1986 Moody 31 MKII twin keel
description:
The Moody 31 MKII is fast becoming a classic family cruising yacht thanks to its comfortable accommodation, good all-round performance, and a sugar scoop stern. 'Buzz' is a sought-after twin keel version, presented in good condition for her age with a good inventory including diesel heating, fridge, hot water, recent standing rigging, and an upgraded canvas pack with bimini and full cockpit enclosure. Early viewing is highly recommended as we expect demand to be very high!
Viewing by appointment only through our Essex office (01621) 785600.Mehr anzeigen

description:
The Vindo 40 is a long keeled offshore cruiser with elegant lines and sea kindly performance.  The GRP hull ensures easy maintenance whilst the varnished Mahogany superstructure and beautifully crafted interior give the joy and ambience of a wooden vessel.  This excellent example has been in the same ownership for 25 years and has obviously been carefully used and well maintained.  Now only for sale due to the owner's advancing years, Varana is seeking a new custodian for the next quarter century and beyond.

name: 1978 Vindo 401978 Vindo 40
description: Equipment & accessories Cooker, gas stove, oven, cool box, compass, GPS, self-steering system, VHF radio, plotter, depth gauge, speedometer, full tarpaulin, sprayhood, shore power, battery, battery charger, navigation lights, anchor, bilge pump, teak cockpit, teak deck , Fire extinguisher, heating, cockpit table, underwater paint, For sale is this well-kept, untouched Vindö 40 - a rock-solid long-keel ocean cruiser built in Sweden in 1978. Our previous owner had owned this ship since 1985 and, as a trained ship's carpenter, was very familiar with the maintenance, which explains the good condition and prompted us to buy it in 2018. Before that, as far as is known, there was only one other owner. This beautiful Vindö 40 has a GRP hull with cast lead ballast. The deck is also made of GRP in sandwich construction, finished with teak and has mahogany superstructures. All of the wood on this ship is in extremely neat condition. The cockpit wood was completely renewed in 2004 (6mm teak), the curve at the front has also been newly glued with 2.6 mm mahogany veneer. The wood was painted with Epifanes every year after it was stripped 2 years ago. The cabin offers a generous amount of space and with a headroom of approx. 1.85 meters. There are sleeping places for a maximum of 6 people. A fixed double bed is located in the bow, 2 more sleeping places are obtained by converting the seating area, another sleeping place is located opposite the seating area as a pullman berth and there is also an "underfloor berth" for one person behind the navigation corner, making the boat also particularly suitable for families. There is also a spacious toilet room with a washbasin. There is also a well-equipped pantry in the cabin with a gas stove, electric cool box and sink. The cabin is heated by a Wallas kerosene heater and invites you to linger even on cooler days. The heating works perfectly and the lady can be heated in the classic way. A power-connected 220V fan heater especially for boats is also included. Of particular note is the Solé Diesel "Mini 29" engine, which was installed by a specialist company in September 2010 and has been running for 1300 operating hours since then. All maintenance work on the engine was carried out by a specialist company, with us in winter storage also with complete maintenance, even though we drove it too little. Also: Sprayhood from 2017, as well as the new furling genoa - also from 2017. A complete cake stand is available. Rig and sails: -furling genoa 27.6m² -mainsail 20m² from 2006 -spinnaker approx. 65m² -furling jib 20 m² from 2016 stainless steel cable 19 wire. All turnbuckles are rustproof and from Selden. The spinnaker equipment consists of the spinnaker boom (aluminium), 2 sheet winches, spinnaker halyard, downhaul, lift, 2 sheets and 2 blocks. In the penultimate winter storage she got new antifouling (with Dutch registration), the hull was polished and everything was checked again. Next up would be the teak deck screws. The deck itself is good, but some of the nuppies are coming off. But that's just hard work in the end. A modern DVD radio with a larger screen has recently been installed. Thanks to the autopilot and furling jib, it is pretty much one-handed. We are selling it because there is simply not enough time, there are young people and the care of the wood is simply there and necessary. But if you do it well, you have a very pretty, venerable lady of staff with whom you can explore the world's oceans. She is currently in the water. With her draft of 1.50m, she is ideal for the IJsselmeer, Wadden Sea and the big wide world.Show more

name: 1986 Hallberg-Rassy 312 -VERKAUFT-1986 Hallberg-Rassy 312 -VERKAUFT-
description: Proven Hallberg-Rassy 312 in original condition and practical layout: watertight and gas-tight separate storage space for anchor, lines and gas bottle accessible through a hatch on deck and with drain overboard. Forepeak with two comfortable berths. Length 2.0 m with filler between the berths results in a width of 80 cm at shoulder height. Storage space under the bunks accessible through sliding shutters. The outer skin is covered with a mahogany weaving. Compartments running the length of the bunks. Salon with corner sofa, length 2.0 m, on starboard and normal sofa on port. By folding up the backrests, the entire space can be used as a bed. There are cupboards and a bookshelf above, and storage space behind the backrests under the sofas. Between the sofas there is a 100x67 cm table. The table top can be folded in on both sides. In the middle of the table is a bottle compartment. The party is equipped with a semi-gimballed gas stove with oven, pot holder, ignition safety device and safety shut-off valve. The work surface is covered with patterned Resopal. Sufficient storage space for pots, plates, cutlery, etc. with holder and a fixed place for the trash can. The 120 l water tank is under the floor. The chart table is designed with drawers and storage compartments, above which there are mounting options for instruments or a dog berth with a chart table. The bilge can be reached with little effort and used as storage space. Upholstery thickness 10cm and covered with high-quality fabric. Curtains throughout the boat. Floor teak, headroom 1.85 cm Equipment: 2x sheet winches Lewmar ST40, 2x spi winches Lewmar ST16, 2x halyard winches Lewmar 8, cam cleats, 2x cranks with lock, 4x 30 cm mooring cleats, bow and pushpit made of stainless steel, rubbing strip with brass rail molded into the hull 14x3mm, sea railing with double lines and 4 pairs of conical supports in stainless steel, height 610mm. Tempered glass windshield in light alloy frame protects the front part of the cockpit. Center disc to open. Spray hood made of synthetic material and stable aluminum tubes. 6 windows in anodized aluminum and 10 mm plexiglass. Interior made of satin-finished Khaya mahogany, three-burner gas stove, gimballed with pan holder, double sink, cool box with Engel cooling unit, fresh water tank with foot pumps, washbasin in the bathroom, seawater pump toilet, Wallas warm-air heating. Nautical and technical equipment: Silva 1000 steering compass, Silva 3200 log and depth sounder, Silva 4000 anemometer. Autopilot Autohelm 200 M, anchor ball and cone. Sails: Main, jib, storm jib, blister and spinaler. Electrical system: 2 batteries 60Ah, navigation lights, headlights. Engine: Volvo Penta 2003. Safety equipment: radar reflector, life ring, 3 life jackets, seat belt, fire extinguisher Accessories: bow anchor, stern anchor with belt reel, mooring lines, boat hook, 4 fenders, 4 mooring lines, Verklickre, Zesinge, bathing ladder, Bosun's chair, sail tarpaulin. Renewal in recent years: 2016 - batteries, 2014 - mainsail - material: Contender 7.52 oz, 2013 - sleeve for sail drive and propeller shaft with clamping ring. Arrange a viewing appointment, we look forward to your visit! - The sale takes place in the mediation order -Show more

It is currently in a Coruna on the dry and can be visited there. From our point of view, A Coruna is the perfect starting port for the Atlantic round or for sailing into the Mediterranean! name: 1977 Hallberg-Rassy Monsun 311977 Hallberg-Rassy Monsun 31
description: Original Hallberg Rassy 31 Monsoon with bowsprit. The Monsun is Hallberg-Rassy's most successful sailing boat to date. It was built a total of 904 times between 1974 and 1982. It is one of the most stable long-haul ships ever built. We give up sailing for reasons of age. The care and optimization of our Monsun was carried out continuously by the boat builder, who would also be willing to continue the care if the Varuna stayed on the Baltic Sea. Our Monsun "Varuna" is unique with the Hallberg Rassy shipyard's laminated bowsprit and thus a second foredeck, which has resulted in a large genoa and thus a sail area of ​​50m² instead of the usual 39m². Here are the data of our Monsun 31, the Varuna: - Hallberg Rassy Monsun, built in 1977, building no. 470 - sail area 50m² - Yanmar 3HM3 5F with 23.8kW, 33HP, diesel, built in 1997, approx. 800 hours - autopilot under engine - New 80l diesel tank 2017 - 120l water tank - bow thruster renewed in 2015 - radio equipment: advan Sea, call sign DC 7183, power 60 w - sailtainer in the boom - jib and genoa new as furling devices, each with sewn-in UV protection in green - spinnaker boom - electric anchor winch 2020 - All sailing maneuvers (set, reef, downhaul) can be carried out from the cockpit - LÜA 9.36 m, with bowsprit approx. 10.36 m and with bathing platform approx. 11.25 m - Headroom 1.82 m - Sprayhood new 2017 - Cake booth 2019 , 2 person sleeping place in the fully designed cockpit - Max. 6 sleeping places in the cabin - Winter tarpaulin with ventilation 2018 - Optimized battery system - TV, radio - Toilet new 2020 - LED for complete lighting - Spirit cooker, no gas - Cool box with cooling unit - Holy berth nhafen, season 2022 paid - winter berth with own Bock in Wendtorf All information to the best of our knowledge and belief.Show more

name: 1979 gd boote dauel (d) kielschwert1979 gd boote dauel (d) kielschwert
description: Our keel sword from Dauelsberg in Bremen is a classic and, with its masterfully crafted wooden structure, is a real eye-catcher in every port. In fact, the hull is made of GRP, which greatly facilitates maintenance. First watering was in 1989 after completion of construction and expansion. The yacht is built for the Wadden Sea. Two small keels on the side of the keel box ensure your own safe standing when falling dry. With approx. 4t of lead under the hull and its solid construction, the yacht also cuts a fine figure on the rough open sea. A double forestay is available for the outer areas. In the inland area you benefit from the shallow draft. The additional 0.95m centerboard enable good sailing characteristics. Due to the flat structure, the boat elegantly ranks among the cruisers. The approx. 9t total weight cannot be guessed at. Mahogany heartwood was used for the construction and expansion. The deck is made of teak. The deck fittings are made of bronze. Mainsail and boom tarpaulin are from 2021, Genoa3 and headsail hose from 2020, sprayhood from 2019. We had the new cockpit tarpaulin made as a robust awning. It therefore also serves as protection in the rain. The boat is in very good condition. The annual maintenance was carried out under the guidance of a boat builder. Hall parking space in Neustadt-Glewe and the harbor trailer can be taken over. The winter camp can be reached by water from the Lake District, the Baltic Sea and the North Sea. A berth in the city harbor of Schwerin can be brokered.Show more

name: 2005 Bicker Biga 2922005 Bicker Biga 292
description: In our offer you will find a beautiful BIGA 292 white-blue with a 4cm thick continuous decorative stripe. The deck itself is made of teak and has always been maintained and embedded. The boat is in top condition and, including the engine, is serviced annually in the specialist workshop. In the winter months it is covered with a stable winter tarpaulin on a pedestal in the harbour. Our Biga has few operating hours and offers a wide range of accessories and special equipment. She was sailed on Lake Constance, but she is also seaworthy. Regarding ship equipment: Our BIGA 292 was built for us in 2005. The ship can be controlled centrally from the stern area. In addition to the self-tailing winches, an electric anchor winch is installed in the anchor locker. The mainsail is easily rolled up in the mast, and a furling jib makes it easier to operate the sails. Due to the special wind conditions on Lake Constance, a higher mast was installed during construction, so sailing is also possible when there is little wind. Furthermore, the boat has an 18 hp inboard engine (Volvo Penta MD2020) and a second supply battery. An autopilot was later retrofitted for easy control, which also makes sailing with 1 person possible. In addition to the seating in the rear, a stable fold-out table can be mounted. The upholstery for this area is covered with a light fabric/leather and was custom-made to fit perfectly. A beautiful dark blue spreyhood completes the seating area. A bathing platform with a ladder is available for bathing pleasure. In addition to the already mentioned winter tarpaulin, a new lighter summer tarpaulin with which the entire ship can be covered and a smaller summer tarpaulin are available. Below deck is a dining area with kitchenette, which can be converted to sleep. There is another sleeping space in the bow. The wet room is equipped with a toilet. A total of 5 people have a place to sleep. Our Biga can be viewed from mid-April in the BMK Hafen in Langenargen.Show more

name: 1978 Custom Craglietto TS Chance 291978 Custom Craglietto TS Chance 29
description:
Project boat The first Chance 29 was commissioned in 1975 to participate in the Hal Ton Cup held in Michigan (USA) and gave excellent proof of itself there. Over the years the sail plan and the excavation have been slightly revised while maintaining the element of lead and antimony as a building material. The hull has a masthead rig and is made of cross-laminated mahogany while the deck and deckhouse are in marine plywood. The interiors are welcoming in their simplicity and despite being a boat born for regattas, she lends itself to navigation and travel.

The hull has an armament at the head of the mast and is made of crossed mahogany lamellar while the deckhouse and deckhouse are made of marine plywood. The interiors are welcoming in their simplicity and despite being a boat born for regattas it lends itself to navigation and travel.

name: 1991 Beneteau First 3101991 Beneteau First 310
description:
Nice First 310, with fantastic sailing characteristics, compact in dimensions but comfortable.


Super nice Beneteau First 310! Like every Beneteau First, the 310 has above-average sailing characteristics and manages to find the perfect balance between sporty and comfort. Sporty thanks to the tiller steering and the many trim options and comfort thanks to the two cabins, compact but complete galley (with a new refrigerator in 2020), comfortable sofas in the cabin, the newly installed hot air heating in 2020 and separate toilet facility.
The cockpit is spacious and offers enough space for all passengers. In addition, the same spacious cockpit offers a lot of freedom of movement for the ambitious sailor who wants to get everything out of the ship. The deck fittings are logically placed and the gangways offer good space to move around the deck. Incidentally, another interesting detail of this First in particular, is the newly installed diesel engine in 2014 so that you will not have to worry about it for many years to come.
In short, this Beneteau First 310 sails like the fire brigade, is nicely fully equipped and offers you many years of sailing pleasure. She does need a little love, mainly in the form of a good cleaning inside and out. Interested? Be sure to contact White Whale Willemstad via tel.: 0168-820208 or email: info@wwy.nl to make an appointment for a viewing. She is currently still ashore in Herkingen on the Grevelingenmeer.

name: 1978 Fairways Marine northeaster/ fisher 301978 Fairways Marine northeaster/ fisher 30
description: Probably the most beautiful Northeaster 30 (Fisher/Fairways) is for sale after an extensive refit in recent years, unfortunately due to lack of time. She was built in 1978, has a length of 9.14 m, a width of 3.14 m and a draft of 1.35 m. The Northeaster/Fisher 30 is particularly characterized by 2 cabins with a total of 6 berths. She has been modernized/restored from the ground up and has received some practical modifications: - the pulpit has been divided and the pushpit to the bathing ladder has folding hinges, this allows for more comfortable boarding and disembarking. - the seating area in the helm station has been enlarged - all upholstery has been reupholstered - all plastic guying (ceilings/walls) have been renewed or recoated - all the wood in the interior has been overhauled and repainted - the anchor winch has been overhauled and repainted - many useful and easy-care stainless steel parts processed - new self-abrasive antifouling - all outer wooden parts were provided with an open-pore paint, the seal no longer flaking off and allows for easy reworking if necessary - easy-care flexi teak deck outside and inside - all cupboards, storage compartments and the compl. Bilges have been recoated and painted -new refrigerator -new electric toilet -Abus safety system water, fire, CO2 -the 50hp VW diesel engine has received a new timing belt, water pump and oil change -3 new batteries have been installed -portholes, cleats etc. have been new chromed The motor glider has 3 heating systems; Diesel oven, Webasto parking heater and a warm air blower. 2 water tanks á 50L made of VA, a gas system with 2-burner stove. Outside, the Northeaster has a stainless steel railing, is equipped with an inland sea mast and 2 aluminum masts for sailing. She has brown new sails and a furling system. Technically it is equipped with a GPS, echo sounder, radar, intercom, SAT receiver, approved radio (registered with the Federal Network Agency). The Northeaster 30 is registered in the seagoing ship register in Bremen. It is located in Hanover/Mittellandkanal and can be viewed there. It is also possible to take over the berth With putt and pan, from maritime crockery, glasses, pots etc. to the complete set of tools, spare parts set, binoculars, signaling equipment, there are actually only a few personal things missing from their new owner Board, then the journey can begin. description:
A Jeanneau Folie douce in the online auction. Everyone can bid until 2022-10-31


The Folie Douce (the 1st series construction 9 meters from Jeanneau) is an easy to sail yacht with excellent sailing characteristics. It has a Victoire style deck layout, slightly raised mast deck and superstructure behind the mast. Due to the windscreen and side windows in the superstructure, there is a lot of light and visibility inside. With the draft of 1.5 m, inland waterways are also easily navigable. The boat has a pleasantly spacious cabin, which also makes it suitable for a sailing trip with several people.

name: 1967 Alpa 91967 Alpa 9
description:
The boat is the number 3 of 1967 of the alpa shipyards, it was renovated in 2008 Completely emptied internally, leaving only the vertical wooden structures of the bathroom which are immovable. The hull was sanded internally and repainted with primer and gray paint; all the wood was brought to virgin and 7 coats of opaque coppale (silk) were given, then renewed every year in one coat. Disassembled all the various furniture (kitchen, dinette beds) and here too the wood brought to virgin and re-applied as above. Electric system completely redone with line for 12 v and 220 v; all starting from the internal squares where the threads are all numbered. The external watertight socket was installed in the cockpit to connect the power supply of the 220 line to the ground. The information presented here is generic and first contact. name: 1978 Scandinavia COMFORT 301978 Scandinavia COMFORT 30
description:
Comfort 30 is an excellent yacht: safe and brave, which, despite its small size, can handle more difficult conditions. It has a hull similar to the well-known Albin Ballad, but is more spacious and more comfortable. The Ballast / Displacement ratio of 42 and Ballast / Lenght to lengths of 260 indicates that although the yacht is designed as a coastal cruiser, it will also perform well in more difficult conditions. The lead keel screwed to the bottom and laminated at the same time is not susceptible to corrosion and is an armored structure in the case of shoals. Skeg protected rudder. In addition, the bottom of the yacht is not flat as in the current constructions, but a bit V-shaped, which reduces the drift and does not give the feeling of tapping against every wave in the course to the wind. It has a single cylinder Yanmar engine (12 HP) which has many advantages. Ours is well-maintained, fires up easily, does not go out, with good access from all sides, easy to use and operate. It will be reliable for a long time to come.
What is important, the parts for it are cheap and available, the most important thing: it burns less than 1 liter per hour!
With a cruising speed of 4.5-5 knots you have a fuel efficient, reliable engine, the yacht is neat and clean.
When you buy now, you are guaranteed insurance until June 2023, a very good technical marina in which it is on land, and in addition, we can introduce you to Greek nuances, contacts and tell you how and where to moor it in the season.
Basic description: Yacht type: Comfort 30 Year of manufacture: 1978 Hull material: Laminate Hull type: Fin keel with skeg rudder Length: 29.82 ft / 9.09 m Width: 3.03 m Draft: 1.7 m Displacement: 3300 kg
Detailed Features:
Hull: Very good condition, zero osmosis, bolted and laminated lead keel, skeg rudder, new anti-fouling 2021
Engine: Yanmar Ysb 12 in good condition, consumption: 1ltr diesel / hour (!), Fuel tank: 40l Revision 2021 - replaced: fuel filters, water hoses, fuel, electric cables, new 100A alternator, new outboard water filter, new siphon, new water temperature sensor, new thermostat, new anode.
Rigging: New fixed rigging in 2018, new boom 2019 (inside: 2 reflines and a glass), adjustable backstay, detachable baby headstay, Furlex genoa Roler, self-tacking jib system (without jib),
Sails: 3 x batten mainsail - one in very good condition (3 reefs) and two spare ones in average condition. 2 x genoa - one Elvstrom company (!) In good condition and a spare one in average condition
Lazy jack All ropes brought to the cockpit 8 capstans (4 under the sprocket and two on the side) plus 2 on the mast.
Steering column: This yacht has non-standard equipment such as an autopilot steering column. Most of the Comfort 30 had a tiller.
Safety measures: Zodiak raft (6 people), VHF Nexus 2000 radio with new antenna and cable from 2018, 2 lifebuoys with a light buoy, lajlin, pyrotechnics
Electronics: Nasa Clipper Duet depth probe, Nasa Clipper Wind wind gauge, Raymarine ST 4000 Autopilot, Geonav 5 GPS / plotter.
Electricity: New installation in 2017: new cables, 3 batteries: 2021 60 Ah engine starter battery, 2 x 2017 hotel batteries 115 Ah +80 Ah, Solar panel 25, which is used to maintain the condition of the battery when we are not on the yacht, installation 230v with 30m connection cable, battery charger, LED navigation lighting
Inside equipment: Two water tanks (45 + 60 l), electric water pump, refrigerator, electric toilet, new cooker, all lights on the led yacht, electric bilge pump (plus new spare) and internal bilge manual pump, led out heating installation without webasto, plenty of storage space under the bunks, navigation table with spacious drawers,
Outdoor equipment: Compass, two anchors: bow and stern, each with 10 meters of chain plus 30 meters of lead-filled anchor line. Scandinavian style bimini top (it is possible to close the entire cockpit in the kennel), sprats, net and wind shields on the rails, bow gangway with a ladder, bathing ladder at the stern, a table in the cockpit, 2 large lockers in the cockpit.
Berths: At the bow there is a double closed berth, mess: 1 single berth, 1 double berth, 1 hund berth. A total of 6 people.
This year, the oils and water filters are replaced
The yacht is currently located in the Takis Shipyard technical marina on the beautiful island of Aegina in Greece. Takis is known for its good reputation, and there are well-equipped nautical and technical shops around, so you won't be missing anything. The price per month in the port or shipyard is EUR 100, which is the same as in Poland! The island is very close to Athens. The ferry from Piraeus takes 40-70 minutes here. So you can get to the yacht from the Athens airport in real terms in 2-3 hours. Add to that cheap airline tickets and the flight itself, which takes 2.5 hours from Poland. This way, you have a yacht within half a day's reach in a great climate and season that lasts most days of the year.
The yacht is fully prepared for departure. All the equipment is left - dishes, pots, blankets, towels, etc. Book a ticket, pack a backpack and you can start your dream vacation in Greece - visiting beautiful islands and nooks :)
Please contact us, I will send more photos to those interested in what'apptMehr anzeigen

name: 1977 Sweden Yachts Comfort 301977 Sweden Yachts Comfort 30
description:
Very nice Swedish Comfort 30 from Sweden Yacht in neat condition, together with the berth in St. Anna Archipelago.
Sankt Anna & Gryt are jewels among treasures. This 70-kilometer natural stretch of the Baltic Sea coast is a wondrous jumble of 6,000 islands and islets. In this fairytale land you can become an explorer.
Why is it very good to have a sailing boat in Sweden? The nature is incredibly beautiful, mooring is quite cheap and you don't need a license for a boat up to 12x4 m
Comfort 30 https://sailboatdata.com/sailboat/comfort-30?units=metric
Lots of space and comfort, with 5 berths. Moderate draft due to wing keel. Extensively equipped. Furling sails, heating, deck shower, autopilot, plotter, shore connection, 2x solar panels, 3xbattery, etc. Boat in very good condition, details as follows: Year built 1977Length 9.09mWidth 3.03mWeight 3200 kgFuel tank: ~60 litersFresh water tank: ~100 liters

Nautical instruments: GPS chart plotter -> Garmin GPSmap 420 model with Blue Chart g2 Vision, Silva compass 2x, depth and speedometer, autopilot (AutoHelm ST2000), VHF radio. Nautical charts available for the Swedish Baltic Sea
Galley: fridge, sink, gas stove, toilet bow anchor stern anchor, engine Lombardini LDW 702M 30 from year 2000. with only 170 hours. And much more....
There are still a few cosmetic repairs, so the price is 16,200 euros
Winter berth with trailer Included in the price.

The Memories is a very well maintained Dufour 30 Classic. This ship is from the second Dutch owner. The Dufour 30 Classic is a comfortable ship with good sailing qualities. The cockpit is spacious and equipped with a handy removable Lagoon cockpit table. A solar panel is mounted on the cabin roof with which the battery is charged even when you are absent. The interior is cozy and well equipped. There is a spacious kitchen with stove and oven. Opposite is a spacious chart table with the switch panel and equipment. The spacious lounge sofas are upholstered with a fresh light-coloured fabric. The tip is fitted with a fold-out headboard that can be used to create a spacious bed with a length of 2.01 metres. The aft cabin also has a long bed. Right next to the entrance is a spacious bathroom with an underwater toilet. You are most welcome to come and view this ship by appointment in Volendam. description: Restored sapele-mahogany Plattgatt yacht, a dream for every wood lover. A stylish, safe and seaworthy cruising yacht with excellent sailing characteristics. This beautiful yacht is a construction of the well-known Scotsman A.K. Balfour. It was produced as a German license - shipyard construction in 1965. The yacht has a comfortable cabin with standing height and elegant interior design, pantry and separate foredeck with toilet area. The boat was recently overhauled by an expert boatyard and is in like-new condition. The entire hull has been recaulked and repainted, the wood is in perfect condition. The hull is totally dry in the bilge and has no condensation anywhere in the interior. The specialist shipyard has invested well over 300 hours of work in the entire interior and exterior overhaul. The interior has 1.90 m headroom throughout the ship. Separate forward cabin with toilet and sink. New upholstery including foam, as well as curtains and curtains. Pantry with petroleum stove. pressurized water system. Navigation: compass, echo, speedometer, VHF, chart plotter. Sails little used and all in good condition, about 40 m².
