name: 2014 unbekannt windrider172014 unbekannt windrider17
description: Windrider 17 is a type of fast multihull boat. Its three hulls are narrow and located parallel to each other, with the middle two-seater hull being the largest, and the two smaller, outer hulls stabilizing the trimaran. The telescopic beams of the hull allow the floats to slide off, which greatly facilitates transport. The operation of the boat is easy, everyone will be sure of control through intuitive controls, which are operated using two levers designed for foot operation. Pressing the lever with the left foot makes a turn to the left, and the right foot to the right. This type of solution allows you to freely operate the sails in a sitting position. Rigging access is not complicated, everything is within easy reach. The boat is very light, it weighs only 182 kg. The aluminum mast rotates while swimming, improving the performance of the mainsail. The construction of steel, aluminum and rotomolded polyethylene makes it almost armored and stable when sailing in strong winds. At the same time, the Windrider's slight draft allows you to swim to the shore without damaging the boat. The trampolines between the hull beams allow additional passengers to relax and rest. The presented trimaran was purchased new in 2014. It is offered with a custom unregistered trailer, 2.5km Yamaha outboard. I sell the trimaran with the following equipment: Double main cockpit covers made of plastic, which ensure watertightness during mooring, built-in bilge pump, new larger jib, which was not equipped with the furler, rudder pedals in the front and rear cockpit, seat cushions and backrest, mast erection and retraction system, two springboards, one on each side of the fuselage, cockpit windshield, all necessary rigging.

name: 2022 MiniCat 4602022 MiniCat 460
description: The MINICAT 460 - Ultra light catamaran 11.5 sqm sail area (furling jib) 4 sail colors are selectable! No trailer or berth necessary, transport in just 3 bags, weight only 58 kg! Construction ready to sail in just 45 minutes Technical data Minicat 460 ESPRIT: LüA ...... 4.60 m width ..... 2.20 m mast ...... 6.10 m (4-part) aluminum (also available as a carbon mast) weight. approx. 58 kg diameter d. Hulls….49 cm Large…….8.0 m2 (carbon fiber reinforced X-PLY sail) Furling jib……3.5 m2 Gennaker……12 m2 (available as an accessory) Trampoline…..1.90 m x 1.45 m Category ………..“D” Load capacity ………450 kg people …….1-4 set-up time …..approx. 45 min transport ….. 2 large bags (each approx. 1.75m x 30 x 30cm) plus 1 smaller bag (1.00m x 30 x 30cm) price ready to sail (incl. VAT, electric pump) excl. Sailing characteristics: The Minicat can be sailed very quickly and sportily with the appropriate wind (4-5 Bft). The boat begins to plane and reaches speeds of up to 15 knots. Due to the minimal boat weight, it can be sailed well even in weak winds. Due to the 2 (1.50m long) plastic keel fins, you can sail upwind with the Minicat very well (hardly any lateral drift) and also has hardly any draft, which makes the boat very practical for flat water and inland areas. Even if the windward hull rises and comes out of the water, the entire keel fin (1.50 m long) on ​​the lee side always remains under water and you always have a lot of lateral surface against drift. For comparison, a center dagger board is then only half in the water and no longer offers a good lateral plan. Due to the long keel fins, the boat also sails very stably on course and does not get out of control and high in the wind. In addition, the 2 plastic fins also offer very good protection for the rubber hulls, because when you pull the boat ashore, it always stands on the hard fins and never on the soft rubber hull. This is no problem even on harder surfaces (e.g. gravel beach)! The 2 keel fins are simply removed for transport, i.e. they are not glued to the hulls. The shape of the bow with the slightly raised bow tips also offers very good sailing characteristics, even in waves, for example, the boat never dives in at the front and always sails with good buoyancy. A possible capsizing over the bow is impossible here. This concept inspires and convinces even experienced professional sailors, like Laura Dekker, to sail the Minicat! So if you are looking for a sporty sailing boat that you can even simply load IN the car, that is also much cheaper than a comparatively rigid hull boat of this size, and that also has no follow-up costs (such as trailer, berth, etc.) then a MINICAT is the right choice for you really trendy ! What does a Minicat offer? No transport problem by car, mobile home or plane! Sail at the weekend or on holiday, without logistical problems such as trailers or berths sporty and safe sailing at speeds of up to 15 knots minimal weight and high stability A catamaran with inflatable hulls, modern design and high-quality technology. Completely portable on its own, the boat fits in just 1 bag (Minicat 310) or 2 bags (Minicat 420). So you don't need a cumbersome trailer transport to the water. The portable boat can even be easily taken by bus, train or plane. The ideal vacation sailor!! For all water & sailing enthusiasts, MINICAT offers the perfect, affordable opportunity to own your own boat without the hassles of transport & storage! excellent sailing characteristics and easy control for young water sports enthusiasts as well as for older, experienced sailors. Or with outboard instead of rig and sail, MINICAT is the ideal dinghy for yacht trips. The safety standard of the MINICAT corresponds to the EU standard, DIN EN ISO 6185, and the CE standard. Design category D according to the EU Sport Craft Directive (inland and coastal waters, bays). MINICAT has a 2-year guarantee on all individual parts. Each individual part of the boat can be reordered immediately in the event of loss or damage. Despite the light weight, the focus during production was on the quality and stability of the material. The boat is a quality product from the Czech Republic. Quote from the YACHT: "The Minicat is a fun boat that is hardly inferior to a GRP beach cat. It's a bit slower - but it costs significantly less, doesn't need a trailer and disappears in the basement in winter." All further information on the page: mini -cat.de There you will also find the 460 in the ELITE CARBON VERSION with carbon mast, boom, bowsprit & rudder! Price ready to sail, incl. VAT, 12V electric pump. Shipping straight to your door! Delivery time only approx. 1 weekShow more

Sail at the weekend or on holiday, without logistical problems such as trailers or berths sporty and safe sailing at speeds of up to 15 knots minimal weight and high stability A catamaran with inflatable hulls, modern design and high-quality technology. Completely portable on its own, the boat fits in just 1 bag (Minicat 310) or 2 bags (Minicat 420). So you don't need a cumbersome trailer transport to the water. The portable boat can even be easily taken by bus, train or plane. The ideal vacation sailor!! For all water & sailing enthusiasts, MINICAT offers the perfect, affordable opportunity to own your own boat without the hassles of transport & storage! excellent sailing characteristics and easy control for young water sports enthusiasts as well as for older, experienced sailors. Or with outboard instead of rig and sail, MINICAT is the ideal dinghy for yacht trips. The safety standard of the MINICAT corresponds to the EU standard, DIN EN ISO 6185, and the CE standard. Design category D according to the EU Sport Craft Directive (inland and coastal waters, bays). MINICAT has a 2-year guarantee on all individual parts. Each individual part of the boat can be reordered immediately in the event of loss or damage. Despite the light weight, the focus during production was on the quality and stability of the material. The boat is a quality product from the Czech Republic. Quote from the YACHT: "The Minicat is a fun boat that is hardly inferior to a GRP beach cat. It's a bit slower - but it costs significantly less, doesn't need a trailer and disappears in the basement in winter." name: 2022 MiniCat 310 Sport2022 MiniCat 310 Sport
description: Now in the new 2022 version, 5 kg lighter than before and with a new, faster assembly concept! With a length of 3.10 m and a sail area of ​​5.25 m2, the 310 offers space for 1-2 sailors. The boat fits completely in just 1 pannier and sailed alone you can reach a sporty 10-12 knots of speed. The 310 SPORT is available in 4 colors, a furling jib (with endless line) is standard. The entire boat is packed in just 1 bag, which can easily be transported in any mobile home, caravan or car (trunk in a station wagon or roof rack). On a camping holiday, the boat can be quickly and easily accommodated in the rear garage or, for example, on a bicycle rack on the camper van and camper van. The boat is set up in just a maximum of 20 minutes thanks to the new, faster assembly concept. 5.2qm sail area (furling jib) 4 sail colors are selectable. Minicat 310 Sport with furling jib: Length:……………………… 3.10 m Width: ………………………1.40 m Mast height: …………………3.80 m Weight : ……………………33 kg Diam./hulls: ………39 cm Mainsail: …………………3.75 sqm Jib: …………………………1.5 sqm Trampoline:………………….1.35m x 95cm Bag Size: …………1.60m x 32cm x36cm Design Category:………….. D (Inland, Coastal) Carrying Capacity: …… ………………..235 Kg Number of people:……………….. 1-2 Top speed: ……………………10-12 knots Max. wind speed: ……………4- 5 Bft Setup: …………………………20 minutes Sailing characteristics: The Minicat can be sailed very quickly and sportily when the wind is right (4-5 Bft). The boat begins to plane and reaches speeds of up to 12 knots. Due to the minimal boat weight, it can be sailed well even in weak winds. Due to the 2 plastic keel fins, you can sail upwind with the Minicat very well (hardly any lateral drift) and also has hardly any draft, which makes the boat very practical for flat water and inland areas. Even if the windward hull rises and comes out of the water, the entire keel fin (1.50 m long) on ​​the lee side always remains under water and you always have a lot of lateral surface against drift. For comparison, a center dagger board is then only half in the water and no longer offers a good lateral plan. Due to the long keel fins, the boat also sails very stably on course and does not get out of control and high in the wind. In addition, the 2 plastic fins also offer very good protection for the rubber hulls, because when you pull the boat ashore, it always stands on the hard fins and never on the soft rubber hull. This is no problem even on harder surfaces (e.g. gravel beach)! The 2 keel fins are simply removed for transport, i.e. they are not glued to the hulls. The shape of the bow with the slightly raised bow tips also offers very good sailing characteristics, even in waves, for example, the boat never dives in at the front and always sails with good buoyancy. A possible capsizing over the bow is impossible here. This concept inspires and convinces even experienced professional sailors, like Laura Dekker, to sail the Minicat! name: 2022 MiniCat GUPPY2022 MiniCat GUPPY
description: New model Minicat GUPPY - it couldn't be more compact. Perhaps the smallest, most compact & most uncomplicated catamaran in the world! Again in cooperation with our long-standing partner Laura Dekker, a new model has been created in the Minicat fleet. The advantage of this boat is the incredibly fast assembly time of only 10 minutes and the very light weight of only 26 kg! The construction concept is new, because the entire trampoline seat remains firmly attached to the 2 hulls and is simply rolled up together with the hulls like a carpet. This means that the boat is ready to sail in just 10 minutes: simply roll out the trampoline and hull, insert the 2 keel fins, inflate the hull. Attach the central tube and the rudder, put the 3-part mast together and pull it into the sail, set the mast - done! A small 1-2 person catamaran, ideal for any holiday luggage, and at a really unbeatable price! The boat (like our 310) fits in just 1 pannier (165x30x30cm). Very well suited for e.g. beginners, younger sailors or spontaneous, uncomplicated after-work sailing!
